story:
Hey! The Comet Knife makes you get a life’s boost, as a continuation of a real man, making you irreplaceable in any crew.

 

 Now you can never get lost even, even in a dense forest. That's because you have a universal and a true knife in your hand. This is not a lemon, but a real knife that can fix many problems, from everyday house use, to outdoors use

Perhaps you are a skilled craftsman, then this is your tool. Before, you were deprived of such a friendly friend. To solve a number of tasks you needed to have a whole toolbox set. But not now. You can even throw away the beer opener, as now you can do it effectively with Comet Knife. Now there’s just one small but very cool knife that can replace everything you ever had.

 

 

 

The Comet knife is practical, functional and suitable for everyday wear. I make my knives by hand, assemble by hand, and sharpen them by hand. So, you get a real piece of mastery.

We had challenges when we began designing the knife. It should be small enough and big enough at the same. Comet Knife is a functional knife and comes with a long service life.

The goal was to establish a compact and multifunctional knife for a long time. The Comet Knife was born after extensive analysis, comparison, technical drawings, and calculations.

 

For inspiration, I took something from Japanise Kiridashi. This is a small beveled blade with one-sided sharpening which is most suitable for precise cutting. 

Also for inspiration, I looked for something from a European jamb knife, which used by shoemakers, artisans, and woodcarvers.

The Comet Knife will become an integral part of your daily life. You will want to wear it all the time, every day. Wherever you go.

It's all about the design - the knife is comfortable and designed to be worn around the neck, as a stylish accessory.

Perhaps someone can underestimate the Comet Knife. But in any case, he will very soon change their mind!

The knife Comet (a mixture of Japan and Europe ) has inexplicably strong charisma, which will be transmitted to you. In any company you always will be in a cuter of attention and call respect with your knife by your side

With Comet Knife, you will have your guardian angel for all time and your faithful amulet that can carry with you and look stylish at the same time.

I am engaged in the manufacture of knives for over 10 years now. I love to invent new models. I long wanted to make a small knife, able to cope with a large number of tasks, which would always be at hand.

 

I would like to devote all my time to creating products that help people more easily cope with everyday activities.  Thus, you not only support me in this project, but also support my enthusiasm, the desire to give you more interesting products.

 For the manufacture of the knife, it was decided to use D2 steel. 

D2 is high-carbon steel that has high hardness, resistance to wear, compression loads and abrasion.   

This steel makes the blade resilient but does not allow it to break. Steel is able to hold the cutting edge for a very long time

  For additional protection of the blade from corrosion, it was further coated with a second layer of anti-corrosion compound.

-- Tightens loose screws.

-- Bottle Opener.

-- Cuts thick Paracords.

-- Emergency Seat Belt Cutting.

-- Slices Foods and Fruits.

--Removes thick Staples

-- Create detailed Wood Carvings

-- Cuts through Wires

-- Scraper (scrape stickers and cleans windshield)

-- Pencil Sharpener

-- Self-defense

-- Personal Safety

 During the development of the Knife Model, there were many ideas and many questions.

One of these questions was: 

How can the knife be held in the case when worn around the neck?

 

And then this simple solution that came to us was: the bead holding was invented.

These blades are among the sharpest and can begin to cut with little or no pressure on the blade. Always use caution and common sense when using your knife. Keep everything that you do not want to be cut far away from the blade.

You must be 18 years or older to buy. Know your local knife laws before buying.

 

You are responsible for checking the local laws to determine if you can import or own this tool. We cannot be held responsible if the parcel was confiscated by customs.

 

I am happy to hear your ideas and feedback, so please continue to send great suggestions. Thank you all!

l
The risks are close to zero, since I already have experience working on Kickstarter and everything is thought out, this means that you are financing the large-scale production of a new product instead of developing a prototype.


 I do not foresee any problems, and I will use my production time to strengthen the plan and the best delivery process.

However, I will always keep you updated on the latest achievements.
I pride myself on excellent customer service and your good reviews.

You can be sure that your time and investments are in safe hands.
I am happy to hear your ideas and feedback, so please continue to send great suggestions.

Thank you all!

story:
Turn your attention to your travel accessories and discover the potential of VINZENCE travel wallet.

 

     The Great Escape wallet enables you to keep all of your essential items in one place while fitting snuggly in your pocket. Section for passport, tickets, cards and bills. Includes hidden pocket for spare change and memory card/sim card

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Don't waste your time at a security checkpoint. All you need to get pass security line is pack in VINZENCE travel wallet ( passport, boarding pass) It's QUICK and convenient.

Cardholder is outfitted with four slots, one slide slot for boarding pass and some cash, and one main slot to carry passport.

   

***PERFECT FIT in you pocket***

 

 

Super slim design makes it perfect for slipping into your trouser, shirt or jacket pocket without leaving a crease.

 

Perfect slim for you to carry everywhere

Unisex design, Functional, Presentable and Stylish enough for gentlemen or gentlewomen style. Convenient for business travel or adventures. Perfect size for any destination.

We just wanted to make a simple minimal wallet but very comfortable.

 

Product Warranty

    We want to make sure you have the best experience with your VINZENCE. Our product offer 1 year warranty against defects from the day it was shipped. This warranty doesn’t cover normal wear and tear, improper use, negligence or accident.

Return Policy

    We will replace or repair items that defect caused by mistake of the manufacture is within the 1 year limited warranty.

    If you are unhappy with your product, you may return it for a refund but please note that in this instance you will NOT be refunded the return shipping.

Shipping Details & Policy

    We offer free tracked shipping worldwide. It is important to note that import taxes and additional changes are NOT included in the price of your order.

    If you don’t get our shipping because you are not there, wrong address and the package returns back to our warehouse, it will be the buyer’s responsibility to pay shipping fee to reship the order.

Risks and Challenges

    This is our first project on crowdfunding. We’re working hard to ensure that everyone will have inspiration to travel. All amount of money we receive, we will use for development in traveller products. Please back this project and support us. We’ll keep you updated in every process.

    Duty/Vat changes & customs depends on each country’s regulation and customs, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/Vat changes.

 

     Campaigns on crowdfunding are built on word of mouth, so we need your help to spread the word. Follow along our adventures below and feel free to share with a friend.

story:
Short Summary

The Terraforma Project was born in August 2013 based on the need for economic and social development in the region, based on the local opening to foreign tourism. While the project was being developed and new skills were acquired, in March 2016 we arrived at the desired concept and decided to dedicate ourselves to the project full time with self-financing, and at the end of the year we were able to approve an application that gave us the support Create with a more detailed business plan and some initial financing for what will be the formation of the Cooperative, but to be able to develop the job and create stable jobs this is not enough.

Concept

The Terraforma Project aims to evolve from a project to promote the region to Cooperative Terraforma, a non-profit cooperative focused on ecotourism, agrotourism and rural tourism, whose objective is to offer tourist animation services such as walking and cycling rails, The village festivals, and the agricultural life, not forgetting, of course, the canoe trips. In addition we also offer workshops in various areas such as construction of urban gardens, photography, observation of fauna and flora. During the low seasons of tourism we have already planned a series of small events that aim at traditional activities like Carnival and the Janeiras. Also in the summer our Festivals: the Fountain Festival, an ecological festival in a village with a long tradition of festivals in São João and the Festival RPM, a sports festival that aims at the competition of ecological sports.
As a non-profit cooperative, we have no profits but surpluses, which will be applied to our conservation projects such as river clearing, pond cleaning and reforestation, as well as our social projects such as sports and artistic clubs and distribution Of agricultural surpluses. The Terraforma project is aimed entirely at the economic and social development of an area affected by bad forestry practices and immigration, and your monetary support as well as the sharing of this campaign will be a great help in the sustainable protection of the Pinhal of Beira Interior Sul.

  •  

Why must you support us

Why Crowdfunding should help:

We know that you are tired of the noise of the city, that you need to find the peace of mind that you don’t have at home, we also know that you need to be in harmony with nature and synchronize energies. What about us? We want to contribute to make your visit to our village productive and unforgettable.

Our region has fantastic natural resources, the best sights, the best gastronomy, a very welcoming population and a unique experience, and we want to share all this wonder with you and yours. But we alone can not, your contribution will take us far.

The amount that we will be able to raise with your help will revert to materials that will be used in our activities, to start cleaning rails and courses, to marketing the project, to purchase sports and safety material, formalize sports clubs, legalization Of the cooperative and development of social projects in the area.

We will grow yes, with you and for you!

Why are we using  crowdfunding to raise funds

As a cooperative, we are not for profit and since we do not intend to ask the banks or the Portuguese Government to help us with our project sustainability and purpose, we have found crowdfunding which is a fundraising campaign in which we are committed to show you The reason for our participation in this adventure and ask you for help so that our cooperative can move forward. Our great motivation is to develop and recreate the tourism of our area with nature walks and prestigious villages in this area; We have nautical activities in the rivers and streams surrounding our county, ending with the desire that our county be visited by foreign tourists and not only.
    By helping us have contributed to our project being sustainable and further driving our marketing campaign that will be very important in our development. In addition to this cooperation will be rewarded with services linked to tourism that will be available to thank for your help.

story:
Mi nombre es Maylin Ramirez, soy de Caracas, Venezuela, tengo un hermoso bebé que pronto cumplirá 2 años, afortunadamente tengo empleo y cuento con el apoyo de mi esposo y mi familia, pero me acerco rápidamente a mis 30 años de edad y a esta altura de mi vida, alcanzar la independencia económica sigue siendo un sueño. Esa es en definitiva la importancia de esta campaña, ayudarme a emprender un negocio en el área turística, que me encamine a obtener libertad financiera, a pesar del mar de dificultades que atravesamos todos en Venezuela. Y esto será posible únicamente si ustedes me prestan su apoyo, por muy pequeño que sea. 

 El financiamiento que requiero para poder hacer la inversión en este negocio es de 1.800$; sin embargo, con un monto mínimo de 800$ ya puedo dar pie a mi ingreso en este moderno negocio, el cual se conoce como Vision Travel, donde me brindan la oportunidad de tener mi propia agencia de viajes virtual, así como de tener a mi disposición su sólida plataforma tecnológica, financiera y educativa que me permitirá hacer crecer mi negocio a través de las redes de mercadeo digital que hoy día no tienen fronteras. 

Cuando tenga mi propia oficina virtual de Vision Travel, podré ofrecerles, no solo boletos aéreos nacionales e internacionales, sino también paquetes turísticos, cruceros y más, a precios altamente competitivos, bajo el respaldo de autoridades internacionales que aseguran la confiabilidad de nuestro trabajo. Así como el valor agregado que significa la atención personalizada  eficiente, atenta y proactiva.

Lograr el objetivo de esta campaña y recaudar los fondos que solicito significaría tantas cosas. No solo la demostración de que en equipo es posible construir un mundo mejor y de que las redes sociales tienen alcances insospechables, sino la confirmación de que debemos seguir soñando y creando caminos que hagan realidad esos sueños.

Lograr el objetivo de esta campaña tendrá un efecto multiplicador en mi familia y en todas las personas que me rodean, porque Vision Travel no solo ofrece servicios turísticos sino que forma líderes.  

La confiabilidad, responsabilidad y seriedad son palabras que puedo decir que me caracterizan, pero también el optimismo, la eficiencia y la seguridad de que puedo lograr las cosas que me propongo. Además, las pruebas que se me han presentado a lo largo de mi corta vida me han demostrado que es imprescindible saber pedir ayuda cuando se nos presenta un problema que no podemos resolver solos. Y es lo que humildemente quiero hacer a través de esta campaña, pedir su colaboración, ayuda, apoyo, aporte, por pequeño que sea, es importante. Juntos llegamos más lejos. 

Si no está dentro de tus posibilidades hacer algún aporte monetario, está bien!, simplemente comparte mi pequeña campaña con aquéllos que tal vez si puedan y conviértete en un agente multiplicador. 

Mil gracias por tu tiempo y atención!

 May.

story:
Ultra lightweight compression packing organisers are here to help you save on luggage space!  

Made with premium ripstop nylon in two sizes, our compression bags come in custom sets to suit your travel needs. 

Small bags are designed for underwear, socks, and other loose items; whilst Large bags are designed for tops, pants, and other outerwear.

 

 

A super easy, one-step zip system compresses your clothes by removing excess air!

 Attention to all detail - a functional bag with a super sleek design.

Reinforced stitching withstands even the most aggressive compressing!

A

An extra pocket at the front can store loose items such as your passport or jewellery, or even your dirty clothes!

Pro-tip: always roll your clothes to fit the most into your bag!

 

 www.facebook.com/altitudebagsau

www.instagram.com/altitudebags

If you have any questions, please contact us at altitudebags@gmail.com

story:
Satori is designed with a patented 5-in-1 recycled ripstop membrane built with hydrophobic fibers; it is waterproof, windproof, breathable, and designed for your lifestyle.

 

 

 

We will be removing the wrist logo and replacing the chest embroidery with a small mountain for those who chose that option. It will be part of the survey.

 

High performance outerwear for everyday use at amazing prices. Our state-of-the-art jackets are crafted for excessive everyday use. A next generation build that is waterproof, windproof,  eco-friendly, and made with a 100% recycled ripstop shell. The ultimate travel jacket for exploring anything from a rain-forest to an urban setting.

By supporting our campaign, you are supporting a growing minority owned business that cares about its customers. Our products endure rigorous testing to ensure the highest quality and standards. Your support means the world to us; thank you!

The most important piece of our outdoor gear kit is the travel jacket. Hikers, climbers, skiers, snowboarders, bikers, mountaineers, or everyday users have to protect themselves from the elements. Introducing Satori, the ultimate travel jacket with balanced weight and performance: 

It is of the utmost importance to us to continue on our mission of delivering high end, sustainable and eco-friendly products that are backed with our warranty. The result is a travel jacket that is packed with features and perfect for all your upcoming travel and outdoor adventures, yet so soft and light you’ll never want to take it off! 

Delivering the highest level of durable, waterproof/breathable protection you need for everyday adventures. We didn't want you to have a soggy jacket when the unexpected rain/sleet came around. So we made Satori waterproof.

 

When it gets windy out there, you feel cold. From breezes while you walk around the city to sudden squalls riding up during your favorite mountain hike, our totally windproof jacket will completely block the wind so you stay protected—and comfortable. 

 

The driving force behind our technology: Breathability. It's essential to have a breathable jacket that blocks rain while simultaneously allowing moisture (aka your sweat) to escape.

 

Our jacket is exceptional in its ability to compress. See it for yourself!!

 

We were excited that our backers loved the many pockets on our first jacket, so we decided to do it again. There are 4 inner and three outer pockets that can hold all your gear.

 

 

Our jacket is the best packable, lightweight, all year-round jacket that will keep you feeling warm and looking stylish anywhere. Perfect for travel and adventure because it doesn’t require much packing space. 

 

Traditional jackets are bulky and awkward, and usually not very eco-friendly. Here’s how the Satori Jacket compares.

No water gets through, and we mean that! While Satori is breathable, allows moisture to escape and provides much comfort to its users, protecting your valuables is of the utmost importance. The YKK zippers and the outer protective ripstop membrane don't allow a single drop of water to penetrate to damage your electronics. See it in action! 

 

According to a report in The BMJ, a leading peer-reviewed medical journal, a person loses 7% to 10% of their body heat through their head. Our double sided, adjustable, helmet-compatible, stretchable, thermal insulated hood with its soft lining for maximum protection and comfort, will keep you warm and protected in every season.

 

Never adjust your hood again when it's windy, rainy or stormy. Our double sided hood is built to keep you safe and protected. See it for yourself:  

You don't even have to adjust the draw strings, you just stretch the hood and cover your helmet, that's it. See for yourself:

 

For safety reasons, we have designed the hood to adjust around any size helmet. 

 

High neck design for added warmth, comfort and protection.

Ventilation is always as important as the fabric itself. Our jacket is designed with a state-of-the-art under-arm ventilation system that is stretchable and allows moisture to escape to keep you cool. 

Mobility is very important when outdoors or traveling. While many jackets feel stiff, our jacket is stretchable and allows you full mobility without any restrictions.

 

Both lightweight and durable, our jacket is constructed with premium fabric and state of the art stitching and is set to protect you while outdoors working, traveling or simply enjoying life.   

 

Level G-III inspection provides assurance of top-quality workmanship and function, and avoiding any issues during production. We have used this type of inspection service before. Our manufacturer's clients include some of the top brands in the world like a Arc'teryx, REI, Patagonia, Columbia, and more.

A fabric must have a UPF of 30 to qualify for The Skin Cancer Foundation’s Seal of Recommendation. A UPF of 30 to 49 offers very good protection, while UPF 50+ rates as excellent. 

 

High quality knitted ripstop fabric is woven; and fade, wrinkle, and crack resistant. 

The Satori jacket is so light and sleek and will look amazing on you. Support us today; back this project!!

If you love to travel and explore other places then you MUST have The Satori Jacket. It is light and easy to pack. One of our ambassadors, Sarah Griffith, is sharing her thoughts about Satori. Sarah travels the world and has been to many countries throughout Asia and South America. Take a listen:

 

Patent pending unmatched 5-in-1 design: provides superior warmth and balanced heat throughout your body. You do not need to have multiple layers to feel the power of SATORI:

 

Every jacket comes with a washing instructions label. For best results: please wash in maximum temperature of 40°C/104°F; do not bleach; hang to dry; do not tumble dry; iron on low temperature; do not dry clean.

 

We know that spills happen, especially when you are out and about enjoying dinner or sipping a glass of wine on a chilly night with your family and friends. So, we made Satori stain resistant! Be it salsa, coffee, beer, wine, soda, or cocktails, our jacket will help you come out of every gathering stain free.  

 

We have compared our jacket with Arc'teryx, Cerium LT, and The North Face Summit L3. Our comparisons are below:

Our Satori™ Jackets are made per standard US sizing. If you are between sizes, we suggest you size up for a comfortable fit.

The Early Bird special prices are available for a limited time, so get yours early! 

We’re dedicated to delivering an amazing product just like we did with our previous campaign, and you can rest assured that the Satori™  Jacket is also top quality. We are expecting to deliver The Satori™ Jacket in November 2020. We will keep you updated of the progress after the end of our campaign. 

If you have any questions related to Packsture during or after the campaign, you can always reach out to us at contact@packsture.com

We have accounts with major shipping companies such as UPS, FEDEX, DHL, and USPS. We shipped most jackets using UPS and FEDEX. Our U.S. backers received their rewards within two (2) to three (3) days of shipping.

For our International backers, we used a combination of FEDEX, DHL, and UPS, and most backers received their jackets within two (2) to (3) weeks of shipping.

COVID-19: As of today, we are not aware of any delays in worldwide shipping. We use commercial accounts, and our packages have been getting to their destinations without any issues. 

For international backers, customs and duties are charged by your country but never by us. Many of our backers received their parcels without any additional charges. We will offer worldwide FREE shipping including insurance and VAT as we did with our first campaign. 

If you follow the sizing chart carefully, the Satori™ jacket will fit you.  Please order a size up if you're between sizes, or your size fluctuates. Still, if you wish to exchange your jacket, we will allow exchanges, but you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping. The item must be unworn and still have the tags attached to it. We have a 30 day exchange policy. 

Our warranty means that you have 10 years to open the package and inspect it for manufacturing defects and send it back to us for a replacement. All garments eventually show signs of wear, and damages and wear-and-tear are not covered under Satori's 10 year warranty. The item must be unworn and still have the tags attached to it. 

We will collect needed sizing and shipping information from you after the campaign ends. We have our own in-house staff that is in charge of fulfillment.  We ship from the United States; we include insurance and tracking for your parcels.

Social media is the best way to connect and communicate with us. You get to tag and follow along on some of our amazing adventures.

It will be part of the survey. High performance outerwear for everyday use at amazing prices. Our state-of-the-art jackets are crafted for excessive everyday use. A next generation build that is waterproof, windproof,  eco-friendly, and made with a 100% recycled ripstop shell. story:
¿Por qué hemos creado este portamaletas?

En muchas ocasiones nos gustaría llevar todo lo que necesitamos a bordo de nuestra scooter y no nos es posible porque el espacio del baúl no es suficiente, y llevar algún bulto entre las piernas puede ser muy peligroso.

Además, creemos que las maletas y las alforjas que existen en el mercado son muy grandes, y están pensadas para viajes largos en grandes motos de carretera pero no para trasladar bultos que puedas llevar en otro medio de transporte. 

Nosotros utilizamos la scooter a diario en la ciudad, para ir a estudiar, al trabajo, a tomar algo al centro, y a partir de ahora al aeropuerto, a la estación de tren, o a la de autobús.

Esta es la principal razón de nuestro proyecto, poder utilizar la moto como medio de transporte complementario a otros transportes de largas distancias.

 

¿Qué hemos desarrollado?

Cocodriloroad es un portaequipaje especialmente orientado a scooters de 125 cc. o superior (aunque también para algunas motocicletas), que se ancla de una manera muy sencilla a una de las asas de pasajero que llevan todos los modelos actuales.

Este anclaje tiene una rótula que permite un movimiento en 360º de la plataforma que sujeta el equipaje para poder adaptarla a cualquier modelo o situación que necesitemos.

Además, esta plataforma dispone de un sistema de correas que nos permite sujetar la maleta de una manera firme y segura.

Pero lo mejor está por llegar, si en algún momento no necesitas transportar nada, cocodriloroad se pliega y puede guardarse dentro del baúl utilizando la bolsa que incluye.

¿Quiénes somos y qué nos llevó a desarrollar este proyecto?

SSomos Álvaro Peña, Sebastian Flores y Pablo Buzarra. Un grupo de compañeros que trabajamos en diferentes campos pero que nos hemos unido para perseguir una idea común. 

Álvaro y Sebastian son directores de una empresa de desarollo web y marketing digital; y Pablo es ingeniero industrial. Los cuatro creemos firmemente en el desarrollo para el transporte de equipaje en scooters que CocodriloRoad puede suponer, y por eso estamos trabajando duro en el proyecto.

La idea principal nace hace un año, cuando uno de nosotros, tenía que coger un vuelo en Barajas y decidió ir en moto, aparcarla allí, y recogerla a la vuelta.

El trayecto de Madrid a Barajas en moto y llevando su maleta de tamaño de cabina de avión fue muy peligroso. La llevaba entre las piernas y le impedía conducir y girar con facilidad.

Una vez nació la primera idea, los cuatro nos pusimos en marcha y desarrollamos Cocodriloroad hasta la fase del prototipo.

Para terminar el proyecto y fabricar nuestro producto en serie, necesitamos ampliar este pequeño equipo. El resto del equipo sois todos vosotros, ya que vuestra ayuda es la única forma de llevar a cabo nuestra primera idea hasta el final.

¿Cómo lo monto en mi moto?

El proceso completo de diseño se ha basado en que el montaje y desmontaje del producto sea lo más sencillo y rápido posible. El anclaje al asa del pasajero se realiza utilizando una pinza de que apretamos en dos puntos con la mano.

Por otro lado, la plataforma es extraíble del anclaje mediante una abrazadera que apretamos con nuestras manos, y el equipaje lo anclamos con un sistema convencional de cinturones, con un cierre central.

 

¿Qué recibo si lo pido ahora?

El producto consta de dos partes diferenciadas. Por un lado, el sistema de anclaje a la moto, y por otro lado, la plataforma que soporta el equipaje plegable. Todo ello va dentro de una bolsa de poliéster de gran calidad que te permite guardar todas las piezas con facilidad.

 

¿Sirve para mi moto?

La idea que hemos perseguido desde el principio es conseguir un producto universal, por esto hemos desarrollado un sistema de doble pinza que pueda adaptarse a cualquier superficie del asa, ya que sabemos que casa modelo tiene un asa diferente.

Además, esta pinza lleva una protección de caucho para evitar que Cocodriloroad raye o deteriore tanto el asa como la carrocería de tu moto.

¿De qué está hecho?

Toda la estructura de está fabricada en aluminio y pintada en color negro. Tanto la pinza que va en la moto, como las abrazaderas que unen las dos partes del producto llevan protecciones de caucho.

 

¿Por qué os necesitamos?

No tenemos fábrica propia y necesitamos mandar una serie de fabricación a una fábrica externa. Esto supone una gran inversión de la que no disponemos.

Ahí entra tu aportación al equipo. Necesitamos tu ayuda para hacer realidad el producto y poder comercializarlo.

¡Os necesitamos para mejorar el viaje a todos los moteros urbanos!

 

¿Cómo podéis ayudarnos?

Nos puedes ayudar de varias maneras: 

1. Haz una donación o una pre-orden de producto. 

2. Síguenos en redes sociales. Vive este viaje con nosotros. Descubre cómo es lanzar un producto al mercado. Enlace a Facebook e Instagram. 

 

Un último favor

Tenemos que llegar al máximo número de personas posible. Si te ha gustado nuestro proyecto compártelo con tus contactos para que también puedan participar en nuestro equipo.

 

Gracias

Después de todo lo que os hemos pedido, sólo nos queda daros las gracias. Gracias por haber leído todo nuestro proyecto y por confiar en nosotros. ¿Te gusta? Compártelo! 

 

¡Estamos deseando que podáis disfrutar de Cocodriloroad.com!

 

 

 

Un pequeño resumen de todo

Producto novedoso y patentado.

Disponibilidad: cuando llegan los reyes magos de oriente. 

Precio: 149€

story:
I've been going to Camp Wanapitei since I was 11 years old. It is a canoe tripping camp in Northern Ontario. This coming summer is my last year of camp, Voyageurs II, a 2 month canoe trip up to the Arctic Circle.

I am earning as much money as I can through working various part-time jobs and hoping to supplement that with this campaign. I need to raise and earn $6000 I need to pay for my portion of the camp fees and travel expenses. I sincerely appreciate your help and support.

To thank you for a $200 donation or above, I will perform a piano show at your house for your event or party, or even just for you.

To thank you for any donation $25 or over, I will make a video playing your favourite song and send it to you.

I can bring a keyboard if you don't have a piano.

Your choice of jazz, pop or holiday tunes.

Here is the description of my trip (from the camp website- www.wanapitei.net) : "Without a doubt, the Voyageur II trip (for 18 year olds) is the pinnacle of the Wanapitei experience. As the only program of its kind in Canada, participants spend about 50 days in the remote wilderness of the Northwest Territories, Yukon or Labrador. As many of our parents tell us, this trip is an investment in life equal to no other.  The challenge of upstream travel, the excitement of arctic whitewater, and the grandeur of the mountains and barrens makes this the trip of a lifetime." Here is a video our friend and neighbour made after her V2 trip: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T_tjqG-XLqU&amp...

story:
They talk about it:

The Rider Post (French)                            Alliancy le mag (French)

Not a long time ago…

We discovered Drift Trikes during a journey abroad and we totally fell in love with the sensation this little vehicle can offer you. It’s right between rally and kart racing.

Unfortunately, like most people, we cannot use this amazing vehicle at home because there is no proper hills to ride. We thought there should be a way to ride these even without hills.

During our research process we tried a lot of options from thermic motors to electrical propulsion. But there is one design that really gave us the best feelings: electrical traction. This is how the e-Trike Flat Drifter is born.


We need you to help us launching the most amazing electric drift trike!

We truly believe this electric vehicle is an amazing way to enjoy cities, nature and landscapes with more fun than ever. To let people all over the world like you discover it, we need some funds to launch the production!

We need your help to raise 25 000€ to produce the first e-Trikes:

Those 25 000€ will help us to buy the raw materials, such as motors, frames, powerful batteries, PVC wheel covers... They will also cover the Crowdfunding expenses (payments fees and website fees).

To convince you to help us we prepared a list of rewards that will blow your mind, from our very unique T-Shirts to a fully equipped e-trike with 2 batteries.

And if you really want to get your hands on this electric drift trike enjoy the early bird reward that let you get a fully equipped BeeRide e-Trike flat drifter for only 1 290€ instead of 1 690€ (limited to 5).

If this project is successfully funded we will be pleased to ship your rewards for Christmas for the apparel & early birds and late January for all others!

About the Electric Drift Trike Flat Drifter

We worked over two years on the perfect Drift Trike. This research has lead us to what the Flat Drifter is going to be. A 1000W motor on a 100% high resistance steel frame and a 48V15Ah Battery. The least you can notice is that it is the most powerful Drift  Trike ever produced.

The combination of this 48V 15Ah battery with the 1000W front motor is just unbelievable. It goes fast, it climbs hills, it can ride every solid ground surface from asphalt to grass. It is the most powerful electric drift trike on the market!

You will make the difference

We started this amazing project with the idea that we wanted to have fun and share the fun with as many people as possible. But beyond the fun part we want to do things properly.

We chose an electric system to avoid any CO2 emission while using our products. Also we designed a product that is strong enough to let you play with it as much as possible. With a single battery charge you’ll be able to enjoy over 2 hours of fun drifting, and if speed is what you're looking for, then you’ll be happy to know that our e-Trike Flat Drifter can go up to 35km/h uphill or 45km/h on flat ground and of course even faster downhill.

We tested it in several conditions and we are proud to have a very strong product that never failed any of our rough tests.

We are also starting partnerships to recycle your old batteries when they’re dead in an ecological way. It really matters to us that our products have the minimum impact on the environment.

A well thought project

Before putting this project online we studied all aspects of it. We invested our savings to develop several prototypes and we now are ready to commercialize our e-Trike in early 2015.

This funding will be the first step in a long run and we would love to have you trying to make history with BeeRide!

About BeeRide

BeeRide is a young innovative company specialized in electric vehicles. With over 10 years of experience in electric motors and batteries we know better than anyone else how to have fun with these vehicles and how to make them. After the successful launch of our electric Mountainboard we are now ready to offer the world the electric Drift Trike it deserves.

Entirely produced in France and ecologically responsible we do our best to preserve mother nature and its beauty. Because we want to grow with our market we need you to show us your support to this project by backing and spreading the word about it!

You love the project but don’t have money to invest?

No problem! Whether you invest or not we would like to thank you for considering our project as something nice! If you can’t be part of the funding you can still spread the word around you and let people now about this amazing new vehicle.

Spread the word and join us on Facebook or Twitter.


What if we go beyond our goal?

Well, if you guys are so enthusiast about this project we have some great surprises.

Stretch Goal 1 - 50 000 €


What are your rewards?



Note that all designs above are prototypes and may differ from the final product that will be shipped. Updates will let you know evolutions in the rewards design.

story:
Hi Friends and Supporters, thanks for your interest in my project. I have been trying to find the support to finish my invention but, as we all know, the current economy doesn't allow for many people to believe in a new product. I'm asking for not only your help but also to believe in me and my product. I hope you checked out the video and saw "The Sniper" in action! As a lifelong ball player and coach, I love all kinds of sports. But the bottom line is I am a teacher and I have a burning passion for making people better at what they do. I have invented and designed a number of successful baseball training devices. They are used at all levels from tee ball to the professional level.

I’ve also spent a fair amount of time on the golf course and played with men and women of a wide range of abilities. If I had to paint them all with one brush, it would be that everyone could drop 5-10 strokes from their game, if they could just drain a higher percentage of putts. Now I’m not talking only longer putts, say outside of 15 feet. I’m primarily talking in the 6 to 15 foot range. That is where the majority of strokes are wasted whether you are an amateur or professional. And its not that their putting stroke is necessarily bad. It's that they just don't have the correct alignment. That's where the Sniper laser comes in.

My research showed that most golf training aids have a very short lifespan. The primary complaints I found is that they do not work for a wide enough range of abilities, and they cannot be used legally on the course. In developing the Sniper Laser Putting System, I took this into consideration. That’s why the same putter you practice with and get the feel for with the laser guidance, is the identical putter you can use on the course, without the lasers installed.

Now I can’t promise you will sink ridiculous putts, like the famous Chevy Chase scene in Caddyshack, http://youtu.be/qNVU23knqZw but I can guarantee you will not only become a better putter and more competitive player, you’ll have a lot more fun, and as YOUR coach that’s my bottom line! Finally, I'm asking you to join the "TEAM" because it is going to take a team to get this done, I clearly see that now. Thank you so much.

story:
About this project

West Coast Tackle Box is a subscription service that delivers a box (or two) of hand-picked, premium fishing tackle to your door every month. We’ll be offering two boxes to start: Saltwater, focused on Salmon, Halibut, Lingcod and bottom fish; and Freshwater, focused on Trout, Steelhead, Bass and Pike. 

We're using Indiegogo to raise the money we need to launch West Coast Tackle Box. A big cost will be the technology needed to automate our subscription service so we can keep prices affordable and continue to provide high quality tackle to you every month. Every contribution, no matter how small, helps us get closer to our goal of making West Coast Tackle Box a reality! 

Not only is this a chance to get a one-of-a-kind West Coast Tackle Box, we want you to be part of our product development. We’ll be following up with all of our Indiegogo backers to hear your thoughts and ideas. We hope you will help us make West Coast Tackle Box even better!

Sample Saltwater West Coast Tackle Box

By partnering with industry-leading tackle producers, we’re able to hand-pick the best selection of premium tackle for your box every month. We’re excited to be working with Gibbs Delta, Jughead Shakers, Lighthouse Lures, Deadly Dicks, Rhys Davis, Mustad, Luhr, Jensen, Rapala and more. With West Coast Tackle Box, you can expect a box of tried-and-true tackle delivered to your door; tested by guys that love to fish as much as you do.



Let us do the research and testing, and find you the best gear – the less you have to do the more time you have to fish! You get great tackle without the hassle. 

Sample Freshwater West Coast Tackle Box

Our Story

In December of 2015, West Coast Tackle Box was founded in Sooke, BC, Canada. We're just two guys who were lucky enough to grow up with some of the best fishing in the world in our own backyard. Through our passion for fishing, we came up with an idea that would deliver great tackle to fishermen's doorsteps so they could spend more time doing what they love. We took the idea to our whiteboard in the garage, and from there, West Coast Tackle Box was born. 

After trying a couple of other boxes, we found that none were focused on the fishing we were doing and the tackle wasn’t being used on our weekly fishing trips. We loved the idea of being able to get a different box of tackle delivered to our door every month. You never know what you’re going to get – it’s like Christmas every month. But we wanted something with quality tackle that we were actually able to use. We were tired of cheap tackle that didn’t do us any good, so the idea came to us to build a company that would provide customers with the best tackle available, tackle they could use and have success with in their local waters. 

We hope that our experience and passion gets you as excited as we are to bring West Coast Tackle Box to fishermen's doorsteps around the world. This is your opportunity to be part of something exciting, creative and fun. You don’t want to miss out on the chance to get your hands on a limited edition West Coast Tackle Box – the boxes we offer on Indiegogo will be the only boxes of their kind we ever make. 

What We Will Use the Funds For

The funds we raise from Indiegogo will be used to build out the technology infrastructure necessary to automate our subscription service so we can keep prices affordable for our customers and continue to provide high quality tackle to you every month. We also need to design our shipping materials that will house our tackle and keep it in tact through its journey to you. 

Shipping will also be a big portion of our costs. Shipping can be a pain, and we want to make our boxes as affordable and convenient as we can. We will require some up-front capital in order to ship our first rounds of boxes and continue to keep our shipping costs down. 


West Coast Tackle Box t-shirts

Risks & Challenges

Although we’ve spent a lot of time planning and developing our idea, we understand that there are inherent risks with any business. As a subscription service, our suppliers and supply chain are particularly important to manage. Suppliers change on a regular basis, and we’ll minimize this risk by offering tackle from a wide range of quality suppliers and maintaining the strong relationship we have with them.

Another challenge we will face is building our customer base so that we can continue to offer affordable prices to you. The more we grow West Coast Tackle Box, the more value we can pass on to our customers every month. We know that with your support we can continually improve each and every West Coast Tackle Box we ship.

Finally, without a successful Indiegogo campaign we risk delaying the official launch of West Coast Tackle Box until later in the year. Our goal has always been to launch in the early days of the summer of 2016. We appreciate all of the support we've received thus far, and it is our hope that support will translate into a successful Indiegogo campaign so that we can get our first-ever West Coast Tackle Box into your hands this summer.

Other Ways You Can Help

Anything you can do to help get the word out about our campaign would be greatly appreciated. We understand that this project isn't for everyone, but if you know people who might be interested, please let them know.

  • Give us a like and share on Facebook, Instagram or Twitter.
  • You can also use the Indiegogo share tools to share this project directly!
Thanks for all the support!

We understand that this project isn't for everyone, but if you know people who might be interested, please let them know.  Give us a like and share on Facebook, Instagram or Twitter. You can also use the Indiegogo share tools to share this project directly!

Thanks for all the support!

story:
The SWAYY Premus™ and Eira™ are your all-in-one hammock camping systems. What started out as a bunch of crazy ideas has now come to fruition in the form of an amazing outdoor experience. Let us SWAYY you to go anywhere and do anything, outside.

 

The Problem

When you put a sleeping bag in the hammock with you, the insulation compresses on your backside and you get cold.

You don't hammock camp? Let us ask a question:

 

The Solution

We use "Loft" technology to hang insulation lower than your bum... No more CBS (Cold Butt Syndrome). 

Loft is the ability of insulation to trap air between the fibers (synthetic insulation) or feather dander (down). Loft allows for the trapped air pockets to be warmed up. For our synthetic insulation, this is achieved by allowing the insulation to Loft without any compression below your backside. The down insulation follows the same model, it just uses a different material.

The SWAYY Premus™ and Eira™ work using 3 main layers of material. 

  • The 1st holds your weight. (Up to 400lbs!)
  • The 2nd insulates you using "loft" so that it does not compress against your backside, in essence, the insulation drapes a little lower than the hammock-body fabric (load-bearing layer). 
  • The 3rd layer is a shell that breaks the wind.

 

Thus we give you: 

The Premus™ is constructed using four parts.

  • The first is the weight bearing layer, or hammock body, is constructed using a 1.6oz per square yard, 40 Denier, nylon fabric with a 6-way ripstop to increase strength and durability. 
  • The second is the insulation layer. This layer consists of two layers of Primaloft Silver 3.0oz insulation to keep opulent warmth. Each insulation layer is cut, sewn, darted and pleated in a specific way to create three specific air gaps under your backside that won't compress.
  • The third is the shell layer. This wind breaking layer is made of a .9oz per square yard, 15 Denier, nylon fabric that is designed to be lightweight and breathable enough to prevent moisture build-up.
  • The fourth and final piece is the full-length zipper. When zipped up, this allows for total warmth for the chilly nice. When unzipped, this allows for a steady warmth under your bum but keeps it cool enough for summer camping. The zipper is a #8 zipper that is strong, durable, and lightweight.

U.S. Provisional Patent App. No. 62/595,254

The Premus™ Suspension is constructed using 3 main parts: The carabiners, CD101 aluminum alloy cinch buckles, and Poly/Dyneema webbing. 

  • The carabiners are made of high grade A6061 cold-forged aluminum alloy. Each biner weights 25.7g. The closed gate strength is 10kN and the open strength is 3kN.
  • The CD101 cinch buckles are crafted for easy tensile adjustability of the hammock and are made using an aluminum alloy for the perfect balance of strength and weight.
  • The high-tensile strength webbing is made from a polyester and Dyneema blend. This keeps the weight and wearability low and the strength high. Our webbing is 1" wide and is 4.9g per foot.

Entire System Tech Specs:

  • Weight Maximum: 400 lbs / 182 kg
  • Length: 10 ft (11ft for long option)
  • Stuff-Sack Dimensions: 19" x 8" x 16"
  • Temperature Rating: Spring-Fall (35-70°F / 1.6 - 21°C)
  • System Weight: 5.1 lbs 
  • Weight Bearing Fabric: Hexon™ 1.6 oz 
  • Shell Fabric: Argon™ .9 oz
  • Heat Reflection: All Sides
  • Fill: Primaloft® Silver Insulation 3.0 oz
  • Suspension Material: 1" Poly/Dyneema Webbing
  • Carabiners: 25.7g A6061 Cold-Forged Aluminum Alloy. 10kN Closed. 

 

The Eira™ is constructed using four parts. 

  • The first is the weight bearing layer, or hammock body, is constructed using a 1.6oz per square yard, 40 Denier, nylon fabric with a 6-way ripstop to increase strength and durability. (Up to 400lbs!)
  • The second is the insulation layer. This layer consists of 20 tubular baffles that hold 800FP DownTek storm treated goose down. Each baffle is filled with precisely 1.25oz of down.
  • The third is the shell layer. This wind breaking layer is made of a .9oz per square yard, 15 Denier, nylon fabric that is designed to be lightweight and breathable enough to prevent moisture build-up. 
  • The fourth and final piece is the full-length zipper. When zipped up, this allows for total warmth for the chilly nice. When unzipped, this allows for a steady warmth under your bum but keeps it cool enough for summer camping. The zipper is a #8 zipper that is strong, durable, and lightweight.

U.S. Provisional Patent App. No. 62/595,254

The Eira™ rain-fly is constructed with 4 main parts: The ridgeline (not attached to the rain-fly), the rain-fly itself, and the rain-fly quick deploy sock (above). Inside each of the four corner hems of the rain-fly, you will find a nail stake connected to the rain-fly by shock cord.

  • At 2.8 grams per foot, the ridgeline is made of 1/2" high-tensile strength polyester that yields low stretch and 500lbs of breaking strength.
  • The rain-fly is made of 2.7oz Wide Sil Nylon. It is a low stretch fabric with a ripstop grid. It has at least 1500 mm of head pressure. This fabric is a lightweight and waterproof.
  • The quick deploy sock cover is made of a 1.6oz 6-way ripstop nylon designed for ease of access to shelter when the storms come rolling in. When the sun comes out, simply place the four titanium nail stakes in their respective channels and pull the sock back to encase your shelter.
  • The 6" and 2.8g ultralight titanium nail stakes can be driven into hard soil without getting bent or damaged.

The Eira™ Suspension is constructed using 3 main parts: The carabiners, the titanium cinch buckles, and the Poly/Dyneema webbing.  Each component is constructed and engineered for the extraordinary adventurer and has our guarantee.

  • The carabiners are made of high grade A6061 cold-forged aluminum alloy. Each biner weights 25.7g. The closed gate strength is 10kN and the open strength is 3kN. 
  • Each of the 11g titanium cinch buckles has been crafted for easy tensile adjustability of the hammock.
  • The high-tensile strength webbing is made from a polyester and Dyneema blend. This keeps the weight and wearability low and the strength high. Our webbing is 1" wide and is 4.9g per foot.

Entire system Tech Specs: 

  • Weight Maximum: 400 lbs / 182 kg
  • Stuff-Sack Dimensions: 14” x 6” x 12” 
  • Hammock Overall Length: 10’ (11' for long option) 
  • Temperature Rating: Four Season (35-70°F / 1.6 - 21°C) 
  • System Weight: 3.1 lbs 
  • Weight Bearing Fabric: Hexon™ 1.6 oz  
  • Shell Fabric: Argon™ .9 oz 
  • Heat Reflection: All Side Insulation 
  • Construction: Baffeled Fill: 800 FP DownTek™ Storm Down
  • Suspension Material: 1" Polypro Webbing (Polyester Dyneema Blend)
  • Carabiners: 25.7g A6061 Cold-Forged Aluminum Alloy. 10kN Closed. 
  • Rainfly Dimensions: 138" × 73" / 350.5cm × 193cm 
  • Anchors: 4 Reinforced Points 
  • Fly Sock: 12' 
  • Fabric: Sil Nylon 2.7oz 
  • Shock Cord: Reflecting 1/8" .4oz 4 
  • Stakes: .3oz Titanium  
  • Outer Layer: DWR Finish

HOW?

With our insulation partnerships with Primaloft® and DownTek®, we offer two hammock systems that are both rated at 35 degrees (comfort).  

 

Brand Partners:

WHY?

When SWAYY was started, we had a vision for more than the creation of awesome outdoor gear. Our vision is to make a lasting difference in the world at large. Watch the video below to get a glimpse of that vision.

 

Rewards:

Questions? Want to help spread the word? 

Founders phone:  (828) 448-8767

Founders email: seth@swayyhammocks.com

 

Risks and challenges

This is our very first Kickstarter campaign, and we have lots to learn, no doubt about it. When tackling anything new, we expect there may be challenges and setbacks, but rest assured we will never stop until the job is completed! We will work around the clock to make sure we deliver, the whole 9 yards, and then some.

1) Generally, fabrics are the longest lead item in our supply chain and if the produced fabric does not meet our high-quality control specifications it will have to be redone. This could cause an unforeseen delay. 

2) While we do expect to have your products to you as quickly as possible, there is always a possibility that we could run into unexpected delays. If this were to happen, and it probably will no, we will keep you updated as quickly and as often as possible. 

3) If by chance we amass an unprecedented number of backers, we could experience a slight delay. However, we are confident that we can deliver! 

With partners such as Primaloft® and DownTek®, we expect to carry forward in providing you with the highest of quality camping gear. 

We are dependent on several other companies staying in business and doing their job well - so with the launch of new products, we sure do appreciate your patience and support! We are founded on the principles of honesty, integrity, and giving back. We are doing everything we can to exceed your expectations, raise them, and equip you with gear that will help you encounter more!
story_txt:
The SWAYY Premus™ and Eira™ are your all-in-one hammock camping systems. What started out as a bunch of crazy ideas has now come to fruition in the form of an amazing outdoor experience. Let us SWAYY you to go anywhere and do anything, outside.
 
The Problem
When you put a sleeping bag in the hammock with you, the insulation compresses on your backside and you get cold.

You don't hammock camp? Let us ask a question:
 
The Solution
We use "Loft" technology to hang insulation lower than your bum... No more CBS (Cold Butt Syndrome). 
Loft is the ability of insulation to trap air between the fibers (synthetic insulation) or feather dander (down). Loft allows for the trapped air pockets to be warmed up. For our synthetic insulation, this is achieved by allowing the insulation to Loft without any compression below your backside. The down insulation follows the same model, it just uses a different material.

The SWAYY Premus™ and Eira™ work using 3 main layers of material. 

The 1st holds your weight. (Up to 400lbs!)
The 2nd insulates you using "loft" so that it does not compress against your backside, in essence, the insulation drapes a little lower than the hammock-body fabric (load-bearing layer). 
The 3rd layer is a shell that breaks the wind.

 
Thus we give you:  
The Premus™ is constructed using four parts.

The first is the weight bearing layer, or hammock body, is constructed using a 1.6oz per square yard, 40 Denier, nylon fabric with a 6-way ripstop to increase strength and durability. 
The second is the insulation layer. This layer consists of two layers of Primaloft Silver 3.0oz insulation to keep opulent warmth. Each insulation layer is cut, sewn, darted and pleated in a specific way to create three specific air gaps under your backside that won't compress.
The third is the shell layer. This wind breaking layer is made of a .9oz per square yard, 15 Denier, nylon fabric that is designed to be lightweight and breathable enough to prevent moisture build-up.
The fourth and final piece is the full-length zipper. When zipped up, this allows for total warmth for the chilly nice. When unzipped, this allows for a steady warmth under your bum but keeps it cool enough for summer camping. The zipper is a #8 zipper that is strong, durable, and lightweight.

U.S. Provisional Patent App. No. 62/595,254









The Premus™ Suspension is constructed using 3 main parts: The carabiners, CD101 aluminum alloy cinch buckles, and Poly/Dyneema webbing. 

The carabiners are made of high grade A6061 cold-forged aluminum alloy. Each biner weights 25.7g. The closed gate strength is 10kN and the open strength is 3kN.
The CD101 cinch buckles are crafted for easy tensile adjustability of the hammock and are made using an aluminum alloy for the perfect balance of strength and weight.
The high-tensile strength webbing is made from a polyester and Dyneema blend. This keeps the weight and wearability low and the strength high. Our webbing is 1" wide and is 4.9g per foot.

Entire System Tech Specs:

Weight Maximum: 400 lbs / 182 kg
Length: 10 ft (11ft for long option)
Stuff-Sack Dimensions: 19" x 8" x 16"
Temperature Rating: Spring-Fall (35-70°F / 1.6 - 21°C)
System Weight: 5.1 lbs 
Weight Bearing Fabric: Hexon™ 1.6 oz 
Shell Fabric: Argon™ .9 oz
Heat Reflection: All Sides
Fill: Primaloft® Silver Insulation 3.0 oz
Suspension Material: 1" Poly/Dyneema Webbing
Carabiners: 25.7g A6061 Cold-Forged Aluminum Alloy. 10kN Closed. 

 

The Eira™ is constructed using four parts. 

The first is the weight bearing layer, or hammock body, is constructed using a 1.6oz per square yard, 40 Denier, nylon fabric with a 6-way ripstop to increase strength and durability. (Up to 400lbs!)
The second is the insulation layer. This layer consists of 20 tubular baffles that hold 800FP DownTek storm treated goose down. Each baffle is filled with precisely 1.25oz of down.
The third is the shell layer. This wind breaking layer is made of a .9oz per square yard, 15 Denier, nylon fabric that is designed to be lightweight and breathable enough to prevent moisture build-up. 
The fourth and final piece is the full-length zipper. When zipped up, this allows for total warmth for the chilly nice. When unzipped, this allows for a steady warmth under your bum but keeps it cool enough for summer camping. The zipper is a #8 zipper that is strong, durable, and lightweight.

U.S. Provisional Patent App. No. 62/595,254








The Eira™ rain-fly is constructed with 4 main parts: The ridgeline (not attached to the rain-fly), the rain-fly itself, and the rain-fly quick deploy sock (above). Inside each of the four corner hems of the rain-fly, you will find a nail stake connected to the rain-fly by shock cord.

At 2.8 grams per foot, the ridgeline is made of 1/2" high-tensile strength polyester that yields low stretch and 500lbs of breaking strength.
The rain-fly is made of 2.7oz Wide Sil Nylon. It is a low stretch fabric with a ripstop grid. It has at least 1500 mm of head pressure. This fabric is a lightweight and waterproof.
The quick deploy sock cover is made of a 1.6oz 6-way ripstop nylon designed for ease of access to shelter when the storms come rolling in. When the sun comes out, simply place the four titanium nail stakes in their respective channels and pull the sock back to encase your shelter.
The 6" and 2.8g ultralight titanium nail stakes can be driven into hard soil without getting bent or damaged.


The Eira™ Suspension is constructed using 3 main parts: The carabiners, the titanium cinch buckles, and the Poly/Dyneema webbing.  Each component is constructed and engineered for the extraordinary adventurer and has our guarantee.

The carabiners are made of high grade A6061 cold-forged aluminum alloy. Each biner weights 25.7g. The closed gate strength is 10kN and the open strength is 3kN. 
Each of the 11g titanium cinch buckles has been crafted for easy tensile adjustability of the hammock.
The high-tensile strength webbing is made from a polyester and Dyneema blend. This keeps the weight and wearability low and the strength high. Our webbing is 1" wide and is 4.9g per foot.

Entire system Tech Specs: 

Weight Maximum: 400 lbs / 182 kg
Stuff-Sack Dimensions: 14” x 6” x 12” 
Hammock Overall Length: 10’ (11' for long option) 
Temperature Rating: Four Season (35-70°F / 1.6 - 21°C) 
System Weight: 3.1 lbs 
Weight Bearing Fabric: Hexon™ 1.6 oz  
Shell Fabric: Argon™ .9 oz 
Heat Reflection: All Side Insulation 
Construction: Baffeled Fill: 800 FP DownTek™ Storm Down
Suspension Material: 1" Polypro Webbing (Polyester Dyneema Blend)
Carabiners: 25.7g A6061 Cold-Forged Aluminum Alloy. 10kN Closed. 
Rainfly Dimensions: 138" × 73" / 350.5cm × 193cm 
Anchors: 4 Reinforced Points 
Fly Sock: 12' 
Fabric: Sil Nylon 2.7oz 
Shock Cord: Reflecting 1/8" .4oz 4 
Stakes: .3oz Titanium  
Outer Layer: DWR Finish





HOW?
With our insulation partnerships with Primaloft® and DownTek®, we offer two hammock systems that are both rated at 35 degrees (comfort).  
 
Brand Partners:


WHY?
When SWAYY was started, we had a vision for more than the creation of awesome outdoor gear. Our vision is to make a lasting difference in the world at large. Watch the video below to get a glimpse of that vision.
 
Rewards:










Questions? Want to help spread the word? 
Founders phone:  (828) 448-8767
Founders email: seth@swayyhammocks.com
 
Risks and challenges
This is our very first Kickstarter campaign, and we have lots to learn, no doubt about it. When tackling anything new, we expect there may be challenges and setbacks, but rest assured we will never stop until the job is completed! We will work around the clock to make sure we deliver, the whole 9 yards, and then some.
1) Generally, fabrics are the longest lead item in our supply chain and if the produced fabric does not meet our high-quality control specifications it will have to be redone. This could cause an unforeseen delay. 
2) While we do expect to have your products to you as quickly as possible, there is always a possibility that we could run into unexpected delays. If this were to happen, and it probably will no, we will keep you updated as quickly and as often as possible. 
3) If by chance we amass an unprecedented number of backers, we could experience a slight delay. However, we are confident that we can deliver! 
With partners such as Primaloft® and DownTek®, we expect to carry forward in providing you with the highest of quality camping gear. 
We are dependent on several other companies staying in business and doing their job well - so with the launch of new products, we sure do appreciate your patience and support! We are founded on the principles of honesty, integrity, and giving back. We are doing everything we can to exceed your expectations, raise them, and equip you with gear that will help you encounter more!

story:
AS SEEN ON...


How many times have you been in a situation where you needed a pen but one was not available? 

Chances are more than once, but that doesn’t need to happen. We've designed an Everyday Carry Keychain Pen that can be with you at all times. There is no need to remove it from a clip or split ring on your keychain to use.

This is a well-crafted pen that will last generations! 

Specs: 

  • 0.35" (9mm) Diameter
  • 3.25" Long Closed, On Keychain
  • 2.94" Long Open 'In-Use', Off Keychain
  • Ink - D-1 Style Fisher Space Ink Refill

I have been hand making pens on a very old (1930s) and well-built manual lathe. I love the thing. Every time I use it, I think back to what it must have been like when it was new. Lathes such as these were a staple in shops everywhere. The smokey and oil filled atmosphere and the sound of the humming from them all. 

These lathes were used all over the world. The machines were used in every type of industry, in schools, home workshops and large manufacturers. They were used where the finest accuracy was required. Much of their success was due in part to trained and skilled machinists. 

I would like to begin to utilize the technology of today and begin making these pens the CNC way. I have purchased a CNC lathe but that is just the beginning. Making a precision product takes a good machine and a good machinist but it also needs precision made tooling and a lot of it.


Risks and challenges

When manufacturing any product there are always risks and challenges but I prefer to call these opportunities. I have done my best to plan the entire process, executing it is the next step. I am excited to get moving on it, so the rest is up to you. During the entire process I will post updates to backers so they know where I am at all times.

Risks

The biggest risk, like most campaigns, is not meeting the deadline. While I have planned realistic goals and then added some extra time, there is always a chance for a delay. I have set a date of December, which seems like a long time off, and it is. I have set that date as a "safe" date. I hope and plan to deliver early.

Challenges

In the process of manufacturing a product from start to finish and then shipping it out, there are many steps to accomplish. In my case, I have the additional task of getting the machine installed and setup before moving on to tooling and programming for these pens. After the CNC machine is in place, setup, tooled and a few test samples have been run, the production starts. The production process takes a big chunk of time but there is still plenty to be done after that. At that point, when production is done, just one step in creating the finished product is complete. In the shop, the next steps include, inspection, cleaning, assembly, boxing and packing. From there, its out of the shop and off to the computer to prepare the shipping paperwork.

story:
"One"is a portable and refillable spray. You can carry all type of liquids that can be contained is a spray and refill as you like. Thanks to its unscratchable, stainless and waterproof body it can withstand outdoor environment

 

 

With "One", you can carry your daily use liquids with you. It is easy and practical to refill the liquids that you may use like the following

 

 

 

 

"One" will be shipped with the box special to you. This box contains 1 spray, 1 keychain, and 1 zipper rope. It can be used both a present and a self motivation for a long period of time

 

 

One will be available with 3 color options. Body is made of stainless steel. Therefore it can be carried in your pocket, bag or outside environment confidently

 

 

The story begins when I forgot to take my bug spray last summer. After this bad practice, I started to think a practical container to carry bug spray for daily use. We examined the goods in the market and we started to make a more compact and a higher quality product. We finally have the prototype. The main reason to give the name as “ONE” comes from the all in one principal

 

 

 

World's first neodimyum magnetic valve system which has long durability,uninterruptible service and stainless parts.

PATENT NUMBER:2017-GE-104231

FILE NUMBER:2017/04027

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Production process for outer case have 4 stages. First, the main container will have a die cast process. Secondly, the metal lathe process will be done. Lazer logo will be employed and finally surface erosion will be implemented. The inner pieces will be imported from the OEM manufacturer.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Why you should purchase?

Almost everybody uses sprays in daily life. Parfumes, hair sprays, sun oils, etc. can be used with One. It is easy to use these luqids in a less space than its original container which makes it portable readily.

 

  • Is it possible to see ONE in any other shop?

No, it will be available only in Indiegogo

 

  •  Do product tests implemented

Yes, they are implemented on the prototype and all the tests passed.

More details can be found in the following video.

 

  • Can the inner container be disassembled?

No, it can’t be but it can be refilled. For a different type of liquid usage, seperate ONE should be ordered.

 

  • Is it possible to refund

A 30 day refund is possible without any cutoff

 

  • What happens if the product get broken?

It will be replaced with a new one if it is posted to us. Only the courier will be paid by the customers.

 

  • Does it have any patent

We already applied for the patent and patent is pending.

 

  • Is it possible to carry in a flight cabin?

Since it has only 5 ml of volume, it can be carried in the cabin according to the flight regulations.

https://www.tsa.gov/travel/security-screening/l...

http://ec.europa.eu/transport/modes/air/securit...

  • Why crowdfunding?

We chose this way purely for economical reasons. Since we don’t have enough financial resources, we thought that crowdfunding will be the best way. Since initial production setup costs are more than we can fund.

 

We don’t think it will be any problem in the production phase. We made the necessary connections with the suppliers in both design and production phase. 

 

                                          

 

Coming Soon 

www.onesprays.com

story:
Some time ago I recognised people in the streets riding nice and simple constructed bikes – no speeds and brakes – Fixed Gears. The fixed-gear bicycles’ owners formed into a separate subculture. The bikes began to appear at many places – the high-road and track bikes became a true design object.


______

My name is Sergey and I am the author of GetFixed. I’m an art-director and chief of design department. During last 3 years of my 5-year experience, I worked mainly with web and app design. I’m an author of creative concepts for many start-ups, advertising projects, web pages and brand books.

In March 2013 I made my first fix:

There are lots of people like me. I had an idea to create a community of all fixed gear enthusiasts from the entire world. The main task is to promote the fixers and the way of life, behind it. I just want to make riding popular, and fixed gear riding as well. But we don't have a platform, where you may easily find guys to ride around your town in the evening, chat and relax after a hard working day. And even find soul mates in another town. Or imagine you need to find a spare part for your bike. Currently we are split into FB groups, forums, which no one knows and can’t find them. It’s a true quest – you have to search it on the Internet all days out. Thousands of bikes’ stores and enthusiasts. 

The app is already has a design prototype and I'm here to get your help in completing it.

GetFixed is a non-commercial project, but rather an initiative. The app is and will remain free to download and use.

I want to create a community that will inspire, develop and support a worldwide fix-movement.


MY GOAL WITH THIS APP

It's primary aim is to unite all fixed gear fans by giving them a platform to find new fixed gear friends nearby (using geo-location), join rides set up by others or start their own, as well as buy or sell bicycle parts.

We combined a geolocation-based social network with a classified ad service – all of that just for fixed gear bicycle owners. You can not only make a profile for yourself, but for your bicycle as well. Add photos and describe each bicycle part so others know what you have installed. The geo-specific part of the app breaks users by areas that could be a city, district, state or country and makes it easy to find ride buddies nearby.

Main features of GetFixed include:  

  • News Feed
  • Posts Check-ins
  • Photo / Video sharing
  • Rides
  • Buy and Sell 
  • Events


WHERE DOES THE MONEY GO?

Members of our team are doing the design and back-end (server part) as a contribution to the project. We need your support to develop iOS and Android apps, so 100% of the money will go towards it (minus cost of stickers and bells).

______

Honestly speaking, I do it for my soul and I wish to bring this idea into life, let people use and popularize the fixed gear culture through GetFixed. I constantly work on that. The app will be grandious and I need your help.


Risks and challenges

Due to a numerous orders for bells, the delays of delivery are possible. We have a wonderful team: web engineer, designer and programmer. We will do our best to launch the app in time both for iOS and Android.
