story:
What is the Travelshowerhero? 

The Travelshowerhero is a compact hand shower you can take on all your trips, without wasting unnecessary space in your luggage. It comes in a stable package, and it helps guarantee your clean feeling while and after showering. The Travelshowerhero is only 6.7 inches long and 1.4 inches wide. The package is only 7 inches long and 1.7 inches wide.

But I already have a hand shower; do I need the Travelshowerhero?

The standard hand shower is great for one place: your home. It will be installed once and exchanged if calcified or leaking. But you won’t use the Travelshowerhero only in your bathroom. You take it with you on your trips to guarantee cleanliness with every shower you take. From now on, it will be your traveling companion :-)

 


What materials is the Travelshowerhero made from? 

It is made of chromed brass. That allows you to screw it on and off as often as you want. Also, it feels great in your hand. The package is composed of solid cardboard. It is very stable, so you don’t have to worry about damage in your suitcase.

Does the Travelshowerhero fit in every suitcase?

Simple answer: Yes. It fits in all your suitcases, in your hand luggage, and even in your handbag. The Travelshowerhero is very helpful for globetrotters because of the small space it takes. Just look how small the package is compared to the toothbrush.

How do I use the Travelshowerhero? 

You don’t have to be an expert to install it. The principle is very simple. You just screw the dirty hand shower off and screw your Travelshowerhero on the hose connection. Most are standardized.  It is a 1/2 inch thread, so it fits in almost every shower.

 

And what if the hotel already has a clean hand shower?

This is something you never know in advance. You better take a Travelshowerhero with you to guarantee a clean shower. It doesn’t even take much space in your luggage. But maybe you don’t like the spray mode of the hotel hand shower. Then you can simply screw the Travelshowerhero on the hose, and you get your usual shower feeling back.

Here are examples of hand showers that are not that nice:

Can I use the Travelshowerhero at home as well? 

You can! Because of the standardized hose connection, it fits in nearly every bathroom. You even save water because the flow rate is only 8-9 l / min. And if you go traveling, you just screw it down and put it in the package and then in your luggage. So, don’t throw away the package; it is helpful to protect the Travelshowerhero in your luggage. This is why you must pay attention to the next step of the drying process in order not to damage the packaging!

How do I clean the Travelshowerhero right before I put it back in the package?

If you are in a hurry, try at least to shake the Travelshowerhero so the last drops of water will leave it. Subsequently, you just wipe it with a damp cloth. The nozzles are easy to clean, so don’t worry. For the perfect result, let the Travelshowerhero dry for 15 minutes after this procedure. And that’s it!

How to become a contributor?


If you want to be a contributor you just have to follow two simple steps:

 

  1. Choose a Perk
    You can choose between 5 Perks.
    Take the one you like the most and click on it.
  2. Enter personal data and submit payment
    If you are already a member of Indiegogo, just log in. If you are a guest, you have to enter your name and your E-Mail address.

    Then you have to enter your Delivery address. Unfortunately, there is only one payment option: PayPal.
    Finally. you decide whether you want to make the support anonymous or public. To complete the whole process, click on „Continue to PayPal“. Now you will be redirected to PayPal.


That’s it!

A few seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the Travelshowerhero community! Share our campaign with your family and friends!

 

Risks and challenges

We are dedicated to delivering you the Travelshowerhero with the best quality. After finding the manufacturer and testing the prototype, we are confident the production will run smoothly. We reduced the risk, but there is unfortunately always the chance that something doesn’t work like it should.
In this case, we promise you to be honest and to inform you about it, whether there are problems with the timeline, with the production, or something else.
Of course, we will work hard to try to solve the problem and bring the ultimate travel shower solution to you.

Was ist der Travelshowerhero? 

Der Travelshowerhero ist eine kompakte Handbrause, die du mit zu jedem Trip nehmen kannst, ohne unnötigen Platz in deinem Gepäck zu verschwenden. Er hilft dir, dein sauberes Wohlbefinden beim und nach dem Duschen im Urlaub beizubehalten. Der Travelshowerhero ist nur 17 cm lang und 3,5 cm breit. Die Verpackung ist 17,8 cm lang und 4,4 cm breit

Aber ich habe zu Hause doch schon eine Handbrause, brauch ich den Travelshowerhero wirklich? 

Deine Handbrause ist großartig, aber nur für einen Ort: Dein Zuhause! Sie wird einmal an den Schlauch geschraubt und wieder gewechselt wenn sie leckt oder verkalkt ist. Aber der Travelshowerhero wird nicht nur in deinem Bad benutzt. Du nimmst ihn mit zu deine Reisen um deine Sauberkeit auch im Urlaub zu garantieren. Von jetzt an ist er dein Reisebegleiter :-) 

Aus welchen Materialien besteht der Travelshowerhero? 

Er besteht aus verchromtem Messing. Das heißt, dass du ihn so oft wie du willst ab und wieder draufmontieren kannst. Die Verpackung besteht vollkommen aus Pappe. Sie ist sehr stabil und schützt den Travelshowerhero vor Schäden in deinem Gepäck.

Passt der Travelshowerhero in jedes Gepäckstück? 

Simple Antwort: Ja, er passt ohne Probleme in jeden Koffer, in jede Tasche und selbst in dein Handgepäck. Der Travelshowerhero ist sehr hilfreich für Backpacker weil er so wenig Platz in der Tasche verbraucht. Schau einfach mal, wie klein die Verpackung im Vergleich zu einer Zahnbürste ist. 

Wie benutzte ich den Travelshowerhero? 

Man muss kein Experte sein um ihn zu installieren. Das Prinzip ist sehr simple. Man schraubt einfach die dreckige Handbrause des Hotels ab und schraubt den Travelshowerhero an den Anschluss am Schlauch. Die meisten Schlauchanschlüsse sind genormt, das heißt, dass sie ein 1/2 Zoll Gewinde haben. Also kann man den Travelshowerhero in fast jeder Dusche benutzen. 

Und wenn das Hotel eine saubere Handbrause besitzt? 

Das kann man meistens vor der ersten Reise in das Hotel nicht wissen. Um sicher zu gehen, dass man keinen Schreck im Badezimmer bekommt, nimmst du lieber einen Travelshowerhero mit. Da er so klein ist, nimmt er auch nicht viel Platz im Koffer ein. Vielleicht ist aber auch die Strahlart der Handbrause im Hotel nicht so wie du sie dir wünscht. Dann kannst du einfach den Travelshowerhero drauf schrauben und du hast sofort dein gewohntes Duschgefühl wieder.

Hier sind einige Beispiele, die nicht so schön sind:

Kann ich den Travelshowerhero auch in meiner Dusche benutzen? 

Selbstverständlich. Richtig gut sogar! Wegen des genormten Anschlusses, passt er in fast jede Dusche. Du sparst sogar Wasser weil die Durchflussmenge nur 8-9l/min beträgt.Und wenn du mal Reisen gehst, schraubst du ihn einfach ab, steckst ihn wieder in die Verpackung und anschließend in dein Gepäck. Also schmeiß die Box nicht weg! Sie wird dir noch bei deinen unzähligen Reisen helfen, den Travelshowerhero unbeschädigt mitzunehmen. Deswegen musst du unbedingt auch den nächsten Schritt mit dem Trocknen beachten um die Verpackung nicht zu beschädigen!

Wie reinige ich den Travelshowerhero richtig, bevor ich ihn wieder in die Verpackung lege?

Wenn du es mal eilig hast, solltest du wenigstens versuchen, den Travelshowerhero auszuschütteln, um die restliche Feuchtigkeit aus dem Korpus zu bekommen. Danach einfach nur noch mit einem Lappen abwischen. Die Düsen sind leicht zu reinigen also keine Sorge. Für ein perfektes Ergebnis, sollte man den Travelshowerhero 15 Minuten, bevor man ihn einpackt, trocknen lassen.
Und das wars!

Wie kann ich die Kampagne Unterstützen?


Wenn du ein Unterstützer sein möchtest, musst du nur diesen zwei simplen Schritten folgen:

  1. Wähle einen Perk
    Du kannst zwischen 5 Perks wählen.
    Wähle das Perk, das du haben möchtest und klick es an.
  2. Persönliche Daten eingeben und Zahlung abschicken
    Wenn du Mitglied bei Indiegogo bist, logge dich einfach ein. Falls du ein Gast bist, musst du deinen Namen und deine E-Mail Adresse eingeben.

    Dann gibst du deine Lieferadresse ein. Es gibt leider nur eine Zahlungsart: PayPal.
    Anschließend entscheidest du, ob du die Unterstützung anonym oder öffentlich machen möchtest.
    Um das ganze abzuschließen, klickst du auf „Weiter zu Paypal“. Jetzt wirst du weiter zu PayPal weitergeleitet.


Das wars auch schon!

Ein paar Sekunden deiner Zeit, könnten den Unterschied im Wachstum unserer Travelshowerhero Community machen! Teile unsere Kampagne mit deiner Familie und deinen Freunden!

 

Risiken und Herausforderungen

Wir sind bemüht, den Travelshowerhero mit der besten Qualität zu liefern. Nachdem wir den Hersteller gefunden und den Prototyp getestet haben, sind wir zuversichtlich, dass die Produktion reibungslos verläuft.

In diesem Fall versprechen wir Dir, ehrlich zu sein und Dich zu informieren, falls es Probleme mit dem Zeitplan, mit der Produktion oder etwas anderem gibt. Selbstverständlich arbeiten wir hart daran, mögliche Probleme zu vermeiden und Dir die ultimative Reiseduschlösung zu liefern.

story:
Whether you are commuting to work or shopping on the weekends, you want to feel free. The open roads are calling out to you, but at the same time, you don't want to fall into the same trap that so many others are falling into. Cars and motorcycles are, you know too well, destructive for the planet. That's why you have chosen to go a different route – to ride an e-bike instead.

You don't just want any old e-bike, though. You want the very best that you can get. We understand. With the wind in your hair, the pavement passing underneath you, you should feel like you are riding a world-class piece of machinery.

That is why we have created JI-MOVE II, an e-bike that always standard to the highest standards of quality, fun, convenience, and eco-friendliness. We have passed the EN15194 EU comprehensive safety standard certification for e-bikes in order to ensure a smooth ride every time. 

If you are ready to ride into the future, JI-MOVE II is the e-bike to do it on. Just check out all of these features.

You can remove the lithium battery from JI-MOVE II as necessary. That way, you can swap batteries in and out, keeping yourself charged for miles and miles. Otherwise, you can insert the charger directly into the body, which is perfect for overnight charging.

We have gone with the "less is more" philosophy in designing JI-MOVE II, eliminating any unnecessary parts so that it looks sleek and stylish.

Both of these features mean that you can store JI-MOVE II easily – which will come in handy if you need to stash your e-bike while you are working or visiting family.

The key to welding, as we see it, is tastefulness. We have used solder joints without any fish pattern welding so that the entire look is uniform. The 16-inch three-lobe magnesium alloy wheels pair nicely with the 6061 aviation aluminum alloy as well.

In the front wheel, there are powerful shock absorbers, which means that potholes and debris won't cause the same pain that you would if you were riding any e-bike other than JI-MOVE II.

The motor on JI-MOVE II runs at 350w, affording you the power you need to climb slopes and accelerate quickly.What's your mode? On JI-MOVE II, you get to choose human riding, electric-assisted riding, and pure electric riding. Pick the one that works for you from one right to the next！We are ready to bring our cutting-edge e-bike to riders all around the world. To make that happen, though, we need to do one thing: raise the capital we need to cover our start-up costs. We have calculated total costs of $10000. That includes manufacturing, marketing, and distribution. If we raise anything above that goal amount, we will spend the rest on R&D, looking into the next generation sooner.

story:
The FUNCTION flashlight was designed for the person that doesn't want a specific light for every task. Because of the light's dual 1/4-20 tripod threads and unique form factor, it's much more versatile than the standard stick flashlight configuration. The Function flashlight can output up to 1600 lumens but since its output is infinitely variable, you can turn the brightness down to exactly where you need it. This light can be used for biking, hiking, camping, and videography just to list a few. Support our project to take advantage of the introductory pricing! 

 Features and Specifications

 

Infinitely Adjustable Output - Pressing down on the switch turns the light on and off. Rotating the control knob allows the user to adjust the output from less than 1 lumen to 1600 lumens.

3 x LED emitters - Cree XPG2 for maximum lumens or Nichia 219 Hi CRI for a neutral white beam with perfect color rendition

Copper LED Star Board - The emitters will be installed on a copper "pillar" star board which has no dieletric layer like the typical LED star boards. The custom  board allows the LEDs to run cooler for a longer life. Also, it allows us to drive the LED harder without sacrificing too much efficiency.

Aluminum Unibody - The body is intricately CNC machined from a solid block of 6061 aluminum.

Size - 3.31" x 1" x 1.85" (84mm x 25.4mm x 47mm)

Weight - 5.5oz (156g) 

HAIII Hard anodized - All aluminum parts on the light are anodized in matte black. The HAIII anodizing provides a scratch resistant coating with a 0.001" thickness.

Strobe - Strobe mode offers variable strobe flash rate and variable strobe brightness.

Battery Compatibility - The Function light can be used a single Lithium Ion  18650, two Primary CR123A, or two Lithium Ion 18350 batteries.

Battery Life (on Max)

Lithium Ion 18650 - 1 hr 40 min

CR123A Lithium - 1 hr

IMR18350 - 40min

Reverse Polarity Protection - The light's driver circuitry is designed to protect itself if the battery is ever installed backwards.

1/4-20 Tripod Mounting Threads - Two 1/4-20 tripod threads on the top and back of the light allows fo easy mounting with commonly available camera mounts.

Anti-Reflective Coated Glass - The mineral glass lens has an anti-reflective coating on both surfaces to maximize the light output.

Water Resistant - The Function light is designed with O-rings and gaskets so that it can function in any weather condition.

Battery lockout - A half turn counter-clockwise on the battery cap will lock out the light to prevent accidental activation

Thermal Protection - An on board temperature chip allows the microcontroller to manage the heat generated by the LED's.

Microcontroller Powered - The functionality of the light is all programmed via an ATTINY microcontroller. With a 8-SOIC clip, the Function flashlight can be reprogrammed such that it meets your specific needs.

 

 

Operation

 

Mode 0 - The light will be OFF in Mode 0.

Mode 1 - The light will be On in Mode 1 and adjusting the knob will change the output brightness of the light.

Mode 2 - Rate control strobe mode allows the user to change the strobe rate via the control knob. By default, the brightness is 100% but the brightness will be saved when adjusted in Mode 3.

Mode 3 - Brightness control strobe mode allows the user to change the strobe brightness via the control knob. The strobe rate is determined by the setting in Mode 2.

Soft Lockout - Soft lockout will prevent accidental activation of the light. 

Mechanical Lockout - Mechanical lockout will prevent accidental activation of the light by physically disconnecting the battery. Using the mechanical lockout is recommended when the Function flashlight will be stored away for a long period of time.

 

What You Get

  • Cool White Cree XPG2 or Neutral White Nichia 219 High CRI emitter
  • CR123A battery tube to prevent rattling when using the smaller diameter batteries
  • Narrow (24°), Medium (30°) or Wide (40°) optic

Accessories

Check out the gallery for images of the different accessories.

Billet aluminum go pro mount - This mount will allow you to use the Function light with practically any GoPro mount.

Magnetic Ouput Modifier - A lantern dome, red or blue filter, or diffuser can be easily attached via the embedded magnet.

Magnet mount - The magnet screws into the rear 1/4-20 threaded hole and allows the attachment of the light to any ferrous surface.

Bike Helmet mount -  Allows for mounting of the Function light onto any standard bike helmet. The mount attaches to the helmet via velco straps through the helmet's vent holes.

Bike Handlebar Mount - The handle bar mount allows for easy installation of the Function light onto any bike handlebar.

Backpack mount - A stainless steel clip which allows the Function light to be attached to the shoulder strap of a backpack. The clip is made from a ferrous grade of stainless to allow the clip to be used with the magnet mount for quick removal.

Suction Cup Mount - The suction cup mount will attach to any smooth flat surface. It will be great for attaching the light onto full faced helmets.

Hotshoe mount - The hotshoe mount with ball head is great for those that want to film video with the Function light. 

Additional Optics - Different beam pattern optics will also be avialable for the user to go from Narrow (24°), Medium (30°) or Wide optics (40°).

 

 

Shipping Costs

Shipping costs are not included as part of the contribution of the Perk. The final shipping cost will depend on your location and any additional accessories you order. All items will ship out from Canada via Canada Post.

 

Project Progress

We have a few fully functioning prototypes at the moment. We are still in the process of improving the driver and refining the code. We aim to have two more revisions to work out any issues before the final production run. We want to make sure the electronics and code work together seamlessly to create an easy to use and efficient flashlight. In tandem, we will be working hard to provide a wide range of accessories to accompany the Function light at it's launch.

 

Who are we?

Ron Chan: Ron is an active member at www.candlepowerforums.com under the avatar Ronac. In the past three years, he and Brian have created a small business in creating unique flashlight upgrade parts to the flashlight community.

Brian Har: Brian has played a critical role in design and logistics of the existing Cryos Illumination products. His background as a mechanical engineer has helped ensure the Cryos Illumination products are designed with function in mind and of the highest quality.

Mathew Leung: Mathew has been the driving force in the development of the custom designed driver for the Function light. His background and experience with electronics has brought this project to life.

 

What is Cryos Illumination?

Here is a sample of the products that have been designed and produced by us. Through selling these custom flashlight parts, we have built a strong reputation of supplying high quality products and excellent service.
story_txt:
The FUNCTION flashlight was designed for the person that doesn't want a specific light for every task. Because of the light's dual 1/4-20 tripod threads and unique form factor, it's much more versatile than the standard stick flashlight configuration. The Function flashlight can output up to 1600 lumens but since its output is infinitely variable, you can turn the brightness down to exactly where you need it. This light can be used for biking, hiking, camping, and videography just to list a few. Support our project to take advantage of the introductory pricing! 

 Features and Specifications


 
Infinitely Adjustable Output - Pressing down on the switch turns the light on and off. Rotating the control knob allows the user to adjust the output from less than 1 lumen to 1600 lumens.
3 x LED emitters - Cree XPG2 for maximum lumens or Nichia 219 Hi CRI for a neutral white beam with perfect color rendition


Copper LED Star Board - The emitters will be installed on a copper "pillar" star board which has no dieletric layer like the typical LED star boards. The custom  board allows the LEDs to run cooler for a longer life. Also, it allows us to drive the LED harder without sacrificing too much efficiency.
Aluminum Unibody - The body is intricately CNC machined from a solid block of 6061 aluminum.
Size - 3.31" x 1" x 1.85" (84mm x 25.4mm x 47mm)
Weight - 5.5oz (156g) 
HAIII Hard anodized - All aluminum parts on the light are anodized in matte black. The HAIII anodizing provides a scratch resistant coating with a 0.001" thickness.
Strobe - Strobe mode offers variable strobe flash rate and variable strobe brightness.
Battery Compatibility - The Function light can be used a single Lithium Ion  18650, two Primary CR123A, or two Lithium Ion 18350 batteries.
Battery Life (on Max)
Lithium Ion 18650 - 1 hr 40 min
CR123A Lithium - 1 hr
IMR18350 - 40min
Reverse Polarity Protection - The light's driver circuitry is designed to protect itself if the battery is ever installed backwards.

1/4-20 Tripod Mounting Threads - Two 1/4-20 tripod threads on the top and back of the light allows fo easy mounting with commonly available camera mounts.
Anti-Reflective Coated Glass - The mineral glass lens has an anti-reflective coating on both surfaces to maximize the light output.
Water Resistant - The Function light is designed with O-rings and gaskets so that it can function in any weather condition.
Battery lockout - A half turn counter-clockwise on the battery cap will lock out the light to prevent accidental activation
Thermal Protection - An on board temperature chip allows the microcontroller to manage the heat generated by the LED's.
Microcontroller Powered - The functionality of the light is all programmed via an ATTINY microcontroller. With a 8-SOIC clip, the Function flashlight can be reprogrammed such that it meets your specific needs.
 
 
Operation

 
Mode 0 - The light will be OFF in Mode 0.
Mode 1 - The light will be On in Mode 1 and adjusting the knob will change the output brightness of the light.
Mode 2 - Rate control strobe mode allows the user to change the strobe rate via the control knob. By default, the brightness is 100% but the brightness will be saved when adjusted in Mode 3.
Mode 3 - Brightness control strobe mode allows the user to change the strobe brightness via the control knob. The strobe rate is determined by the setting in Mode 2.
Soft Lockout - Soft lockout will prevent accidental activation of the light. 
Mechanical Lockout - Mechanical lockout will prevent accidental activation of the light by physically disconnecting the battery. Using the mechanical lockout is recommended when the Function flashlight will be stored away for a long period of time.
 
What You Get

Cool White Cree XPG2 or Neutral White Nichia 219 High CRI emitter
CR123A battery tube to prevent rattling when using the smaller diameter batteries
Narrow (24°), Medium (30°) or Wide (40°) optic


Accessories
Check out the gallery for images of the different accessories.

Billet aluminum go pro mount - This mount will allow you to use the Function light with practically any GoPro mount.
Magnetic Ouput Modifier - A lantern dome, red or blue filter, or diffuser can be easily attached via the embedded magnet.
Magnet mount - The magnet screws into the rear 1/4-20 threaded hole and allows the attachment of the light to any ferrous surface.
Bike Helmet mount -  Allows for mounting of the Function light onto any standard bike helmet. The mount attaches to the helmet via velco straps through the helmet's vent holes.
Bike Handlebar Mount - The handle bar mount allows for easy installation of the Function light onto any bike handlebar.
Backpack mount - A stainless steel clip which allows the Function light to be attached to the shoulder strap of a backpack. The clip is made from a ferrous grade of stainless to allow the clip to be used with the magnet mount for quick removal.
Suction Cup Mount - The suction cup mount will attach to any smooth flat surface. It will be great for attaching the light onto full faced helmets.
Hotshoe mount - The hotshoe mount with ball head is great for those that want to film video with the Function light. 
Additional Optics - Different beam pattern optics will also be avialable for the user to go from Narrow (24°), Medium (30°) or Wide optics (40°).
 

 
Shipping Costs
Shipping costs are not included as part of the contribution of the Perk. The final shipping cost will depend on your location and any additional accessories you order. All items will ship out from Canada via Canada Post.
 
Project Progress
We have a few fully functioning prototypes at the moment. We are still in the process of improving the driver and refining the code. We aim to have two more revisions to work out any issues before the final production run. We want to make sure the electronics and code work together seamlessly to create an easy to use and efficient flashlight. In tandem, we will be working hard to provide a wide range of accessories to accompany the Function light at it's launch.
 


Who are we?
Ron Chan: Ron is an active member at www.candlepowerforums.com under the avatar Ronac. In the past three years, he and Brian have created a small business in creating unique flashlight upgrade parts to the flashlight community.
Brian Har: Brian has played a critical role in design and logistics of the existing Cryos Illumination products. His background as a mechanical engineer has helped ensure the Cryos Illumination products are designed with function in mind and of the highest quality.
Mathew Leung: Mathew has been the driving force in the development of the custom designed driver for the Function light. His background and experience with electronics has brought this project to life.
 
What is Cryos Illumination?
Here is a sample of the products that have been designed and produced by us. Through selling these custom flashlight parts, we have built a strong reputation of supplying high quality products and excellent service.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
You can immediately choose your color from the basic collection when checking out. Choose out of Lagoon Blue, Diamond Black, Golden Hay or Cherry Red.

Choose a perk with (P) for a print.
After the campaign a survey will follow where you can choose your print.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The built-in pump and its shell are patent protected and therefore reproducing this design would result in criminal charges. Patent number: PAT2523288PC00.

 

THE SELF-INFLATING LOUNGEBAG THAT EVERYONE HAS BEEN WAITING FOR

Our self-inflating Coolado lounge bag offers the perfect solution. You can sit back and relax, while the built-in pump inflates and deflates the bag automatically.

The lightweight, waterproof, airtight and extremely comfortable Coolado lounge bag easily fits two. Compact and portable, it's perfect for a day at the beach, a hiking trip or a festival. The USB-chargeable pump is lightweight and super fast. It can be removed from the lounge bag  to inflate or deflate other mattresses or inflatables.

Coolado actively searched for lightweight materials allowing you to take your lounge bag everywhere. Since our inflatables are made out of durable materials instead of plastic, we came up with nice prints and colours, turning inflatables into fashionable gadgets. 

The Coolado lounge bag can be used on any surface. Each lounge bag has been thoroughly tested in the factory to make sure it doesn't lose air.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Media: press@coolado.com

Partnership & retail: sales@coolado.com

 

 

 

Is there warranty on my Coolado?
Yes, you get 2 years of full warranty limited to the product.

How can I choose a print?
We will send a survey later, where you can choose a print.

How can I inflate my Coolado?
Turn the switch on the pump. The Coolado is a self-inflatable device, with a removable pump. You can also deflate your Coolado LoungeBag.

How long does it take to inflate my Coolado?
It takes about two minutes to inflate your Coolado Lounge Bag.

What material is my Coolado made off?
The outside is made out of super strong, lightweight, high quality nylon and polyester, exclusively produced to resist all types of weather and to be used on different surfaces. The materials are durable with a focus on environmental sustainability. There's an airtight/waterproof layer on the inside, keeping the air in and the water out. The materials are strong enough to offer you many years of lounging pleasure.

What can I inflate with the pump?

You can use the pump on all Coolado inflatables and with the two extra nozzles you can use it on other inflatables as well.

How much weight can my Coolado LoungeBag handle?

Although we have been sitting on our Coolado LoungeBag with five persons and it worked out perfectly fine, we do not recommend sitting on the Coolado LoungeBag with more than 2 or 3 people, depending on their weight (approx. 330lbs or 150kg).

What’s the delivery time on my Coolado?
If the goods are in stock they'll be delivered within 48 hours.

Do you ship worldwide?

We ship to the EU, the US and Canada without charge. For other locations the shipping costs depend on the chosen perk and your location. When selecting your country during check-out the shipping costs will be shown.

How can I choose a colour?

You can select the colour of your choice on our website.

When can I get my Coolado?

The first shipment will arrive in the beginning of July.

What are the shipping costs?

We ship to the EU, the US and Canada without charge. For other locations the shipping costs depend on the chosen perk and your location. When selecting your country during check-out the shipping costs will be shown.

How long does my Coolado stay inflated?

The material used inside the Coolado Lounge Bag creates an airtight seal, so your Coolado Lounge Bag will stay inflated until you deflate it. By the way: did you know that every Coolado inflatable is tested for 24 hours under high pressure before shipping out?

Can I use it in the water?
Of course! All Coolado inflatables, including the lounge bag, are completely waterproof. Use it to chill in the pool or the lake or on a conquest of the oceans.

How do I deflate my Coolado?
Simply attach the pump in the deflating position (see instruction manual) and switch it on.

Can I sleep on it during the night?
Of course! Our team members do it all the time.

What are the measurements?

The Coolado Lounge Bag only weighs 1.3 kg (2.8 lbs). When folded into the carrying bag, the dimensions are 19 cm x 36 cm (7.5in x 14.2in). Completely inflated, the dimensions are 260 cm x 70 cm (88.5in x 37.4in).

How much does it weigh packed and how much inflated?
The Coolado Lounge Bag only weighs 1.3 kg (2.8 lbs). When folded into the carrying bag, the dimensions are 19 cm x 36 cm (7.5in x 14.2in). Completely inflated, the dimensions are 260 cm x 70 cm (88.5in x 37.4in).

On what kind of surface can I use my Coolado?
The Coolado can be used on almost any imaginable surface: grass, sand, concrete and even snow and water. This makes the Coolado your best choice to relax at festivals, parks, on the beach and basically anywhere else. Its durability even makes it possible to use the Coolado on uneven surfaces, such as in the mountains, in the jungle or in other uncomfortable places. However, using it on a volcano is at your own risk...

How do I return it when it’s defected?
Since all the bags have been thoroughly tested, flaws shouldn't see the light of day. In case it does happen, just send it back and you’ll get a replacement immediately.

How can I place a business order?
Just contact us through the contact page. We’ll take care of you.

How do I clean my Coolado?
Just wipe the surface with plain soap and water.

story:
GUSTAV & HARALD - THE FUTURE OF STROLLERS

Have you tried to lift a stroller when there is a child in it? It weighs a lot ( >25kg/55.1lbs) and even when it´s just a stroller there is still a risk for injury.

We at Gustav & Harald don´t think that all parents need to be strong as construction workers. So we enginered a multifunctional stroller from scratch and used ultralightweight and super strong carbon fibre and military grade textiles. The result is an amazing 5,8kg / 12.8lbs - the whole stroller. 

 

Why is Gustav & Harald stroller so special:

  • It weighs only 5,8kg / 12.8lbs
  • Body and wheels are from ultralight and super strong carbon fibre
  • Large wheels with all wheel suspension
  • Easily foldable as one piece
  • Seat can be turned towars parent - smile to your baby that brightenes your day
  • Comfortable and long seat
  • For a kid up to 25kg / 55.1lbs
  • A long canopy that protects from the wether and creates a cosy "cave" to the baby
  • Three different seating positions
  • 180 degree lie-flat sleeping position - let´s help the spine develop as it should
  • Three different positions for foot rest
  • Safety bar
  • Adjustable handlebar that make also tall people smile
  • A large covered basket for your staff
  • an much much more that you want from your stroller

 

Gustav & Harald innovation:

Few years ago we wanted to design/make a stroller that is ergonomical, ultralight and produced in sustainable way. 

Now we have made several successful testings with the materials and built prototypes. Now our stroller is what it has to be - ergonomical, ultralight and produced in sustainable way.  

Thank you EU Reginal Development Fund and Enterprise Estonia for backing us.

 

Gustav & Harald team:

Why we are so sure that our concept works are the knowledge, skills and ambitions of our team. 

Our team of engineers is very motivated to set new standards for stroller industry and beside the motivation they are all seasoned engineers with a solid academic background, MSc, PhD. Also they have a secret passion for ultralight materials. 

Our designer is a seasoned veteran in design industry and has lots of experiences from automotive industry. He has an eye for style, exclusivness and proportion and he knows very well what can be made by engineers and production. So no illusions, just the style that makes your hart sing. 

And the most important person is our co-founder who is a lawyer, entrepreneur and a mother of two small boys. She keeps us all on track so there won´t be any shortcuts when it´s about the functionality and quality of the stroller. 

 

Production:

The production of carbon fibre details is a higly demanding and knowledge based process and to ensure the utmost quality of our products the production takes place in our own factory in Europe. 

To ensure our products quality we have limited our production to a 1 000 unit a year. 

 

Why are we here and not somewhere else

Because we need your support to set up the production and fine tune the product. Supporting us has it´s benefits - supporters are the first ones to get this amazing stroller.

Please share our campaign and our web-site : www.gustav-harald.com. Let´s set the new standars for the stroller industry! 

Let´s make this amazing ultralight stroller together

story:
The story of Elos continues with a lighter, smoother, and more accessible cruiser.

The story of Elos did not start with a business plan. It started with just a pair of hands crafting a new kind of skateboard. A board designed so friends and family would have an easier time learning and riding together.

The design has grown with our founder, Tom Wang, and the initial concept from 2003 has evolved to become a skateboard that fits easily into an out-and-about urban lifestyle.

On Oct. 18, 2016, the well-refined concept named Elos, which stands for "Effortless Lifestyle of Skateboarding,” became a reality with the support of over 600 Kickstarter visionaries around the world.

Today, we are announcing the new Elos 2018 model. We kept all the features people told us they loved, then we made it lighter and cruise smoother so the next generation of Elos enthusiasts can continue the story of learning and riding together.

Are you in?

 

 

Ultra-portable  

At only 4 lbs, you can easily carry Elos with your backpack, or messenger bag, for hands-free travel.

 

Easy to learn

The iconic extra-wide deck design makes Elos stable and user-friendly even for absolute beginners.

 

Cruisability 

Elos is a lightweight cruiser with big soft wheels built for the smoothest ride in the city!

 

Everyday usability  

Dress the way you need, still able to ride everywhere while looking sharp. Our special surface coating will not scratch up your suit. Once you are there, easily put your Elos next to you with our patented Table-Dock system.

 

Ride safe at night

Built-in reflectors on the trucks make the rider visible to pedestrians and cars for night ride safety.

 

Maneuverability  

The race car-inspired design makes Elos handle sharp turns smoothly. Experienced users can turn on a dime.

 

Customer support  

Every Elos comes engraved with a unique QR code to verify ownership and warranty status. 

"Love this board! Been using it daily and the portable design has cut my commute down to about 15 min each way. Gotta love it." - Brett Bolte (Kickstarter Backer)  

“Been a skater my whole life and the feeling on this board is such a good one. Its very easy to ride! Even my girlfriend that can’t stand on a normal board can cruise with it to the bagel shop!” - Marco (Instagrammer)

"Love this li’l guy...perfect answer to a need I see daily in LA!" - Tom Herring (Kickstarter Backer)

"The concept of a board that you can slip into your backpack was a great one!" - Laura (SugarCRM Manager)

 

 

 

Our first Kickstarter campaign (2016) was special because you helped thousands of people’s dream come true. Many got to ride a skateboard with their friends and family for the first time. Some seniors even crossed skateboarding off their bucket list by learning how to ride Elos easily. Elos seems to be able to capture good times, regardless of age and location.

We have been learning stories about how Elos have had a positive impact on people’s lives. We received messages about how Elos helped someone regain confidence, or helped an isolated person become more sociable, even stories about how an Elos friend recovered from a broken relationship and found his soulmate (while riding Elos) in just 6 months! 

Last year, we had the opportunity to send two Elos skateboards to a children’s community center in a small island in the Philippines. In return, we were flooded with photos of kids beaming as they rode around on our board. We were blown away by the children's strong positive response to our simple gift. We learned that we could do a lot more for communities in need by sharing our passion. And that this occasion should not be a one time deal.

With this in mind, we started the #RideWell program. We believe that riding Elos can be a positive outlet for a person to express themselves creatively while developing balance, flexibility, and coordination. Skateboarding encourages outdoor exploration, improving mental agility and building self-esteem. We aim to give back to the larger community by donating our skateboards to those in need, especially children, who can benefit from the positive vibes and the freedom Elos can surely provide.

If you run a non-profit and think Elos could help, feel free to get in touch with us at hi@elosskateboards.com

 Our team was formed around a love for creating something new. We put our heart and soul into every detail to make our product something we are proud to share with you.

We ARE NOT a team of material scientists, programmers, designers, etc. who decided to make a new kind of skateboard. We ARE a bunch of passionate hands on makers who happen to have material scientists, programmers, designers, etc. backgrounds. We rode with and listened to 1st-generation Elos riders and used our professional expertise to make sure everything was just right. 10 years ago, Elos started with one pair of hands, but today our team has evolved to fit the needs of a grown community. We still make them all carefully by hand, but now there are more hands in the mix.

Throughout the past 2 years, our vision, belief, and promise to you have driven us to conduct countless iterations that result in the best portable skateboard we can offer. Every Elos rider is part of our family and without your support, we wouldn’t exist. Thank you!

When Elos launched our first Kickstarter back in October 2016, we were one of the few campaigns that delivered on-time, and won a lot of positive feedback with a high quality product. Feel free to check out our updates and comments from the first Elos Kickstarter here.  

After 1.5 years, we have grown a lot. We aim to create an even better experience with our Elos 2018 Kickstarter campaign.
story_txt:
The story of Elos continues with a lighter, smoother, and more accessible cruiser.The story of Elos did not start with a business plan. It started with just a pair of hands crafting a new kind of skateboard. A board designed so friends and family would have an easier time learning and riding together.The design has grown with our founder, Tom Wang, and the initial concept from 2003 has evolved to become a skateboard that fits easily into an out-and-about urban lifestyle.On Oct. 18, 2016, the well-refined concept named Elos, which stands for "Effortless Lifestyle of Skateboarding,” became a reality with the support of over 600 Kickstarter visionaries around the world.Today, we are announcing the new Elos 2018 model. We kept all the features people told us they loved, then we made it lighter and cruise smoother so the next generation of Elos enthusiasts can continue the story of learning and riding together.Are you in? Running around town or getting to the office has never been so easy or efficient.Perfect for college campuses. Turn heads as you zip around in style, then dock your board next to you for easy storage.Discover a fun new way to spend time with your friends and bond with your family.
  
Ultra-portable  At only 4 lbs, you can easily carry Elos with your backpack, or messenger bag, for hands-free travel. Easy to learnThe iconic extra-wide deck design makes Elos stable and user-friendly even for absolute beginners. Cruisability Elos is a lightweight cruiser with big soft wheels built for the smoothest ride in the city! 
Everyday usability  Dress the way you need, still able to ride everywhere while looking sharp. Our special surface coating will not scratch up your suit. Once you are there, easily put your Elos next to you with our patented Table-Dock system. Ride safe at nightBuilt-in reflectors on the trucks make the rider visible to pedestrians and cars for night ride safety. 
Maneuverability  The race car-inspired design makes Elos handle sharp turns smoothly. Experienced users can turn on a dime. 
Customer support  Every Elos comes engraved with a unique QR code to verify ownership and warranty status. "Love this board! Been using it daily and the portable design has cut my commute down to about 15 min each way. Gotta love it." - Brett Bolte (Kickstarter Backer)  “Been a skater my whole life and the feeling on this board is such a good one. Its very easy to ride! Even my girlfriend that can’t stand on a normal board can cruise with it to the bagel shop!” - Marco (Instagrammer)"Love this li’l guy...perfect answer to a need I see daily in LA!" - Tom Herring (Kickstarter Backer)"The concept of a board that you can slip into your backpack was a great one!" - Laura (SugarCRM Manager) 
       Our first Kickstarter campaign (2016) was special because you helped thousands of people’s dream come true. Many got to ride a skateboard with their friends and family for the first time. Some seniors even crossed skateboarding off their bucket list by learning how to ride Elos easily. Elos seems to be able to capture good times, regardless of age and location.We have been learning stories about how Elos have had a positive impact on people’s lives. We received messages about how Elos helped someone regain confidence, or helped an isolated person become more sociable, even stories about how an Elos friend recovered from a broken relationship and found his soulmate (while riding Elos) in just 6 months! Last year, we had the opportunity to send two Elos skateboards to a children’s community center in a small island in the Philippines. In return, we were flooded with photos of kids beaming as they rode around on our board. We were blown away by the children's strong positive response to our simple gift. story:
WHO WE ARE?

We are the Guardian Geese – a project team passionate about developing ideas that help the world be a better, safer place.

Many of us have travelled as hitchhikers or in dangerous countries and situations. The fear of something bad happening while travelling and the unease our friends and families felt, paved the way for the idea behind Guardian Goose – the travel safety app.

We have developed the complex back-end technology behind Guardian Goose, and are now asking for YOUR HELP in the final steps towards launching Guardian Goose to the world, and thus making travel safer.

WHAT IS GUARDIAN GOOSE?

Guardian Goose is a travel safety app, developed to keep its users safe and give their friends and families peace of mind.

DEVELOPMENT OF GUARDIAN GOOSE.

The back-end technologies upon which Guardian Goose is based, are pretty complicated. These include GPS tracking, mobile phone status checking technology, intelligent decision making capabilities, automated messaging and call technology, and many more.
Our team has more than a decade experience in developing these elaborate systems, including the artificial intelligence elements which we have integrated into the Guardian Goose technology.

Most of the Guardian Goose technology has been completed or is close to completion. It is only the app design and development which still needs to be completed and localised into the languages which we would like to offer our service in.

WHY USE GUARDIAN GOOSE?

Two words: Travel Safety. 

The world has become a dangerous place. 

Not only hitchhikers are at risk. Lone travelling business travellers, especially women, are vulnerable to attacks or worse.

Friends, family, and sometimes co-workers, are often left worrying if their loved ones have arrived safe and sound.

Sometimes, a simple thing such as a dead cell-phone battery can cause stress, worry and even panic, as Neal Bruewer, Co-Creator and CEO of Guardian Goose, the travel safety app, tells: “I have been in sales for a long time, which means I travel a fair bit. When I travelled, I made it a habit to call my wife when I arrived at the hotel. On one occasion, my battery went flat on the way to the hotel, just after I had arranged to meet a client straight after arriving. Once there, I realised I had forgotten my charger at home, and a quick ask around for a suitable charger came up empty. Since my business partner was waiting, I decided to find a solution later and concentrate on the business at hand. Later that evening, much to my surprise, the phone of my client rang and he handed it to me, saying I should take the call. On the other end was my panicked wife, having spent the last couple hours calling all of my colleagues, desperately trying to find out what had happened to me.”

Knowing that you have a Guardian Goose watching over you, gives you, your family and friends peace of mind.

WHO SHOULD USE GUARDIAN GOOSE?

Travelling alone, or in vulnerably small groups, can be perilous.
Whether hitchhiking your way across the world alone – or with a friend –, travelling alone for business or pleasure or any other unsecure travel situation, it is comforting to know that someone is watching over you, and your friends and family know all is well.

HOW GUARDIAN GOOSE WORKS.

The Guardian Goose app is free to download, however each trip you use Guardian Goose to monitor your travels with, is paid through the usual payment options.

1. First, you set up your user account in a few simple steps and prepare Guardian Goose to look after you.

2. Once the user account is set up, you can start a trip profile. Guardian Goose automatically calculates all possible routes.

3. When Guardian Goose notices an unplanned deviation from the given route, it activates its elaborate alarm system (EAS).

- How does our EAS work?

1. As soon as you deviate from the most likely routes, EAS sends a message to you. If you answer that message with a code word of your choice in a predefined amount of time EAS is turned off and it asks you whether you would like to abort the journey or pause for some time, in order to get back on track.

2. However, if you fail to answer, or do so in an unexpected way, EAS will activate alarm code orange. That means it calls you, and asks for another code word. If you do not answer the call or answer in an unexpected way, EAS acitvates the alarm code red.

3. When EAS activates the red alarm, it autonomously sends a message to your predefined contacts to inform them of the situation, and request for them to call you immediately. If necessary, GUARDIAN GOOSE provides them with the stored photos, your location and a log of where you started and what happend so far.

There is also a panic button which, if pushed somewhere along the way, immediately elevates the alarm code to red and initiates the emergency procedures.

WHAT WILL YOU GET FOR BACKING US?

- REWARDS.

Pledge €5 or more.
Receive 20 Guardian Goose trips for free, additionally a bumper sticker and a Button with the Guardian Goose slogan of your choice.

Pledge €15 or more.
60 Guardian Goose trips for free, together with the previous rewards perks (excluding the free trips), plus a compass with the Guardian Goose design.

Pledge €35 or more.
150 Guardian Goose trips for free, together with the previous rewards perks (excluding the free trips), plus a Guardian Goose Poster.

Pledge €75 or more.
300 Guardian Goose trips for free, together with the previous rewards perks (excluding the free trips), plus a Guardian Goose t-shirt.

Pledge €850 or more.
Lifelong bronze membership into the Guardian Goose club (see details in description), plus the previous rewards perks (excluding the free trips) and sun shade for your car.

Pledge €2,500 or more.

Lifelong silver membership into the Guardian Goose club (see details in description), plus the previous rewards perks (excluding the free trips) and a Guardian Goose backpack on wheels.

Pledge €5,000 or more.

Lifelong Gold membership into the Guardian Goose club (see details in description), plus the previous rewards perks (excluding the free trips) and the Guardian Goose limited edition mascot soft toy.

- THE GUARDIAN GOOSE CLUB.

For those who wish to become Guardians themselves, securing Guardian Goose safety for family, friends and colleagues, we are creating the Guardian Goose Club.

Members of the Guardian Goose Club have following benefits:

Bronze – 20 Guardian Goose trips per month, for own use or transferrable to loved ones, friends and colleagues, plus other Guardian Goose bronze Club benefits (To be confirmed).

Silver – 100 Guardian Goose trips per month, for own use or transferrable to loved ones, friends and colleagues, plus other Guardian Goose silver Club benefits (To be confirmed).

Gold – 300 Guardian Goose trips per month, for own use or transferrable to loved ones, friends and colleagues, plus other Guardian Goose gold Club benefits (To be confirmed).

HOW CAN YOU HELP US?

- BACK OUR PROJECT!

Help us make travelling safe! Through your support, we can finalise and launch Guardian Goose.

- SPREAD THE WORD!

Support us further, through spreading the word about our great project and our aim to make travel safer! Share our story on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, LinkedIn, etc.
For any help you can give us in spreading the word, we are thankful.

- KEEP IN TOUCH!

Follow us on Facebook, Twitter and Youtube, keep up to date on news and share ideas on how to make our service better.

WHERE YOUR MONEY GOES.

DEVELOPMENT SCHEDULE.

RISKS AND CHALLENGES.

The hardest part of the projects development is done. This includes elements such as GPS tracking, mobile phone status checking technology, intelligent decision making capabilities, automated messaging and call technology, and many more.

Our development team, managed by our CTO Dr. Inf. Abdolreza Eshghipour, is well equipped to handle any possible problems the front end design and development might put in our way.
We are confident we can deliver on time and on budget.

story:
Who I am

My name is TJ, and I want to bike across the country. It has always been one of those things I see people doing and think "wow, I really want to do that". I have come up with many different reasons to not do it, but the other night I realized I will always have an excuse to not do something. So I am going to do it. In the spring of 2013 I will start in Los Angeles and bike to New York City.

I don't just want to spend 2.5 months on my bike for no reason, so I will be doing it all to raise money for my non profit organization, Sport Against Poverty. Money raised will be used to start soccer programs in underdeveloped areas of Kenya. That is what I call a win win.

What We Need & What You Get

Although it sounds simple, riding across the country is actually a very complex and costly endeavor. I am raising money to help cover some of the expenses I will incur on the trip:

  • Food
  • Supplies (Tent, repairs, etc.)
  • Biking equipment
  • A website for people to follow, make pledges, etc. 

The Impact

This bike trip will allow me the opportunity to meet one of my lifetime goals, as well as to help other people. I am a huge fan of sports, and the power they can have. Raising money on this trip will allow me to work in Kenya with schools to develop soccer programs to give underprivileged youth opportunities both on and off the field. You can read all about the organization and its goals here.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that not everyone can contribute, and that is fine. If you can't contribute, I ask that if you believe in what I am doing then you will just share it with your Facebook or Twitter friends, you never know who might come across it.

story:
There’s nothing like a crying, hungry baby to get a parent thinking, “There has to be a better way.” That’s exactly what I was thinking as I watched my wife try to prepare a bottle of formula at a restaurant while our infant fussed.  Necessity, “the mother of invention”, spurred us to launch Quix Products.


 

Quix introduces a new infant formula bottle that transforms formula preparation from a tedious, time-consuming task to a simple twist and shake to mix the formula for feeding.


The Revolutionary Quix Bottle

What is the Quix bottle and why is it needed?



 

Mixed powdered formula has only about a one hour shelf life, ruling out premixing at home before going out with a child.  When your infant decides he/she is hungry, time is of the essence.  Scooping formula into a water bottle and screwing on the nipple is messy and stressful when your child is crying or screaming to be fed, especially in a public location.  Mixing separate containers in an uncontrolled environment can also lead to contamination. Premixed formula avoids some of these problems but is on average 8-10 times more costly.



The Quix bottle is a patented, award-winning design that keeps baby formula and water separate in a two-container bottle until the moment of need.  Then, with just a twist of the valve and a shake of the bottle a parent can immediately and safely feed their hungry child.  No mess, less stress.



About Quix

Quix Products, LLC. is about making life easier for busy on-the-go parents.  Our first product, the Quix Bottle, achieves this by enabling safe formula bottle preparation to take place in the home, without the stress of a crying and fidgeting infant and away from public venues.  The Quix bottle is ready when you need it anytime, anywhere.



The best part about developing the Quix Bottle is the opportunity it gives us to create a product that truly benefits people. The joy comes from transforming an idea from a dream to a finished product in someone’s hand and on the store shelves! 


Innovation awards & recognition for Quix include:

• Florida Trend Magazine; Person to Watch
• Inaugural Gary R. Cunningham Entrepreneurial Award
•Gold Merit award at INPEX
•TOP 50 Perfect Business Pitch


Quix Perks


What Can You Do to Help?

By helping us reach our funding goal you will be contributing to the manufacturing of the bottle that will have a positive life-changing effect on new parents who frequently find themselves preparing bottles to feed their infants in less than ideal conditions.  We live in a highly-charged, fast-paced world that has an over-abundance of stressors. Anytime these can be reduced, especially for parents, a natural consequence is a healthier lifestyle for both parents and children.


 “Giving back just feels good”. We are committed to making a difference in parents and their children.  For every bottle purchased Quix will give a portion of the proceeds to benefit Vitamin Angels - an organization dedicated to helping at risk children under five and pregnant women obtain the micronutrients that are essential to a child's survival and ability to thrive.  


What Happens When We Meet Our Goal?

We are looking to raise funds for our first production run. We've poured our heart and soul into this project and need your help to bring it to life. We've done our homework, engineered every detail and patented/ trademarked our product.  Funds raised with this project will go directly to finalized tooling and our first production run!  Whether its sharing this video, liking our Facebook page, Tweeting us or backing us here we appreciate your time and support.


'All-or-nothing' funding means that Quix Products only receives the funds if we hit our funding goal successfully.

Please share this with your family and friends via the social media buttons below or the "Share This Campaign" link under the video. Your support will help us achieve our dream of starting Quix Products. Thank you so much!

-The Quix Family-

Quix Products, LLC. is about making life easier for busy on-the-go parents.  Our first product, the Quix Bottle, achieves this by enabling safe formula bottle preparation to take place in the home, without the stress of a crying and fidgeting infant and away from public venues.  The Quix bottle is ready when you need it anytime, anywhere.


The best part about developing the Quix Bottle is the opportunity it gives us to create a product that truly benefits people. The joy comes from transforming an idea from a dream to a finished product in someone’s hand and on the store shelves! Innovation awards & recognition for Quix include: • Florida Trend Magazine; Person to Watch• Inaugural Gary R. Cunningham Entrepreneurial Award•Gold Merit award at INPEX •TOP 50 Perfect Business Pitch

Quix Perks
What Can You Do to Help?

By helping us reach our funding goal you will be contributing to the manufacturing of the bottle that will have a positive life-changing effect on new parents who frequently find themselves preparing bottles to feed their infants in less than ideal conditions.  We live in a highly-charged, fast-paced world that has an over-abundance of stressors. Anytime these can be reduced, especially for parents, a natural consequence is a healthier lifestyle for both parents and children.

 “Giving back just feels good”. We are committed to making a difference in parents and their children.  For every bottle purchased Quix will give a portion of the proceeds to benefit Vitamin Angels - an organization dedicated to helping at risk children under five and pregnant women obtain the micronutrients that are essential to a child's survival and ability to thrive.  

What Happens When We Meet Our Goal?


We are looking to raise funds for our first production run. We've poured our
heart and soul into this project and need your help to bring it to life.
We've done our homework, engineered every detail and patented/ trademarked
our product.  Funds raised with this project will go directly to finalized
tooling and our first production run!  Whether its sharing this video,
liking our Facebook page, Tweeting us or backing us here we appreciate your time and
support. 

'All-or-nothing' funding means that Quix Products only receives the funds if we hit our funding goal successfully.


Please share this with your family and friends via the social media buttons below or the "Share This Campaign" link under the video. Your support will help us achieve our dream of starting Quix Products. Thank you so much!-The Quix Family-

story:
Meet the Crua Tribe Collection

We would like you to meet the Crua Tribe. Here at Crua Outdoors we are constantly looking for new ways to make your lives (and ours) better. When we go on a camping trip, out to the beach or around the city, a few things that really annoy us are:

  • Not having enough space to pack our stuff
  • Making multiple trips to the car or house
  • Not having a place to sit
  • Keeping our gear protected in the rain 
  • Being able to bring our tech and keep it safe

So we thought, what if, like our modular tents, we had modular bags… plural. Bags for different uses, that are, in their own right, multi-functional, but also come together to work in perfect harmony? That’s so Crua! 

Up first, Cargo or skip ahead to  Thermo | Nomad | Armour

 

This holdall is big enough to fit all the bits and bobs you need for a picnic, camping trip or just around the backyard. It has a collapsible rigid frame so when the top is closed, it became a sofa that can seat 2 people. PLUS… well thought out pockets, ease of use, and all terrain wheels!!

 

From the Shop Floor: A deeper dive into the product features of the Cargo.

 

We are Crua.  We HAVE to have an insulated bag! This bag excels at keeping the cold things cold and the warm things warm. Only the best insulation for this bag, boasting an R value or insulating capability to rival even the heavy hitting hard-sided coolers. And, fits right into the holdall so they can be seamlessly used together.

 

From the Shop Floor: A deeper dive into the product features of the Thermo.

 

Not just any backpack, it has well-thought out pockets to store everything we need. Whether we are taking this on a business trip or a week-long camping trip, the Nomad ticks all the boxes. AND it attaches to the Cargo holdall, so that we only have to carry one bag.

 

From the Shop Floor: A deeper dive into the product features of the Nomad.

 

The laptop/tablet could  be stored in the Nomad, but what if I need to run off to a quick meeting? The Armour is a multi-functional carry case that will protect our precious tech from bumps, scratches, and the elements, if we are enjoying our tech in nature.

 

From the Shop Floor: A deeper dive into the product features of the Armour.

 

 

 

How to Get Them

All you need to do is back this project and claim one of your perks.

 

 

Risks and Challenges

While there are always risks & challenges with creating and delivering a brand new product, we've minimized both by having the entire process, from production to delivery, already set and arranged.

We've already signed agreements with key suppliers and manufacturers, and our prototype has been finalized. We have the technical expertise when it comes to outdoor gear, and this is our sixth crowfunding campaign. We've got some experience under our belts.

All of this, along with our strategic partnerships with experienced crowdfunding and fulfillment experts leaves little room for error and ensures a very quick delivery.

 

Thank You for Your Support!

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help.  Please like, share and spread the word!

story:
*** Updated FIXED FUNDING Campaign ***

- : The SolarCooler : -

Facebook - Twitter - Website

The World’s First Solar-Powered Refrigerating Cooler

A new technology revolutionizing Vaccine Transport and redefining the beach cooler

We have developed a revolutionary technology that we hope will significantly impact how vaccines are transported around the world. 

Help us get the Solar Refrigeration movement off the ground! We believe that in this era, access to refrigeration is not a privilege, but a right for the entire world to enjoy.  This is why we have worked so hard designing  and refining our technology into a portable rugged package for anyone to use.  Whether you are transporting valuable vaccines across the globe, or keeping your beer cold on a relaxing summer day.

- : Adopt a Vaccine SolarCooler in Action : -

There are many ways that you can help us make a difference.  we are offering the opportunity to sponsor a pilot run of our first Vaccine SolarCooler's thought medical camps in Africa.  as an individual, you can sponsor the Vaccine SolarCooler's by having your name or phrase printed on the cooler for $2 per letter.  for example "in loving memory of Helen Taylor" printed on the side of our Vaccine SolarCooler will help get this project off the ground.  if you are a corporation and want to be a sponsor, you can put a logo on the cooler for $100 per square inch.  Each sponsor will be able to track their Vaccine SolarCooler's through their journey, and receive photo updates of the SolarCooler's in action.

: Robin Hood business model :

A percentage of each SolarCooler sale will go towards providing those in developing countries without the luxury of a power grid with their very own SolarCooler.

__________________________________________________________________________

Are you an Explorer, Tailgater, boater, or overall gadget buff?

Below is some information on the consumer version of the SolarCooler!

Who needs ice? Make your own with the power of the sun! Enjoy refrigeration that’s clean, green, and free!

...Did we mention it can also power your USB and 12v DC accessories? 

Check out the production model with optional beach wheel kit, featured at CES:

*more images in our gallery section

Below is an image of the early prototype:

*more images in our Gallery section.

How can you help?

This development has gone as far as it can go, and now we need your help!  The SolarCooler is ready for production, but that last funding hurdle still needs to be jumped.  This is where you guys come in:  if enough people purchase a SolarCooler, I can flip the switch on for manufacturing not only the recreational cooler, but the cooler that will make medical vaccine transport possible.

We need to sell a minimum of 250 coolers to break even on the costs of materials and tooling that it takes to produce the SolarCooler.  Once we reach our goal (and hopefully, exceed!), we can start cranking away on manufacturing and shipping!

The Impact:

So what's the impact that portable, solar-powered refrigeration can have?  Good question… its huge, and the benefits span much further than cold beer for the beach.  We intend implement our technology into the cold chain, transporting vaccines safely around the world and into the hands of those in need.  Much of this world is without the luxury of a power grid at their fingertips, and we plan on providing these developing countries with the basic need of refrigeration for their perishables and medications.  Aside from this, we can also bring light into their home at night by powering LED lighting that’s plugged into the SolarCooler.

And in the consumer market, our goal is to change how the world perceives refrigeration and power.  In this day and age, we believe everyone should have the luxury of portable refrigeration. The SolarCooler allows you to be free to explore, camp, boat, tailgate, and hit the beach without worrying about ice or running out of cell phone battery. Need ice for a game, day drink, or margarita? The SolarCooler will make the ice AND power the blender.

Interested in technical details on how this baby works?

We use our advanced power path management circuity to harmonize the load demands of the refrigeration process, the inflow of photovoltaic energy, and energy storage in the internal batteries.  The SolarCooler uses a highly efficient variable speed vapor-compression refrigeration cycle.  Our solar panels are high quality flexible and durable.

You can find lots more information about how the SolarCooler works in our Gallery section.  If you are still curious, please feel free to call or email us.

story:
If you contribute, you can win 5000$ for a trip to Paris (or anywhere you want) or you can choose 3000$cash!

 

Why WAYFmobile?

I've been travelling for many years! Everywhere I go, I always ask myself where do all the people around me come from? What language do they speak? What country are they from? Very often, I'd like to start a conversation, but I don't want to disturb them and I end-up regretting not having done it.

When travelling one day, I thought why not create an app that not only lets you see other tourists, but also their positions on a map! Wouldn't it be cool to see all the tourists around you on a map and seeing where they are from just by looking at their country flags? Then just click on their flags to see their profiles? You then would know what language they speak and what they like to do.  You can choose to contact them at your convenience and chat with them! Meet people from different nationality, origin and culture, or just find people from your country around you somewhere in the world.

 

 

 

What WAYFmobile gives you

There are many usefulness of the application. Of course, you just learn that you can chat with other people, but you also can need someone to help you in case your are lost, you lost your money or luggage or you are ill or injured. With WAYFmobile, you can easily find someone close to you who speaks your language and could help you. Every frequent traveler knows that, in another country, it can be very difficult to find someone who speaks your language outside touristic areas. Even in large cities, like Bangkok or Tokyo, it can be often troublesome. 

Another usefulness of the app is to find a friend to share a great moment, to share your nice pictures, or to travel with. You can find fellow travelers for life, even from another country to meet on your next trip somewhere in Asia or South America or elsewhere.

Sometimes, you may need a translator. Your are eating in a Vietnamese restaurant in Thanh Hoa, and you just don't understand the menu at all. With WAYFmobile, you can easily find someone who can translate the menu for you! You can even send a picture of the menu to one close user who would write you if this is chicken or squid! You can make a search through all users according to the name, the country or the language you are looking for.

 

 

You may also need a guide or just a direction. You can quickly ask one other user your way if you are lost. Just look on WAYFmobile's map at people around you and tap on his or her shoulder! Someone could be happy to help you and even guide you for a few hours or more in a city that they know well! Even locals can use the app to be a guide or a translator in their own city or country. Even you can be a WAYFmobile guide in your own city or country! 

 

 

How WAYFmobile works

The application is free and will remain free. The goal is to get the most people around the world using the app so it would be easy to find someone who can help you anywhere you are. You just download the app from the Apple Store or the Google Store, and subscription is quick and easy. You can start using the app right away. You can enter more information in your profile whenever you want. You don't want to be followed? Easy, just click on the icon "inactive" and no user could see you, but you can continue to use WAYFmobile.

We already are planning to develop a  new version of WAYFmobile that gives you information about the countries or the cities you are visiting. This could be a Premium version that will be at a low cost.

Why WAYFmobile needs your contribution

We are planning of using publicity into the app to finance WAYFmobile (updates, customer service, servers, etc.). However, to start, we need your help! The production of the app cost a lot of money and then it needs some people to make it works! We need to find a server in order to keep confidential all users' information. We need someone to keep it updated, and someone to answer any question in case of problems. Also, in case of fraudulous or unacceptable use of the app, we must be advised and be able to cancel the account of the spiteful user. We need an easy reachable and useful customer service.

However, to begin, we have to finance the production of the app and mostly its marketing. We need a lot of publicity in different travel magazines, travel agencies and maybe airlines. What we need more is the word of mouth from people like you and other travelers who will use to application and find it useful. In the last 10 years, the number of travelers has been exponential and in 2018, more than 1,4 billion people traveled around the world. If only 5% of all travelers and tourists are using WAYFmobile, it means 70 millions people that you can contact and follow! 

What to you get?

All contributors will receive the Premium application free whenever available, but also everyone gets a chance to win a trip to Paris! (or anywhere you want using your 5000$US discount*). (If you don't want a trip discount, you can choose to receive 3000$ US instead.) The more you contribute, the more chances you have to win. You receive one chance for the first 10$ invested, two chances for 20$, but one more chance at 50$ (6 chances total), two more chances at 100$ (13 chances total), five more chances at 200$ (28 chances total)! The best part is that you contribute to a new and very innovative social network app for travelers that you will be using probably very often!

 

*If we cannot get a minimum of 20000$US, there will be no price and you will be reimbursed.

story:
Resumen

 

My name is  Mª Luisa F. Arrabal

 I´ve been dedicating myself to the commercial world for more than 30 years, from luxury cosmetics consultant, commercial agent and manager of a representations agency, traveling and becoming more and more interested in the conservation of nature, visiting and analyzing different hotels and glampings.

 I believe there´s a growing demand about a type of accommodation for all travellers seeking to enjoy free in contact with nature, and also to be able to know a new culture through its gastronomy and landscape.

We´ve wanted that everyone could find its space in this place and thus be able to connect with nature.

 We´ve developed in collaboration with the international designer and engineer David García, a typology of eco-friendly cabins, protecting the invironment to create the necessary comfort that allows you to disconnect from cities routine and  connect with nature and people.

We seek the restoration of a space that allows its conservation in a natural and timeless way, as well as simplicity in the choice of building elements, trying to be the most natural and appropriate, helping to minimize the impact.  All this will make possible the construction of cabins that fit the locations and provide them with intelligent protection means that collaborate in the preservation of the natural space, for example, through a rainwater collection system and its  subsequent use through maxi-sprinklers to refresh the exterior of the enclosure in summer time  or in the undesirable assumption of forest fires in the area.

Through the collaboration of all those who participate in our project, we´ll build eco-efficient cabins that will help to conserve the forest of more than 22,000 squared meters in perfect conditions, as well as to restore the 19th century buildings that we´ll allocate in part to accommodation and common services. 

We´ll use part of the surface to grow an organic garden in wich our guests can participate.

Our glamping will collaborate in the development of the rural environment of the area where we´re located.

 To carry out our project, we need to collect about your contributions, the total amount of $ 400,000.

 

CONTRIBUTION PLAN AND REWARDS

 

TARGET CONTRIBUTIONS: $ 400,000 / TOTAL INVESTMENT: $1,300,000

CONTRIBUTIONS

REWARDS

$ 50 

FOUNDER COLLABORATOR + 25% DISCOUNT ON YOUR FIRST BOOKING.

$ 100 

FOUNDER COLLABORATOR +  50% DISCOUNT ON YOUR FIRST BOOKING.

$ 150 

1 T-SHIRT AS FOUNDER COLLABORATOR +  SHIPPING COSTS NOT INCLUDED + 30% DISCOUNT ON YOUR FIRST BOOKING.

$ 200 

1 T-SHIRT AS FOUNDER COLLABORATOR + SHIPPING COSTS NOT INCLUDED +  40% DISCOUNT ON YOUR FIRST BOOKING.

$ 300 

1 T-SHIRT AS FOUNDER COLLABORATOR + SHIPPING COSTS NOT INCLUDED + 50% DISCOUNT ON YOUR FIRST BOOKING.

$ 400 

2 T-SHIRTS AS FOUNDER COLLABORATOR + SHIPPING COSTS INCLUDED +  50% DISCOUNT ON YOUR FIRST BOOKING.

$ 500 

2 T-SHIRTS AS FOUNDER COLLABORATOR+ SHIPPING COSTS INCLUDED + 2 FREE NIGHTS BONUS.

$ 600 

2 T-SHIRTS AS FOUNDER COLLABORATOR + SHIPPING COSTS INCLUDED + 3 FREE NIGHTS BONUS.

$ 800 

2 T-SHIRTS AS FOUNDER COLLABORATOR + SHIPPING COSTS INCLUDED+ 5 FREE NIGHTS BONUS.

$ 1,000 

2 T-SHIRTS AS FOUNDER COLLABORATOR + SHIPPING COSTS INCLUDED + 8 FREE NIGHTS BONUS.

$ 1,500 

2 T-SHIRTS AS FOUNDER COLLABORATOR + SHIPPING COSTS INCLUDED + 12 FREE NIGHTS BONUS.

$ 2,000 

3 T-SHIRTS AS FOUNDER COLLABORATOR + SHIPPING COSTS INCLUDED + 16 FREE NIGHTS BONUS.

$ 4,000

It´s a detail that connects us. You are our ambassador of our project. A symbol of our project that we deliver with pride.
