story_txt:
Resumen My name is  Mª Luisa F. Arrabal I´ve been dedicating myself to the commercial world for more than 30 years, from luxury cosmetics consultant, commercial agent and manager of a representations agency, traveling and becoming more and more interested in the conservation of nature, visiting and analyzing different hotels and glampings. I believe there´s a growing demand about a type of accommodation for all travellers seeking to enjoy free in contact with nature, and also to be able to know a new culture through its gastronomy and landscape.We´ve wanted that everyone could find its space in this place and thus be able to connect with nature. We´ve developed in collaboration with the international designer and engineer David García, a typology of eco-friendly cabins, protecting the invironment to create the necessary comfort that allows you to disconnect from cities routine and  connect with nature and people.We seek the restoration of a space that allows its conservation in a natural and timeless way, as well as simplicity in the choice of building elements, trying to be the most natural and appropriate, helping to minimize the impact.  All this will make possible the construction of cabins that fit the locations and provide them with intelligent protection means that collaborate in the preservation of the natural space, for example, through a rainwater collection system and its  subsequent use through maxi-sprinklers to refresh the exterior of the enclosure in summer time  or in the undesirable assumption of forest fires in the area.Through the collaboration of all those who participate in our project, we´ll build eco-efficient cabins that will help to conserve the forest of more than 22,000 squared meters in perfect conditions, as well as to restore the 19th century buildings that we´ll allocate in part to accommodation and common services. We´ll use part of the surface to grow an organic garden in wich our guests can participate.Our glamping will collaborate in the development of the rural environment of the area where we´re located. To carry out our project, we need to collect about your contributions, the total amount of $ 400,000.

story:
Simple style, with not-so-simple technology.

 

KG Tee: A super soft and ultra-breathable and stain-resistant shirt that you didn’t think existed. Combined with a silver ionization treatment, the KG Tee keeps you comfortable, clean and fresh for days on end!

 KG Socks: The sock re-imagined. Don’t feel self-conscious about your feet anymore - The KG Socks are treated with an advanced silver ionization treatment that kills odour at its source. A unique Honeycomb padding provides comfort and support while increasing breathability. The KG Socks will put a new spring in your step!

 


 


 

*Now available in both crew neck and v-neck collar options.

*ONLY heather grey is available.

 

Anti-Odour/Antibacterial (Silver Ionization Treatment): Our product is treated with medical-grade Silver Chloride, which effectively kills over 99% of all bacteria, and therefore kills odour at its source. 

 

Stain Resistant Exterior: Our shirt features an advanced hydro repellent treatment that helps liquids roll right off. By preventing liquids from penetrating the fabric, the risk of stains developing is minimized.

 

 Hyperabsorption Interior: The inner layer of our fabric is designed to rapidly absorb moisture while gradually wicking moisture away from the skin. This provides greater comfort and reduces visible sweat on the outside of the shirt, so you can stay confident no matter where you're headed.

 

4-Way Comfort Stretch: We use a balanced blend of fibres, including Lycra, for a flexible fit that also provides extreme comfort. 

 

 

What is the KG Tee made of?

We blended 47% Modal fibres with 47% high quality combed cotton combined with 6% Elastane. Compared to our 150 gsm (gram per square meter) underwear fabric, our T-shirt fabric goes up to 200 gsm. Why? Because it makes sense for the t-shirt to be constructed of a heavier material, even though it results in increased cost and fewer T-shirts made per roll of fabric. Heavier (more tightly knit) fabric increases durability, shape retention, stain repellency and opacity.

*ONLY dark heather grey is available.

 Anti-Odour/antibacterial (Silver Ionization Treatment): Foot odour is a common problem among men. We’ve researched and tried various different solutions to help control foot odour. Our socks were treated with the same advanced silver ionization treatment that our shirts undergo that actively kill bacteria and odour at their source.

 

 Honeycomb Modular Padding: Cushioned socks have become a popular choice due to the increased level of support and comfort provided as well as the ability to help reduce blistering. However, cushioning often reduces breathability, trapping heat and moisture in. Some socks are (ineffectively) designed with mesh only on top to allow heat to escape. With KG socks you don’t have to compromise: have full cushioned comfort and support, while simultaneously receiving enhanced breathability even through the bottom of the sock.

 

Comfort and Breathability: You can pack as many features as you want into a sock, but if it’s not comfortable, it won’t be your go-to sock. We’ve sourced the best materials to ensure that the KG Sock is soft and comfortable. In addition to the honeycomb padding, we have incorporated mesh panels on the top of the sock for added circulation. A fitted band helps to keep the sock from sliding off the foot.

 

Extra Durability: The worst part about finding a new favourite sock, is the thought of an inevitable hole forming in the future. With the KG Sock, we’ve optimized the use of nylon to reinforce the heel and toe. 

 

 

What is the KG Sock made of?

We blended 50% German Bayer ultra-fine anti-pilling acrylic with 17% hyper absorbing bamboo fibre and 17% high quality combed cotton. This blend offers 2.5x more durability than the average wool sock, all while maintaining high absorbency. To ensure a form-fitting experience with our socks, we have also included 2% Dupont Lycra, which will last longer than the elastic in regular socks. Finally, we added 14% Nylon to the toe and heel for added reinforcement and durability.

 


 

Our shirts have a tapered fit, for a casual fit, it is recommended to go up a size.

 

 

Both tumble drying at high temperatures and ironing without steam can help to extend the hydro-repellent performance

 

KOY Gear in the Media

We’ve been getting recognized! Here's what others have been saying about us: 

"KOY Gear Add Shirts and Socks to Their 'Invisible Technical' Product Offering to Challenge Menswear Norms" - Business Insider

 

"KOY Gear Aims to Revolutionize Men’s Everyday Apparel" - The Manual

 

"You Can Spill an Entire Cup of Coffee on This Shirt Without Staining It — and It's About to Be Your No. 1 Travel Tee" - Travel+Leisure

story:
Short Summary

Joe Bequette, Lab Coordinator and instructor at EKU, and his family has had a rough week, and he and his family has no need to be on campus for the remainder of the semester.  As a student and faculty body, let's join together and make it easier for him and his family.

What We Need & What You Get

I think that it is realistic to imagine that if every student at EKU can donate $5 to this fund that we should be able to raise enough money to help Joe and his family in this trying time.  Any donation will be appreciated I am sure, by him and his family.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help through donation, it is understandable as times are rough for us all, but any support would be very appreciated and I am sure it would be received happily.  Ideas would include possibly cards or letters of encouragement dropped off at the Department Chairs Office.

story:
Why?

How many times we have found ourself with children wanted that we bought an air mattress, but then, when we arrived at the beach they saw a friend with a little boat and they wanted also tried it? You decide to do canoeing with your wife but your kids want to come with you, but you can’t, or there are big waves that will make you want to play and you don’t say how you can do. For this and much more is born ALL In ONE, that include relax end fun in a only object that you can bring with you.

All is born when...

All is born without the goal of commercialize it, but only for a personal use. The next decision about take the road of Indiegogo is born when we are arrived at the beach by ourself. 

A lot of people looked us, lot of them have asked us where we have bought it, but above all many of them have fun with us. By that moment we have asked us: why we can’t try it?

Our challenge is only one. We want to take a test about 1000 pieces and try to understand what are yours feelings. Anyway, thank at all for your confidence.

Our challenge

Our challenge is only one. We want to take a test about 1000 pieces and try to understand what are yours feelings. Anyway, thank at all for your confidence.

story:
We've long been frustrated by the limited functionality of conventional travel bags. Why waste space and time carrying multiple bags, or worrying about whether you brought the right bag in the first place?

We set out to create a new line of bags that are not only completely versatile and tough as nails, but adaptable to what you need to carry across multiple environments.

 

One Backpack. Three Configurations.

The Adventurer is the first backpack that changes to fit your plans. Zip in one of three distinct center panels to create an entirely new backpack, ranging in volume from 1450 to 2300 cubic inches (24-38 liters).

In our campaign, you can purchase the Adventurer with just one panel (the Standard) or with all three panels (Standard, Hunter, and Out & Back).

Keep things simple and allow the light hiker or minimalist traveler to stash essentials without added weight or volume. Features an extra grab handle. Volume: 24 liters / 1450 cu. in.

With a touch of tacti-cool features and MOLLE/PALS webbing, the Hunter is built for the practical rifleman seeking to fill a tag or the summit seeker with enough experience to know exactly what they need for their trip. Volume: 34 liters / 2100 cu. in.

The Out & Back is perfect for carrying essentials for an unplanned overnighter while still remaining compact and versatile for longer trips where every item is needed or desired. The stash pocket is great for adding/removing layers due to changing weather. Volume: 38 liters / 2300 cu. in.

Everyday Features

No matter which panel you're using, the Adventurer always includes:

  • Laptop sleeve
  • Water bladder sleeve and hose holes
  • Horizontal and vertical mounting loops on all padded shoulder straps
  • Waist belt with mounting loops
  • Erector and sacrum padding with internal frame reinforcement
  • #10 zippers

 

 

"Whoa. Tell Me About That Carrier."

Rugged and versatile, Wrascal Carrier is our first product which converts into any of six configurations by simply zipping and unzipping side panels.

Designed for ultimate durability and adaptability, Wrascal Carrier is built to military specifications, can lift over 400 pounds, and attaches to any backpack, daypack, or luggage. It includes:

  • Removable laptop sleeve with multiple pockets
  • Two large, zippered outer pockets
  • Pockets inside each side panel
  • Handles, shoulder strap, and waist belt
  • Easy to clean, water-resistant interior lining

You can get the Wrascal Carrier bundled with the Adventurer Backpack and save nearly $40 off its retail price.

 

Where Things Stand Today

We have prototypes of the Adventurer and have already priced them with our manufacturer personally. In order to proceed with production, however, we need to order a minimum of 500 backpacks. That's where you come in.

Your contribution allows us to order fabric, zippers, and other materials, pay for assembly, and get those bad boys shipped back to our garage in San Jose. Then, we can send them out and you can get outside and take them on any adventure you want.

"Sounds great. But do you really know what you're doing?"

Ah, grizzled veteran of crowdfunding campaigns gone wrong... we hear your concerns. But this isn't our first rodeo. We've already successfully manufactured one product –the Wrascal Carrier – and our experiences with that product have been invaluable. We know our manufacturing partners well and have worked with them for over 2 years and are familiar with the timelines, expectations, and potential snags that can pop up. We're confident that, when we reach our funding goals, we can deliver on our promises and then some.

Nick's Story

Wrascal Designs was founded by me, Nick Welihozkiy–an adventurer, traveler, elite Track and Field athlete, and avid outdoorsman.

For years, I’ve been frustrated with the lack of versatility and adaptability in conventional travel bags. I want to carry less, do more, and have the freedom to change plans on the go without worrying whether I have the right bag with me.

So I set out to create a new line of bags that were not only completely versatile and tough as nails, but adaptable to what you need them to carry across multiple environments.

For the past three years, I've been designing and sewing my own prototyped bags and backpacks, and then beating them up on adventures around the world to see what works and what doesn't.

The Wrascal Adventurer Backpack is the culmination of more than three years of work and I think you're going to love it. So what are you waiting for? Grab a Wrascal and configure your adventure.

Two large, zippered outer pockets
Pockets inside each side panel
Handles, shoulder strap, and waist belt
Easy to clean, water-resistant interior lining
You can get the Wrascal Carrier bundled with the Adventurer Backpack and save nearly $40 off its retail price. Where Things Stand TodayWe have prototypes of the Adventurer and have already priced them with our manufacturer personally. In order to proceed with production, however, we need to order a minimum of 500 backpacks. That's where you come in.Your contribution allows us to order fabric, zippers, and other materials, pay for assembly, and get those bad boys shipped back to our garage in San Jose. Then, we can send them out and you can get outside and take them on any adventure you want."Sounds great. But do you really know what you're doing?"Ah, grizzled veteran of crowdfunding campaigns gone wrong... we hear your concerns. But this isn't our first rodeo. We've already successfully manufactured one product –the Wrascal Carrier – and our experiences with that product have been invaluable. We know our manufacturing partners well and have worked with them for over 2 years and are familiar with the timelines, expectations, and potential snags that can pop up. We're confident that, when we reach our funding goals, we can deliver on our promises and then some.Nick's StoryWrascal Designs was founded by me, Nick Welihozkiy–an adventurer, traveler, elite Track and Field athlete, and avid outdoorsman.For years, I’ve been frustrated with the lack of versatility and adaptability in conventional travel bags. I want to carry less, do more, and have the freedom to change plans on the go without worrying whether I have the right bag with me.So I set out to create a new line of bags that were not only completely versatile and tough as nails, but adaptable to what you need them to carry across multiple environments.For the past three years, I've been designing and sewing my own prototyped bags and backpacks, and then beating them up on adventures around the world to see what works and what doesn't.The Wrascal Adventurer Backpack is the culmination of more than three years of work and I think you're going to love it. So what are you waiting for? Grab a Wrascal and configure your adventure.

story:
Introducing The Claw - The Everyday Carry With 18 Functions

Being huge EDC/knife enthusiasts, we have designed, grind and tested countless prototypes. We are finally ready to share our everyday carry that will revolutionize the market and add iron to those who wield it. 

Crafted from 440c stainless steel, the Claw is a simple yet brilliantly designed multi-tool that has 18 unique functions that is currently patent pending. Our goal is to create a tool that is practical, functional and available to everyone that will ultimately make daily tasks easier. 

 

Functions 

  • Semi-sharp blade (Box cutter/scrapper/slicer/marker)
  • Ruler
  • Wire Stripper
  • Bottle Opener
  • Glass Smasher
  • Filer/Wood Carver
  • Pry Bar
  • Cross Tip
  • Hex Ratchet (Size: 10, 12, 13, 14, 17, 19mm)


                                                               box cutter


                                                               wire stripper


                                                             bottle opener


                                                                      filer


                                                                   pry bar


                                                      cross tip screwdriver


                                         hex ratchet (10, 12, 13, 14, 17, 19)

 

ISO 9001 Standards 

Each tool is made individually, adhering to ISO9001:2008 standards. We aim to create industrial grade tools that will take a beating and survive a lifetime. A total of 18 steps including rough machining, heat treatment, sandblasting, descaling, grinding, line cutting, EDM, polishing is taken in order to produce one tool. With pride and passion poured into this project, we are confident to say that each tool comes with a Life-Time Warranty.

 

 

Stretch Goals

These are some of the stretch goals and rewards we lined up for our valued backers!

  • 5K  - A personal thank you card that will be hand written and sent to your door! 
  • 10k - 5K reward plus Toolman stickers that will look good on any laptop!
  • 50k - 5K, 10K rewards and 3 different choices of paracord to match The Claw!

With every pledge, 10% of funds will go to a non-profit organization. We at Toolman believe that giving back to our community is the right thing to do. Sharing is caring. 

After all, it is the community that is helping us to make our dreams come true. From the bottom of our heart, we would like to thank those who contributed.

 

Risks & Challenges

We foresee minimal, if not no risks or challenges. The production crew is all lined up and ready to go full steam ahead. We will have plenty of time to ship. All we need is to hit our funding goal and start making these bad boys!  We are planning to deliver all Claws by December!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Do share our campaign on Twitter, Facebook or Instagram @toolmancompany. 

Thank you for all your support!

story:
Our Story

Our story isn’t unique. Every lake in America has a group of buddies who have a week exactly like ours. It's our yearly trip to the Belgrade Lakes in Maine, where we do nothing but fish, eat, sleep, laugh—and desperately try to figure out how we could extend the trip, adding an extra day or somehow (anyhow) make that week we love so much, be a bigger part of our lives.

Like the ancient proverb states, "Choose a job you love and you'll never work a day in your life." As such, we decided to start a business that would let us do more of the things we love most with the people we love most—and that’s how Revolutionary Baits Company was born.

We are also a group of amazing friends with wildly different backgrounds that are passionate about fishing, family, community and the environment. We feel fishing is much more than just a rod and reel with a hook and a bait. Fishing is a way of life, an experience, whether it’s your first time or your thousandth—it’s an opportunity to make a lifelong memory.

Our focus is laser sharp—design and engineer custom baits at the highest quality, that are an asset to any pro's tackle box and equally simple for any family of first time anglers to use. Let us welcome you to join in our passion—and our friendship—and to be Revolutionary in everything you do!

Revolutionary New Design

Meet the Bayonet line of baits, the 76 & 76 Slim. An all new industry design with tapered tips formed on an elliptical body. The Bayonet was designed to mesmerize and cut through water with one goal in mind—Catch fish. Lastly, but equally important as catching fish, is how easy is it to use? The answer....Very! It's as simple as driving the hook through the center logo. Enjoy!

 

Made in the U.S.A. 

We pride ourselves on manufacturing the highest quality custom baits right here in the USA. Our headquarters is located in Woodbury, CT, a prime example of small town America, nestled in the New England foothills. We believe you don't have to accept anything less than American made—From the baits we make, to the vendors we use as well as the apparel we sell, you guessed it, all from right here in the USA. 

Junebug w/ Chart Tail, Purple Glass, Pumpkin Seed, Black & Blue, Watermelon Red, Smoke Red

 

Junebug, Purple Glass, Pumpkin Seed, Black & Blue, Watermelon Red, Smoke Red

 

Royal Blue Tee (Back Logo) — Black Tee (Front Logo) — Slate Hoodie (Arm/Front Logo)

Our Project

Our project is simple and straightforward. We created this campaign to ask for your support as we begin scaling our manufacturing process, right here in America. Your gracious support will be used to purchase the additional machinery needed to cut down our manufacturing process time, so we can get more of our baits in your hands quicker.

To support our team and effort, please review our perks and enjoy these exclusive discounts. Our starting goal is set at $10,000—but don't stop there and be sure to click your favorite perk on the right. To keep the momentum going, we have created accelerators for everyone to take advantage of...

Accelerators 

Once the $10,000 goal has been met, all accelerators, will be offered at a 50% discount.

  • $10,000: We will open the perk reward for the Bayonet 33 (Ned bait)
  • $25,000: We will open the perk reward for the Bloodletter (Leech bait)
  • $40,000: We will open the perk reward for the Frigate (Jerkbait) 
  • $75,000: We will open the perk reward for the Lightning Bug (Creature bait)
  • $100,000: Mystery Perk—Everyone loves a good surprise!

It's all in the Details

  • Each bag of the Bayonet 76 comes with (7) baits
  • Each bag of the Bayonet 76 Slim comes with (15) baits

Risks & Challenges

We currently own the necessary manufacturing machinery to produce and fulfill orders on a consistent basis. Reasonably speaking, we do not expect any delays and have conservatively estimated all delivery times.

story:
Introducing the Colapz 4-in-1

It’s a bucket, watering can, liquid carrier AND a shower. The 4-in-1 by Colapz is perfect for use around the home, when you are away or out enjoying the great outdoors!


This intelligent design saves valuable space when you are travelling or storing whilst not in use. Using an innovative plastic composite and construction process, Colapz is bringing something truly unique to the market.

Press

It’s a bucket
A huge 10L capacity when used as a bucket, ideal for many applications including washing cars, carrying water, fishing, camping, boating, gardening, storing vegetable/pet food/wood/tools, washing dishes, even collecting crabs & clams! Let your imagination run wild and you will find this is one very useful collapsible bucket!

It’s a watering can

A huge 9 Litre capacity when the 4-in-1 is used as a watering can, refillable using a hole in the lid. When not in use, each component stores easily in the base. Ideal for gardening, vegetable plots, apartment living, visiting the cemetery and washing the dog!

It’s a liquid carrier The 4-in-1 is 100% food-grade compliant to FDA/LFGB standards. Great for carrying and dispensing water, juice, squash and lots of your favourite alcohols. A huge 9 Litre capacity when the 4-in-1 is used as a liquid carrier, refillable using a hole in the lid. Ideal for camping, glamping, festivals, boating, fishing, picnics, BBQ’s and many more happy times with family and friends!

It’s a shower

Make use of a huge 9 Litre capacity when the 4-in-1 is used as a shower.  Using the Watering Can rose, attach to the end of the plastic hose and hey presto, you have a shower! The rose head can also attaches directly to the tap, to give you the ultimate take-anywhere hands free shower. The 590mm plastic hose stores neatly into the lid when not in use. Ideal for camping, glamping, festivals, boating, fishing, beach trips, washing the pets or just getting wet!
Our design

  • Space saver
  • Comfortable handle
  • Ergonomically designed for ease of use
  • Integral elastic strap to ensure security when collapsed
  • Easy to store with hanging loop
  • 100% watertight
  • Components cleverly store away, so you can't lose them!
  • Level indicator, so you can see how much liquid you have inside!
Built to last

  • UV Resistant
  • Frost proof
  • High grade durable plastic composite
  • 100% Recyclable Materials
  • Food grade (FDA / LFGB)

It's available


    Its applications are endless, so choose your own adventure

    Just in time for your
    • Music Festival
    • Presents for your friends & family
    • Fishing trip
    • Camping Trip
    • Boating adventure
    • Picnic
    • And much more...

    The rewards


    Timelines


    Meet The Team



    Hi, we're David & Shaun. We're both product esigners and have a combined 30 years experience in product development. We launched Colapz together in 2010 and were blown away by the positive response from our first customers with our initial products. Now we’re excited to bring you the 4-in-1, which we hope every person and their dog will want this year.


    Risk & Challenges

    We have been working with our manufacturer for many years now, so we are very confident the project will run smoothly. There are always unexpected hurdles to face, but we will always be transparent and ensure regular communication between us and our backers about any challenges we face.

    We have been very generous with our expected ship date, as we know it causes frustration for backers when projects run over. Therefore we have accounted for delays and are confident we can deliver on time. If in the unlikely event it does take a little longer, we will keep you updated.

    Building something that will last is very important at Colapz HQ. To ensure this, we will have built a final production quality sample and tested it to destruction. Any amendments to the design will be incorporated. When production finally starts we have our own QC team based at source who will be checking everything at the various stages of manufacture, right up to when the product is dispatched. The product and materials will be tested to ensure they comply with all the food and safety regulations.

Camping Trip
Boating adventure
Picnic

The rewards



















Timelines





Meet The Team






Hi, we're David & Shaun. We're both product esigners and have a combined 30 years experience in product development. We launched Colapz together in 2010 and were blown away by the positive response from our first customers with our initial products. Now we’re excited to bring you the 4-in-1, which we hope every person and their dog will want this year.


Risk & Challenges

We have been working with our manufacturer for many years now, so we are very confident the project will run smoothly. There are always unexpected hurdles to face, but we will always be transparent and ensure regular communication between us and our backers about any challenges we face.
We have been very generous with our expected ship date, as we know it causes frustration for backers when projects run over. Therefore we have accounted for delays and are confident we can deliver on time. If in the unlikely event it does take a little longer, we will keep you updated.
Building something that will last is very important at Colapz HQ. To ensure this, we will have built a final production quality sample and tested it to destruction. Any amendments to the design will be incorporated. When production finally starts we have our own QC team based at source who will be checking everything at the various stages of manufacture, right up to when the product is dispatched. The product and materials will be tested to ensure they comply with all the food and safety regulations.

story:
We have invented the first modular storage solution for storing Keurig K-Cups in drawers.

There are existing K-Cup storage devices. They hold anywhere from  24 to 36 cups. The problem with all of these is they take up often-precious counter-top space and contribute to counter-top clutter.

There are over 10,800,000 US households with Keurig brewers. For those people wanting  drawer storage, we set out to create an effective way to efficiently, and neatly, store K-Cups in kitchen or break room drawers. Which leads us to ...

The Problem

The obvious challenge is drawers come in numerous widths. 

The Solution

Our solution was Kuzzles, a modular system.

Two dozen Kuzzles come in a package. You simply figure out how many your drawer will hold and start fitting them together. They work like any other puzzle you have assembled. It doesn’t matter what size drawer you want to use, Kuzzles will give you a neat, organized way to store your K-Cups.

You can assemble them as a single color, checkerboard or let your creativity run wild.

We have Perks ranging from 1 box all the way up to wholesale quantities.

If you want to support this project but don’t want to order wholesale quantities of Kuzzles, there are experiential options.

I enjoy creating fused glass platters and am offering them as a choice. You can see samples in the video above.

I also live in Montana, if you want to float a river, fish or hike, I will devote 2 to 4 days helping you enjoy the splendor that Montana has to offer.

Why we need your help.

We have our patent pending.

We have our prototypes made.

We need your help to create the 24 cavity die to make the Kuzzles and to produce our first high volume production run.

We also need funding to help design and produce our packaging. We want a simple, minimal, efficient packaging. We have located several companies to print and cut our boxes. We have the flat, unfolded template for the box. We simply need some of our local designer's time to finish the layout.

I hope you will help us by supporting Kuzzles.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like this idea and don't need a drawer of Kuzzles, please help get the word out. Use the Indiegogo sharing tools. Tweet it out, Post on Facebook or Pinterest it.

Thank you very much!

 

Kuzzles are Patent Pending

Keurig and K-Cup are registered trademarks of Keurig, Incorporated.

story:
Why waste precious game time constantly inflating, checking and deflating over and over again when you can have a ball fully inflated in 45 seconds flat, automatically?


Introducing Aer: the All-In-One Precision Ball Pump.


Precision pumping power.


Aer is the last ball pump you’ll ever need. Its precision inflation technology gets any ball ready at the touch of a button. Simply use Aer’s easy-to-read, LCD screen to select from a wide range of regulation PSI presets, insert the retractable (and replaceable) needle into any ball with the proper port, hit ‘inflate” and voila! Aer fills the ball to the specified PSI level and stops automatically. It’s that simple.

Stop wasting your time pumping. Aer gets you ready for the game faster without all the manual labor or trial and error of traditional ball pumps.  





Step 1: Charge

Step 2: Carry

Step 3: Select

Step 4: Inflate


Lots of designing, refining and defining went into the creation of the Aer ball pump. We developed the device with curved edges so that it would adapt and mold to the varying spherical contours of different ball shapes.

After speaking with many athletes and coaches, we also learned that the needles in older ball pumps that deliver the air are easily lost or misplaced. That’s why we thought it was important to provide Aer with a retractable needle that hides safely ensconced inside the body of the product when it’s not being used.

And, of course, we cannot forget the secret sauce that makes Aer the unique and innovative product that we claim it to be: the built-in motor that facilitates the actual pumping mechanism (and makes your life easier). It can’t run a car, but it gets the job done. 

We’re a business development firm that connects sport innovation entrepreneurs, investors and high profile industry partners. We've developed an ecosystem that combines the novel ideas of inventors and entrepreneurs with the education and experience of industry experts. The outcome is to provide YOU, the consumers, with unparalleled access to influence and accelerate the go-to-market timing of in-demand sports tech products. You tell us what products you like and we bring them to life.


One of our first partnerships is with Dick’s Sporting Goods as part of our Stadia FirstLook Initiative. FirstLook allows merchandisers (like Dick's) to connect with early adopters (like you); they get to learn how their product is perceived while you get first dibs on the new stuff before it hits the shelf.  


How can you join?


It’s easy! By supporting our campaign, you will be granted immediate membership to Stadia FirstLook. When you become a member, you will be invited to review and provide consumer feedback to retailers and manufacturers about sports product prototypes. In return, you'll get special deals and advanced buying rights to new products before they are released. 





Will I really only have to charge Aer once a year?
Answer: Yes and no. It really depends how often you use Aer to blow air into things. One standard charge will give you enough juice to inflate forty balls. 


What else can Aer do?
Answer: Every product has its limitations. Unfortunately, we did not design Aer with the intention of it slicing, dicing, making Julienne fries or preparing your taxes. We did, however, discover a viable need in the market to alleviate the trouble most people have with older ball pumps. Thus spoke Aer.


How long must I wait before I can buy this product in retail stores?
Answer: March 2017. Perhaps if we do fare well enough on this particular crowdfunding campaign, we may, in fact, be able to expedite the release of the product to merchandisers.


Does it come with a warranty?
Answer: One year. You have 365 days to break it before we ship you a new one, on the house. 


When you say one year, is that one year in 'RENT' time or one year in leap year time? 
Answer: That is an excellent question. We're operating on 'RENT' time - so that's 525,600 minutes. Despite 2016 being a leap year, February has come and gone. Time is money, after all.

How will the money be spent if I fund this campaign?
Answer: Towards building of the tool and producing the product for the backers. 


Why is Dick's Sporting Goods involved in launching this product on Indiegogo?
Answer: Dick’s has collaborated with Stadia Ventures to give you a first look at the Aer ball pump on Indiegogo.  This campaign allows Dick’s to learn valuable information about Aer from real consumers prior to a national release. Your feedback helps fine-tune the product design while also building some momentum from key early adopters. Meanwhile, you get first dibs on the newest and best things currently in development. 


Is Aer waterproof?
Answer: No. We know, we know. We kindly yet firmly caution against using Aer in your swimming pool.


What powers Aer?
Answer: 8 volt lithium ion power (2x4v cells).


How much is shipping and where does it ship to?
Answer: We are able to deliver to any location in the continental United States for an additional handling fee of $15. When you decide to claim a perk, you will be redirected to the donation page in order to provide your credit card and shipping information. You will be notified that an additional $15 fee is being added on to your donation to cover courier expenses.  


What type of noise does the pump make?
Answer: A sound similar in rhythm and in rhyme to the soft, mellifluous utterances of mating fruit flies. No, just kidding. In reality, the noise is comparable to all standard electric power air pumps.


Can I replace the needle?
Answer: Yes, with standard off-the-shelf needles, not your bubbie’s threading needle.


What do I do if the ball gets over inflated?
Answer: Stay calm; do not panic. Keep your cool and remember to breathe. There is a manual deflate button you can press until the desired pressure is achieved.


How long does it take to charge?
Answer: 8-10 hours. We recommend an overnight charge before its first use.


How long will the charge last if not used for a period of time?
Answer: Up to a year. In this case, if you don’t use it, you will eventually lose it.


Is Aer available in other colors?
Answer: Unfortunately, no. But if the product grows in popularity and enough excitement is garnered for it, we will certainly consider and implement all stylistic amendments that our customers request. 


How would you describe this product in Haiku form?
Answer:

Breathing, giving life
to inanimate playthings,
you fill us with joy.


Will the pump stop at the preset regulation specs for each ball?
Answer: No, we just completely lied about the technical capabilities of our product so that you would read this far. Yes, of course.


What is the max pressure for this pump?
Answer: 13 PSI. The Goldilocks Zone for a regulation NFL football.


How large is the screen?
Answer: As we say in the industry, go big or go home. The dimensions of the screen are 36mmx28mm. Even if Aer were connected to broadcast television, we are confident that you would not want to watch Jeopardy on it. 


How accurate is the air pump?
Answer: Within plus or minus .5 PSI.


Can I select a custom pressure?
Answer: Yes, absolutely. 


Can I use Aer to pump other balls?
Answer: Yes, as long as there is a port to receive the needle. 


How do I claim a perk?
Answer: Perks are listed on the right-hand side of the page, under the "Contribute Now" button. Once you decide on the perk that you want, click on the button that says "Claim This Perk". You will then be guided through the contribution check-out process. Click the link below for a how-to on perk procurement. 
https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

Can I upgrade a perk? 
Answer: So you've decided that one ball pump just won't cut it. You need more pump power. That's cool. If you'd like to upgrade your perk to a higher priced one, you will need to go to the " My Contributions" tab on your Indiegogo profile. Click the link below for step-by-step instructions on how to make this dream a reality. 
https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526756-How-to-Upgrade-Your-Perk 

How do I reach back out to your team if I have any additional questions?
Answer: If your curiosity for this product cannot be contained, contact us by clicking the email at the top of the page.
story_txt:
Why waste precious game time constantly inflating, checking and deflating over and over again when you can have a ball fully inflated in 45 seconds flat, automatically?  Introducing Aer: the All-In-One Precision Ball Pump. Precision pumping power. Aer is the last ball pump you’ll ever need. Its precision inflation technology gets any ball ready at the touch of a button. Simply use Aer’s easy-to-read, LCD screen to select from a wide range of regulation PSI presets, insert the retractable (and replaceable) needle into any ball with the proper port, hit ‘inflate” and voila! Aer fills the ball to the specified PSI level and stops automatically. It’s that simple.Stop wasting your time pumping. Aer gets you ready for the game faster without all the manual labor or trial and error of traditional ball pumps.  



Step 1: Charge


Step 2: Carry

Step 3: Select


Step 4: Inflate















Lots of designing, refining and defining went into the creation of the Aer ball pump. We developed the device with curved edges so that it would adapt and mold to the varying spherical contours of different ball shapes.
After speaking with many athletes and coaches, we also learned that the needles in older ball pumps that deliver the air are easily lost or misplaced. That’s why we thought it was important to provide Aer with a retractable needle that hides safely ensconced inside the body of the product when it’s not being used.

And, of course, we cannot forget the secret sauce that makes Aer the unique and innovative product that we claim it to be: the built-in motor that facilitates the actual pumping mechanism (and makes your life easier). It can’t run a car, but it gets the job done. 








We’re a business development firm that connects sport innovation entrepreneurs, investors and high profile industry partners. We've developed an ecosystem that combines the novel ideas of inventors and entrepreneurs with the education and experience of industry experts. story:
Note: Click on Packadoo sizes to see weight suggestions for your doggo!

I'm a co-parent of twin human babies and two very non-twin fur buddies. We love taking our dogs to explore the great outdoors. Unfortunately, anyone who walks in an area or trail where dogs are common can agree: poop is a problem. Studies have shown that people are only willing to walk 75 feet to throw away garbage. Now compare a dirty napkin to a warm, stinky bag of the brown stuff. This is why there's an epoodemic (see what I did... never mind) of number 2 and even BAGGED poops littered all around our beautiful neighborhoods and hiking trails.

But what if you could do the right thing AND not have to carry that miserable bag of squishy buzzkill? ENTER THE PACKADOO. Simply bag it up like normal (preferably in a biodegradeable bag), put the bag in your Packadoo, clip it to your dog's harness or collar, and let that rascal carry their own mess! Boom. You're free to enjoy your adventure, AND feel like an amazing citizen of a suddenly more beautiful planet. Later, either toss the bag when you see a can or dumpster, or bury it in your own compost. We've done our testing and can promise: they don't mind carrying it as much as you do. Help us make the world a little less poopy... With PACKADOO!

Final product will be slightly more stylized and branded (cool) than the prototypes shown here. Manufacturing is already arranged and Packadoo will be MADE IN THE USA. 

What We Need & What You Get

- We are producing four sizes of the Packadoo for different sized dogs. Between the cost of the molds and minimum manufacturing number of each size, sales tax and Indiegogo fees,  our cost to get launched is just under $60,000.

- Our perks include your choice of any of the Packadoo sizes and/or our custom sticker. They will be in different colors, but due to limitations, we won't be able to take color requests.

- If we don't reach our goal, money will be refunded and we'll try another route to market.

The Impact

- For anyone who walks or hikes with their dog, this makes carrying their poop out with you a completely painless experience.

- When this product becomes popular among dog owners, there will be a visible (and "smellable") improvement in our public dog areas. Our ultimate dream is to see more areas opened up to dogs because of more responsible owners enabled by Packadoo.

- With our manufacturing being already arranged, this campaign will make it possible to get your Packadoo to you & your loved ones in time for the holidays.

Risks & Challenges

Our campaign budget is pretty straightforward and our working prototypes have proven successful. The only forseeable risks for us would be issues with the USPS. However, we believe they will continue to operate as usual and delivery to our supporters will be efficient and painless.

Other Ways You Can Help

- You may not have a dog, or may be strapped for cash (thanks Covid!) but you can still help!

- share our link on your social media and make some noise about Packadoo.

  use the super helpful Indiegogo share tools!

- We're offering a fun custom sticker for $7 that you can use to remind others to "pick it up!"

story:
If we don't reach our funding goal we will still go ahead with Sky Drone FPV. While sticking to our timeline of shipping the Sky Drone FPV sets in December 2013, we will only have a groundstation app for Android at start. Other platforms will be supported later (free of charge). The only way to secure the Early Bird price ($349) of a Sky Drone FPV set, is to purchase the Early Bird perk before this Indiegogo campaign ends. If the funding goal is not reached, Early Bird funders will get discount information to order from our website later.

We are 100% committed to our technology and we will prevail.

Get more Sky Drone FPV info here: www.skydrone.aero

"Finally, the feed is encrypted via AES-256 encryption to prevent any spying eyes from taking a peek at your feed […]"
– TechCrunch

"Looks good! I've backed it."
– DIY Drones

"Sky Drone’s system relies on a 3G or 4G signal, while it doesn’t have a range limit."
– TechInAsia


As all FPV flyers know, there is usually a big gap between the high quality HD video of a recorded flight that you can see on YouTube and the blurred analog First Person View you actually see during the flight. We wanted to change this and figured that we can improve a lot of other aspects with our fully digital FPV solution as well:

  • Full HD Digital Video (up to 1920*1080 with 30 fps)
  • Unlimited Range by using 3G or 4G/LTE networks
  • FPV Groundstation app that is available on all major smartphone/tablet platforms: iOS, Android, BlackBerry 10 and BlackBerry PlayBook
  • On Screen Display (OSD) incl. Head-Up Display (HUD) (only if connected to a MAVLink compatible Autopilot Board like APM)
  • Unique Feature: take 5 MegaPixel HQ Still Images that are instantly transmitted to the app (while the video is still running of course)
  • Automatic and instant Bandwidth Adaptation
  • No regulatory / frequency issues as it uses a standard 3G/4G link
  • No more antenna tracking or heavy equipment – the only ground equipment you need for FPV video is your smartphone or tablet.
  • Optional: just connect any standard HDMI Video goggle to your smartphone / tablet and immerse yourself into Full HD FPV flying (Note: we even have Oculus Rift support as one of our Stretch Goals)
  • AES-256 Encryption – nobody will be able to spy on your Video Stream, not even the NSA ;-)

 

Our Funders Know Best

Find some of our funders whose expertise is related to the scope of our Sky Drone FPV project here:

  • Chris Anderson, CEO of 3D Robotics & Creator of DIY Drones
  • Wolfgang Kandek, CTO of Qualys, Inc.
  • Alec Saunders, Vice President, Developer Relations and Ecosystems Management at BlackBerry
  • Mike Winn, Co-Founder of DroneDeploy
  • Florian Horsch, CEO of HypeCast
  • and dozens more FPV enthusiasts.


FPV Flying today is mostly done with 20+ year old, low resolution analog technology that comes with some considerable drawbacks:

  • Low Resolution Video with a lot of noise
  • Heavy equipment on the ground, that needs to be carried
  • Interference issues with other radio equipment
  • The need for a large tracking antenna to achieve long range flights

Although digital FPV solutions that could eliminate all of the above issues are available, here are the main reasons why FPV Flying enthusiasts still use analog technology:

  • Low latency
    Analog links often have a low latency. Digital solutions usually need buffering or use inter-frame compression algorithms (H.264 / MPEG4) that are not built for low latency video or unreliable connections. Furthermore they are transferred on network protocols that are not suitable for real time video transfer (e.g. TCP).
  • Reliability
    Analog video is known to “just work” and even if it doesn’t work, it usually does not stop completely but just gives you noisy or distorted images. Digital solutions on the other hand are often not fault tolerant. Image errors often make the image unrecognizable or would require re-transmission of faulty video-frames which makes a live transmission impossible.
  • Price
    Analog solutions are cheap compared to Digital Video solutions that are currently on the market. Many of the available digital CODFM based systems target the military sector and cost multiple thousand dollars.

The Sky Drone FPV solution combines the reliability, low latency and low price of an analog FPV system with the video quality of a digital FPV system!


 

  • The Sky Drone FPV system is optimized for FPV flying but can be used standalone for any use case e.g. remote controlled ground vehicles; you can put it in a car for vehicle remote monitoring; as a security cam; …
  • For HUD and telemetry data we support MAVLink compatible autopilot boards (tested on APM 2.5)
  • Total Weight: 129 g (incl. all components and all cables)
  • Camera:
    • Option 1: Full HD 1080p 5Mpix Camera, Field of View: 120° (default)
    • Option 2: Full HD 1080p 5Mpix Camera, Field of View: 62°
  • Controller Board: BeagleBone Black
  • 3G/4G LTE Modem:
    • Option 1: Huawei E397Bu-501 for US / Americas
      4G LTE FDD 1700/2100MHz and 700MHz
    • Option 2: Huawei E398u-1 for Europe / Asia
      4G LTE FDD  900/2600 MHz
    • Note: check http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_LTE_networks for supported frequencies of your carrier
  • Typical End to End Latency: <150ms
  • Data Usage: highly customizable; bandwidth cap can be configured
  • Power Input: 6-23v

 

 


 


(Photo is showing a prototype. Cabling, Casing and USB-Hub will be improved and minimized in the final product.)

 

(Sky Drone FPV mounted on quadcopter; quadcopter not included)

 

 

The Sky Drone FPV groundstation provides you with a low latency First Person View and an optional HUD Overlay. The telemetry data to be displayed is highly configurable. Furthermore it allows the user to set up alarms to ensure safety. By clicking the photo button a high resolution still photo is captured and transmitted to the groundstation in the background.

 

(Options Screen on BlackBerry 10 Sky Drone FPV app)

(Android and iOS mockups)


 

You are probably wondering, if it's all so simple, why hasn't this been done before? After all, there are some commonly known problems with live video transmission over 3G/4G networks:

  • Carriers often only provide heavily firewalled 3G/4G connections
  • Bandwidth can vary greatly from second to second
  • When routed via multiple hops there is a high latency
  • Transmission methods and compression algorithms weren't designed for 3G/4G networks
  • Link Reliability

After more than a year of research, development and testing we've have solved the above mentioned problems and have come up with some clever solutions:

  • Using a customized video format streamed via UDP to achieve low latency.
  • Using NAT Traversal / “hole punching” techniques to create a direct peer to peer connection even if the link is firewalled.
  • Custom USB camera driver to allow frame by frame resolution changes to quickly adapt to bandwidth demands.
  • Mediation Server to let both peers find each other.
  • Fallback to proprietary Proxy Server if NAT Traversal / “hole punching” fails to establish a direct connection.
  • Synchronization mechanism guaranties that the MAVLink telemetry data matches video timestamp.
  • FPV pilot safety features:
    • Auto-reconnect
    • Configurable alarms in ground station
    • An auto-bandwidth adaptation mechanism can instantly change frame rate, resolution and compression parameters to guarantee a snappy video stream even on very slow connections.
    • Current Latency displayed on HUD

 

The Sky Drone FPV system is a great solution for any FPV flying enthusiast. However, in achieving a low cost, reliable digital solutions we had to make some tradeoffs:

  • You always need Cell Tower coverage. So if you have plans flying in the Gobi Desert or on the South Pole, you probably want to use a different FPV solution.
  • A data flat rate or high volume contract is highly recommended to avoid costly phone bills.
  • You need a smartphone or tablet running either Android, iOS or BlackBerry 10 / PlayBook Tablet OS (but we assume this won't be much of an issue).

 

 

The FPV system works flawlessly as of today. However, in order to finish the “final” product and start production we still have some work to do:

  • Still Image functionality is not finished yet
  • Our current development platform is BlackBerry. We still need to port the ground station application to Android & iOS. As the UI is mainly OpenGL ES based we expect the porting process to be relatively straightforward.


Stretch Goals - if we get more funding than our initial funding goal we will add:

  • on-groundstation video recording
  • on-device video recording
  • augmented reality overlays
  • Oculus Rift Support (starting with 2D)

 

We have put our heart and soul and a staggering amount of work in the project. To take the last hurdles we need you to support us. The financial support will cover the production costs and contributes to the remaining development.

Schedule:

  • September: obtain funding
  • October: Finish Still Image Functionality + some tweaks
  • November: Port Ground Station Application to Android & iOS
  • December: App Store Submissions & Deliver final product

 

 

Project Risks:

  • This project is challenging on the software side. On the hardware side we only use standard components.
  • Hardware sourcing won't be in issue. We're based in Hong Kong, The world's largest electronics manufacturing factories are just next door.

Technology risks:

  • If a direct peer-to-peer connection fails and our proxy infrastructure is used, the latency will be higher and fly by wire / autopilot assisted flight is recommended. This might happen if different carriers are used. To prevent this we recommend to use SIM cards from the same carrier on both sides.
  • Safety issues: your carrier might stop the connection after a bandwidth limit has been reached. Make sure to get a contract that does not shut off the connection. It is no problem if your carrier lowers the bandwidth after a certain amount of data transfer is reached though.
  • Cell congestion / availability might unexpectedly lower the video quality.


Q: How much data is usually been transmitted per hour?

A: With good HD quality at 30 fps you will run through 5GB of data within one hour.

Q: Does 4G/LTE provide enough bandwidth? How can I increase it?

A: 4G/LTE networks are capable of carrying full-HD (1920x1080p with 30fps). The Sky Drone FPV software automatically adjusts to the network's capabilities and always tries to ensure a smooth video stream. 

Q: Does the cellular network cause high latency?

A: No, in fact it does not. There is a lot of prejudice in cellular networks and their latency these days. In extensive network tests we have discovered that ordinary "ping" latency between two endpoints is usually around 20 milliseconds. However, this is only the network latency and does not include any payload (video+telemetry) yet. Our goal is to deliver a FPV system that comes with less than 150ms End-To-End Latency by using cellular (3G, 4G/LTE) networks. We are already very close to this. You can check out our latency test info in the “Updates” section of our campaign.

Q: Is there any way to control my drone / UAV with this?

A: No. This is a FPV system only. It allows you to see what the drone is seeing in real-time with virtually unlimited range. While telemetry data is also being transmitted from the UAV to the groundstation app, controlling the UAV through the groundstation app is currently not available.

Q: Will you publish the source code as Open Source?

A: We truly believe in open standards like POSIX, AES, MAVLink and we are building our software to be compatible with those open standards. At a later stage we will be evaluating which parts of our software we might publish as open source. Right now we do not have any immediate plans for that, though.

Q: Can I use this with my analog video gear?

A: As mentioned in the video, we are using a BlackBerry PlayBook to run our groundstation app. The PlayBook, BlackBerry 10 phones as well as some Android devices have a micro-HDMI output which can be used with any standard HDMI-to-Analog converter for example. So it should be rather easy to hook that up to your analog gear and view the output on there.  For high quality and lowest latency we highly recommend digital video gear though.

Q: How is it NSA proof?

A: We wrap our custom built video codec and telemetry stream into a AES-256 encrypted data channel. "AES is available in many different encryption packages, and is the first publicly accessible and open cipher approved by the National Security Agency (NSA) for top secret information when used in an NSA approved cryptographic module." source: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AES-256

The security of AES-encrypted data only depends on keeping the cypher secret while the encryption algorithm is public. You can read more about the security aspects of AES on Wikipedia in the "Security" section of the AES article: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Advanced_Encryption_Standard#Security

Q: Which drone / UAV is included?

A: The Sky Drone FPV set is a FPV (first person view) system only. Therefore, it only includes the camera, controller, usb hub, 3G/4G/LTE modem, cabling for such and the Sky Drone FPV software as well as access to the groundstation app for BlackBerry, Android and iOS.


If you have any more questions, please do reach out to us through the comment tab of this campaign.
story_txt:
If we don't reach our funding goal we will still go ahead with Sky Drone FPV. While sticking to our timeline of shipping the Sky Drone FPV sets in December 2013, we will only have a groundstation app for Android at start. Other platforms will be supported later (free of charge). The only way to secure the Early Bird price ($349) of a Sky Drone FPV set, is to purchase the Early Bird perk before this Indiegogo campaign ends. If the funding goal is not reached, Early Bird funders will get discount information to order from our website later.
We are 100% committed to our technology and we will prevail.
Get more Sky Drone FPV info here: www.skydrone.aero


"Finally, the feed is encrypted via AES-256 encryption to prevent any spying eyes from taking a peek at your feed […]" – TechCrunch
"Looks good! I've backed it." – DIY Drones
"Sky Drone’s system relies on a 3G or 4G signal, while it doesn’t have a range limit." – TechInAsia



As all FPV flyers know, there is usually a big gap between the high quality HD video of a recorded flight that you can see on YouTube and the blurred analog First Person View you actually see during the flight. We wanted to change this and figured that we can improve a lot of other aspects with our fully digital FPV solution as well:


Full HD Digital Video (up to 1920*1080 with 30 fps)

Unlimited Range by using 3G or 4G/LTE networks
FPV Groundstation app that is available on all major smartphone/tablet platforms: iOS, Android, BlackBerry 10 and BlackBerry PlayBook

On Screen Display (OSD) incl. Head-Up Display (HUD) (only if connected to a MAVLink compatible Autopilot Board like APM)

Unique Feature: take 5 MegaPixel HQ Still Images that are instantly transmitted to the app (while the video is still running of course)
Automatic and instant Bandwidth Adaptation
No regulatory / frequency issues as it uses a standard 3G/4G link
No more antenna tracking or heavy equipment – the only ground equipment you need for FPV video is your smartphone or tablet.
Optional: just connect any standard HDMI Video goggle to your smartphone / tablet and immerse yourself into Full HD FPV flying (Note: we even have Oculus Rift support as one of our Stretch Goals)
AES-256 Encryption – nobody will be able to spy on your Video Stream, not even the NSA ;-)

 
Our Funders Know Best
Find some of our funders whose expertise is related to the scope of our Sky Drone FPV project here:

Chris Anderson, CEO of 3D Robotics & Creator of DIY Drones


Wolfgang Kandek, CTO of Qualys, Inc.


Alec Saunders, Vice President, Developer Relations and Ecosystems Management at BlackBerry


Mike Winn, Co-Founder of DroneDeploy


Florian Horsch, CEO of HypeCast

and dozens more FPV enthusiasts.




FPV Flying today is mostly done with 20+ year old, low resolution analog technology that comes with some considerable drawbacks:

Low Resolution Video with a lot of noise
Heavy equipment on the ground, that needs to be carried
Interference issues with other radio equipment
The need for a large tracking antenna to achieve long range flights

Although digital FPV solutions that could eliminate all of the above issues are available, here are the main reasons why FPV Flying enthusiasts still use analog technology:


Low latencyAnalog links often have a low latency. Digital solutions usually need buffering or use inter-frame compression algorithms (H.264 / MPEG4) that are not built for low latency video or unreliable connections. Furthermore they are transferred on network protocols that are not suitable for real time video transfer (e.g. TCP).

ReliabilityAnalog video is known to “just work” and even if it doesn’t work, it usually does not stop completely but just gives you noisy or distorted images. Digital solutions on the other hand are often not fault tolerant. Image errors often make the image unrecognizable or would require re-transmission of faulty video-frames which makes a live transmission impossible.

PriceAnalog solutions are cheap compared to Digital Video solutions that are currently on the market. Many of the available digital CODFM based systems target the military sector and cost multiple thousand dollars.

The Sky Drone FPV solution combines the reliability, low latency and low price of an analog FPV system with the video quality of a digital FPV system!


 


The Sky Drone FPV system is optimized for FPV flying but can be used standalone for any use case e.g. remote controlled ground vehicles; you can put it in a car for vehicle remote monitoring; as a security cam; …
For HUD and telemetry data we support MAVLink compatible autopilot boards (tested on APM 2.5)
Total Weight: 129 g (incl. all components and all cables)
Camera:

Option 1: Full HD 1080p 5Mpix Camera, Field of View: 120° (default)
Option 2: Full HD 1080p 5Mpix Camera, Field of View: 62°



Controller Board: BeagleBone Black
3G/4G LTE Modem:

Option 1: Huawei E397Bu-501 for US / Americas 4G LTE FDD 1700/2100MHz and 700MHz
Option 2: Huawei E398u-1 for Europe / Asia4G LTE FDD  900/2600 MHz

Note: check http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_LTE_networks for supported frequencies of your carrier


Typical End to End Latency: <150ms
Data Usage: highly customizable; bandwidth cap can be configured
Power Input: 6-23v

 
 

 


(Photo is showing a prototype. Cabling, Casing and USB-Hub will be improved and minimized in the final product.)
  
(Sky Drone FPV mounted on quadcopter; quadcopter not included)
 
 

The Sky Drone FPV groundstation provides you with a low latency First Person View and an optional HUD Overlay. The telemetry data to be displayed is highly configurable. Furthermore it allows the user to set up alarms to ensure safety. By clicking the photo button a high resolution still photo is captured and transmitted to the groundstation in the background.
 
(Options Screen on BlackBerry 10 Sky Drone FPV app)

(Android and iOS mockups)

 

You are probably wondering, if it's all so simple, why hasn't this been done before? After all, there are some commonly known problems with live video transmission over 3G/4G networks:

Carriers often only provide heavily firewalled 3G/4G connections
Bandwidth can vary greatly from second to second
When routed via multiple hops there is a high latency
Transmission methods and compression algorithms weren't designed for 3G/4G networks
Link Reliability

After more than a year of research, development and testing we've have solved the above mentioned problems and have come up with some clever solutions:

Using a customized video format streamed via UDP to achieve low latency.
Using NAT Traversal / “hole punching” techniques to create a direct peer to peer connection even if the link is firewalled.
Custom USB camera driver to allow frame by frame resolution changes to quickly adapt to bandwidth demands.
Mediation Server to let both peers find each other.
Fallback to proprietary Proxy Server if NAT Traversal / “hole punching” fails to establish a direct connection.
Synchronization mechanism guaranties that the MAVLink telemetry data matches video timestamp.
FPV pilot safety features:

Auto-reconnect
Configurable alarms in ground station
An auto-bandwidth adaptation mechanism can instantly change frame rate, resolution and compression parameters to guarantee a snappy video stream even on very slow connections.
Current Latency displayed on HUD


 

The Sky Drone FPV system is a great solution for any FPV flying enthusiast. However, in achieving a low cost, reliable digital solutions we had to make some tradeoffs:

You always need Cell Tower coverage. So if you have plans flying in the Gobi Desert or on the South Pole, you probably want to use a different FPV solution.
A data flat rate or high volume contract is highly recommended to avoid costly phone bills.
You need a smartphone or tablet running either Android, iOS or BlackBerry 10 / PlayBook Tablet OS (but we assume this won't be much of an issue).

 


 
The FPV system works flawlessly as of today. However, in order to finish the “final” product and start production we still have some work to do:

Still Image functionality is not finished yet
Our current development platform is BlackBerry. We still need to port the ground station application to Android & iOS. As the UI is mainly OpenGL ES based we expect the porting process to be relatively straightforward.

Stretch Goals - if we get more funding than our initial funding goal we will add:

on-groundstation video recording
on-device video recording
augmented reality overlays
Oculus Rift Support (starting with 2D)

  

We have put our heart and soul and a staggering amount of work in the project. To take the last hurdles we need you to support us. The financial support will cover the production costs and contributes to the remaining development.
Schedule:

September: obtain funding
October: Finish Still Image Functionality + some tweaks
November: Port Ground Station Application to Android & iOS
December: App Store Submissions & Deliver final product

 

 

Project Risks: 

This project is challenging on the software side. On the hardware side we only use standard components.
Hardware sourcing won't be in issue. We're based in Hong Kong, The world's largest electronics manufacturing factories are just next door.

Technology risks:

If a direct peer-to-peer connection fails and our proxy infrastructure is used, the latency will be higher and fly by wire / autopilot assisted flight is recommended. This might happen if different carriers are used. To prevent this we recommend to use SIM cards from the same carrier on both sides.
Safety issues: your carrier might stop the connection after a bandwidth limit has been reached. Make sure to get a contract that does not shut off the connection. It is no problem if your carrier lowers the bandwidth after a certain amount of data transfer is reached though.
Cell congestion / availability might unexpectedly lower the video quality.






Q: How much data is usually been transmitted per hour?
A: With good HD quality at 30 fps you will run through 5GB of data within one hour.

Q: Does 4G/LTE provide enough bandwidth? How can I increase it?
A: 
4G/LTE networks are capable of carrying full-HD
(1920x1080p with 30fps). The Sky Drone FPV software automatically adjusts to the network's capabilities and always tries to ensure a smooth video stream. 
Q: Does the cellular network cause high latency?
A: No, in fact it does not. There is a lot of prejudice in cellular networks and their latency these days. In extensive network tests we have discovered that ordinary "ping" latency between two endpoints is usually around 20 milliseconds. However, this is only the network latency and does not include any payload (video+telemetry) yet. Our goal is to deliver a FPV system that comes with less than 150ms End-To-End Latency by using cellular (3G, 4G/LTE) networks. 
We are already very close to this. You can check out
our latency test info in the “Updates” section of our campaign.
Q: Is there any way to control my drone / UAV with this?
A: No. This is a FPV system only. It allows you to see what the drone is seeing in real-time with virtually unlimited range. While telemetry data is also being transmitted from the UAV to the groundstation app, controlling the UAV through the groundstation app is currently not available.
Q: Will you publish the source code as Open Source?
A: We truly believe in open standards like POSIX, AES, MAVLink and we are building our software to be compatible with those open standards. At a later stage we will be evaluating which parts of our software we might publish as open source. Right now we do not have any immediate plans for that, though.
Q: Can I use this with my analog video gear?
A: As mentioned in the video, we are using a BlackBerry PlayBook to run our groundstation app. The PlayBook, BlackBerry 10 phones as well as some Android devices have a micro-HDMI output which can be used with any standard HDMI-to-Analog converter for example. So it should be rather easy to hook that up to your analog gear and view the output on there. 
For high quality and lowest latency we highly
recommend digital video gear though.
Q: How is it NSA proof?
A: We wrap our custom built video codec and telemetry stream into a AES-256 encrypted data channel. "AES is available in many different encryption packages, and is the first publicly accessible and open cipher approved by the National Security Agency (NSA) for top secret information when used in an NSA approved cryptographic module." source: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AES-256
The security of AES-encrypted data only depends on keeping the cypher secret while the encryption algorithm is public. You can read more about the security aspects of AES on Wikipedia in the "Security" section of the AES article: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Advanced_Encryption_Standard#Security
Q: Which drone / UAV is included?
A: The Sky Drone FPV set is a FPV (first person view) system only. Therefore, it only includes the camera, controller, usb hub, 3G/4G/LTE modem, cabling for such and the Sky Drone FPV software as well as access to the groundstation app for BlackBerry, Android and iOS.
If you have any more questions, please do reach out to us through the comment tab of this campaign.

story:
HangFold – Your Travel Partner

HangFold is the travel partner that transforms itself into a template for perfect folding!

HangFold works by simply pressing down on the hook and transforming it into a template so you can perfectly fold clothes around it.

Once you arrive at your destination, simply pull the hook up, and HangFold will transform itself into a clothes hanger.

 

Experience wrinkle-free!

HangFold helps to prevent wrinkles in your clothes and frustration when travelling.

Thanks to the internal support that HangFold provides to your clothes, they are folded the same size, thus minimizing wrinkles, and saving time and frustration.

Packing and unpacking are now simpler and quicker. 

HangFold works for all clothes and sizes and saves space and minimizes wrinkles. Just two steps, repeat with us… hang, fold, hang, fold…

 

What our test users say about it

 

 

Created by an eco-friendly company

HangFold GmbH brings you this unique and patented system.

HangFold is exclusively made in Spain by ISO 9001-certified manufacturers from 100% recycled polypropylene (PP)— creating the perfect balance between quality and sustainability.

In HangFold GmbH, we strive to not only develop the perfect product but to have a positive impact on the environment while maintaining the highest quality.

 

Manufactured exclusively in EU (Spain)

This unique system is exclusively commercialized by HangFold GmbH.

HangFold is the result of several years of research and development and has been granted the Patent ES201930024. Thus, only HangFold GmbH can commercialize this product.

HangFold is manufactured in the European Union (Spain) and only by approved ISO 9001-certified manufacturers.

We have conducted numerous tests and market research during the past months and got a lot of feedback that was implemented in the design of HangFold.

 

Hurry up! This campaign will end on!

 

 

 

 

Meet the team

"Our reason to exist is to create innovative and helpful products while at the same time, making the world a better place. Our dream is to serve as an example for other companies on how to successfully implement a circular economy system."

Juan Flores   – CEO

 

 

We are ready to start production and delivery!

 

 

Technical characteristics

HangFold is only 6mm (0.23”) wide and measures 38cm long x 19cm high (less than 15” x 7.5”) in the “hanger position” and 30cm long x 25cm high (less than 12” x 10”) in the “template position.” Thus, HangFold can be used with nearly every size of garment.

 

 

HangFold weighs about the same as a business shirt.

HangFold has anti-slip grooves on the shoulders to avoid clothes from slipping.

HangFold also features rounded and C-shapes as well as anti-slip grooves and weighs less than 180g (6.34 oz). It is capable of supporting more than 2.5kg (~5.5 lb.) on the shoulders and more than 3kg (~6.6 lb.) of trousers.

 

They've published about HangFold

 

 

 

A project from HangFold GmbH

Hertensteinstrasse 51
CH-6004 Luzern

Registry of commerce: CH-100.4.811.448-8 | MWST-Nr. CHE-303.604.302

story:
VIHUS suitcase, your best travel companion.

Integrated box concept, your travel assistant

Make your travel no longer tedious, travel more focused, more flexible, lighter, more intelligent, make the journey easier.

Unique material, anti fall, scratch resistant.

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/930019525663191040

 

The ultimate bearing capacity, the bad environment is no longer afraid of shipping.

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/930019939947307008

 

Ergonomic pull rod design makes dragging easier and more comfortable.

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/930020180167503872

 

PVC silent universal wheel, no noise, walk more smoothly.

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/930018759057608704

 

Double explosion proof zipper, give more peace of mind for the journey

World class TSA customs code lock, no longer afraid of theft.

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/930018569856851968

 

Internal space for work and personal distinction, make you more professional, more convenient.

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/930019939947307008

 

Product details

 

Double hinges, metal rivets around the box reinforcement,more long-term Guardian.

Shaped handle, anti pinch design, feel more comfortable.

High performance waterproof bag, no longer worry about wet, rainy travel more assured.

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/930020360849833985

 

Product display

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/930020594380242944

 

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/930020817051664386

 

Color & style

 

Parameter description

 

Timeline

 

TEAM

Intelligent anti-theft travel box, not only the trunk, but travel partner, help you deal with all kinds of troubles encountered in travel.

 

FAQ

 

How to Back

 

Your VIHUS's are on their way!

Once you've made a pledge you can expect to receive your new VIHUS in December of 2017. Relax and wait for your package in the mail. We'll ask you for any additional order information in surveys.

 

 

Refund Policy

 

Indiegogo is not a store, but rather a donation-based platform designed to bring creative projects to life. In accordance with Indiegogo’s Terms of Use, we will not offer refunds or returns for non-defective merchandise. If there is a problem or defect with your product, we would be happy to assist you. Please contact us at misswu_sun@sina.com.

 

While we are not obligated to refund a pledge post-campaign, if you are truly not satisfied with your VIHUS we will refund your original pledge less a 30% restocking fee to cover shipping and crowdfunding fees. You must notify us within 5 days of your receipt of the product and return your product in unused condition, along with the original packaging.

 

Shipping Limitations

 

When an order is placed, it will be shipped to an address designated by the purchaser as long as that shipping address is compliant and verified by our warehouse. Risk of loss and title for items purchased from this website pass to you upon delivery of the items to the carrier. You are responsible for filing any claims with carriers for damaged and/or lost shipments.

 

Due to legal restrictions on shipping electronics, units in some countries will not include electronics. These countries include Israel and certain places in the Middle East. We apologize for the inconvenience.

 

Warranty

 

We will replace or repair any defective products free of charge within one years of receipt of product. The warranty applies to original purchaser only and requires proof of pledge/purchase. This does not cover any products that have suffered any damage from use outside of manufacturer defect. If you have any questions about this policy please contact us at misswu_sun@sina.com.

 

Alterations to Product

 

The product representations and details are current as of the time of your pledge. Although products are as close to the final version as possible, products may change throughout the campaign, and VIHUS reserves the right to make any changes due to ongoing testing, materials sourcing, feedback and other development activities. Our goal is always to launch the best version of each product when it goes to production.

 

Thank You

 

We are incredibly grateful for the support we have received from our Indiegogo community. It is our pleasure to continue bringing you new and innovative products.
