story:
Crowdfunding's Most Amazing Filtration Water Bottle

Make Any Fresh Water Drinkable Instantly & Effortlessly!

 

 

Clean & Pure Drinking Water, Wherever You Go with the Eco-Friendly, Stainless Steel Bottle with a Super Filter 

California, Florida, Cancun, India, Bangkok... Or Your Apartment, University, Work...?

No matter where you are or where you are going, having fresh and clean drinking water is essential! RIPURI is the world’s top travel filtration bottle, providing you with pure drinking water! You know it's safe and 110% functional. 

RIPURI produces completely drinkable water in only a few seconds. Featuring a squeezable design, RIPURI effortlessly accelerates water flow. Simply squeeze the bottle right in the middle to easily pour and share the filtered water.

 

RIPURI offers you the most effective, fully portable way to filter even the murkiest water into something that is 100% drinkable in just minutes. Never go thirsty again with the world’s most accessible, BPA-free stainless steel travel bottle with a specially-designed filtration system!

 

Hey! We got a squeezy squeezable pump, too! 

Once you have purified your water, getting it out of the bottle is always tough. With Ripuri, it is super easy with its genius squeezable water pump. Located right in the center of the stainless steel bottle, a quick press helps to accelerate the water flow, allowing you to pour and share pure water easily & effortlessly.

 

 

Our Color Choices feature FOUR ENDANGERED ANIMALS: Elephant, Whale, Rhino, and Polar Bear. They're beautiful. We love them. What do you think?

 

 

KEY FEATURES

 

1) SUSTAINABLY MADE FROM 18/8 STAINLESS STEEL

18/8 stainless steel is considered the best solution for creating a durable yet safe water bottle.

2) A RIPURI WATER FILTER

The powerful filter at the top of the bottle is able to remove 99.99% of all viruses, chemicals, sediments and other harmful substances to ensure that your drinking water is as close to 100% pure as possible.

It's also detachable. IF you don't need it (because your water is clean), just remove it. :)

3) THE EASY PUMP TO SQUEEZE AND SHARE

A squeezable bottle is an immense benefit, as it allows you to quickly drink water one-handed, a necessity during hikes or excursions. Unfortunately, stainless steel bottles lacked squeezability, while squeezable plastic bottles lacked the BPA-free water that is healthiest for our bodies.

RIPURI includes the amazing functionality of a squeezable center while still offering the durability that a stainless steel water bottle provides. An evolution in drinking on-the-go, you will see just how convenient it is on your next outdoor adventure!

4) ERGONOMIC SILICONE MOUTHPIECE

We wanted to create the perfect mouthpiece for RIPURI. One that felt great on your lips, while providing excellent water flow to keep you hydrated. The piece is completely protected from outside bacteria by the bottle’s cap, yet just a quick tap from the trigger ensures it is instantly accessible for your drinking pleasure! Hey, it's shaped like your thumb , too :)

5) EXTREMELY HYGIENIC AND EASY TO CLEAN

Cleanliness is a key aspect to focus on. The RIPURI is 100% dishwasher safe and includes a fully removable bottom lid for quick and thorough cleaning.

No more struggling with brushes, cleaning balls or other novelty products. Just fast, efficient and simple cleaning. 

 

 

We live in a plastic-clogged planet that cannot withstand more plastic being used, disposed of and wasted—with all its nefarious effects. Seriously, how many more plastics can end up in the planet’s oceans without their marine wildlife being even more awfully affected by these plastics than it already is? 

With humans wasting almost 20,000 plastic bottles per second worldwide, we are unnecessarily mass consuming bottled water that is not even healthy for us.

 

 

#ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY

By creating a reusable water bottle that offers exceptionally clean drinking water at all times, you don’t need to worry about buying bottled water for convenience. Just find a tap, river, lake or any other freshwater source and you instantly have purified water that is ready to consume.

With each RIPURI filter lasting 79 gallons (roughly three months), you will save $300 on bottled water purchases and prevent 300 disposable plastic bottles from being manufactured, transported and thrown into our ecosystem! 

At the end of the day, using RIPURI will not only have an amazing impact on your wellbeing, but it will also drastically improve your carbon footprint. Forget about bottled waters which are conveniently available at our every step, but which just keep piling on the already 9.2 billion tons of plastic waste that the humankind must deal with. 

Just switch from disposable bottles to RIPURI, the finest reusable water filtration bottle—and have a great impact on your life, well-being and on the planet’s balance!

 

 

The RIPRUI water filter also removes a variety of particulates (sediment, silt), chemicals (chlorine, benzene) and heavy metals (lead, arsenic), as well as additional odors or flavors that can accumulate in the water.

Save your money and the environment with the reusable water bottle that allows you to say goodbye to expensive plastic bottles of water that are constantly damaging ecosystems across the globe! Take it to Airport! You can save $5 every flight :) 

 

 

In a nutshell, RIPURI means that you can find fresh water anywhere, anytime, at any occasion, and turn it into drinkable water in the safest, purest and most convenient and affordable way. 

FAQ1: A RIPURI filter is replaceable and it will only cost $9 or $10 per filter.  It will last about 3 months if you use it actively everyday. :) It may last 4-6 months if you use it regularly. It is also detachable, so you can put it aside if you don't need it.

FAQ2: The filtration process is very fast. Some filters may take minutes per liter, but RIPURI filters water as fast as you can squeeze. In another words, Instantly.

FAQ3: Filters will be available everywhere: our own Shopify stores, amazon, even at Wal-Mart. :)

 

 

Whether you are a global adventurer, an outdoor enthusiast or you like to be ready for any emergency situation, RIPURI is the world’s most effective portable, reusable water filtration bottle that offers you the cleanest and purest H20 with every sip!

 

 

All of these use-cases are possible because we need NO Electricity!

Many people have prepared emergency kits in case of regular disasters, such as a power outages or intense snow storms. The kits usually include food, medicine and jugs of water. However, in an actual emergency situation, whatever amount of stored water that people prepared will be depleted quickly, and clean drinking water will quickly become hard to find.

On the other hand, in situations like these, there is no power available, so there is no way to use a water purifier that requires power to work, or even to boil water. That’s why RIPURI is the perfect disaster preparation sidekick—it requires no heat or power source to provide you pure and clean water. 

We want to help many in need. Help us to walk into a right direction.

 

Do you want RIPURI to make your life better with instant access to clean, fresh and pure water everywhere you go? Then we invite you to:

  • Share this campaign on social media to help us get the word out about RIPURI and how it will make access to pure water easy, eco-friendly and instant
  • Talk to your friends and family members about RIPURI – they may also want it to have fresh clean water available anywhere they go!

 

Whether you are on an outdoor adventure or in an emergency situation, having bacteria-free drinking water can be hard to come by. You can keep a limited amount of reserves on hand, however the moment that they run out, you will need some way to access clean water on a regular basis.

That’s why we created RIPURI, the eco-friendly, squeezable stainless steel RIPURI filtration bottle that allows you to have instant access to pure drinking water anywhere in the world!

It is a fact: most cities in the world do not have drinkable tap water. That means that, whether in your hotel room, in an outdoor adventure or in an emergency situation, bacteria-free drinking water can be hard to come by. Even if you’d want to rely on bottled water, no amount of bottles would be enough for your regular water needs.

With RIPURI, you have the easiest, most effective, convenient and portable way to filter even the murkiest water and turn it into water that is 100% drinkable in just a few minutes. 

It has been an amazing journey, and it will be epic when we have you on board. Join us today and start changing the world together :) Oh, Check out the photos, too :)  

 

 

Caution

Do not use hot water when using the water filter. Do not leave any water in the bottle after using it. Not following these instructions could cause malfunctions of the nozzle and the filter (coconut fiber carbon block inside the filter). Keep RIPURI out of reach children’s reach or near hot places, fire and chemicals.

story:
Have you ever bent or broken a key trying to open a paint can or attempted to repair something with whatever you have in your pocket? Have you ever needed a screwdriver NOW, but they’re all out in the garage or needed to quickly measure something at the hardware store? 

Kiki is designed to ride along side your keys, to be with you at all times and ready when you need it most. Like your wallet and your phone, your keys are always with you - the perfect place to keep a tough, well-made, multi-function tool. Laser cut from 3mm thick 304 Stainless Steel or Titanium, Kiki is tough, tailored & versatile. 

While Kiki was born to live on your key chain, it's equally at home as a zipper pull or tethered to your backpack, bag or outdoor gear.

Kiki + Leather!

Kiki can be used 'lean' like the rest of your keys, or 'dressed up' with the included hand-crafted leather sheath. It adds order to your keys, is warm to the touch and really ups the look & feel of your EDC game.

Specs 

Kiki is the result of all of the feedback we've received since our original Tuls project, incorporating the most popular mix of individual tools and backer suggestions. Whether you’re a cyclist, a backpacker, a craftsman or simply want to be ready for anything that may come up – Kiki is ready for you. 

Traveling? 

Kiki is under the 7" length restriction for tools allowed in carry-ons – we checked, you’re good to go! 

http://www.tsa.gov/traveler-information/prohibi... 

Shipping

We've had a very high success rate with USPS on our past projects - it's both affordable and reliable, but please note that we will not be able to track past the US border. We are happy to make alternative shipping arrangements with tracking at additional cost if needed – just let us know. 

 Gallery

story:
Let's build a dream

 

We are Marlon (51), Maja (38) & Joris (12). Living in The Netherlands and trying to get a dream come true. We saved up some money to start a Bed & Breakfast in Spain. I am a professional with 20 years international business experience at Apple, eBay and PayPal. My wife Maja is a professional Dental Nurse.  It is time to do something we love. Creating an experience for other people. 

The dream!

In order to keep the finances going, we try to get funding to renovate the property into a fantastic place where families, couples or individuals will have a great affordable holiday. A place where you can relax and yet have a feeling to be at home. The purchase of the property will be done by us in cash. This property is a repossession by the bank which allows us to have a very good deal on the purchase price. However the inside is not finished and a lot of work needs to be done. A lot we can do our self.

Vacation Season

COVID destroyed the complete holiday market around the globe. Many restaurants, Hotels, Hostels and B&B's have a rough time. Many are closed or near bankruptcy. 

This offers chances for new concepts. We all know that we will go back to normal, and therefore it is necessary to start building new businesses which creates new employment. With your help we can realise this.

What we need

An estimate of 100.000 Euro will help us to build the best B&B for in the entire area. Next to the B&B plans, I run a SaaS startup which generates income to live from. 

A breakdown in the costs:

8 Rooms refurbishing including bathrooms €35.000
Kitchen & Floors €15.000
Garden €5.000
Electricity €5.000
Roof & Windows refurbishing €15.000 
€25.000 for unexpected maintenance 

Expected Revenue 

Spain has approximately 5 months season. Children School holidays, Mid-Week holidays, Holiday Weekends and Retirees who visiting Spain during the winter months. A room price is €89 per night, with an occupation of 60% brings an estimate between €90K and €106K revenue per year.

Because of the income stream we generate already we are not dependent.

story:
Follow us on Facebook                          www.HTLLacrosse.com

Hey there fellow sports enthusiasts, Nic here representing Hat Trick Lacrosse working to bring a brand new piece of lacrosse equipment to the market place. For the past year we have been working with an optical engineer to create an optically correct form fitting helmet visor for the sport of Lacrosse.

A protective helmet visor is nothing new, they have been around for a while and been made most notably for sports like football and hockey. The problem is when it comes to lacrosse, there are zero visors that are made to be worn with a modern day lacrosse helmet!

There are many reasons why someone would want a helmet visor while playing Lacrosse, shielding the eyes from the elements and debris such as turf rubber, rain, cold, dirt, sun, glare. Another reason someone would want a helmet visor is for aesthetics, lets be honest, a tinted face mask looks intimidating! The aesthetics of the visor always has been, and will continue to be of great importance to the company. When working with engineers to design this project, we had two main objectives, create a visor that is engineered with optically correct geometry & make sure the visor is form fitting and will look sleek on a helmet.

Like we said before the technology of a helmet visor is nothing new, safety lenses have a variety of applications such as construction, military, sports, consumer wear, aviation, ect. The polymer of choice for safety lenses is Polycarbonate, a nearly shatterproof plastic that is incredibly versatile. To ensure this visor would function as an optical piece, we worked with an optical engineering firm located just outside of Seattle. With their expertise, we have created a truly form fitting optically correct Helmet visor.

Our first model Visor will ONLY fit on the Cascade Pro 7.  Again, This visor is designed to fit perfectly into the Cascade Pro 7 model helmet.  We are already working on a visor to fit the Cascade CPX-R as well as other brand helmets, but for now we have focused on bringing this first Pro 7 model to production.

 

What we are asking for?

We are seeking funding to help pay for the high sunk cost of manufacturing this product. The best way to manufacture optical parts is by injection molding. Although this method is extremely efficient in the long run, at first there is a high sunk cost to pay for the “tooling” cost to construct the mold. Once the mold is constructed, identical pieces can be made very efficiently. 

HTL helmet visors will be made in the USA!! Due to the higher costs of manufacturing optical grade products, many companies quickly move production overseas to save a quick buck. We took the time to find a domestic manufacturer in Southern California who has the knowledge and expertise to complete this project.

With your help, we hope to get this project up and running, we have a lot of cool ideas we plan on bringing to the market, with tint colors and coatings to advance the sports of lacrosse.

In addition to Black Tinted visors, we will be applying a variety of different finishes, including Mirror and Iridium Coatings.

 

 

Timeline: 

 As soon as we have funding, we will have our manufacturer begin “tooling”.  This process of carving a mold of the visor out of a block of steel will take around 8 weeks. Once they have created the tool they will make a few samples to test for quality, and spend another few weeks making minor adjustments to mold before it is ready for production. Once we have our first batch of visors made they will be shipped to a Coating facility where they will receive Anti-fog and a exterior Hard coating, all of which will take an additional 2 weeks before they are in our hands ready to be shipped to customers. Over all we plan

story:
Concept

Did you ever come out of a subway station only to find that it is raining hard but you don’t have an umbrella with you? We aim to create an umbrella that is ultra-lightweight and small enough when folded so people can simply put it in their bag and forget about it until a hard rain suddenly falls.

Just imagine how light an umbrella has to be to fly like THIS:

Benefit of the product

Normally, what prevents people from bringing an umbrella with them are the extra weight they must carry around and the space an umbrella will occupy. The Tube (87g) weighs less than half of that of an iPhone 7 Plus (188g), and when folded, it is mere 20cm in length and 4cm in diameter, about 1/4 of a A5-size paper. The size and weight allow you to put it in your bags, suitcases or even jacket pockets adding almost no extra burden on you.

Engineering and design  

To make the umbrella super lightweight and still strong, we use carbon fibers to make the ribs. Carbon Fibers are 17.15 times stronger than steel and yet 5 to 10 times lighter, which makes it very popular in aerospace, civil engineering, military, and motorsports, etc. However, they are relatively expensive when compared with similar fibers. 

We also developed a fabric that is about half the weight of normal fabric for the canopy, Furthermore, we design special molds to drill holes on the ribs and allow the use of lighter plastic to make the umbrella even lighter.

Aside from the lightness, our exclusive "WindBrace" technology allows the ribs to fold upward when the wind is too strong to withstand, so the rib will be unharmed and you can just flip it back and keep going. 

The canopy is not only super lightweight, but is also equipped with our unique "AquaRepel" and "UVshield" capabilities. The "AquaRepel" is a water-repellency coating that allows users to quickly dry the canopy with one few fling motions. The "UVshield", meanwhile, provides UPF50+ protection under harsh sun.

Quality   

While making our A.Brolly Tube ultra-lightweight, we also take good care of its quality. Carbon fiber, mainly used in aerospace, sport cars and professional sport equipment, is one of the lightest and strongest materials available for commercial use. We also re-designed the structures of the shaft and ribs so it won't get destroyed even against strong wind. Our A.Brolly Tube is designed to hold up for 10 to 15 years under normal usage.

Packaging

In order to protect our A.Brolly Tube during the international shipping, we specially designed a tube-shaped outer box, which is solid, colorful and seepage-proof. 

Shopping Bag

In addition to the Tube umbrella, A.Brolly also present a foldable shopping bag made with the same fabric as the Tube canopy. It is lightweight, durable, and can support up to 44 pounds (20kgs) of items inside.

Rewards

Media Coverage

Risks and challenges

We have successfully made on-time shipments to our Kickstarter backers:

And, you can check out the overwhelmingly positive comments from our satisfied backers in our Kickstarter campaign page.

So, you can be sure that we make shipments as promised, and the quality of our products will be simply amazing. You can rest assured that you get one of the best umbrella in the market if you back us.
story_txt: ConceptDid you ever come out of a subway station only to find that it is raining hard but you don’t have an umbrella with you? We aim to create an umbrella that is ultra-lightweight and small enough when folded so people can simply put it in their bag and forget about it until a hard rain suddenly falls.Just imagine how light an umbrella has to be to fly like THIS:Benefit of the productNormally, what prevents people from bringing an umbrella with them are the extra weight they must carry around and the space an umbrella will occupy. The Tube (87g) weighs less than half of that of an iPhone 7 Plus (188g), and when folded, it is mere 20cm in length and 4cm in diameter, about 1/4 of a A5-size paper. The size and weight allow you to put it in your bags, suitcases or even jacket pockets adding almost no extra burden on you.Engineering and design  To make the umbrella super lightweight and still strong, we use carbon fibers to make the ribs. Carbon Fibers are 17.15 times stronger than steel and yet 5 to 10 times lighter, which makes it very popular in aerospace, civil engineering, military, and motorsports, etc. However, they are relatively expensive when compared with similar fibers. We also developed a fabric that is about half the weight of normal fabric for the canopy, Furthermore, we design special molds to drill holes on the ribs and allow the use of lighter plastic to make the umbrella even lighter.Aside from the lightness, our exclusive "WindBrace" technology allows the ribs to fold upward when the wind is too strong to withstand, so the rib will be unharmed and you can just flip it back and keep going. The canopy is not only super lightweight, but is also equipped with our unique "AquaRepel" and "UVshield" capabilities. The "AquaRepel" is a water-repellency coating that allows users to quickly dry the canopy with one few fling motions. The "UVshield", meanwhile, provides UPF50+ protection under harsh sun.Quality   While making our A.Brolly Tube ultra-lightweight, we also take good care of its quality. Carbon fiber, mainly used in aerospace, sport cars and professional sport equipment, is one of the lightest and strongest materials available for commercial use. We also re-designed the structures of the shaft and ribs so it won't get destroyed even against strong wind. Our A.Brolly Tube is designed to hold up for 10 to 15 years under normal usage.PackagingIn order to protect our A.Brolly Tube during the international shipping, we specially designed a tube-shaped outer box, which is solid, colorful and seepage-proof. Shopping BagIn addition to the Tube umbrella, A.Brolly also present a foldable shopping bag made with the same fabric as the Tube canopy. It is lightweight, durable, and can support up to 44 pounds (20kgs) of items inside.RewardsMedia CoverageRisks and challengesWe have successfully made on-time shipments to our Kickstarter backers:And, you can check out the overwhelmingly positive comments from our satisfied backers in our Kickstarter campaign page.So, you can be sure that we make shipments as promised, and the quality of our products will be simply amazing. You can rest assured that you get one of the best umbrella in the market if you back us.

story:
NapUp FLY is a unique, ergonomic and supportive in-flight personal sleep system.   

If you love traveling but hate the discomfort that comes along with it than NapUp FLY is your ultimate 360° sleep solution.

 NapUp FLY attaches to ANY headrest and gently holds your head upright. With its non restrictive, unique forehead strap design, NapUp FLY cradles your head, whether you are actually sleeping or just relaxing. 

 

Music is a big part of our on-the-go life. NapUp Fly+ includes integrated seamless high-quality speakers that connect via a 3.5mm jack, providing the ultimate relaxing experience.

Whether you like to watch movies or listen to your favorite music, NapUp Fly+ will make your journey much more pleasant and give you maximum comfort. 

[no gifs]

Bobbing Heads might be funny to see, but in reality it causes stiffness and discomfort :(  

NapUp FLY ends this ordeal, once and for all :) 

 If you're still here, you must have already tried the common products on the market and realized that you owe it to yourself to find a better solution: 

[funded today for IGG]

 Take your NapUp FLY/FLY+ out of the special carrying case and wrap the straps around the headrest or around the seat   

Connect the forehead strap and fit it to your head size using the Velcro.

 Now you can choose whether to:   

  • Use NapUp FLY as a comfy neck pillow 
  • Pull the forehead strap down so your head won’t flop when you start to snooze 
  • Put the eye cover in place for some serious zzz’s 
  • With NapUp Fly+ plug in your phone or music device and dream on... 

4 years ago, we started a company dedicated to solving the bobbing head syndrome for kids sleeping on-the-go. 
 

Since then more than 100K kids in 35 countries are sleeping comfortably and securely in the car using NapUp. 

*This product is on the market and won't be offer as a reward. 

Soon after we launched we received some feedback from parents, who wanted to use Napup for themselves on flights, and so we got to work.

 ~18 months and about 8 prototypes later, we perfected NapUp FLY, and are proud to Kickstart it , and share this amazing inflight sleep solution with the Kickstarter community first.

We can’t wait to get your NapUp FLY selfies :)

Ben Cohen Gazit - CEO & Founder 

After 25 years in the advertising business, plus a stint on the client side, Ben finally realized his dream and made a new direction for flying 

Avital Eran - CMO

After more than 15 years in the direct response, international sales & marketing industry, Avital is finally kick starting… 

Hagit Mesika Cohen - Digital Director 

Hagit owned her own B2B business in the lifestyle field and was recruited by NapUp Fly to work her magic on all things digital 

Sigahl Silvera - Global Communications Director 

 After years at all the biggest name ad agencies, Sigahl is using her international know how to bring NapUp Fly sky high 

Dorit Moses -  COO 

Dorit keeps things running smoothly on the ground, managing the day-to-day operations of NapUp Fly  

 

[Funded Today]

 A pick into our workshop: 

 

 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

story:
GoVe™ : The First ASD


GoVe™ is a unique all surface drone. What is that you ask?  Let's explain: 
The GoVe™ drone is remotely controlled by an individual (Pilot), or in future version autonomously, in order to explore land, water, and difficult terrains (mud, ice, marshes, etc). 

The GoVe™ is the first drone capable of driving along ANY surface. With the GoVe™ you can quickly and safely go from land to water at a moment's notice. The GoVe™  is the"Jeep Wrangler of the drone world." 

At this time, the GoVe™ drone has been designed, a working prototype has been built and established. The heavy lifting has been done, now it's just a matter of delivering so other people can benefit from it.

The funding is no longer going to be devoted to the mechanical aspects, but rather to ramp up the electronics and to integrate the control systems for cameras and apps. 

Be a champion for this project, share with family and friends and help get the word out there. Check out our fantastic perks, and use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the news.
Contact:

661-513-GOVE(4683)
goveallsurfacedrone@gmail.com
www.facebook.com/GoVedrone


GoVe™ : Application


"The GoVe™ stretches the imagination and it expands the conventional way of traveling."  - Rod Blair, Inventor

 Recreational and work application uses are limitless.

Drive through water, mud, ice, marshes/everglades, sand, snow, rocky terrain, and even on the wide open ocean. The GoVe™ drone can be dropped from a plane and inflate in midair prior to landing. 
The original concept came from watching a life guard on the beach fight against the surf to help someone. Why not just send a GoVe™ drone out that can drop a ring or raft in order to immediately help them. In situations where tide is too high or the surf is impossible for an individual to get through, sending the GoVe™ drone will help identify and assist how rescuers can be prepared and equipped to respond.
 
The inventor of the GoVe™ drone had a strong interest in ice rescue. When conceptualizing the applications for the GoVe™ drone, he wanted to create a device that was capable of saving a person's life when trapped in ice, without risking the life of a rescue respondent. The difficulties in ice rescue is that the ice can break as soon as you crawl on top of the surface, and fall through. If the ice cracks with the GoVe™ drone, the pilot of the GoVe™ drone can continue to propel it towards the victim and provide aid.
Use the GoVe™ for adventure. Make home movies by utilizing the 360-degree feature. Capture every moment of those thrill seeking experiences. 
Imagine as a video producer, you can have five GoVe™'s all with 360 cameras, getting angled shots you can't get anywhere else. In water scenes, adventure scenes, by taking the GoVe™ right behind the actor obtaining a more dynamic view point. You don't have to have an expensive helicopter, or boat, there are unlimited uses at a very low cost.
The GoVe™ drone is compact, small enough to fit in the trunk of a car, and can be easily assembled after inflation onsite. The GoVe™ drone was designed to be scalable. It can be made big enough for an individual pilot to ride, or it can be made small enough to drive remotely.  

"There are applications that are going to change most markets and have an impact on the Internet of Things (IOT)." - Rod Blair, Inventor

Other applications:

·  Recreational

· Amusement Park Rides 

·  Rescue

·  Surveillance

·  Surveying 

·  Security

·  Pipeline inspection

·  Farming (Agricultural industries)

·  Fishing

·  Package delivery

·  Photography

·  Videography (Filmmaking)      

· Internet of Things (IOT)


                                                                       


GoVe™ drone: How it works 

·  Suitable power sources include gasoline, alcohol, batteries and fuel cells.

· 50 min charge time on battery operated ASD 

·  Each wheel is powered independently forward and reverse 

·  Outfitted with cameras, sensors, or custom payloads 

·  Radio controlled with Wi-Fi & Bluetooth enabled

·  Speeds up to 80 mph 

·  Center of gravity is below the center plane, so it’s self-righting (cannot be flipped)

·  Can be deployed from an aircraft

·Suitable for propulsion with various power sources from JP, gasoline, alcohol, batteries, fuel cells, or propane  


GoVe™ drone: Going Green

It is environmentally friendly. The low-pressure footprint on any surfaces would allow the craft to travel in environmentally sensitive areas without compaction.

No exhausts are transmitted through the water, so hydrocarbon contamination will not come in contact with the water or vegetation. 



GoVe™ drone: Funding Expectations

·  Miniaturize the electrical components 
·  Select the optimum for batteries and motors
·  Manufacturing and tooling 
·  Programming 
·  App development

We are seeking sponsors to produce a larger GoVe™ for an individual to pilot and set the precedent for the first all surface vehicle (ASV). 

We invite you to be part of this experience. This is an amazing opportunity to be at the forefront of technology, as well as support an eco-friendly initiative. Your contribution will go a long way in making the GoVe™  a reality. Within three -six months of receiving the full funding we need, we will be able to produce the first batch of the GoVe™ drone , and place this exciting product within your reach. 

About the Inventor:


 
 

Rod Blair, Inventor designed and built the Hydro Bronc, an exceptional craft used in the extreme sport of white water rafting. Check our website for more details on our inventions- http://www.sportogo.com/


GoVe™ Team:



Rod Blair, Founder & Inventor 

Luke Blair, Electronic Design Engineer 

Dal Williams, Electrical Engineer Consulting Designer

Roy Blair, Treasurer & Secretary CFO 

Emmanuel Medina, Physical Analyst & Viability 

Erika Baltazar, Project Coordinator 

Rebecca Ilodibia, Research Analyst 

 Jordan Yarbrough, Marketing Coordinator 


 Special thanks to Matthew Smith Productions 


FAQs:

What do you mean by all surface drone?

GoVe™ is the only drone capable of driving through mud, snow, ice, sand, rocks and even water. No other drone can quickly and safely go from land or ice to water at a moment’s notice.

Why not just use a flying drone?

Flying drones typically have trouble in bad weather and limited ranges because of their weight restrictions or FAA regulations. With the GoVe™ we will be able to carry much heavier payloads for longer distances and longer periods of time in all kinds of weather.

What are the applications?

The GoVe™ is a unique remotely controlled all surface drone capable of driving through mud, ice, snow, marshes, everglades, sand, rocky terrain and even the wide open ocean. This makes it perfect for rescue missions, package delivery, recreation, adventure, and cinematography. 

How long will I be able to use the GoVe™ on a single charge?

Thanks to lithium technology in the GoVe™'s batteries you will be able to drive around for up to 50 minutes at a time. The rechargeable battery packs are easily switched out to keep the fun going.

What kind of cameras and equipment can I mount on the GoVe™? 

A variety of sensor and camera capabilities will be integrated into GoVe™'s electronics. You can use sports cameras, thermal sensors, motion sensors, custom payloads or enough controls to make it autonomous. 

Can you swap out power sources like batteries or gasoline engines?

At this time we are not able to swap out power sources for the GoVe™. We will be developing the electric and gas versions separately. 

Is the GoVe™ environmentally friendly or green?

Yes. The low-pressure footprint on solid surfaces would allow the craft to travel in environmentally sensitive areas without compaction. Due to the nature of the craft, there is limited hull drag under propulsion so surface speeds can be extreme on the water up to 80mph. Even at such high speeds, there is no need for a cooling exhaust that would put hydrocarbons in the water. In areas where propellers or jets are used, there would be no clogging or entanglement with the environment that would disrupt local habitats. 

How does it work?

The GoVe™ can be manually piloted or remotely controlled.  Each wheel is powered independently, making it easier to maneuver and giving it a unique braking system which uses the reverse operation mode. Since the center of gravity of the craft is below the center plane there is no effective way to capsize the craft. It can be outfitted with powerful cameras and sensors for all sorts of adventures, reconnaissance, surveying, data collection and custom package or payload delivery. 

How big is it?

GoVe™ is inherently simple to operate and can be made compact enough to go into the trunk of a vehicle. The first production versions will be about the size of a small dog but the GoVe™ was also designed to be scalable. We can make the GoVe™ big enough for people to ride in; you could replace both your Rhino™ and Jet Ski with a single GoVe™. 

What is the funding for? 

At this time, the GoVe™ drone has been designed and a working prototype has been built. With the funds raised, we will be able to miniaturize the electrical components, select the optimum batteries and develop the motors along with their respective drive trains. The rest of the funding will go towards building the first production versions. The heavy lifting has been done, now it’s just a matter of delivering so other people can benefit from it.  

How do I order my GoVe™? 

You can be among the first to receive a GoVe™ drone  if you select the $3,000 donation option in the perks section. 

For any further questions or comments please contact:

661-513-GOVE(4683)

goveallsurfacedrone@gmail.com

www.facebook.com/GoVedrone

goveallsurfacedrone.com (website coming soon)

story:
Perhaps you like the kind of exploring the world and are aware of the feeling when you are trying to catch the wind or the crest of a wave, when you are challenging gravity doing downhill or rock climbing, when you are having wonderful time at an adorably picturesque place that you don‘t want to leave. However, on the next day, you eager to go somewhere else and explore some other amazing destination. At such times, you hate wasting precious time on packing and unpacking, don`t you! Vagabond Home is a comfortable and cozy home for anyone who loves doing outdoor activities and being on the road. For the first time, there is a roof top tent in which the classic two layer construction of 4 season expedition tents is used.

We are Elena Shopova and Zdravko Doychev and Vagabond Home is our new project. We combine the artistic abilities of a stage designer (Elena) and the expert knowledge of an engineer (Zdravko) in order to give birth to an innovative roof top tent, entirely designed by us. We had been imagining our dream tent for a long time before it brought it home to us that we could design and construct a safe and mobile tent with the laziest possible set-up.

We have spent the last two years creating the prototype, testing and improving it. Now we introduce it to the world with the launch of our INDIEGOGO campaign. Production will start in spring 2019. Vagabond Home claims to be the most comfortable two-person tent of this type.

 
 
- Exceptional thermal insulation - the two-layer construction will make you feel comfortable even in the most extreme weather conditions. It prevents condensation in wet and cold weather and eliminates any possibility of water leakage in heavy rain. The ventilation pockets on the outer fabric can be closed to regulate air circulation, depending on climatic conditions. The outer and inner fabrics are attached with Velcro and can be easily detached for cleaning. The shell of the tent is manufactured from fiberglass sandwich construction that is also a great insulator.

- Comfort - gas springs and support mechanisms are hidden between the two layers of fabric, and so you don’t see them while resting in the tent. The ceiling is covered by fine, 3mm thick, automotive grade upholstery.

- Lightweight construction – the fibreglass shell is made by vacuum infusion (a process
used in the production of modern aircraft and sailing yachts). This in combination with the aluminium frame, integrated in the bottom, provides a weight of only 55kg (121lbs). This means that the tent can be easily placed on top of a car by two people.

- Quick closing - thanks to gas springs that can be locked in any position, it is very easy to close the Vagabond Home. To do this, you have to pull the roof of the tent almost completely down, lock the springs, put the fabric inside, and then close the box completely.

- Aerodynamic shape – The tent resembles the shape of an airplane wing, which is optimized for reducing drag force, and so minimizes fuel consumption. That’s why on most modern car designs the roof tends to go lower to the back.

- Easy installation on almost any car with no tools - To use the Vagabond Home you have to equip your car with roof bars at least 135cm (53") long (this is a standard size offered by all major manufacturers of roof racks).

- Provides a lot of internal space – The highest spot of the Vagabond Home is located in the front. And when you open it up, it provides really a lot of height in the front. This way it combines the advantages of both types of hard shell roof top tents.

- Security - Vagabond Home has a special anti-theft lock, allowing you to leave your belongings in the closed tent and be sure about their safety. In addition, Vagabond Home cannot be removed from the vehicle while it is in closed position.

- Comfortably fits two adults and one child - The width and length are 135cm by 225cm (53'' x 88.5’’). When open, the highest point of the ceiling is 150cm (59''). This fits two adults and a child comfortably.

 

- Telescopic ladder

- Comfortable foam mattress and bed sheet

- Four dimmable LED lights and a 12V socket for charging electronics, which draws power from the vehicle lighter, via an integrated cable.

- Storage net and pockets

Best of all, everything - like sleeping bags, bedclothes, pillows, clothes, cosmetics, books and other stuff without which a trip seems unthinkable can stay in the tent, and the luggage compartment of the car remains free and easily accessible.

- dimmable 4 point lightning and power socket - The tent is equipped with 4 lights, mounted in the 4 corners of the ceiling. The top ones provide light in the whole tent, and the bottom ones are intended mainly for reading. You can dim them separately. The tent is also equipped with an automotive lighter socket, providing a convenient way to charge electronics. Both the lightning and power socket are powered from the lighter socket of the car via an integrated cable. This way you don’t have to worry about any batteries or other consumables.

- no metal parts or mechanisms inside - The gas springs and support mechanisms of the tent are hidden between the two layers of fabric, so when resting inside you don’t see any metal parts. This provides a true sense of coziness.

- fine anti mosquito meshes - on each door, can be closed in cold weather.

- two storage pocket with three smaller pockets each - suitable for mobile phone, book, electronics...

- two bottle holders - very useful when it is rainy.

- five ways to open the back door - For more convenience each layer of the back door can be opened to the left right top or bottom.

 - closable ventilation pockets -  provide good insulation and ventilation, and the ability to handle all kinds of weather.

- anti-theft lock - The anti-theft lock gives you peace of mind to park your car in cities without  worrying about your belongings. This way you don’t have to move your stuff in the car before closing the tent.

- telescopic aluminium ladder with attachment hooks - Stays inside while travelling. (three sizes - 200/260/320cm)

EU - Indicated European Union shipping applies to continental EU and Mainland UK. Ships right to your doorstep, customs taxes are included (DDP).

US - United States shipping rate applies to the lower 48 states of continental US. Ships right to your doorstep, customs taxes are included (DDP).

Canada - PickUp at Vancouver airport (YVR). VAT and customs taxes are not included (DAT). Other locations and options are possible upon request.

International – Worldwide shipping is available upon request. Just ask us for the exact options to your location. VAT and customs taxes are not included. (office@vagabondhome.eu)

Shipping will start at the end of April, and will follow the order of contribution.

  • Zdravko Doychev: Engineer – has done all the engineering and technologies and a lot of hard working
  • Elena Shopova: Stage and graphic designer – has done the visual, interior and exterior design and also a lot of hard work building the prototype

Together we share the passion of paragliding, kayaking and being outdoors. We constantly go camping, having a broad experience with tents and different gear.

As paragliding pilots we need a way to travel long distances with our car and be able to sleep at a different place every night, without having to set-up and pack complicated camping gear.

That’s why almost three years ago we decided to create the Vagabond Home, offering the best protection from weather conditions, the fastest closing and a real aerodynamic shape, which doesn’t slow the car down.

We were extremely happy to find out that our one year old daughter Eva simply adores the Vagabond Home and feels even more comfortable sleeping in it, than in her home bed.

 

 

More about Vagabond home:

Web Site

Facebook
story_txt:
Perhaps you like the kind of exploring the world and are aware of the feeling when you are trying to catch the wind or the crest of a wave, when you are challenging gravity doing downhill or rock climbing, when you are having wonderful time at an adorably picturesque place that you don‘t want to leave. However, on the next day, you eager to go somewhere else and explore some other amazing destination. At such times, you hate wasting precious time on packing and unpacking, don`t you! Vagabond Home is a comfortable and cozy home for anyone who loves doing outdoor activities and being on the road. For the first time, there is a roof top tent in which the classic two layer construction of 4 season expedition tents is used.We are Elena Shopova and Zdravko Doychev and Vagabond Home is our new project. We combine the artistic abilities of a stage designer (Elena) and the expert knowledge of an engineer (Zdravko) in order to give birth to an innovative roof top tent, entirely designed by us. We had been imagining our dream tent for a long time before it brought it home to us that we could design and construct a safe and mobile tent with the laziest possible set-up.We have spent the last two years creating the prototype, testing and improving it. Now we introduce it to the world with the launch of our INDIEGOGO campaign. Production will start in spring 2019. Vagabond Home claims to be the most comfortable two-person tent of this type.

 

 

- Exceptional thermal insulation - the two-layer construction will make you feel comfortable even in the most extreme weather conditions. It prevents condensation in wet and cold weather and eliminates any possibility of water leakage in heavy rain. The ventilation pockets on the outer fabric can be closed to regulate air circulation, depending on climatic conditions. The outer and inner fabrics are attached with Velcro and can be easily detached for cleaning. The shell of the tent is manufactured from fiberglass sandwich construction that is also a great insulator.
- Comfort - gas springs and support mechanisms are hidden between the two layers of fabric, and so you don’t see them while resting in the tent. The ceiling is covered by fine, 3mm thick, automotive grade upholstery.- Lightweight construction – the fibreglass shell is made by vacuum infusion (a processused in the production of modern aircraft and sailing yachts). This in combination with the aluminium frame, integrated in the bottom, provides a weight of only 55kg (121lbs). This means that the tent can be easily placed on top of a car by two people.- Quick closing - thanks to gas springs that can be locked in any position, it is very easy to close the Vagabond Home. To do this, you have to pull the roof of the tent almost completely down, lock the springs, put the fabric inside, and then close the box completely. - Aerodynamic shape – The tent resembles the shape of an airplane wing, which is optimized for reducing drag force, and so minimizes fuel consumption. That’s why on most modern car designs the roof tends to go lower to the back. - Easy installation on almost any car with no tools - To use the Vagabond Home you have to equip your car with roof bars at least 135cm (53") long (this is a standard size offered by all major manufacturers of roof racks).- Provides a lot of internal space – The highest spot of the Vagabond Home is located in the front. The top ones provide light in the whole tent, and the bottom ones are intended mainly for reading. You can dim them separately. The tent is also equipped with an automotive lighter socket, providing a convenient way to charge electronics. Both the lightning and power socket are powered from the lighter socket of the car via an integrated cable. This way you don’t have to worry about any batteries or other consumables.- no metal parts or mechanisms inside - The gas springs and support mechanisms of the tent are hidden between the two layers of fabric, so when resting inside you don’t see any metal parts. story:
Hello again from Easy Aerial!

We have been on Kickstarter for the second time to fund the Easy Drone XL Pro - our newest addition to the Easy Drone family. Last year when we launched our Easy Drone series here on KickStarter we gained a lot of happy customers worldwide. They helped us tremendously test and improve our modular design and provided invaluable feedback.

How is it different? 

Well first off, it can stay in the air for 45 minutes on one battery charge. Unheard of right? We thought so.

It spans an amazing 28 inches (700mm) from motor to motor diagonally, in comparison the original DJI Phantom has 14 in (350mm) span. You do the math. 

Even though it's twice the size it fits in the same backpack as a 350mm frame including the remote, the battery, charger, etc., with room to spare.

Easy Drone XL Pro can easily lift a mirrorless back camera on a gimbal with combined weight of up to 3 lbs (1.4 Kg). Check below for a list of example cameras you could use. 

What stayed the same?

Same modular design - Easy Drone XL Pro has the same modular design as the previous versions L and XL that allows it to fit into the same size backpack. 

Same Control Unit - Even though the new Fly Bot has some new and upgraded features it is still backwards compatible with all our previous frame versions. Same goes for our previous FlyBots - they can be used with the new frame with a simple wireless profile update.

Same Travel Backpack - The XL Pro still fits in the same backpack that pack the L and XL. If you happen to own one of our previous versions all you need is a custom insert for XL Pro. 

As seen on:

How do we compare to: 

Other GoPro drones? 

Even though our quadcopter is twice the size, it still fits in the same travel case as these other ones available for purchase in stores. Flight times comparison:

Now, if you just wanted to put your fave mirrorless-back camera (or anything larger then a GoPro) up in the sky, these would be your options. 

Professional Camera Drones:


Rewards

The $1 reward is often under appreciated, but we see it as an equivalent of a tap on the back and a friendly "Good job guys! I like what you're doing here..."

$35 T-shirt has our logo and the tagline. It's not too flashy or prominent, but definitely a conversation starter.

 All our reward packages are Ready-To-Fly, which means they come with a remote, battery, charger, telemetry dongle and video receiver.

If you want to maximize your flight time with a GoPro camera on a gimbal pledge $2195 or more and we will reward you with an endurance kit like this that stays up in the air for up to 45 minutes!

If you'd like to use a camera larger than a GoPro and have a video screen that mounts on the remote this is the perfect kit for you. 

What is included in an Easy Drone XL Pro Kit:

  • Frame with powerful 400KV motors and foldable 15in propellers
  • FlyBot - proprietary modular command unit with built in video transmitter
  • Remote
  • Video Receiver
  • USB Telemetry module
  • Battery - 6 cell 8,000 Mah battery comes standard (10K Mah optional)
  • Charger - with built in power supply and digital display 
  • Backpack - with custom cut foam, convenient for travel

Flight times: 

Easy Drone XL Pro can carry a GoPro camera for an amazing 45 minutes while streaming video to the screen on the ground. As the weight increases the flight time shortens. Here is a table of the impressive XL Pro airtimes with some common configurations: 

Technical Specs

FlyBot
- 4x 30A ESC's 
- 915Mhz (US) or 433Mhz (Europe) telemetry
- 5.8 Ghz Video link
- 2.4 Ghz Radio controller

Frame
- 28 in (700mm) diagonal
- 400 KV motors
- 15 in folding props

Quick to assemble


Compatible Camera Types (sample)

Easy Drone XL Pro can lift up to 3 lbs of weight. Recommended weight for flight is up to 2.2 pounds combined (gimbal+camera). Here are some of the cameras that fit this profile: 

Timeline

January 2015 - Frame expansion - maximizing frame size

March 2015 - Battery testing - finding the largest battery for the frame

May 2015 - Motor and prop matching - best performing combination

July 2015 - Flight length testing

August 2015 - New backpack insert design


Delivery Schedule

Why another KickStarter?

You are probably wondering why are we back on Kickstarter and the answer is two-fold. One reason is that we need to reach a certain number of units to be able to negotiate better prices with vendors and then pass them on to you in the form of KickStarter only, low pricing. 

More importantly though this is where our most involved audience is. The biggest reward we received last time was the feedback from our supporters. It allowed us to iterate and improve until we reached the final solution. In return we gave everyone a free upgrade to the latest version of our previous drone. 

How did we do last time? 

About the same time we launched last year, there were a few other drones that kickstarted their campaigns. More then a year later this is the outcome so far: 

CAUTION! 

This is NOT a toy. Improper handling and not following proper procedures can result in a serious injury. Always have your own and safety of others on your mind when piloting. Avoid flying in public places and always comply with your local laws and regulations.

The Team

Easy Aerial team includes four talented young engineers with shared passion for robotics and flying machines. 

In Conclusion

Here we are a year later. We spent it improving and testing, optimizing and expanding, but most importantly making sure our supporters are getting the best possible support wherever they are in the world. We are ready to present to you the Easy Drone XL Pro our latest modular quadcopter. 

Risks and challenges

Being on Kickstarter for the third time you could say that we have seen it all. Last year after a successful campaign we carefully planned the production schedule making sure we cover all bases. A week later we we learned that the ship carrying our batteries and remotes broke down and had to be docked for repairs. It threw off our schedule by a month!

This time around we know where the potential pitfalls lay and we can do everything to try and avoid that. On top of that we already have the key components to build the first 15 units and we have developed relationships with some of the local providers so that we can deliver on our early bird promise.

However, it doesn't mean that there won't be any surprises since a lot of the components are coming from abroad. We will do our best to deliver on our promise no matter what.

story:
Sunglasses with a Vision

It's not breaking news...

Trash is a serious problem that affects the health of people, wildlife, local business and the surrounding areas. Trash in the water and on the shore can harm and or kill marine animals, birds, injure swimmers and beach goers. By 2050, plastic in the oceans will outweigh, predicts a report from the Ellen MacArthur Foundation, in partnership with the World Economic.

 

What You're Getting

In exchange for your donation you will be receiving a pair of your choice from our Surfside Collection. Either Cobalt, Flare, Lucky or Ink.

You're assisting in our Project. You're donation financially assists us in many ways. From getting to our cleanup sites to lunches for our Volunteers. With your donation we can also increase our inventory volume and create a marketing campaign, Without you this Project cannot be an on-going one. Many thanks go out to our Volunteers, Supporters, Friends, Family, Pledges and Social media following for being the ones to make this possible.

 

The Impact

There are thousands of people and companies worldwide working together to end this crisis. The public is more aware than ever and yet there are continued reports of pollution getting worse. Not just in the oceans, but in our local lakes, waterways, streets and forests.

Our goal is to work with organizations like The Ocean Cleanup, Greenpeace, and 4Ocean as they are on the cutting edge of technology and in need of as much assistance as possible. Today we are actively working in the local Columbia area trying to do our part. If you are interested in joining us please send us an email.

 

Risks & Challenges

As we launch our campaign, we see no delays in shipping nor any shipping complications as we have a set inventory ready to go!!

 

www.Driftcoshades.com

story:
Short Summary

Our team come from emergency services backgrounds and have many years experience both practising and teaching First Aid.

We've been frustrated by how impractical many First Aid kits are for use in the real world, and have done many months of research and prototyping to create a kit that is small, portable, and good value for money.

Here's just a few reasons out kit stands out in the market:-

  • It's orange! Most kits are green which means they're very easily lost if put down in long grass.
  • Truly portable. No rigid plastic boxes here; this kit stuffs easily into a rucksack, onto your belt, or your bike.
  • It's useful! We've done away with a lot of the rubbish that's included in typical First Aid kits. Instead of tiny scissors, we've put heavy-duty shears that will easily cut through clothing (including motorbike leathers) and seat belts. The contents have been designed specifically for what you'll actually need and use in the outdoor environment.
  • We use it! We run wilderness First Aid courses and have been using our prototype kits for all the training we perform, and also keep them on us in case of a real life incident during a training session.

What We Need & What You Get

We have funded the costs of prototyping this kit and now have this at a level where we're ready for production. Once produced, the kits will be retailed to our existing customer base and online, and potentially on a wholesale basis to independent outdoor retailers. The RRP will be £15 (excl postage).

For a contribution of £10, we'll send you one of our brand new kits, postage free, to any UK address.

£70 will give you a place on a 2-day Wilderness First Aid course (held nr Hastings, East Sussex), usual price £140, together with free overnight camping, and a free First Aid kit,

If we're unable to get full funding via crowdfunding, production will be delayed until such time as there are sufficient funds to develop this kit.

    The Impact

    We've had many years experience in training people in First Aid and also, with our emergency-services backgrounds, we've attended to many patients in real situations.

    It is clear to us that the majority of First Aid kits are not actually very practical for use in an emergency situation. We've therefore invested a great deal of time in prototyping a new kit which we have now used extensively.

    We've a real passion for what we do (as backed up by numerous testimonials on our website and Facebook page), and it's been a long-term aim of ours to put a kit together that looks great, but is also practical, and could help to save lives.

    Your contribution will really help us to turn this aim into an end product.

      Risks & Challenges

      We have got prototypes and costs from several manufacturers and have found one that has produced the prototype kit to the standard we were looking for. We've also sourced reliable suppliers for the components of the kits.

      We train well in excess of 1,000 people per year in First Aid, and will market the initial production of these kits to these customers. Our long-term aim is to be able to offer these on a wholesale basis to retailers of outdoor products, which is a huge potential market.

      The initial risk is that the kits won't sell as quickly as we expected to our current customer base. (We estimate that the initial production run will sell within appx 6 months) However, only a small number of the components have a 'best before' date, and this is usually at least 2 years from the initial point of sale. We therefore have a much longer time to sell these kits if required.

        Other Ways You Can Help

        If you're unable to help financially, but share our goals, we'd love it if you could spread the word on social media, and maybe help with the marketing of the kits once they have been produced. Our Facebook page is at Facebook.com/EmergencyLifeSupportTeam

        Many thanks for your interest in our project.

Instead of tiny scissors, we've put heavy-duty shears that will easily cut through clothing (including motorbike leathers) and seat belts. The contents have been designed specifically for what you'll actually need and use in the outdoor environment.
We use it! We run wilderness First Aid courses and have been using our prototype kits for all the training we perform, and also keep them on us in case of a real life incident during a training session. 

What We Need & What You Get

We have funded the costs of prototyping this kit and now have this at a level where we're ready for production. Once produced, the kits will be retailed to our existing customer base and online, and potentially on a wholesale basis to independent outdoor retailers. The RRP will be £15 (excl postage).
For a contribution of £10, we'll send you one of our brand new kits, postage free, to any UK address.
£70 will give you a place on a 2-day Wilderness First Aid course (held nr Hastings, East Sussex), usual price £140, together with free overnight camping, and a free First Aid kit,
If we're unable to get full funding via crowdfunding, production will be delayed until such time as there are sufficient funds to develop this kit.

  The Impact We've had many years experience in training people in First Aid and also, with our emergency-services backgrounds, we've attended to many patients in real situations.
It is clear to us that the majority of First Aid kits are not actually very practical for use in an emergency situation. We've therefore invested a great deal of time in prototyping a new kit which we have now used extensively.
We've a real passion for what we do (as backed up by numerous testimonials on our website and Facebook page), and it's been a long-term aim of ours to put a kit together that looks great, but is also practical, and could help to save lives.
Your contribution will really help us to turn this aim into an end product.

  Risks & Challenges We have got prototypes and costs from several manufacturers and have found one that has produced the prototype kit to the standard we were looking for. We've also sourced reliable suppliers for the components of the kits.
We train well in excess of 1,000 people per year in First Aid, and will market the initial production of these kits to these customers. Our long-term aim is to be able to offer these on a wholesale basis to retailers of outdoor products, which is a huge potential market.
The initial risk is that the kits won't sell as quickly as we expected to our current customer base. (We estimate that the initial production run will sell within appx 6 months) However, only a small number of the components have a 'best before' date, and this is usually at least 2 years from the initial point of sale. We therefore have a much longer time to sell these kits if required.

  Other Ways You Can Help If you're unable to help financially, but share our goals, we'd love it if you could spread the word on social media, and maybe help with the marketing of the kits once they have been produced. Our Facebook page is at Facebook.com/EmergencyLifeSupportTeam
Many thanks for your interest in our project.

story:
Where the Idea Came From

The Travel Halo was born after lots of traveling, sore necks and sleepless flights. I have always loved to travel. But I’ve never been able to fall asleep in the car or on a plane. I’ve tried almost every travel pillow on the market with little relief. Regular c-shaped “neck pillows” just don’t work. They still allow your head to move, and neck to bend. And they're not very ergonomic. Just about everyone has tried a conventional travel/neck pillow, but I’ve yet to meet anyone who says they like them.

So, one day after riding shotgun during a long and sleepless car ride, I had the idea. I jumped out of the car, grabbed some old socks, an old tennis headband, lots of tape, and here’s what I came up with:

It was truly ugly, but it worked well! I spent the next year and a half fine tuning the design, researching materials, and finding an appropriate manufacuturer who could produce something to my standards.

The Travel Halo is for People Who:

  • Like things that actually work
  • Can't sleep while traveling or sitting up
  • Don't want to turn into a travel zombie

The Design

I have spent the last two years testing dozens of different designs and materials with one goal in mind: create a comfortable and easy to use travel pillow that actually works. 

The Travel Halo is made from a high quality polyester/spandex blend sports cloth. The material is very breathable, lightweight and soft to the touch providing maximum comfort. The Travel Halo features a stretchable band designed to fit any head-size. Two cotton pillows, secured inside the band, are positioned so that they cradle your head and prevent it from rolling to either side while you sleep. 

When traveling, I often found myself trying to sleep in brightly lit environments with little success. To address this, the Travel Halo includes a fold-down eye mask to block out ambient light.

The Travel Halo is designed with portability in mind. It sports a super comact, minimalist design that folds up easily when not in use. It can then be stored in the travel pouch included with every Travel Halo.

Help me help you sleep better!

I have the final design, prototypes and pre-production samples finished. I need your help to make sure that I can meet the minimum order quantity (MOQ) required by the manufacturer to go into production. Our website and interested retailers are ready. Your pledge will help me get our first full-scale production run under way and bring the Travel Halo to market!

To have the minimum pieces produced to get this project off the ground translates to about $35,000 - our funding goal. This money will be used exclusively for the following:

  • Manufacturing, production and associated costs
  • Packaging design and production
  • Shipping costs and materials

Please know that this campaign is all-or-nothing; meaning if we are unable to meet our funding goal, no money will be collected.

So please back this project! We have some awesome rewards for our backers ranging from the limited edition travel mug (below) to a Travel Halo from our first big production run!

 
 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to donate, please help get the word out to your friends and network. I'll give you a shout out and you'll have the satisfaction of knowing that you played a vital role in bringing the Travel Halo to market and comfort to weary travelers everywhere!

-Mike

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this d:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
PocketLab Air is an all-in-one science lab for investigating climate change and air pollution in your environment. PocketLab Air can measure carbon dioxide, ozone, particulate matter (PM1, PM2.5, PM10), temperature, humidity, barometric pressure, and light. We've designed PocketLab Air to be capable enough for climate and air quality researchers but simple enough for a 4th grade student learning about Earth science.

 

Map the pollution data that you collected to your phone GPS location to generate maps of air quality in your local community.

 

You can view sensor data on any phone, tablet, or computer with Bluetooth 4.0 support.

Store up to 30,000 data points on the internal memory and then download the data to your phone, tablet, or computer.

 

Simultaneously measure all the sensor parameters: carbon dioxide, ozone, particulate matter, temperature, humidity, barometric pressure, and light.

Wirelessly transmit data in real-time using Bluetooth 4.0. PocketLab Air can transmit up to 250 feet when in direct line of sight.

 

You can view sensor data on any phone, tablet, or computer with Bluetooth 4.0 support. PocketLab Air is small, rugged, and portable so you can attach it to things like weather balloons and drones.

 

You can collect pollution and emissions data in many new environments and applications.

Every PocketLab Air comes with a custom molded protective carrying case and accessories for going out in the world and exploring.

 

 PocketLab Air fits right along with your other tech gadgets and gear.

 

 

Turn your everyday commute into an air quality experiment.

 

You can better understand the air quality in your community and engage in pursuits like environmental justice.

 

PocketLab Air joins our other award-winning products that enable anyone to be a scientist and explore the world around them.

 

 

With PocketLab Air's Mission Mode, you can collaborate on global climate, air quality, and weather experiments. Request data contributions from other PocketLab Air users or submit your data to investigations set up by fellow citizen scientists, classroom teachers, and climate and air quality researchers.

 

With PocketLab Air you will be part of a movement to fight climate change and air pollution with real data from users all over the world.

Your data will never be shared without your permission and you can opt-in or out of any features.

Features:

  • Keep a timeline of your experiments 
  • Display your data with geolocation 
  • Join experiments set up other users or the PocketLab team
  • Use an interactive mapping interface 
  • Organize projects on climate change and air quality
  • Choose to share experiments with the PocketLab community 
  • Access PocketLab data from any internet connection

 

 

 

 

*PocketLab Weather is a rugged weather center that can measure temperature, humidity, light, barometric pressure, heat index, dew point and can connect to an external temperature probe. We launched PocketLab Weather last year in an Indiegogo campaign. If you select the PocketLab Air + PocketLab Weather perk, you will receive your PocketLab Weather sensor immediately after we confirm your payment.

**PocketLab Voyager is is an all-in-one science lab that is capable enough for a professional engineer and simple enough for a 4th grade student. Voyager can measure motion, light, magnetic field, and weather, and you can attach an external temperature probe. PocketLab Voyager includes an optical range finder that works from 10 cm to 2 meters, and is perfect for measuring the speed and position of moving objects like rockets.  If you select the PocketLab Air + PocketLab Voyager perk, you will receive your PocketLab Voyager sensor immediately after we confirm your payment.

 

Hear from some of the amazing educators, engineers, and scientists using PocketLab in a wide range of applications.

 

 

 

 

 

We've been working on PocketLab Air for months and have iterated on the hardware design many times already.

 

Augmented reality for science! Here is a quick demo of PocketLab Air's micro-controller and weather sensors working with new enhancements to PocketLab Science Vision, an augmented reality data and video overlay feature already available in the PocketLab App. 

 

 

The mission of PocketLab is to enable people to discover the joy of science and explore the world around them. PocketLab started in October 2013 when inventor Clifton Roozeboom was developing new wireless sensor technology for his PhD. He was searching for a way to bring advanced sensor technology to science education. Now PocketLab is used by tens of thousands of people in 56 different countries. By supporting our Kickstarter campaign, you are helping bring PocketLab Air to life, a product that we hope will inspire thousands of users to combat air pollution and climate change. 

 

 

The PocketLab Team is a small group of engineers and teachers that believe in the joy of science. We believe that is important for everyone to understand science and explore the world around them. We love our customers and users around the world and we hope you will join us!

 

 

First, we want to thank YOU for supporting our campaign and partnering with us! We want to especially thank all those returning Kickstarter backers that have supported us through three campaigns! PocketLab is for all the curious students, educators, hobbyists, techies, and explorers out there and you are helping change the world.

We want to give personalized shout outs to: Darlene Cavalier, Eli Rabek, Elizabeth Broers, Wayne Grant, Ron Chandler, John Galvin, the Intel Education Accelerator, Glenn Larsen, Jessica Wade, Daphne Chen, Sijay Liu, Marita Beard, Leigh High School Physics Classes, MS&E273 Team, Paul Mitiguy, Jeff Arrigotti, Julie Blumreiter, all of the amazing PocketLab educators including Rich Born, Willy Kjellstrom, Ryan Hollister, Kristen Dorsey, Debi Pfeitzmaier, Derek Tangredi, Jamie Larsen, Killer Snails, Stan Silverman, Ron Hipschman, and Sir Isaac Newton.
