story:
Hello, everyone

My name is Amanda Zhang, My partner is Andrew Wang. We are seeking $6,000 to start up our online travel service company in Florida which will help Chinese travelers plan their unique trip to the United States.

I grew up in china, finished my bachelor's degree in Tourism management and have a firm background of the Chinese travel market. I'm currently studying my MBA at Barry University, which is located at Miami Shores, FL (will graduate in 2016).

My partner, Andrew, grew up in the U.S. has both a Chinese and American travel market background. He studied hotel management himself in 2013. Now, he is studying his master degree at Barry University (will graduate in 2015).

We need your help to start up our online travel service company!

  •   The Company:

SPARK TRAVEL is an online travel service company. The latest fashion in traveling, where you decide where you want to go and what you want to do and we’ll take care of all the bookings, reservations, and more! Our main consumers are travelers from China who don’t want to be stuck in a large tour group by a travel agency, with a generalized travel plan. Different people want to have different travel experiences in United States, but aren’t accustomed to the U.S. environment. We are the right company to offer them a variety of personalized services they need.

  •   Our Mission:

To help Chinese fashion travelers accomplish their travel dreams in the U.S. and help them break the language, culture, geographical barriers. To offer them a variety of online services from everyday travel plans to local restaurant suggestions or renting of basic transportation. You tell us your travel ideas, and we’ll make it a reality.

  •   Background:

The U.S. and China  announced an agreement on November 10 2014 that will lengthen the term of tourist visas from 1 year to 10 years. That means that as long as Chinese travelers apply for their visas for one time, they can travel to United States for the next ten years whenever they want. That will bring a huge convenience for the Chinese travelers meaning that there will be more Chinese travelers visiting the U.S. for their second or third time. They may want a different travel experience upon their second or third visit. Our company can meet their needs.

  •   Our services:

Our services are internet based, concentrating on Chinese travelers who want travel to the U.S. by themselves. Initially our services will begin in Florida, then expand to other states in the U.S.. We will offer all the famous travel locations in Florida and unique events such as bicycle renting, diving services, fishing services, and even experiencing local U.S. culture by living with American families. Customers can choose their desired locations and unique events in the U.S. and our company will help them make those travel ideas come true. Our services will allow foreign travelers to gain unique travel experiences not offered by generalized travel agencies.

Presently, our online travel services is in the introductory stage. It will become a travel innovation for modern people. It competes primarily based on our unique travel services and one to one travel planning for Chinese travelers. 

  • Our market:

Our target market will be Chinese travelers. The total amount of Chinese travelers in the U.S. was approximately 1.8 million in 2013. New Chinese travelers are travel- savvy, well-educated, and mostly under 45 years of age.

This number is expected to grow by 20% per year. As of now, no particular travel agencies offer this kind of travel experience to consumers so we are the first. What’s more, due to the new 10 year travel visa, many customers must be second, third, or even fourth time travelers to the U.S. These customers may desire different experiences and truly gain the feeling of what it’s like to live with an American family for several days.

  •   Competition:

Our main competitions are travel agencies already in existence. They offer broad travel packages to consumers such as: Florida 10 day travel package, it includes everything such as hotel, transportation, parks, and tickets. This may be convenient for some first time consumers since they don’t need to worry about anything and just follow their travel guide everywhere. They go see famous places, take pictures, shop, and stay in the hotels. This travel option may be boring and redundant for the second and third time travelers who seek new experiences.

  •   Risk/opportunity:

We differentiate ourselves from those existing travel agencies which are too stable to gain an interesting travel experience. Some Chinese travelers want to experience more, they want try more new things, and they want make their own travel plans. We are the right company which can meet all their requirements. We realize the huge potential travel market where Chinese travelers want to plan their own trip and experience more American cultures. They want their trip to be different from others. We offer all the information to our consumers first, and let them choose their trip. They can choose where they want to live, where they want to eat, where they want go, and what they want do in what place. Everything is dependent on the consumers, then we make their trip come true.

Right now, there is no such online travel service company existing. We are the first one. It can be a risk but also an opportunity for us.

  •   Capital requirement:

We are seeking $6,000 which will enable us to build our website ($600), set up our services and write contracts with local American house owners ($2500). Set up with local transportation company and write contacts ($1200). Electricity ($200). Transportation cost ($500). Emergency spending ($1000).

  •   Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute now, but you think we have great ideas. Please tell more people about us or share our ideas with others. That’s will be a great help for us!

This number is expected to grow by 20% per year. As of now, no particular
travel agencies offer this kind of travel experience to consumers so we are
the first. What’s more, due to the new 10 year travel visa, many customers must
be second, third, or even fourth time travelers to the U.S. These customers may desire
different experiences and truly gain the feeling of what it’s like to live with
an American family for several days.

  Competition:

Our main competitions are travel agencies already in existence. They
offer broad travel packages to consumers such as: Florida 10 day travel
package, it includes everything such as hotel, transportation, parks, and
tickets. This may be convenient for some first time consumers since they don’t need to
worry about anything and just follow their travel guide everywhere. They go see
famous places, take pictures, shop, and stay in the hotels. This travel option
may be boring and redundant for the second and third time travelers who
seek new experiences.

  Risk/opportunity:

We differentiate ourselves from those existing travel
agencies which are too stable to gain an interesting travel experience. Some
Chinese travelers want to experience more, they want try more new things, and they
want make their own travel plans. We are the right company which can meet all
their requirements. We realize the huge potential travel market where Chinese
travelers want to plan their own trip and experience more American cultures.
They want their trip to be different from others. We offer all the information
to our consumers first, and let them choose their trip. They can choose where
they want to live, where they want to eat, where they want go, and what they
want do in what place. Everything is dependent on the consumers, then we make
their trip come true. 
Right now, there is no such online travel service company
existing. We are the first one. It can be a risk but also an opportunity for
us.

  Capital
requirement:

We are seeking $6,000 which will enable us to build our
website ($600), set up our services and write contracts with local American house owners ($2500). Set up with local transportation
company and write contacts ($1200). Electricity ($200). Transportation cost ($500). Emergency
spending ($1000). 

  Other
Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute now, but you think we have great ideas. Please
tell more people about us or share our ideas with others. That’s will be a
great help for us!

story:
Save the Town Lake Water Coolers

The City of Austin has recently forced Rogue Running and RunTex to remove the coolers full of fresh cold water from Town Lake.  If you've ever run a lap in August, you know the importance of these coolers vs the hot water that streams from the fountains provided by the city(when they're working).

The money raised here will be gifted to both companies evenly to pay for their needed permits(see cost breakdown below).  Any money raised over the cost of the permits will be split evenly to both companies for a charitable donation to the cause of their choice.  Assuming the City comes to their senses, the entire raised amount will be donated to the charity of their choice(Rogue and RunTex) as a community 'thank you' for their service.  Proof of all money exchanges will be posted here as proof for donors.

 

The Message Sent from the City

"You will need to complete and submit should you ever decide to provide water coolers for public use on the running trails.

You will need - 1. the Permit to Operate a Food Enterprise ($310/yr). Renewable annually; 2. The “Change of Ownership” permit inspection, ($125) one time inspection to approve the application and issue permit; 3. Complete the Food Handler spreadsheet for the employees who will maintain these units.

The City of Austin’s vendor for Food Handler Registration is “www.statefoodsafety.com”. Using this vendor and choosing the City of Austin will get your staff registered with the City without having to register separately.

For each Mobile Unit/Water table set-up, you will need the Mobile Food Vending application ($90/yr) and need to bring the unit/set-up to the our location for permitting. 

We will also need a copy of the signed agreement with PARD, and a detailed written procedure for sanitary operation of the water cooler set up."

 

Sign the Petition!

https://www.change.org/petitions/mayor-lee-leff...

 

About Chad:

I am not affiliated with Rogue Running or RunTex.  I am a 27 year veteran of Austin, ran my first Capital 10k in '93, 5+ year member of Austin Runners Club, and two time marathoner.  My social networking profiles can be found here:

www.facebook.com/csakon

www.twitter.com/csakon

www.runkeeper.com/user/csakon/profile

 

Thank you for your support!

Chad

story:
Brooks and I are excited to announce the launch of Outguided!

 

 

The Problem:

While researching guided fly fishing trips in Montana, Brooks (my co-founder) and I could not believe how hard it was to research and book the right guide. We were stuck playing phone tag, building a spreadsheet with possible options, and emailing back and forth. The discovery and booking process...sucked. 

Ultimately, we had a great trip and caught a lot of fish, but this problem stuck with us. If it was this hard for both of us, how hard would it be for people who were less experienced anglers or looking to go out there for the first time? After all, we believe life is all about new experiences and the people you do them with. 

Months later, we couldn’t get rid of this idea. There are so many incredible guided adventures out there, but there was no easy way of finding the right guide. We realized how big the problem was.  Then, we set out to work. Outguided was born.

Now, we have 1000s of the greatest outdoor adventures on the site. Our catalogue of trips is pretty incredible -- everything from heli-skiing on a yacht (yep, that's a real thing) to Elk Hunting in New Mexico. The site is now live but we are constantly bringing on new guides and new adventures. 

We would love your support as we build the platform to help connect people with adventures they never thought possible. 

--Brooks and Tim

story:
ENGLISH VERSION

Ir a la Versión en Español   ↓


INTRODUCTION

Link & Found is an object identification system that speeds up the notification, location and recovery of lost items. If you have whatched the video you already know how it works!

Link & Found was officially presented at the IV Fòrum Tecnològic organized by Parc Científic i Tecnològic of the University of Girona, in Catalonia, Spain. It was a great success, and Link & Found was also present in the media:

THE SYSTEM

Link & Found Codes

The system is based on the registration of objects identified with a unique code in the Link & Found database. The Codes are digitally signed to avoid falsification and to certify that they have been generated by Link & Found. That is to say, not just any random combination of letters and numbers is a valid code.

Link & Found Tags

Link & Found tags serve to contain a Link & Found code. For every application you are going to produce the most appropriate tags, all having in common:

  • anonymity of owners is always preserved
  • they are produced in the most appropriate form for its final use
  • no batteries required, no maintenance
  • they are made to last in time
  • easy to identify
  • they contain additional instructions addressed to the person that finds a lost item

Apps

You can use the free Link & Found mobile app or the website to set up and manage your account. If you have the mobile app you will not only recevice notifications in your email, but also on your device.

Android app is fully functional, you can download it right now!

 

PRODUCT CATALOG

The very first products we present are the identifying plates Tig and Tag, made of anodized aluminium, 1.5mm thick, resistant to scratches, solvents, gasoline, oils and other chemical agents. They are made to last without maintenance.


Tig

Tig is an identification plate ideal for keychains and briefcases. Unobtrusive and stylish. We have already tested the initial prototype and we are pleased with the results.


Tag

Tag is the ideal plate for bags and luggage identification, with the same features as the Tig plate, but more visible.

Other Products

Card

Card to carry in your wallet. Although your wallet may contain your identification and is possible to contact you, Link & Found notifications will arrive faster!

Note
For companies and institutions we can customize Tig, Tag and cards with your name and logo. An original gift for your employees or customers and a way to promote your company.

FUNDING

Your help will be useful for us to validate, evaluate and estimate

  • the potential market
  • the system acceptance
  • the Tig and Tag plates acceptance
  • user feedback and response
If the global response is positive and we reach our funding goal, we will start to mass produce Tig and Tag plates, and will create new distribution and commercialization channels. We will design and produce new products based on aluminium or other materials for different applications.

Current State

With respect to our business model, we are about to reach investment sources. To this end, we need the acceptance of the model and the products in the market.

With respect to technology, we have completed 97% of our first developmental stage. We still have to finish:

  • mobile application for iPhone (currently almost done!)
  • some web functionality, planned to be finished before this crowdfunding campaign completes
As we said before, mobile app for Android is finished and 100% functional!

How can you help us?

We need you and your help is crucial. You can help us in different ways:

  • buy some of the perks we offer you in this campaign
  • spread this campaign among your friends, family and contacts
  • promote our products or make a present of some Tigs and Tags
  • send us your comments and suggestions to improve this campaign, offers and products

PERKS

Market price of Tig and Tag plates will be 7 € and 9 € respectively. We offer now the possibility to purchase them at a substantial discount rate.

Shipping

Prices shown include shipping for all packs, except those for distributors outside Spain. If you are a distributor from outside of Spain and want a Retailer Pack (150 or 500 pieces), add 20 € to the amount or buy an international shipping pack.

Summary of Available Packs

Increase your Reward ─ Add 1 Tig x Pack!

Help us spread this crowdfunding campaign. After you have paid for one of our packages or have contributed in our crowdfunding campaign, you will see a link. Share it with your friends and family to let them buy their package. For every bought on your side, we will add a Tig to your pack.

REFERRAL PROGRAM

If you buy some of the available packs and help us spread this crowdfunding campaign, you will receive

1 One free Tig for each referee that buy a pack

NO EXCEPTION / NO LIMITS

Follow the instructions you will find when paying your pack to participate in this program.

CALENDAR

Delivery

We expect to:

  • Run the indiegogo campaign for 5 weeks
  • Production and handling, 4 weeks
  • Preparation of shipments, 1 week
First shipments shall commence in early August. If the campaign reaches 100% of its goal earlier than expected, we will try to start producing as soon as possible.

Risks

If this campaign reaches its goal, the main risk we face is a delay in the Tigs or Tags manufacturing. This will produce a lag in the shipment of your packages.

But be assured we work with good suppliers. Any issue will be notified well in advance. Delays will never be longer than two months. We will keep you updated.

Nothing to lose!
Go to English Version   ↑

VERSIÓN EN ESPAÑOL



INTRODUCCIÓN

Link & Found es un sistema de identificación de objetos que acelera la notificación, la localización y la recuperación de objetos perdidos. Si has visto el vídeo ya sabes cómo funciona!

Link & Found fué presentada oficialmente en el IV Fòrum Tecnològic organizado por el Parc Científic i Tecnològic de la Universitat de Girona, donde tuvo una gran acogida, y también ha estado presente en los medios de comunicación:

EL SISTEMA

Códigos Link & Found

El servicio se basa en el registro de los objetos identificados con códigos únicos en la base de datos de Link & Found. Los códigos están firmados digitalmente para evitar falsificaciones y para certificar que han sido generados por Link & Found. Es decir, no cualquier combinación de letras y números es un código válido.

Etiquetas Link & Found

Las etiquetas sirven para contener un código de Link & Found. Para cada aplicación vamos a fabricar las etiquetas más adecuadas, pero todas ellas tienen en común que:

  • preservan siempre el anonimato del propietario
  • están fabricadas de la forma más adecuada para su uso final
  • no necesitan pilas ni mantenimiento
  • están pensadas para resistir en el tiempo
  • son fáciles de identificar
  • contienen instrucciones adicionales para la persona que encuentra un objeto perdido

Apps

Toda la gestión que un usuario necesita realizar se puede llevar a cabo a través de las apps gratuitas de Link & Found o a través de la web. Usando nuestras apps recibirás las alertas directamente en tu móvil. También recibes un correo electrónico con tus alertas, por si lo que has perdido es el móvil.

La aplicación para android es 100% funcional, ya te la puedes descargar!

 

CATÁLOGO DE PRODUCTOS

Los primeros productos que presentamos son las placas de identificación Tig y Tag, realizadas en aluminio anodizado de 1.5mm de grosor resistentes a roces, ralladuras, disolventes, gasolinas, aceites y otros químicos. Hechas para durar y sin mantenimiento.


Tig

Placa de identificación ideal para llaveros y maletines. Discreta y elegante. Nosotros ya hemos probado los primeros prototipos y estamos encantados con el resultado!


Tag

Placa de identificación ideal para maletas y equipajes. Con las mismas características que Tig, pero con más visibilidad.

Otras Aplicaciones

Tarjeta

Tarjeta de visita para llevar en la cartera. Aunque lleves tus documentos y sea fácil contactar contigo, la notificación de Link & Found te podrá llegar antes!

Nota
Para empresas e instituciones podemos personalizar Tig, Tag y las tarjetas con su nombre y su logo. Un regalo de empresa único y original.

FINANCIACIÓN

Vuestra ayuda nos servirá para validar, evaluar y estimar

  • el mercado potencial
  • la aceptación del sistema
  • la aceptación de las placas Tig y Tag
  • la respuesta de los usuarios
Si la respuesta es positiva y la campaña es un éxito, pasaremos a producir Tig y Tag a gran escala y a buscar otras vías de distribución y comercialización. Diseñaremos y crearemos nuevos productos basados en placas de aluminio y otros metales o materiales para distintas aplicaciones.

Situación Actual

Por lo que respecta al modelo de negocio, estamos cerca de atraer a otros inversores. Para ello necesitamos la aceptación en el mercado del sistema y de los productos.

Por lo que respecta al desarrollo tecnológico, está completado al 97%. Sólo nos falta terminar:

  • aplicación móbil para iPhone (actualmente está casi completada!)
  • parte de la funcionalidad en la web (tenemos previsto terminarla antes que termine esta campaña de crowdfunding)
Como ya hemos comentado más arriba, la aplicación para android es 100% funcional!

Cómo puedes ayudarnos?

Os necesitamos, y vuestra ayuda es fundamental. Nos podéis ayudar de varias formas:

  • comprando alguno de los packs de oferta que ponemos a vuestra disposición en esta campaña
  • difundiendo esta campaña entre vuestros amigos, familiares y contactos
  • haciendo promoción de nuestros productos o regalando Tigs y Tags
  • haciéndonos llegar vuestros comentarios y sugerencias para mejorar la campaña, las ofertas y los productos

RECOMPENSAS

El precio final en el mercado de Tig y Tag será de 7 € y 9 € respectivamente. Os ofrecemos ahora la posibilidad de beneficiaros de notables descuentos en la compra de los packs de Tigs y Tags que ponemos a vuestra disposición.

Nota

Los Tigs y Tags se fabrican en inglés. Si los deseas en otro idioma envíanos un mensaje e intentaremos satisfacer tu demanda.

Gastos de envío

Los precios que se indican incluyen los gastos de envío, excepto en los packs para distribuidores, Retailer's Pack 150 y 500, para envíos fuera de España. Si eres un distribuidor de fuera de España y deseas uno de estos packs, debes comprar también el pack para envíos internacionales o bien añadir el importe equivalente de 20 €.

Resumen de los packs disponibles

Aumenta tu Recompensa ─ Añade 1 Tig x Pack!

Ayúdanos a crecer difundiendo esta campaña. Envía a tus amigos el link que tienes a tu disposición cuando realices el pago de tu contribución y añade un Tig por cada pack que compren.

PROGRAMA DE DIFUSIÓN

Si has comprado alguno de los packs que te ofrecemos y nos ayudas a difundir esta campaña de financiación, recibirás

1 Tig gratis por cada visitante que
venga de tu parte y compre algún pack

SIN EXCEPCIÓN / SIN LÍMITE DE TIGS

Sigue las instrucciones que encontrarás al realizar el pago de tu pack para participar en este programa.

CALENDARIO

Plazos de Entrega

Nuestra previsión es la siguiente:

  • Campaña en Indiegogo, 5 semanas
  • Fabricación y manipulación, 4 semanas
  • Preparación de los envíos, 1 semana
Los primeros envíos se realizarán a principios de Agosto. Si la campaña alcanza el 100% del objetivo marcado antes que ésta finalice, avanzaremos la fabricación para adelantar el envío de las recompensas.

Riesgos

Si la campaña ha funcionado y hemos conseguido nuestro objetivo, el principal riesgo que debemos afrontar son posibles retrasos en la producción de Tigs o Tags. Esto produciría un retraso en el envío de paquetes.

Pero estad seguros que trabajamos con buenos proveedores. Cualquier retraso será informado con la suficiente antelación. En ningún caso será superior a dos meses. Os mantendremos informados.

Nada que perder!

    Los primeros productos que presentamos son las placas de
    identificación Tig y Tag, realizadas en aluminio
    anodizado de 1.5mm de grosor resistentes a roces, ralladuras,
    disolventes, gasolinas, aceites y otros químicos. Hechas para durar y sin
    mantenimiento.
  







Tig

      Placa de identificación ideal para llaveros y maletines. Discreta y
      elegante. Nosotros ya hemos probado los primeros prototipos y estamos
      encantados con el resultado!
    






Tag

      Placa de identificación ideal para maletas y equipajes. Con las mismas
      características que Tig, pero con más visibilidad.
    


Otras Aplicaciones
Tarjeta



    Tarjeta de visita para llevar en la cartera. Aunque lleves tus documentos y
    sea fácil contactar contigo, la notificación de Link & Found te podrá
    llegar antes!
  


Nota
    Para empresas e instituciones podemos personalizar Tig,
    Tag y las tarjetas con su nombre y su logo. Un regalo de empresa
    único y original.
  
FINANCIACIÓN

    Vuestra ayuda nos servirá para validar, evaluar y estimar
    
el mercado potencial
la aceptación del sistema
la aceptación de las placas Tig y Tag
la respuesta de los usuarios

    Si la respuesta es positiva y la campaña es un éxito, pasaremos a
    producir Tig y Tag a gran escala y a buscar otras vías de distribución y
    comercialización. Diseñaremos y crearemos nuevos productos basados en
    placas de aluminio y otros metales o materiales para distintas
    aplicaciones.
  

  Situación Actual

    Por lo que respecta al modelo de negocio, estamos cerca de atraer a otros
    inversores. Para ello necesitamos la aceptación en el mercado del sistema
    y de los productos.
  

    Por lo que respecta al desarrollo tecnológico, está completado al
    97%. Sólo nos falta terminar:
    
aplicación móbil para iPhone (actualmente está casi completada!)
parte de la funcionalidad en la web (tenemos previsto terminarla
        antes que termine esta campaña de crowdfunding)

    Como ya hemos comentado más arriba, la aplicación para android es 100%
    funcional!
  

  


Cómo puedes ayudarnos?

    Os necesitamos, y vuestra ayuda es fundamental. Nos podéis ayudar de
    varias formas:
    
comprando alguno de los packs de oferta que ponemos a vuestra
        disposición en esta campaña
difundiendo esta campaña entre vuestros amigos, familiares y
        contactos
haciendo promoción de nuestros productos o regalando Tigs y
        Tags
haciéndonos llegar vuestros comentarios y sugerencias para mejorar
        la campaña, las ofertas y los productos
RECOMPENSAS

    El precio final en el mercado de Tig y Tag será
    de 7 € y 9 € respectivamente. Os ofrecemos ahora la posibilidad de
    beneficiaros de notables descuentos en la compra de los packs de Tigs y
    Tags que ponemos a vuestra disposición.
  




Nota

      Los Tigs y Tags se fabrican en inglés. Si los deseas en otro idioma
      envíanos un mensaje e intentaremos satisfacer tu demanda.
    

Gastos de envío

    Los precios que se indican incluyen los gastos de envío, excepto en los
    packs para distribuidores, Retailer's Pack 150 y 500, para envíos
    fuera de España. Si eres un distribuidor de fuera de España y deseas uno
    de estos packs, debes comprar también el pack para envíos internacionales
    o bien añadir el importe equivalente de 20 €.
  
Resumen de los packs disponibles



Aumenta tu Recompensa ─ Añade 1 Tig x Pack!

    Ayúdanos a crecer difundiendo esta campaña. Envía a tus amigos el link que
    tienes a tu disposición cuando realices el pago de tu contribución y añade
    un Tig por cada pack que compren.
  

PROGRAMA DE DIFUSIÓN


        Si has comprado alguno de los packs que te ofrecemos y nos ayudas a
        difundir esta campaña de financiación, recibirás
      
1
        Tig gratis por cada visitante que venga de tu parte y compre algún
        pack
      

        SIN EXCEPCIÓN / SIN LÍMITE DE TIGS
      

        Sigue las instrucciones que encontrarás al realizar el pago de tu
        pack para participar en este programa.
      


CALENDARIO
Plazos de Entrega

    Nuestra previsión es la siguiente:
    
Campaña en Indiegogo, 5 semanas
Fabricación y manipulación, 4 semanas
Preparación de los envíos, 1 semana

    Los primeros envíos se realizarán a principios de Agosto. Si la campaña
    alcanza el 100% del objetivo marcado antes que ésta finalice, avanzaremos
    la fabricación para adelantar el envío de las recompensas.
  

  Riesgos

    Si la campaña ha funcionado y hemos conseguido nuestro objetivo, el
    principal riesgo que debemos afrontar son posibles retrasos en la
    producción de Tigs o Tags. Esto produciría un retraso en el envío de
    paquetes.
  

    Pero estad seguros que trabajamos con buenos proveedores. Cualquier
    retraso será informado con la suficiente antelación. En ningún caso será
    superior a dos meses. Os mantendremos informados.
  

Nada que perder!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Monte Applewhite, Executive Director, of GoSayHELLO  App Inc. Our platform is being developed to significantly improve the way people engage and connect with people in their current vicinity as the world becomes increasingly more digital as a result of the 2020 COVID-19 epidemic.

GoSayHELLO is an icebreaker application that enables users to discover, connect, and engage with other users at local parks, grocery stores, festivals, conferences, and nightlife events.

According to Maslow's "Hierarchy of Needs," belongingness and friendship is an important psychological need. However, in today's digital world, people are constantly on their phones and not engaging in-person and saying hello to the many potential connections around them whom they may share similar interests. We are on a mission to change that by being the world's first app for close-proximity engagement and networking.

Right people | Right place | Right time

What We Need & What You Get

  • Develop native apps for iPhone and Android
  • Marketing for HELLO Festivals in Atlanta, Miami, NYC, San Francisco, and Los Angeles
  • Book distribution for "GoSayHELLO: Bringing back social interaction and engagement"
  • Perks you get will include free one-year subscription, free admission to HELLO Festivals, meet the founders, and book signing.
  • If we do not reach our entire goal, funds will be used for app development, book distribution, and selected HELLO Festivals.

Risks & Challenges

GoSayHELLO is not exempted from the risks every mobile application/social networking 
company are exposed to. With the emergence of our business, the possible risks are wide 
acceptability, capital injection to launch and stabilize business growth and the need for a positively strong marketing program. Different strategies will be put in place to ascertain that the risks to our business are controlled or minimized.

These strategies include; 

• Investing sufficient funds into the business to meet business operation requirements. 
• Building strategic and symbiotic partnerships with necessary companies. 
• Building a sufficient user base
• Employing competent and experienced staff 

Other Ways You Can Help

For those that want to help in non-financial ways, we ask folks that you support us by getting the word out and sharing this campaign to your friends and family.

Please share using the Indiegogo share tools!

Sincerely,

Monte Applewhite

story:
What is Adaqulex:

The way it works is fairly straightforward. An electronic auto-watering system, the Christmas Tree Indoor Planter is connected to a water tank, which keeps your tree fresh for the six weeks or so that you are using it. A water level sensor inside the water jar keeps the water at a certain level by automatically filling the jar when the water dips below a threshold.

Adaqulex Concept: 

Nowadays, the people are finding it hard to irrigate their trees, for example, they must bend or even lie down to give water to their trees, and sometimes the water overflows and everything under the tree get wet, also there are cases when there is not water coming to the pond of the tree. Finally, you may have many problems to water your tree.

Water Pump: 

The water pump is very small so that you can put it inside any container and it consumes a little electricity power, and for the next generation, we are going to design it to be connected to solar power so that its feeding would be longer and more secure. In this case, you would not be forced to put the water pump in a pail which has no good appearance also you will not have to fill the pot or pail when it is empty, but you can replace it with another container. More to this, you can connect 2 containers together by a hose to have water for longer time.

 

Water Sensor: 

Another part of the device is a water sensor which also acts as a holder of the hose. This sensor sends the water to control device and whenever the water level is less it sends the signal to run the water pump to fill the water.

Control Unit: 

We have also programmed the microcontroller in the control box so that it can work according to the water limit. It guarantees that your water jar will never run out of the water. On the other hand, in the case of any problem, the control box would automatically halt the system and prevents any damage to your device.

 

What We Need & What You Get: 

We are now turning to you, friends, in order to raise the funds that we need to build a prototype. The technology is designed to provide an easy way of auto-watering plants and trees in a wide range of applications.
With the coming of the new Christmas, the design can be used for watering of the Christmas trees in your home. As a bonus, you will see that We have considered some perks for you, and we are honored to see you among our backers!

 

 

Risks & Challenges: 

While used with an adapter, there is no problem with the device and it can be used for several years. However, for locations where there is no access to electricity or the electricity is intentionally cut off for safety reasons, Lipo batteries  have been considered to power the system.
As an example, in case of chrismass trees, they need to be fresh for a period of 6 weeks when they are in a water jar and you need a guarantee that the system will function properly. During this period, many people leave their homes for their vacation and so they normally cut off the electricity for unnecessary devices and adapter powered systems to prevent danger of fire.
In order to resolve this problem, a high capacity Lipo battery has been considerd to power the system for this period without any need for the mains. Also we have arranged a series of sensors which meet all requirements of your tree to keep it evergreen.

Future Plan: 

We are going to promote the device in 2 stages, at the first stage, we are going to connect the device to a solar power to provide its power. And at the second stage, we are going to embed a magnetic valve which connects the device to a big water source.

Moreover, an app for Android will be produced so that your device to be linked to IOT for reporting the situation.

The next generation of Adaqulex:

The second model: 

Humidity sensor makes it possible to measure the humidity of the soil so that you can use this device not only for the trees but for all other plants.

The features of this model: Battery with longer life - Connecting to Arduino, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth

The third model:

It enjoys a magnetic tap which is connected to power supply and solar charging system. It can also be connected to Wi-Fi and network.

Accessories:

- Special pot for Adaqulex in 2 models which holes 40 liters water for 6 weeks

- Feeding water pot which holds 20 liters water for 3 weeks

- Extra hose & power cord

Team:

Meet the team behind the Adaqulex!

We care about our investors and the travelers who use our product. We aren’t just trying to sell; we want to address the solving family problem at the home. Our industrious team is still on the go and working hard to bring Adaqulex to life. Your support will give us the opportunity to put Adaqulex in your home.

Other Ways You Can Help: 

We know not everyone can contribute money to this campaign. We completely understand that. That being said, there are a few other ways you can help us out:

Spread the word far and wide. Tell friends and neighbors. Post on Facebook, Twitter, and Pinterest. Send a courier pigeon.

We ask you to inform your friends and neighbors who may need this device and are eligible to help us on our project. And don’t forget to share this page!

We couldn’t have done this without you!

Thank you again for backing us and have a good one!!  (◕‿◕)

story:
Cycling in the night of the city can be perilous.

Vehicles move too close to you, as they cannot judge your width. Signalling your intention to turn is impossible on dark roads, making executing turns near vehicles dangerous. Even after the journey, bicycle lights that are left on the bicycle can be stolen, or damaged from exposure to the elements. 

The benefits of cycling are aplenty, and with more people adopting cycling as a form of commuting and leisure, we need to make this healthy activity more safe and convenient. 

As industrial design majors from National University of Singapore seeking to provide a solution to these problems, we have created a unique set of bicycle lights that we believe can enhance the experience of night cycling.
 

INTRODUCING 

 

What is it?

Uon lights are not passive bicycle lights. They also function as signal lights to allow you to signal your intentions to execute a turn while cycling safely. Coupled with Uon bar end plugs, the magnetic bicycle lights can be attached and removed conveniently, while staying strongly adhered to your bicycle while riding. 

 

Usage

1. Install the Uon bar end plugs onto your bicycle bar ends.

2. Secure the bar end plugs with a hex key.

3. Attach Uon lights to the bar end plugs.

 

4. Activate lights by pressing the power button on the bottom.

5. Activate signal lights by pressing the top button

6. Remove lights from plugs for storage or charging.

 

FEATURES

Expandable bar end plugs

Uon bar end plugs are designed to fit into most handlebars with inner diameters of 22mm (7/8"). The cap is designed for road & track bicycles, with a diameter of 25mm (approximately 1''). The plugs can be tightened using a hex key.

Structure

Uon lights are made of anondised die-casted aluminum and the overall body will be weather-sealed to withstand the elements while riding. That means you can work the buttons even in rainy conditions. Strong neodymium magnets will be used to ensure that the light stays on even during the roughest of rides.

Light modes

Uon lights have 3 modes: on, flashing and off state. Each light unit contains frontal white light and a rear red light, both that are triggered simultaneously. These lights are engineered to adhere to road traffic conventions, so any road user can understand them.

Signal lights

When the signal lights are in operation, a yellow blinking light will be triggered for 5 seconds after activation, after which the lights will revert to the previous setting.

Brightness

We are using 4 bright directional one-colour LEDs in our prototype, and we will be using RGB LEDs for our final product to maximize brightness.

Charging

To make charging convenient and reduce the environment impact incurred from using disposable batteries, we intend to use lithium-ion polymer batteries in our lights, that can be charged by using our USB cable.

 

DEVELOPMENTS

Technology

Currently the size of our prototyping materials is large due to the current circuit board and battery unit we are using for testing. Once we have the funds to invest in reducing our component size, we will be improving 

With regards to battery life, we are looking into using rechargeable batteries that can be charged via USB / Micro USB cables, so as to the environmental impact of our product and eliminate the need to purchase new batteries. 

We will be tapping on current technology to create a more sustainable system, such that future Uon add-ons can be used with our current lights in the future without modifications.

Design

After minimizing the internal components as much as we can, we will continue to make improvements to our light design to deliver a sleeker, cooler product to you. We intend to slightly reduce the overall size of our lights so that they are more portable, and look sleeker on your bicycle.

In addition, we will be adding prisms to the lens face so as to diffuse light and make the lights more visible in different directions. 

  

FUNDING

We need US$60,000 in funds, and here’s where the money will go: 

Product development + Further testing

The technology is already out there, but we need funds to access it and create the optimal build that we have envisioned this product to be.

Manufacturing & processing

We will be using manufacturing at minimum order quantities (which usually means thousands of units) as required by factories. The money also goes into assembly and packaging to complete the experience of receiving your Uon lights and bar end plugs.

 

PERKS

 

WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

We came up with this concept and design to enhance the experience of cycling in the night, and we believe that all road users (including both of us) can benefit from this product.

Producing an industrial product like this requires an investment, and we could not have imagined how we could make this happen (and still remain within our control) without the advent of crowdfunding.

Please support us by funding this project, and spread the word! Whether this project comes to fruition, or remains simply a designer concept lies in your power.

  

FAQ

How much will shipping cost?

To reduce shipping costs and our impact on the environment, we will optimise our delivery system by determining it after we find out where the majority of our customers are. That way, we can ensure that our goods reach you as early as possible, and that the shipping costs are at the minimum.

I have a drop handlebar bicycle, can I use this?

Unfortunately, this product is designed for flat/riser handlebar bicycles, so at the time being, this is unsuitable for drop handlebar bicycles. Do help us spread the word of this project however, because if we are successful with this project, we might work on a compatible solution for drop handlebar cyclists after!

Why is the shipping date so late?

To ensure that our product is released at its optimal quality, we need time to do additional research and testing. As industrial designers, we abhor poor quality in products, and to stand by our beliefs that mass production should start only when the design is fully complete, we will have to release our lights later. Your patience will pay off when you receive our lights at their best quality!

story:
10 minutes of such a massage a day is enough to have effect on all the parts of the organism

 


The usage of smart insoles stepG on the energy points located on human feet shows amazing results. This is due to the fact that each and every of our nerve endings is connected to a different organ somewhere else in the body. For instance our big toe is responsible for our head and the index and middle toes for our eyes. Foot massage strenghtens the whole organism: it improves blood flow, works as a prevention of arthritis,and removes fatigue, tension and stress.


Give yourself pleasure with a foot massage, it will bring you better health and charge you with good mood.

 

Basic foot reflexology chart


Each reflective point on our foot is connected to a certain organ via 300 nerves.
Every foot has about 72 000 nerve endings.

  • Improving blood circulation.
  • Strenghtening metabolism processes.
  • Stimulation of food digestion.
  • Fighting extra weight.
  • Removing musle fatigue and soreness.
  • Improving work stamina.
  • Healing constipations, hemmorhoids and urinary incontinence.
  • Removing tension, faster healing of injuries, fractures and traumas.
  • Helping with chronic tiredness, depression, stress and insomnia.
  • Helping with neurosis, depressive states and apathy.
  • Helping with diseases of the nervous system: migraines, frequent headaches, neuralgia, neuritis, vegetative-vascular disorders.
  • Helping with disorders of stomach, intestines, esophagus, disorders in secretion of the gastrointestinal tract.
  • Helping with pathologies and disorders of the musculoskeletal system: sciatica, osteochondrosis, allergic, rheumatoid arthrosis, arthritis.

Foot massage by smart insoles is especially necessary for seniors to support the alertness and heal a number of diseases.




Smart insoles StepG with infrared radiation can work in three modes:

MANUALLY ACTIVATED MASSAGE
(complete foot massage, activating the blood circulation in all the parts of the foot, according to the time needed for every part of the foot to achieve the maximum effectivity)

AUTOMATICALLY ACTIVATED MASSAGE
(16 nano sensors analyze the blood pressure, puls and muscle tension. The insoles will massage the biologically active points automatically according to the readings of the temperature and micro-vein puls frequency.)

MANUALLY ACTIVATED HEATING
(In cold seasons thanks to the infrared radiation* the insoles help create a comfortable feeling, choosing and optimal temperature setting )

*Infrared radiation is used with the goal of warming up the tissues up to 1,5 cm depth. Infrared rays widen the blood vessels, strenghten micro-circulation of blood, which prevents blood clots and removes slags. The drainage is improved, and the oxygen is better difused in the tissue cells. Metabolism and tissue regeneration is improved as well.

Built in accummulator battery lasts up to 3 days according to the intensity of the usage. Built in battery works up to 3 days – depending on the intesity of usage.

Inductive wireless charging technology.


Simply put the insoles on the charger


Smart insoles withstand high physical loads thanks to kevlar fibers

(Kevlar fibers are also used as a protective component, adding the durability to the product in terms of protecting from any abrasive and cutting effects, this material is also often used to create protective gloves and padding for the apparel used in motorsport and snowboarding.)

Flexible enough, fit to use in high heel shoes

They are safe to be used, as the electronics are protected by humididty resistant materials. You can wash the StepG in any ordinary washing machine in temperatures up to +140 °F (+60 °C)


During the production of StepG we use the technology of micro-porous membranes. Microporos-membranes have hydrophobic and breathing features and create a certain „microclimate“. They are made out of a quantity of small micro pores that have less than 1 μm (Micron) in dieamter. The unique contents of the polyuretan microstructure guarantees that micro-porous membranes remain waterproof even after countless washings and steam sterilization.

Test results

Foot massage using the the smart insoles StepG is a safe technique, during which is impossible to harm the body, unlike when taking medication. Thanks to StepG the biologically active points receive dual massage – magnetic and physiologic.

When using the smart insoles our experience shows us that cold hands and feet become warm, the radiculitis pain in the spine is decreased, using the insoles improves the immune durability of the body, restores blood circulation in arteries and the passability of the veins, puffiness is gone, and thanks to improved circulation the blood supply is higher in case of lung diseases. Smart insoles can be used to treat all kinds of illnesses, because the magnetic massage way of healing is effecting the organism in a complex way.
Use the StepG for prevention. Primarily, the usage of the insoles is necessary for people, whos professional life is linked to higher levels of exhaustion and the ones with sitting jobs.


Conclusions

It is no secret that massage is very useful, although not everyone can truly relax under hands of the masseur as this pleasure tends not to be cheap.

Step G – it’s your personal masseur whom you pay only once.

Step G provides the right position of the heel area and the middle part of the foot during walking, it softens impacts on the whole surface of the foot, creates comfortable conditions when walking, takes off the pressure, improves blood circulation, brings the vegetative nervous system into harmony, supports life strenght of the whole body. The insoles, while massaging our feet, stimulate biologically active points, helping to improve the blood circulation. They are flexible and elastic enough to fit any kind of footwear, including high heel shoes.

Life expectancy not less then 3 years.

 


The accompanying app effortlessly complements and enhances every feature of StepG. Packed with dynamic features, the app gives users total control over the insole.


You can see the full statistics over the whole period you were using the smart insoles stepG. Useful graphs include information from all 16 sensors. You can watch the dynamics of improving your own well-being after the massage, and much more.

In February of 2018 the app will be available on the App Store and Google Play Market


Ion Cuzmescu spent more than 20 years as an electronic engineer on a secret project, where the bravest innovative ideas were used for the needs of his customer – the government. He had many orders and projects, and Cuzmescu, along with his creative group, always preceeded all the expectations. Nonetheless Ion thought through all this time that his potential is not fully used as the orders were of purely technical innovative sort, and the human factor was also very important for him. Disregarding his stable position he wanted more: to realize himself and use his personal ideas and experience: „I always wanted to surprise people, help them and add bright colors to their lives.“ says Ion Cuzmescu. Even more so, that he had personal predisposition for this.


Ion had a wonderful house, a beautiful wife and a daughter. The whole family loved to travel to different countries, get to know the world, people in it, and absorb new knowledge. One time during their travels in Malaisia Cuzmescu’s wife hurt her foot bones, they put on the cast in a wrong way and the bone didn’t grow back well. The foot started to hurt and tire easily from walking. His daughter also had certain issues: because of the flat feet her legs were getting tired very quickly. This was the moment the inventor started thinking about the Thai foot massage that has healing effects on the human body. He turned to the experts in the field and the massages started to take effect. Then Ion remembered the images of the human feet divided into parts, where each segment is responsible for one internal organ. He then decided to research this topic to the full and mainly to use his experience in electronics and try to help with the flat feet issue.


Ion decided to create smart insoles that would themselves affect the needed points on feet. He left his job and dedicated himself to the new research useful to people. Countless scientific studies proved that there are many active points in human body containing blood vessel ties and these points have higher temperature. They can actively absorb ultraviolet light and have high levels of electric potential. When stimulated, these active points show higher production of useful elements that take part in all crucial processes of the human body. No wonder that reflexotherapy is used in when treating many diseases. Using the reflective massage it’s impossible to harm the human body. Furthermore it’s a fantastic way to diagnose the current state of the body. The swelling and hurting of the certain reflective zones starts long before the body itself develops any pathological signs, which means it’s possible to discover the errors in different exchange processes, and then, using the smart insoles stepG we can help the system start working correctly once again.


What will we do with $500?
This is the minimum amount we need when combined with our other sources of financing to develop the product, perform any required modifications, manufacture it and ship it to our backers.

By helping us get this very valuable funding and voting with your feet, we can put all the pieces of the puzzle together and provide you with your very own stepG system.

Why you should support us

We really think that this product will be a disruptive force in the recovery industry. A revolution in convenience, effectiveness and design. We would love to have you be on the front lines with us getting this product to the masses.  That's why were are currently offering 35-50% OFF the projected retail price of our products.  It's our way of saying thank you for supporting us in our infancy :)

Here are several reasons why more financing is a better thing for you as a backer:

It will allow us finish development and get you the product faster.
It will allow us to run trials that help to quantify the results of the product so we can add standardized results to the app.
It will allow us to start aggressively marketing our brand globally so we can alert people around the world of our new approach to recovery and help them to join the movement.
There are a bunch of discrete milestones we hope we can reach with you and we’ll be sure to keep you updated on which ones we’re approaching next! There will also be something new and exciting we can do with the brand with additional funding.

Press Release for the Press

I thank the video channel: Tech Divya "Best private therapist foot Massager by Indiegogo"

I thank the video channel: Tech HD "5 Amazing Inventions You Need To See"

the beginning of the review from 3:33 minutes
 

supports us: MostAmazingTop5
(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Opo1VG593-Q)

I am grateful to everyone for your support.

Many thanks for the support of the video blogger "technical raja"

 

Contraindications for using the smart insoles:

  1. Malicious neoplasms.
  2. Major weakening of the organism.
  3. High temperature, fever.
  4. Serious, deep internal organ damage.
  5. Pregnancy.
  6. Serious infectious and viral disease.
  7. Chronic inflammation in tissues and organs.
  8. Patology of cardiovascular system and kidney soreness.
  9. Strong overexcitement of the nervous system, mental disorders.
  10. Tuberculosis.


Q: How does it feel?
A: Lovely. It’s been best described as “a feeling of gentle vibrations”.

Q: How long does it take for me to feel the effects?
A: No time at all. Once you attach the stepG you feel an instant relief.

Q: During which part of my period should I wear stepG?
A: There is no recommended optimal time to use stepG. You can wear it whenever you want. Just put it on when you feel some pain, and take it from there.

Q: Can I use it out in public?
A: Most definitely. stepG is designed to be discreet and can be worn unnoticeably under any outfit.

Q: Is it relevant for every age?
A: Yes. stepG is relevant for all.

Q: Are there any limitations to use stepG?
A: Yes. You should NOT use stepG if you have a heart pacemaker or have a heart rhythm problem.

Q: Can I sit/ move/ exercise with this?
A: stepG doesn’t restrict your movement at any way, it’s designed to be clipped on and forgotten about.

Q: How do I pick my color?
A: We will send you an email later on; you will be able to choose your favorite color there.

Q: Is it safe to use?
A: Yes, stepG is completely safe to use. We strive to meet the strictest International standards and are near completion with the FDA and CE-Mark approval process.

Q: Was this tested with people?
A: Yes. stepG was clinicly tested on 53 women and 70 men. The clinical trial was conducted by Prof. Barny Josplin to very successful results.

Q: Are there any side effects?
A: Safe stepG use doesn’t have any negative side effects whatsoever. It also doesn’t leave any marks on your body.

Q: Will I need to change batteries?
A: No. stepG operates on internal batteries. You charge it by wireless charger. The time it takes to be fully charged is 1 hour. The time of use in the active mode is up to 72 hours.

Q: What if my stepG doesn't work properly?
A: We don't compromise on customer satisfaction and despite working hard to make sure every detail of stepG works well, we've added a 2-year warranty. If there is any defect during the warranty period, we will repair the product for free of charge or exchange the product with a new product. Not that you'll need it :)

Q: How much is the shipping and handling?
A: We provide FREE shipping to all the countries.

All information on our website

story:
The Kamarg 59 is based on a Kamarg model first released in 1959 (you guessed it). We used it as a base to add functionalities expected from a modern daypack. It all came beautifully together. 

What makes the Kamarg 59 special:

High quality materials. Built to last.

 We still believe it’s time for a more sustainable approach to backpacks. We want Kamargs to last for decades just as the originals, that's why we use natural materials like sailcloth and leather. Additionally we avoid plastic as much as possible. Producing our products in Europe, we assure longevity and higher durability by superior product design and more expensive materials like real leather.

Laptop and iPad compartments to protect your stuff.

With an use at work or on travels at mind, we added a compartment for 13" laptops and a second one for your iPad. Due to its elastic material you can also put larger objects like a book or a noise cancelling headphone case into the bag.

Speed closures for quick access. 

One of the most requested features for a new bag were the speed closures. They allow you to quickly open and close the main compartment.

Internal bottle holder for more stability. 

We added two elastic belts to secure your bottle safely on the inside of the backpack, preventing it from falling over.

A carrying strap for that one pullover. 

 Sometimes pullovers or jackets need to be tamed when transporting them. To prevent them from falling out of your backpack, we added an elastic strap.

Again fully water repellent. 

 Like our previous models, the Kamarg 59 is again fully waterrepellent without using nasty chemicals. So you can enjoy your Kamarg 59 even on rainy days.

Ready for your adventure:

Dimensions:

Our road to a new Kamarg:

In June 2017 we successfully relaunched the classic Austrian backpack brand Kamarg via Kickstarter. With 995 Backers, we were able to turn our dream of bringing a sustainable backpack back into a reality. We shipped all products in September 2017. Thank you all who helped us back then. ? ? ?

At the end of 2019 we started to build prototypes around the idea of creating a new Kamarg backpack. Ideas were proposed, then discussed over muesli or wine and then abandoned. We went on mountains to find clarity, sometimes we came back with even more questions and ideas.

 We also started to talk to a lot of current consumers and contacted former employees of Kamarg. In spring 2020 we also held a small roundtable in Vienna to collect and cluster input from our community. That was tremendously helpful.

The Team:

We are a small group of people dedicated to make backpacks more sustainable. Spread across Europe, we work remotely connected through Google meet and the good old telephone.

They say it takes a village to raise a child, for us the support of many people truly helped us move forward. Thanks to Steffi for pushing to get the work done, Eduardo to help us  with production again, Richard for the great product shots, Doris for the awesome lifestyle shots, Johannes for our great Kickstarter video, Inge, Moni, Monika, Hannes, Janine, Simone and Emeka for staring in it. Petra, Agnes and Thomas for helping with the outreach and Heather (Kickstarter), Lukas (LukeRoberts), Miriam (Herbert) and Stephanie (Ünique Skies) for all the advice and support for our Kickstarter campaign. We owe you (again).

story:
Short Summary

 

  • We are ecologists, eco  designers, permerculturist, climate change activist, creative artist, humanitarian and a life coach living in Ghana
  • We are raising funds to start an eco center and farm, we are very passionate about ecological works and want to teach others about permaculture and sustainability. We hope to spread awareness and bring spit lions towards modern problems. 

  • Things We intend to do:

    * Perma/ Sustainability/ Eco trainings

    * Eco Farms ?☘️

    * Organic Food production 

    * Organic pesticides, cosmetics, repellents and fertilizers.

    * Essential oil distillation 

    * Natural medicines

    * School Garden 

    * Eco culture development and exchange programs

    * Apiculture - Beekeeping ? 

    * Nurseries/Tree Planting & Agroforestry systems??

    * EcoTourism - Ecolodge - Ecovillage

    * Youth and women empowerment 

    * Sports - Soccer ⚽️ 

    * Renewable energy - Solar systems - Biogas - Rainwater catchment systems.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

Here is what your money will go to in the initial stage of the project!

* 2-3 acres of land

* Licensed surveyor to document our land

* Tools

* A small vehicle to carry materials

* Materials for the building 

* Compensation for the workers

  • Anyone who donates will be invited and welcomed to stay at our eco center whenever they choose to come visit! for life !
  • We will continue to save up for the land and if we do not reach our goal , we will not stop raising funds to make this project a reality 

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • we want to create a beautiful world and have this place be the first of many environments that will change the world 
  • Mattlawie Ecological non profit has been educating and successfully doing ecological works for several years
  • We will be updating everyone on the exact steps and process we will be going through, as we cannot wait to have you visit us!

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Whatever hurdles may come we will not give up, where there is a will , there is a way. 
  • if there are unforeseen circumstances , we will prepare ahead for them. Such as weather or lack of resources, we will improvise and change materials or work on a different aspect of the project. We will not stop working (of course to rest) because we  are passionate about this project as this is what we do everyday! 
     

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please share and spread the word on all platforms 
  • Talk about ecology and how you can implement more sustainable ways of living in your area

And that's all there is to it.

* Eco Farms ?☘️

story:
Camping needs are changing....and sooo should our tents!  I am creating colorful, hyper tents for the outlandish adventurers. 

I was at a music camp out one year...surrounded by beautiful art and lovely people...  and was sadden by the look of my run of the mill brown tent.  I decided right then and there that I was going to produce a line of tents that ustilzed color and promoted expression.   These 3 man camping tents will be as structurally sound as the camping tents of the past but will utilize colorful fabrics and have intentful designs. Please take a moment to read about the intent of each design on the gallery page of this sight for each tent is more than just a pretty-pretty picture.  Because I am using colored fabric for the tents, the inside will raidiate with color as well and the four sides coming together will make for a kaleidoscope pattern on the ceiling.  I am asking for your participation with two things:  funding for the first year's line... it takes a lot to get ideas flying.... and I want your  vote on the two designs you would want to camp in, you can view them on the gallery page.  I feel really honored to be a part of the bay area music scene and am really stoked to have a way to give back to make the camping experience that much funner. This project keeps me up at night.  I am so stoked to bring these to you!  Waken Tents is going to give us a choice not currently available for those who really know how to live!!!!    Thank you!

 

The Production Of Waken Tents... A brief look at the year once the fund raising is over-

-The funds are in...It is Jan, 29th and you have selected our first seasons tents with your votes- thank you....

-My wonderful bay area pattern designer will translate our dreams into a language that our sewing crew will be able to follow. Pattern designers are not cheap but this one is very affordable and knowledgable.

-As our patterns are being created, I am finalizing the fabrics, zippers and screens, that will be used in our tents.  Purchasing these in bulk does help with the costs.

-That patterns are done and our tents are ready to be created. A sample is constructed...does it work? maybe it needs some adjustments....this takes some cash.  Luckily for Waken Tents, our pattern designer knew the perfect place to have these constructed.  This sewing crew understands how to sew tents for they have done it for other big named companies in the industry.

- Meanwhile our website is being created by a wonderful artist of the music scene...This will make it easy to order the finished products, give feed back on them and, and creates a platform for you to connect with other designers of our scene. 

-So the samples are perfected and the sewing crew is given the go ahead to start producing this years line so that you can have them ready by Spring 2013 festival season.  Wow how time flies and money is transformed into fun elaborations for living!!!!  

-WE DID IT, thank you and look forward to seeing them soon. 

 Why you...?!

  • Without your contributions, without the music scene, and with out the artists, none of this would be possible. You-all make life worth living!!!  Every-body is a part and has huge influence on our experience! Because Waken Tents is responsible, we do want you to have a say in the matter and we will listen to your ideas and needs.  Together, we will make the best tents.  My heart is fully engaged in this company and I am extremely passionate about it's purpose. With your help we can manifest!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

DO pass this on to everyone who has ever had to buy an ugly  brown tent for their music festival camping experience.  DO feel stoked to be a part of this..we are pretty much the first ones doing this.. Don't we know how to live and love!?

story:
Forged Steel Upper Control Arms

Guys, you've been looking at lift kits.  Everybody is telling you that in order to run the lift you want to run you'll need aftermarket upper control arms: "Your caster is going to be whack".  So, you hit your favorite forums, Facebook groups, and subreddits to find the recommended brands.  You get some info and hit your favorite retailer.  You see the price...  W.H.A.T.?!  

Here's the thing - quality aftermarket upper control arms are expensive.  Really expensive.  They range from $500 to $800 to the end user and in most cases they're required if you're running more than 2" of lift on a vehicle with independent front suspension.  We're here to tell you it doesn't have to be this way. 

We can bring you upper control arms which correct for lift.  We can do this for almost half the cost.  We can do this leveraging American manufacturing and North-American raw materials.   We've been in the automotive aftermarket industry for a decade.  We can do it all.  Well... almost all.  What we can't do?  Tooling costs.  

We Need You

What we're talking about here is a paradigm shift in aftermarket upper control arm manufacture.  Most of the OEMs are currently manufacturing upper control arms with stamped sheet metal.  Most aftermarket manufacturers are currently manufacturing upper control arms as weldments - DOM tubing bent with bushing and ball joint / uniball cups welded together. 

OEM's used to manufacture upper control arms as steel forgings but have gradually moved away from this process as a cost-cutting measure over the last two decades.  There are forging facilities in the USA who will be without contracts as the OEM's continue their transition.  

We're here to kill two birds with one stone: save America and bring you a better, stronger, cheaper aftermarket upper control arm.  We need you.  

Forging produces a stronger, more precise, and longer lasting piece than alternatives at a significantly lower cost per unit.  The flip side to this is forging requires extremely high up-front tooling costs to manufacture the dies used in the forging process.  Forging also requires high moq's (minimum order quantities).  

Who We Are

We're a 4x4 consumer cooperative in Lincoln, Nebraska and we've been shaking things up since the summer of 2018.  We're member governed and we're here to support a lifestyle of active adventure and exploration.  We've been tapping American manufacturers to bring awesome and affordable products to market, starting with lift coil springs and leaf springs.  We'll soon be bringing affordable shocks and coilovers to market for select applications. 

We don't come to this campaign empty-handed.  We've been awarded a NIF Prototype Grant by the Department of Economic Development in the great state of Nebraska to help us make this project a really real reality.  The grant award is in the amount of $27,000.  

What We're Going To Do

We're going to start with manufacturing forged upper control arms for the following applications:

  • 2005-2020 Toyota Tacoma
  • 2003-2020 Toyota 4Runner
  • 2007-2014 Toyota FJ Cruiser
  • 2003-2009 Lexus GX470
  • 2010-2020 Lexus GX460
  • 2005-2020 Nissan Frontier
  • 2005-2015 Nissan Xterra

These arms will be caster-corrected for 3" of lift (roughly 3 degrees, depending on application).  As this campaign progresses and as funds allow we will add additional applications.  Voting on additional applications will be conducted via polling on our Alldogs Offroad Coop Facebook page.  This campaign has five tiers and a single add-on perk.  

  1. An Awesome Sticker
  2. An Awesome Sticker and T-shirt
  3. An Awesome Sticker, T-shirt, and Bare Forged UCA's (you supply ball joints and bushings and assemble)
  4. An Awesome Sticker, T-shirt, and Assembled Forged Upper Control Arms (we supply bushings and ball joints and assemble before shipping)
  5. An Awesome Sticker, T-shirt, Assembled Forged Upper Control Arms, and an ADO Membership

Our upper control arms will be manufactured to use readily-available OE-style bushings and ball joints.  They will also be treated for corrosion resistance.  Bare arms can be purchased by DIY-types who will need to source and assemble bushings and ball joints.  Assembled arms will be furnished with high quality bushings and ball joints assembled with loving care in Lincoln, Nebraska by yours truly.  

Our timeline is to run this campaign for 50 days.  If the campaign is successfully funded we will move to production.  Our forge has a 6 week lead time.  If all goes as planned we will have product on customers' doorsteps before the end of July 2020.  If the campaign is not successfully funded, funding will be returned to the customer.  

TL;DR

Forged is stronger.  Forged is cheaper.  We're making it happen.
