story:
The Problems We Address

Classic cars are deteriorating due to lack of investment and use

Problems for classic car owners: Most classic cars are used as second vehicles and spend most of the time not being used (which is bad for any car). The Federation of British Historic Vehicle Clubs reports that 27% of historic cars are not driven at all, with a further 30% used fewer than ten times a year! It's not surprising that many owners end up selling their classic because they cannot justify the cost of ownership.

Problems for non-owners: Your options to drive a classic are extremely limited; you basically have to buy one (and maintain, and store it). And what if you like lots of classics? You can't buy them all. Many classic car enthusiasts are put off by the need to store and maintain a car they'll hardly use.

How We Solve These Problems

OldenCars bridges this gap and offers a revolutionary way to enjoy classic cars. We provide owners a secure way to earn money from their car and meet fellow enthusiasts. We help owners keep their cars on the road, not stuck in the garage. We provide the platform, marketing, bespoke person to person car sharing insurance, payment gateway, and support between owner and driver.

For car owners: Our platform enables classics owners to earn money from their car by sharing it with fellow enthusiasts in a safe and secure way when they're not using it. This helps to offset the cost of ownership. 

For car renters: We provide convenient and secure access to a wide choice of everyday classics without long-term commitment, maintenance overheads, and storage requirements. Whether renters need a car for a special occasion, or just to try one out, we connect them with owners who want to share their passion.

OldenCars creates a community of enthusiasts, including all those people who've never had the opportunity to try out classic motoring first-hand. 

Trust and Security

We understand it is critical for us to build trust and offer a secure solution. 

Some classics owners may not feel comfortable letting other people drive their car. To address this we:

  • Focus on 'everyday' practical classics with a value less than £40,000.
  • Arrange insurance that covers owners and renters for the period of the rental (so each owner's insurance policy is unaffected). 
  • Undertake stringent checks on renters (including information from DVLA) and operate a 'member rates member' review process.
  • Give owners complete control as to when their car is available, how much they charge and who they rent it to.

Our booking process will be straight-forward and pricing transparent so renters can easily make their choice from all the appropriately located cars.

Renters may feel nervous about their ability to drive a classic car. We encourage the owners to provide detailed information about their car, including any of its individual characteristics. Renters meet the owners in person when they collect the keys - this is another opportunity to learn about the car.

Response and Feedback

We have received an encouragingly positive response to date, with key themes being: 

  • Lack of time on the road is a well-acknowledged (and expensive) problem for classics. Having a way to do this securely to pre-vetted drivers with a member review system was welcomed as a solution to this problem.
  • Our decision to focus on modern, practical classics was validated in talking to hundreds of classics owners. Older cars are deemed too delicate and awkward for trouble-free hires.
  • Enthusiasts who don't yet own a classic told us they see our platform as a gentle way to get more actively involved in classics without having to dive in at the deep end and buy a car.
  • Owners who are very protective about their car will not post them (not a surprise), but we met  many other owners who would like to earn towards the upkeep of their car.

The Plan

Should our campaign reach its goals and demonstrate we have sufficient interest we'll start first thing in the New Year building our platform and implementing the marketing plan.

  • Complete our prototype by adding the payment gateway and review system
  • Run extensive tests on the rental platform and payment systems
  • Post advertisements and articles in the classic motoring press
  • Work with classic owners to get their cars registered and accounts setup
  • Deliver perks to our supporters
  • Go live!

The Team

Anna is a Business Management graduate with broad leadership experience. Anna spent 20 years at Autodesk, where she held many positions including Vice-President of Professional Services, responsible for a $100m P&L. Anna is a classic car owner and has suffered the consequences of not using her car enough, requiring a full engine re-build.

 

Allister is an Internet entrepreneur, mathematician and engineer who has held a broad range of engineering and leadership roles in large companies (Burroughs/Unisys, Lockheed Martin, DEC) as well as start-ups (Convergent Technologies, MIPS, TIS). Allister is a long-time classics enthusiast and has chosen to drive a practical classic as his ‘everyday’ car for as long as he can remember.

What's In It For You?

  • If you own a classic and would like to earn money towards its upkeep, we offer you the way to do this securely. And to early supporters we are offering campaign perks that give commission-free rental for life (that's right: we are so grateful for your support that if you select one of these perks you will never have to pay OldenCars to rent your car through our site).
  • If you're a classics enthusiast and want the opportunity to drive a variety of cars, we have great driving perks for you, too. (This applies to current classics owners, by the way. You may love your car, but wouldn't you like to try others once in a while?) 
  • The more backers we have, the greater our ability will be to reach a broad audience and get loads of interesting cars posted to the site. Your valued support helps us to help make your classics dream a reality. 
  • We're offering subscriptions to popular classic car magazines, bumper stickers and key rings which make great gifts for the people in your life.
  • Last but not least you get that warm, fuzzy feeling from knowing you were one of the first people to support OldenCars in its mission to get classics where they belong: back on the road.

How You Can Help

We have already built a prototype of our platform and engaged with many classic car owners and renters. We need help to launch a live version and build the community

  • Buy our perks and become a founding member
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Register your car with us and reap the rental income in our secure environment.
  • Put the word out and tell your friends, family and fellow classic enthusiasts.
  • Encourage classic owners to register their car with us.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

OldenCars Potential For Growth

The UK has thriving classics market with significant interest in, and demand for, classics.

In the UK alone there are an estimated 500,000 owners and a further 1.5 million 'highly interested' enthusiasts who spend time and money in the world of historic vehicles (figures courtesy of The Federation of British Historic Vehicle Clubs). Today there are over one million UK historic vehicles (30 years and older) registered with the DVLA.

Of these, only 10% are in concours condition and clearly treasured. We do not expect these owners to post to our site, but their likely exclusion will not prevent OldenCars from succeeding in its mission.

The vast majority of registered historic cars are in a condition suitable for person to person car hire, with 56% being 'very good all round, but not perfect'. This is unsurprising: it is well-known that classics owners often live with niggles, putting off the expense of getting such issues rectified. OldenCars offers them a way to derive earnings to offset this expense (and for the owners to enjoy the car more too).

These numbers do not include the more modern classics (20 - 30 years old), increasing our opportunity to build a large, active community of enthusiasts.

Enthusiasts who don't yet own a classic told us they see our platform as a gentle way to get more actively involved in classics without having to dive in at the deep end and buy a car.
Owners who are very protective about their car will not post them (not a surprise), but we met  many other owners who would like to earn towards the upkeep of their car.



The Plan

Should our campaign reach its goals and demonstrate we have sufficient interest we'll start first thing in the New Year building our platform and implementing the marketing plan.

Complete our prototype by adding the payment gateway and review system
Run extensive tests on the rental platform and payment systems
Post advertisements and articles in the classic motoring press
Work with classic owners to get their cars registered and accounts setup
Deliver perks to our supporters
Go live!



The Team
Anna is a Business Management graduate with broad leadership experience. Anna spent 20 years at Autodesk, where she held many positions including Vice-President of Professional Services, responsible for a $100m P&L. Anna is a classic car owner and has suffered the consequences of not using her car enough, requiring a full engine re-build.
  Allister is an Internet entrepreneur, mathematician and engineer who has held a broad range of engineering and leadership roles in large companies (Burroughs/Unisys, Lockheed Martin, DEC) as well as start-ups (Convergent Technologies, MIPS, TIS). Allister is a long-time classics enthusiast and has chosen to drive a practical classic as his ‘everyday’ car for as long as he can remember.


What's In It For You?

If you own a classic and would like to earn money towards its upkeep, we offer you the way to do this securely. And to early supporters we are offering campaign perks that give commission-free rental for life (that's right: we are so grateful for your support that if you select one of these perks you will never have to pay OldenCars to rent your car through our site).
If you're a classics enthusiast and want the opportunity to drive a variety of cars, we have great driving perks for you, too. (This applies to current classics owners, by the way. You may love your car, but wouldn't you like to try others once in a while?) 
The more backers we have, the greater our ability will be to reach a broad audience and get loads of interesting cars posted to the site. Your valued support helps us to help make your classics dream a reality. 
We're offering subscriptions to popular classic car magazines, bumper stickers and key rings which make great gifts for the people in your life.
Last but not least you get that warm, fuzzy feeling from knowing you were one of the first people to support OldenCars in its mission to get classics where they belong: back on the road.




How You Can Help

We have already built a prototype of our platform and engaged with many classic car owners and renters. We need help to launch a live version and build the community

Buy our perks and become a founding member
Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
Register your car with us and reap the rental income in our secure environment.
Put the word out and tell your friends, family and fellow classic enthusiasts.
Encourage classic owners to register their car with us.
Use the Indiegogo share tools!


OldenCars Potential For Growth
The UK has thriving classics market with significant interest in, and demand for, classics.
In the UK alone there are an estimated 500,000 owners and a further 1.5 million 'highly interested' enthusiasts who spend time and money in the world of historic vehicles (figures courtesy of The Federation of British Historic Vehicle Clubs). Today there are over one million UK historic vehicles (30 years and older) registered with the DVLA.
Of these, only 10% are in concours condition and clearly treasured. We do not expect these owners to post to our site, but their likely exclusion will not prevent OldenCars from succeeding in its mission.
The vast majority of registered historic cars are in a condition suitable for person to person car hire, with 56% being 'very good all round, but not perfect'. This is unsurprising: it is well-known that classics owners often live with niggles, putting off the expense of getting such issues rectified. OldenCars offers them a way to derive earnings to offset this expense (and for the owners to enjoy the car more too).
These numbers do not include the more modern classics (20 - 30 years old), increasing our opportunity to build a large, active community of enthusiasts.

story:
Short Summary

As a passionate photographer, for a long time now it has been my dream to make a photography book. I currently sell my portraits and since visiting Paris Foto last year, I made the decision that my next big project would be to make a book. 

A couple of weeks ago I made a very last minute decision to travel from Australia to France. The short version of the story is that I received an email on a Friday saying that I had won a First, Second and Third Prize in a Parisian Photographic Competition. I was invited to attend the exhibition opening which would be in Paris and then to travel to Arles for the best Photography Festival in France where more of the work would be shown. So that Monday I made the decision to leave for France, alone. My ticket was booked only a few hours before my departure and I left with $2 in my bank account. I had to borrow money so that my bank account wasn't empty when I arrived in France - otherwise I may not even get into the country! (I have since been payed!!)

Being at the Arles photography festival has been an amazing experience. I have met some amazing industry people and have been given some amazing opportunities - including the offer of a projection of my works. Discussions with the people that I have met and just being here has cemented in my mind the fact that I want to make a book. 

I want to share the amazing places that I have seen, introduce the beautiful people I have met and share the funny stories that I have encountered along the way. The book would be a combination of photographs and words. Portraits of people, photographs of the stunning scenery and a description of each photograph included in the book. 

Now that I am here, I want to continue to travel for as long as I can so that I can keep adding to the book. I hope that this will be the first of many travel journals. I hope that it will make a beautiful coffee table book and be a different take on travel books. 


What We Need & What You Get

Any funding will be incredibly helpful in making this dream happen. Already being in Europe, I feel its better to stay for as long as I can and continue to add to my body of work, so that, in the end I can put together a fantastic presentation. 

Currently I am staying in budget accommodation and have been making salads and eating fruit. I don't want to waste money on eating out! I will continue to do this for the rest of the trip. I have also been lucky in that I have had offers from friends, new and old for free accommodation which is great. It means I can stay a little longer and will have some local knowledge! 

My plan is to head from Arles to Spain, Spain to Morocco, Morocco back through France, France to Italy, Italy to Belgium, Belgium to Germany. Maybe not in that order but those are the places that I would like to go. 

When I first began taking photos, my intention was to take photos that could be used to help people. Whether this be through sharing a story or raising awareness of a particular issue. This would also be a goal of creating this book. I will seek out minorities that need help exposing an issue, get to know locals in smaller communities and help them in any way I can. 

Funding will be used to help with travel costs and the costs involved in putting my book together and getting it out there. I will be putting the book together with or without the help of funding so any funds raised will be going towards this cause, nothing will be wasted. Contributors perks will include photographic prints and copies of the book. 

Back in Australia, I own a fine art Photographic Printer and would use this to print the images myself, thus ensuring they are of the best possible quality. All photographs would be printed on Archival Photographic Cotton, ensuring the colours are most vibrant and the prints most impressive. The book will be a collection of A4 prints that can be framed and hung on the wall if this is your intention.

    The Impact

    Your contribution will make it a whole lot easier and quicker for the project to come together. The project is something I intend to carry out with funding or without but any contributions will help immensely. 

    My Track Record

    I am currently represented by and Art Gallery in Brighton Australia for the sale of my portraits. I have also been selected for numerous exhibitions throughout Australia, Paris, Arles, Aspen and New York.

    I have also been lucky enough to receive a number of Photography Awards both nationally and internationally. These include:

    First Place Grand Prix de la Photographie / PX3

    Second Place Grand Prix de la Photographie / PX3

    Third Place Grand Prix de la Photographie / PX3

    Winner Moran Contemporary Photographic Prize 2012

    Winner Click 11 Photography Prize

    Honourable Mention 8th Black and White Spider Awards

    Finalist Realise Your Dream Award, British Council Australia 2013

    Jury Award of Merit Grand Prix de la Decouverte

    Honourable Mention Grand Prix de la Photographie Paris / PX3

    Judges Merit Award Picture This Photography Prize

    4 x Bronze Merit Awards International Loupe Awards


      Risks & Challenges

      The greatest challenge I think that I will face is travelling alone to countries that I have not been to before and do not speak the language of. I am doing everything I can to be careful! 

      The other challenge is getting people to let you into their world. So far, I have found everyone incredibly warm and welcoming. I think that being in a place long enough that people start to become familiar with you also helps. On the plus side, this is the way I like to travel. I am not that interested in running around like a crazy person trying to see all the monuments and famous places in one day. In fact, I'm not even all that interested in that side of things. Yes it is great to see, but I am much more interested in getting to know the locals, making friends with them and living like them. I think by travelling in this way, I will have no trouble finding interesting content for my book. 


        Other Ways You Can Help

        I will also be selling my photographic prints at discounted rates and taking bookings for work when I get back. With my last minute visa, my maximum stay is 3 months so I will be back in Australia mid October at the latest. If this is something that you may be interested in, please email a@ashleighlauren.com 

        If you don't want to or aren't in a position to contribute money, please spread the word for me! Any help is greatly appreciated!! 

        Thank you for reading my story! xx

story:
BEST OUTDOOR SLEEP.

POLARMOND’S patented, temperature-regulated Outdoor Sleep System eliminates the disadvantages of the conventional sleeping bags and sleeping mats and sets an outstanding new comfort-standard for outdoor sleeping. With the clever combination of spacious sleeping room, sleeping mat and cosy liner, you will experience the outdoor sleeping in a completely new way!

 

Function, modularity and benefits

 
 

Set-up, use and benefits

 
 

First prototype

 

Your support

With your support we can finance the development and production of the first series.

_________________________________

 

YOUR BENEFITS.  

Thanks to the revolutionary design, your benefits are:              

Sleeping comfort just like home

  • Thanks to the enormous free moving space in the sleeping room.
  • There are no restrictions on your sleeping position. Even abdominal sleep is possible.

Temperature regulation of the sleeping room (0°C to +25°C / +32°F to +77°F)

  • Thanks to the zipper ventilation opening, no sweating anymore.

Storage space for things that shouldn't get cold like drinks, food, electronic, shoes etc.

  • Thanks to the spacious, warm sleeping- and storage-room.

 

ALL THIS PROMOTES INCREASED RECOVERY AND MAXIMUM PERFORMANCE NEXT DAY.

_________________________________

 

FUNCTION. 

Sleeping comfort just like home

With our Trekking Sleep System there are no restrictions on your sleeping position. Even abdominal sleep is possible.

 

Room temperature regulation

The sleeping room temperature can be hold constantly warm at outside temperatures from 0°C up to +25°C / +32°F up to +77°F. The temperature can be regulated via a zipper ventilation opening. Moisture can escape. 

 

Warm sleeping- and storage-room

The sleeping room is spacious enough to keep drinks, food, electronic, shoes etc. warm or dry – without coming into contact.

_________________________________

 

TODAY’S PROBLEMS OF CONVENTIONAL SLEEPING BAGS AND SLEEPING MATS. 

Anyone who has ever spent the night outside knows about the disadvantages of conventional sleeping bags and sleeping mats:

  • Hardly any freedom of movement
  • Sleeping on side is uncomfortable
  • Abdominal sleep is hardly possible
  • Slipping off the sleeping mat
  • The pillow is constantly shifting
  • Temperature regulation is not possible in a sleeping bag, because there is no circulating air around your body

ALL THESE PROBLEMS LEAD TO POOR SLEEPING COMFORT!

_________________________________

 

SYSTEM COMPONENTS.

  1. Outer-shell (insulated)
  2. Sleeping mat (air)
  3. Poles (1 x chest, 1 x feet)
  4. Cosy liner 

 

_________________________________

 

SYSTEM SET-UP.  

The Trekking Sleep System is ready in only a few simple steps:

1.  Pump up the sleeping mat 

 

2.  Fix the sleeping mat to the outer-shell bottom

 

3.  Insert the 2 short poles to the outer-shell

 

4.  Place the cosy liner in the outer-shell

_________________________________

 

TECH SPECS.  

(All TECH SPECS are data of series, based on prototype)

1.  Dimensions

Length:         185 cm / 73”

Height:            55 cm / 22”

Width:             60 cm / 24”

 

2.  Packings / weights

Packings for 0 °C / +32 °F:

  1. Outer-shell:                     Ø 20 cm x 18 cm / 7.9” x 7.1”
  2. Sleeping mat:                 Ø   8 cm x 22 cm / 3.1” x 8.7”
  3. Poles (2 pcs.):                Ø   5 cm x 22 cm / 2.0” x 8.7”
  4. Cosy liner:                       Ø 18 cm x 16 cm / 7.1” x 6.3”

  TOTAL volume:                11 Liter

  TOTAL weight:                2.1 kg / 4.6 lbs

 

Packings for ~13 °C / ~ 55 °F:

  1. Outer-shell:                     Ø 20 cm x 18 cm / 7.9” x 7.1”
  2. Sleeping mat:                 Ø   8 cm x 22 cm / 3.1” x 8.7”
  3. Poles (2 pcs.):                Ø   5 cm x 22 cm / 2.0” x 8.7”

  TOTAL volume:                7 liter

  TOTAL weight:                 1.6 kg / 3.5 lbs

 

3.  Other:

Machine washable 

_________________________________

 

FINANCING.  

We use the capital to finance the development and production of the first series.

_________________________________

 

PROJECT PLAN.  

The market launch is planned for 4th quarter 2018.

_________________________________

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES.

The highly experienced management with over 35 years of know-how in development, product management and project management of innovative products faces two major challenges:

Variety of variants: Polarmond will offer its Trekking Sleep System in 3 different sizes. At first, only the Regular-size for body sizes from 170 - 185 cm / 67” – 73”, followed by the sizes Small up to 170 cm / 67” and Large up to 195 cm / 77”.

Time line: we plan to deliver the Polarmond Trekking Sleep System to our customers in 4Q 2018. In product development, unexpected time costing problems can occur. Although we use well-proven technologies for sleeping mat and poles, we need new tools to realise our geometries. An error in tool production could cause a delay in the delivery date.

An excellent project controlling of the Polarmond management will reduce the risks.

_________________________________

 

Why can we successfully launch the Trekking Sleep System?

For more than a year now, Polarmond has a 4-season and temperature regulated All-In-One Sleep System on the market, which inspires its users. It is designed for -30°C / -22°F and contains the functions of tent, several sleeping bags and sleeping mat. This has proven that we can also successfully bring our new Trekking Sleep System to the market.

For more information: www.polarmond.ch 

Award: 

With its temperature-regulated All-In-One sleep system, Polarmond won the most important award at Europe's leading outdoor trade fair - the Outdoor Industry Gold Award.

_________________________________

 

SUPPORT.

We ask you to promote the Polarmond Indiegogo campaign in your community to friends and colleagues and to share it with the social media.

Thank you very much for your trust and your support!

story:
"The Nug is for people who wants a small discreet knife that performs like a regular knife. There are a lot of micro knives out there, but most of them are either too flimsy or difficult to hold. They are only good for menial tasks, like opening letters, cutting tape etc. The Nug can puncture, slice and smash almost anything. It is the best handling micro knife you can have in your pocket." 
- Jeff

I am offering a limited run of The Nug. A micro knife built like a tank with a 3 mm vacuum heat treated S35VN steel blade.  

The Nug is balanced, clean and minimal.


The Nug is a companion blade that is really easy to carry around and use. After many rounds of tests, we figured out the perfect size and proportion. You will appreciate how it feels in your hand, the robust built, the unique carrying clip and the finishing of this product. We selected S35VN steel for the blade, it is a premium grade steel used only in high-end production and custom knives. Handle is made in titanium, and the movement is fitted with ball bearings. 


The Nug comes with a leather strap and clip.


The secret behind The Nug’s incredible strength lies in it’s innovative design. Users are able to leverage the knife through their finger, once the blade is held properly it will never slip.  


Make no mistake, The little Nug cuts like a heavy weight. 


The Nug is small and discreet.


Only the best materials. 3mm Vacuum heat treated S35VN blade / Grade 5 Titanium Handle / Ball Bearings 

If you think a tiny blade is useless, think again...


Follow The Nug on Facebook for new videos and images. https://www.facebook.com/TheNugNo1microknife/
Thank you!


SPECS: 55mm x 30mm x 12mm // hole size 20.5mm // 3mm Vacuum heat treated S35V steel blade // 6AL-4V Grade 5 Titanium handle // Ball bearing mechanism.

SPECS: 55mm x 30mm x 12mm // hole size 20.5mm // 3mm Vacuum heat treated S35V steel blade // 6AL-4V Grade 5 Titanium handle // Ball bearing mechanism.

story:
Camping Should Always Be

This Comfortable

 

With the busy pace of everyday life, it has become nearly impossible to enjoy the present moment. For us, camping is the best way to disconnect from the daily madness and connect with the simpler things in life. As much as we love the outdoors, our camping experience always seems to be deprived of one thing: comfort. Even though we have driven hours away from home to sleep in nature, we find ourselves secretly wishing we were sleeping in our own bed. 

 

 

Given our fanatical obsession with technical gear and our vast experience in the mattress and bedding industry, we sought out to solve the problem of sleeping comfortably outdoors.

 

A Smart Design

Everything You Need to Camp. In One Bag.

 

 

The Basecamp

Bedroll Plus a Tent that Zips On and Off

 

 

... and a 4-Season Fly to protect you from the mighty elements

 

 

Simple Set-up

No tiny stuff sacks. No hassle. Just unroll and assemble in less than 5 minutes.

 

                                                          

                                                        

 

The Finest Components

Heritage Look with a Technical Feel

story:
Cheap Travel Deals!

What is your favorite type of travel?                                                                                                                        We are here to help you to find best travel packet, flight, cruise/ferry, hotel, bus deals in one place just for a cup of coffee price per month in one place!                                                                           

Just choose your favorite airports, ports, bus stations, cities or all together and let us find for your cheap and quality deals news straight to your email! We can help to save hundreds or thousands and you can have an opportunity to travel more times per year!

With cheap deals we also give you our experience, places to visit, to eat and secrets to make your self-travel better!       

                                                                                                                                       

Flight deals

Choose your favorite countries, cities, airports and price range. From that point you will get cheap flight deals all the time straight to your email! And that's not the end, we will also give you our long time travel experience, places to visit, to eat and everything to make your travel better!

Hotel Deals

Choose your favorite countries, cities, price range and let us to find best hotel deals!                  Get information too about places to visit, to eat around your hotel to make your stay better.

Travel Deals

Is there a country you always wanted to have holidays or come back once again? We will find cheap self-travel deals: hotel/resort + flights with return! If we will give you cheap deals, why not to give yourself opportunities to travel more times? Now everything in one place!

Cruise/Ferry Deals

Obsessed with travels through ocean, sea.. Or just need to reach island? We are here to give you the best deals! And not only the deals, all information about this type of travel, our experience, tips to not forget, avoid and get!

Bus Deals

Interested about road travel life? Stops, unique places... or just one direction trip? Just choose countries, cities or bus stations and we will find best deals!

To Travel Is To Live!

We are happy to have opportunity to let people travel at affordable price!                                            Our team is very thankful, who can share our project to friends, social media...                                For now this project is just for Europe, but our plans is to grow and make opportunity for more continents travelers reach our travel deals! Travel deals is self-travel type.

story:
Mission:

"Telmer Enterprises is dedicated to providing products that honor your loved one and show your patriotism"

Our goal is to reach all 50 states to fulfill an unmet need in the marketplace for a small flag and solar light kit. This product will allow you to display your patriotism by placing it at a grave site, displaying it at home or on an apartment balcony.

This kit includes a US Flag (made in the USA), a solar light with a high capacity battery, a sturdy steel base,and a telescoping flagpole that allows one to adjust the height depending on the application.

Like us on Facebook

Tribute:

This project is dedicated to our Father, Duane Telmer Thompson who passed away in 2011.  He served his country in the United States Air Force and was a Korean War Veteran.

Our Progress:

To honor his patriotism we decided to fly a flag at his grave site. An all in one kit was not available so we designed our own and would like to offer others the same opportunity.  We resourced manufacturers for all the parts and tested the product for over a year.

We are poised and ready to start production.

Our assembly and shipping will be handled by Productive Alternatives in Fergus Falls, Minnesota

Going forward we would like to develop additional patriotic products so that we can cover the various ways that you can show your patriotism. Join us so we can bring these patriotic products to market.

Committees:

1)Territory committee (Develop a strategy to market this product)

2)Development committee (Share your ideas with us)

Patriots Club Benefits include:

·Special pricing on Indegogo order.

·10% Discount on future orders.

·Preview and purchase all new products before they go to market.

DISPLAY YOUR PATRIOTISM!!

 

SPECIAL THANKS:

Doug Anderson - Time Lapse Video  

Dan Glaser - Video & Editing (Unmarked Van Films)

David Arkenstone- Time Lapse Music (www.davidarkenstone.com)

Haylee Thompson - Pictures (Rethink Dance Company I Red River Dance)

Our biggest challenge will be getting the parts ready to package.  There will no doubt be a learning curve but we are up for the challenge. Our Management Team has the experience to get the parts assembled, handle the orders and get your flag kits shipped. If we have a large backer base, we have backup facilities to handle the additional volume but shipping lead times may be extended.

We are dedicated to getting the job done right!!

Telmer Enterprises
P.O. Box 195
Ashby, Minnesota 56309

story:
Seek N’ Sneak is an Arduino powered self-controlled robot which is able to run around, find objects, grab them, relocate them and do many other useful and funny things.

- Motivation.

Why did we develop this robot? There is a very short answer: kids! 

They need 10 to 30 minutes (depending on their temper) to scatter literally all the toys they have over their rooms, so initially we were looking for some way to automate a tedious process of daily toys collection. We solved this problem, but we realized that there are many other cool applications for this robot. We found that our robot can be smart, fast, strong, fearless and funny, just like a badger, and we named it Seek N’ Sneak.

 

- Seek N’ Sneak robot at a glance.

The two driving wheels of this robot are powered by independently controlled motors and equipped with 128-steps-per-revolution encoders allowing for precise control of the angular position of the wheel, as well as its velocity and acceleration. 

An independent 2D orientation of the rover is provided by two side mounted IR proximity meters. Objects are detected by the third centered IR proximity meter. The three IR sensors can be replaced by one PING)))™ Ultrasonic Distance Sensor.

The arm is run by 3 super-strong servo-motors, so it is fast and powerful enough to push up about 3 pounds, or even lift the robot itself, or throw objects.

Seek N’ Sneak is an Arduino Mega 2560 powered robot. The robot software is completely open sourced, so you can either use the original software which has already been developed for you, or you can modify it as you please to meet your demands. You can then use commands like LOOK FOR AN OBJECT, GRAB or THROW instead of writing low-level code to control the sensors, motors and servos directly or develop your own way of thinking for the robot from scratch using the Arduino integrated development environment.

Though Seek N’ Sneak was designed as a fully autonomous, upgradable robot. There is plenty of space inside the body of the robot to extend Arduino board with extra sensors or with Wi-Fi or Bluetooth shields to establish communication with a computer or remote control.

Seek N’ Sneak’s body and arm parts, depending on the kit you choose, are made of either 5mm laser cut black acrylic glass, 3mm laser cut galvanized aluminum or 2mm milled carbon-fiber composite. 


8.4 - 9.6V accumulator (not included*) is used as the only power supply.

- What can Seek N’ Sneak robot do?

The most impressive thing is that the robot runs as a fully independent  unit:

  • it can find and collect objects on the ground,
  • chase and attack other robots
  • you can make it organize your living space, placing things back in place whenever they are found where they should not be.

You are only limited by your imagination.

- What Seek N’ Sneak robot can not do:

  • it can't fly... yet,
  • it has no any "+18" application, at least we did not try,
  • we did not integrate the Three Laws of Robotics in the robot's brain yet, so be careful :). 

- Can you use it?

Yes, if you have a very basic knowledge in electronics and programming OR if you are able to accurately follow simple instructions. Seek N’ Sneak robot is provided as a kit, so you will need some basic tools including wrenches, screwdrivers, diagonal cutter and soldering set. For young technicians supervision is recommended.

The Seek N’ Sneak robot can also be a great gift to get your child interested in robotics. Since the databank of free softw­­­­are will be continuously replenished, people with no programming background can also enjoy the fun of robotics.

No matter if you are an experienced programmer, a robotics fan, or a school teacher trying to interest kids in robotics, the Seek N’ Sneak is a great way to learn about mechanics, electronics and programming… All in one!

- What does SN’S kit include?

The standard Seek N’ Sneak kit contains everything* you need to complete the assembly of the robot including 

  • laser cut body parts along with 
  • DC motors with encoders, 
  • dual motor shieldand wheels, 
  • arm powering servos, 
  • IR proximity meters, 
  • an Arduino Mega 2560** or analog control board, 
  • screws, nuts and spacers, flanged bearing wheels, wires, connectors, breadboard and other minor parts.

You will be provided with a full step-by-step tutorial explaining how to assemble your Seek N’ Sneak robot. Moreover, you will get the intermediate programming sketches that will help you to properly connect and test all the electronic parts one by one.


* Accumulator is not included; see recommended type of accumulator here (9.6V) or here (8.4V).

** You can replace it with Arduino UNO as it has exactly as many pins as needed. However we strongly recommend Mega 2560 board because it gives you a lot of room for experiments with additional drives, sensors, screens, pushbuttons or LEDs.

- Seek N’ Sneak evolution.

We made a lot of modifications, but most of them were made on paper. In the end there was only one predecessor which successfully solved the problems of self-orientation and finding objects. It looked like this:

  


- Why does the project need your support?

We want to share the design and our experience building the Seek N’ Sneak robot with developers all around the world. So after the INDIEGOGO campaign, the Seek N’ Sneak robot in its entirety will be released to the public!

Our aim is a community of robotic fans - we count on your participation as a developer. With your help we will be able to establish a network of all Seek N’ Sneak robot developers. You will be able to share and borrow ready-to-use code and find support from other robot builders. At the same time we will be continuously working on new features for existing robot and develop new robots to meet your expectations. Just imagine how much we can do, working together on this project.

The next version of the robot will be equipped with accelerometers for precise positioning of the robot. We will also add a CMOS-camera and BlueTooth or WiFi shields for interactive outboard optical object recognition. We are also considering using the Raspberry Pi portable computer in the next generation of the Seek N’ Sneak robot.

However, all of this can only be done with your support…

With your funding we can make the Seek N’ Sneak robot even better, more affordable and easily accessible to everyone.

- How else can You help?

  • Share the news about our campaign on social media (Instagram, Facebook, Google+, Twitter, etc.)
  • Share about our campaign via email
  • Write the link to our campaign and hand it out. The shortened link is http://igg.me/at/SeekNSneak 
  • Our website is http://seeknsneak.com. We have the easy-to-share photos and videos there. Feel free to copy and share them.
  • Order the Seek N’ Sneak T-Shirt (black or white) now and tell about our project off-line (we will try to deliver it before the official end of the campaign).


- Timeline

October/2014  Finish the "Getting Started with Seek N’ Sneak robot" documentation and sketches for users.

November/2014  Purchase electronic components, laser cutting of mechanical parts.

December/2014  Package reward kits.

December/2014  Start shipping reward kits.

- Acknowledgements 

  • Sergey Cherednichenko for technical consulting,
  • Aspro company for carbon-fiber composite parts set,
  • Alex Stolpovsky for editing the project and providing various tools and parts.

- Risks and Chalanges

We have 3 working prototypes of the Seek N’ Sneak robot and all tests of the robot have been successfully completed. The next task mainly focuses on finding suppliers and packing service.

story:
The biggest reason to back the HUB is …

Because it will give you the POWER to escape the rat race.

Designed in Australia and solidly constructed to withstand the elements, the HUB Chair's unique design incorporates the powerful ability to charge your electronic gadgets when you just want to get away from it all in the great outdoors.

Easily the smartest camping chair ever made, the HUB is genius!

Having one of these chairs can totally save your day:

  • When you’re watching the kids play football and your camera battery fails!
  • When you’re at the beach finishing your murder mystery eBook and your tablet dies!
  • When you’re camping out for the weekend and have forgotten to charge the camp lantern!

There are in fact plenty of other reasons to back the HUB, like weatherproof Bluetooth speakers, an LED flashlight, a portable solar panel or an easy access cooler… 

But being able to escape and get away from it all and still have the convenience of having POWER on hand, is the one you will love the most.


Here's what people have said about the HUB

 Christine King. Brisbane, Australia.

"(It's) what I’ve been saying ie. These days everyone in your group will have things they’ll still want to take with them that require charging. And also, just think about the amount of stuff you pack to take with you to “get a way from it all” and end up bringing it with you anyway. The HUB simplifies that!"



The Hub packs power

Never again worry about having forgotten to pre-charge your electronic gadgets before making your escape from the Big Smoke!

Built in to the HUB table top is a massive 10,000Mah power bank that could run the bluetooth speakers alone for up to 7hrs non-stop or fully charge your iPhone 5 times over. The polymer battery pack is lightweight, water and dust resistant and puts out a 'fast charge' through two x 2.5amp USB ports that will happily charge a couple of your electronic gadgets simultaneously! 

Here's a list of gadgets you might want to charge up:

Camera  Fitness Band  GoPro  Drone  Mobile Phone  GPS        Video Sunglasses  eBook Tablet, iPad  Camping Lantern

Recharging your HUB power bank is also easy. 

Standard with every chair, comes an extra long 3m micro/USB cord and Car Charger that plugs into your car's 12V cigarette socket. Monitor how charged you are with the LED indicator lights and juice up if you need to while you're driving or when you get there. 

Portable Solar Panel

Even if your vehicle's 12V socket is miles away, you can always whip out your trusty fast-charging 18W Solar Panel wallet (conveniently stowed in the armrest pannier where you won't forget it) and charge your HUB power bank using the sun's free rays! This lightweight, waterproof, highly efficient mini panel is dead easy to use; just position it in the full sun and plug it into the micro USB port (with the cord supplied) on the side of the table.  

Make yourself truly self-sufficient when you next head off the beaten track.


Built-in Bluetooth Speakers

Really set the mood and groove to your favourite tunes!


Fully waterproof in the event of an unexpected shower, the superior quality speakers and subwoofer produce sounds with a smooth baseline quality, clear mids and plenty of volume to fill your outdoor spaces. Let your music play for hours using the built-in power bank and take or make phone calls directly from the table top (if you really want to that is!)

 Party Connect Technology

Two HUBs are better than one! 

Create a surround sound party atmosphere when you're in the middle of nowhere with this leading edge technology that connects the speakers from two HUB chairs to a single music source. That means you can play your party tunes with double the volume and outdoor reach; surely the best reason to own two HUBs!

Stable Pivoting Table

What really sucks about eating outdoors is when you've just managed to carefully balance the plate of food on your lap and it decides to take a nosedive into the sand! And don't you just KNOW how impossible it is to properly wash sand from a juicy steak?


For this feature alone, it's worth having a HUB Chair with your own stable personal table that swings to the front for eating and to the side for sharing a bowl of nuts with your drinking buddy. Position the sticky silicon grip-mat on the table surface and pivot it at an angle to create a non-slip easel for sketching or hands free e-reading.


Detachable LED Flashlight

They say we "eat with our eyes" and nothing makes camp food more enjoyable than being able to see what's on the plate in front of us... but when the sun's gone down and there's only starlight to see by, it ain't so easy!

The HUB's 80 Lumens LED torch will likely make your food taste better by giving you hands-free tabletop illumination with it's magnetic attachment and unique bendable shaft for directing the light where you most need it. The flashlight easily detaches for BBQ checking duty or for finding your tent in the dark!


Tough Chair Construction

The last thing you need in the great outdoors is a cheap, flimsy excuse for a camping chair with fabric you can shoot peas through and a frame that can't cope with a bit of rough treatment.

Be confident in knowing that we consider a strong, well-balanced, sturdy and durable structure to be an essential foundation element of the HUB chair; one that will never be compromised. We have used lightweight curved and moulded aluminium tubing with a tough, anodised, powder coat finish in an easy-to-fold-up oversized director's chair style. Hard plastic elbows on the leg corners stop your chair from sinking in the sand and tipping you out, whilst the heavy UV-protected polyester canvas seat and back is padded in just the right spots for maximum laid-back comfort.

Armrest Cooler Bag

Don't get up, stay right there in your seat... reach lazily to your left, flip up the quick-access lid and pull out another icy cold one. RELAX!

It is so EASY to stay refreshed in the HUB! Fit up to 12 cold cans or other snacks and beverages in the detachable soft-sided cooler for possible all-day personal supply. The comfy adjustable shoulder strap makes for an easy BYO to your neighbour's beach party or convenient refill from the mother icebox.

Detachable Trolley Wheels

How much other stuff have you got to cart to your favourite picnic spot?

Turn your HUB into a very handy packhorse:  attach the wide-tread off-road wheels, load up the seat with up to 30kgs of gear, tip and pull/push your HUB cart with the sturdy webbing handles off into the wild!  When you get there, simply detach the wheels, sit down, put your feet up and ENJOY!

Here's a quick overview of the Perks and Packages in a nutshell


Shipping Costs to your Door

If you're like me, you hate getting right to the end of the checkout process before finding out exactly what the 'extra shipping' costs will be! For me personally, the experience can be a real turn off and I definitely don't want it to be for you. So here is a shipping cost chart to help you make your decision.

Risks and Potential Challenges.

I have chosen to run an all-or-nothing type of campaign on this crowdfunding site for a couple of reasons:  First of all, because I need every single cent of my nominated funding goal to be able to go ahead and pay for all the necessary moulding and tooling charges and place my first minimum order with the factories, you will all get your money back if I don't reach my goal. 
 And secondly, I do not take your pledge and personal trust lightly. In fact, on this first order run, I will be matching every one of your dollars with the equivalent number of dollars from my own pocket. It's called 'skin in the game' ... which, in the business venture capital world, is considered a significant demonstration of my commitment, not least because I stand to feel a whole lot of financial pain if I don't keep my promise and deliver to you an outstanding, beyond expectations, product.
If you have supported other crowdfunded campaigns before, you will know this is about the best, hand-on-heart promise you can get. 

So, where do the biggest challenges lie?

Based on my having a whole heap of experience in product development and mass production, I don't believe there are major risks with the production side of the HUB chair. As I briefly explained in my video, I have chosen, researched, double-background checked and personally visited and physically inspected the manufacturing facilities at each of my carefully selected factories. I am totally confident I can produce a superb quality, fit-for-purpose, high-tech camping chair for you.

That said, at this stage the biggest challenges are to do with the shipping of the HUB to your door and this is because I will not be able to personally (and lovingly) pack, address and send every chair off to it's new home from several ports around the world simultaneously. Believe me I would if I physically could. But it's ok, I have been in touch with some very professional fulfillment services out there who have promised they will execute my deliveries with as much care and attention as I would and so I am confident of sorting out any issues that may arise.

Something about Julie


 From the age of 'very young', my Mum and Dad ambitiously trundled me and my two younger brothers around Australia and the world, mostly doing some very care free, adventurous and somewhat dangerous activities many parents wouldn't dream of exposing their kids to.  

Nowadays, at the age of 'not very young', I live by the beach with my husband, Alan on the Gold Coast in Australia and I guess you would not be surprised to learn, that as an adult, I'm still pretty much addicted to that care free feeling I felt way back then and that I still get when I have managed to escape the rat race for a moment.

But alas, my style of travel has evolved into something a little less dangerous and a lot more comfortable. No longer content to put up with inferior gear that doesn't perform, I also want to only take things that make my outdoor life easier in a multitude of ways. And that's the very reason I designed the HUB. 

With over 20 years of experience in a number of design genres; Fashion, Interior and architectural, I turned my hand to creating something that I believed would not just help me but encourage many people to get out there and enjoy the care free feeling of being outdoors, that I have so loved for many years.

The HUB Chair was born and it's thanks to all those people below (and many more) that we have come this far. Launching my pride and joy to the world through crowdfunding has been an incredibly thrilling adventure and I thank you too for joining me on this exciting journey.
story_txt:
The biggest reason to back the HUB is …
Because it will give you the POWER to escape the rat race.
Designed in Australia and solidly constructed to withstand
the elements, the HUB Chair's unique design incorporates the powerful ability to charge
your electronic gadgets when you just want to get away from it all in the great outdoors.Easily the smartest camping chair ever made, the HUB is
genius!
Having one of these chairs can totally save your day:


When you’re watching the kids play football and your camera
battery fails!


When you’re at the beach finishing your murder mystery eBook
and your tablet dies!


When you’re camping out for the weekend and have forgotten
to charge the camp lantern!


There are in fact plenty of other reasons to back the HUB, like
weatherproof Bluetooth speakers, an LED flashlight, a portable solar panel or
an easy access cooler… But being able to escape and get away from it all and still have the convenience of having POWER on hand, is the one
you will love the most.Here's what people have said about the HUB
 Christine King. Brisbane, Australia.
"(It's) what I’ve been saying ie. These days everyone in
your group will have things they’ll still want to take with them that require
charging. And also, just think about the amount of stuff you pack to take with
you to “get a way from it all” and end up bringing it with you anyway. The HUB
simplifies that!"





The Hub packs power

Never again worry about having forgotten to pre-charge your electronic gadgets before making your escape from the Big Smoke!

Built in to the HUB table top is a massive 10,000Mah power bank that could run the bluetooth speakers alone for up to 7hrs non-stop or fully charge your iPhone 5 times over. The polymer battery pack is lightweight, water and dust resistant and puts out a 'fast charge' through two x 2.5amp USB ports that will happily charge a couple of your electronic gadgets simultaneously! 
Here's a list of gadgets you might want to charge up:


Camera  Fitness Band  GoPro  Drone  Mobile Phone  GPS        Video Sunglasses  eBook Tablet, iPad  Camping Lantern

Recharging your HUB power bank is also easy. 


Standard with every chair, comes an extra long 3m micro/USB cord and Car Charger that plugs into your car's 12V cigarette socket. Monitor how charged you are with the LED indicator lights and juice up if you need to while you're driving or when you get there. 


Portable Solar Panel

Even if your vehicle's 12V socket is miles away, you can always whip out your trusty fast-charging 18W Solar Panel wallet (conveniently stowed in the armrest pannier where you won't forget it) and charge your HUB power bank using the sun's free rays! This lightweight, waterproof, highly efficient mini panel is dead easy to use; just position it in the full sun and plug it into the micro USB port (with the cord supplied) on the side of the table.  
Make yourself truly self-sufficient when you next head off the beaten track.




Built-in Bluetooth Speakers




Really set the mood and groove to your favourite tunes!



Fully waterproof in the event of an unexpected shower, the superior quality speakers and subwoofer produce sounds with a smooth baseline quality, clear mids and plenty of volume to fill your outdoor spaces. Let your music play for hours using the built-in power bank and take or make phone calls directly from the table top (if you really want to that is!)

story:
Umate Pillow is the ultimate travel pillow for travelers.

With its unique integrated strap system, Umate Pillow can be used in 4 comfortable modes.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Integrated Strap System

Umate Pillow is a multifunctional pillow with an integrated strap system.This strap system is hidden in the pillow and can be used to fasten the pillow to the seat.

 

The strap system is easy to use and here are 3 ways to fasten Umate Pillow to the seat:

(1)

 

(2)

 

(3)

 

Raised Wall Design

Umate Pillow can give your head more support by its Raised Wall Design.

 

Memory Foam Core

With memory foam core, Umate Pillow provides you the most comfortable experience.

 

 

Storage

Umate Pillow can be compressed to a small volume and takes up little space.

 

 

Hello everyone and welcome to our campaign!

For a long time, we are searching for solutions to have a good sleep while traveling by airplane or by train. Traditional travel pillow doesn't give your head enough support for its low height and lack of support under your chin. To solve this problem we designed Umate Pillow which can give your head full and secure support.

We have made several prototypes and they work well, so we are looking forward to put Umate Pillow into production and to share our solution with all travelers.

With your support, we can bring Umate Pillow to life. Thank you!

You can contact us on twitter @Li_Musheng , @umatepillow or by email umatepillow@163.com

 

 

Risks and challenges

After product development and testing, we are now working with experienced manufacturers to ensure product quality and reliability. We are confident that we will deliver Umate Pillow on time and of high quality.

Our challenge is to promote product and to reach our funding goal. We are promoting Umate Pillow using social media and we believe that the unique features of Umate Pillow will make it a popular product.

story:
It takes just seconds to a pickpocket to grab your phone or to a bag snatcher to leave with your backpack. Because you want to avoid that and keep your belongings safe we have designed Loop.

All stretch goals unlocked !

 

Hundreds of thousands of incidents involving pickpockets occur everyday. Their techniques are so on point that you wouldn't feel anything if you became a target.

Pickpockets are not ready for this !

Also for your pocket

 

Articles from ABC News & The Guardian

 

Your bag is even more vulnerable than what's inside your pockets. A second of inattention and a thief can disappear with not only your bag itself but also all its content.

Don't let anyone ruin your holiday

   

 

                                                                                                                                                                                           ​

 

We sometimes don't realize that we carry thousands of dollars worth of devices in our bags or pockets. For example : 1 MacBook Pro 15"+ 1 Canon EOS M50 = $2,900+. 

How to save $650 (and even more)

 

You don't want to spend 30 seconds looking for your keys everytime you go home or take your car. Thanks to Loop it will soon be history. 

Just pull the rope and see them appear

 

Thanks to its adjustable buckle, Loop adapts in length depending on what you want to protect so you can keep your phone safe as good as your wallet or just a credit card. 

Minimum length of 1 inch 1/2 extendable until 4 inches 1/2

 

Tourists are a target of choice for pickpockets. Using Loop is a simple way to secure your belongings so they don't ruin your holiday. 

Attach your bags together to keep them safe

   

 

Here is some advice to help you protect your belongings the best way possible with Loop in everyday life and when traveling. 

 

  

   

 

 ​

You don't want to loose everything

 

 

Instead you can put them on your leg for more security

 

In some places you have to be more cautious than anywhere else. Broadly speaking these places are very crowded with strangers all around you.

 

Wherever you are in the world we send Loop to your mailbox. Pre-order yours now and let us take care of the rest. Please talk about it around you to help more people protect their belongings.

 

We ship worldwide guys !

 

One of our friends had her phone stolen in the subway while visiting Madrid early this year. She didn't notice anything and seemed pretty affected by that. As travelers ourselves we decided we would brainstorm on a way to secure belongings especially when abroad. 

 

We are both passionate travelers. I live in France and Colette in the U.S. We have designed Loop for us but also for all those who want to protect their belongings. If you have questions about our project do not hesitate to use the comments section. 

 

Feel free to write about Loop and help more people protect their belongings. You can get in touch with us if you want to know more about us or about the project.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

After dozens of prototypes we have finally created the anti-theft device that your belongings deserve. We have been very demanding regarding the choice of materials and will deliver the product you expect.

We both have the competencies required to carry out this project and we will do everything to start shipping on time. After the campaign you will be kept updated about the advancements of the project. You´re part of it as much as we are and we thank you for your help !

story:
About LifeDisc

LifeDisc started with the goal of having a compact fishing kit on hand whenever you need it, but has evolved into much more.
 
Measuring just 37mm in height and 200mm in diameter, LifeDisc builds into a personal life sustaining toolkit that can be neatly stowed in your backpack, glove box or bug-out bag so it's always within easy reach.

LifeDisc features a tough signalling mirror that's built to withstand the outdoors and usable without needing to open the disc. If you find yourself in need of rescue, being able to draw the attention of rescuers quickly is key to survival.
 
A simple twist reveals a watertight storage unit with 240 cubic centimetre capacity. The contents of the storage unit have very deliberately been left to your own personal choice. Whilst we would expect that most survival kits would include an emergency water filter, fire starter, compass, etc., opinions vary widely when selecting personal survival items. So whether your preference is for GPS locators or insulin, the best thing that we feel we can offer with LifeDisc is freedom of choice.
 
That said, we plan to offer you the option of purchasing the following ready-made kit of the basics we feel you would need in a survivalist situation. And yes, all of these items fit  within the LifeDisc storage unit : 

** The Following Optional Items Are Not Included In The Indiegogo Perks **

  • Aquamira Frontier Emergency Water Filter System
  • Virogard Personal Protective Mask
  • SOL Fire Lite With Tinder Quik
  • Multi-Tool (Can Opener, etc.)
  • Fox 40 Micro Safety Whistle
  • CRKT RSK Mk5 Knife
  • 20mm AA Grade Compass
  • Needle and Thread
  • Alcohol Swabs
  • Survival Snare
  • Wire Saw

    The retail value of this ready-made kit is $90, however we hope to have enough customer interest to qualify for volume discounts (see how you can help below).


The signalling mirror and storage unit can be detached, which then allows the outer covers to be removed. Inside you'll find a rope spool wound with 12 metres of 550 Paracord which can also be removed and used separately. The central reel, wound with 100 metres of Platypus 30lb fishing line, is enclosed behind the rope spool ensuring that it remains tangle free and ready for use. The two outer covers turn over and bayonet back onto the central reel forming a full size hand reel ready to catch your next meal.

LifeDisc is manufactured in Australia from an ultra-tough plastic alloy that is chemical and UV resistant, making it virtually indestructible. LifeDisc also includes a drawstring net carry bag which doubles as a holding net for your catch. "Safety Orange" is the default LifeDisc color, but you also have the option of White, Black or Military Green if you would prefer.

So whether you're looking for a compact fishing kit for your next outdoor adventure, or a personal life sustaining tool for emergency preparedness, LifeDisc is up to the task.

Ready For Production

We have been quietly perfecting the LifeDisc design for over a year now and have created working prototypes to ensure the final design works flawlessly (see photos). Now that the design is safely covered by patent, it's time to release it to the world.

To take LifeDisc into full production, we need to raise $48,000 to cover the injection mould tooling. Our funding goal has been calculated to cover this initial up-front tooling cost, plus the cost of producing the LifeDiscs that you, our backer (read savior) will be receiving as part of your perk.

We have chosen a fixed funding model for our Indiegogo campaign. This means that all of your contributions are refunded by Indiegogo if this campaign doesn't raise at least enough to fund the production of the LifeDiscs promised to you in your perks. 

There are two Early Bird perks for backers that are quick off the mark. We're offering 1000 LifeDiscs at $10 off, and another 1000 at $5 off the expected retail price as an extra "Thanks" for getting our campaign off and running early. Please note that these discs will be produced in our first production run ("Safety Orange" color only) and will therefore be shipped first .


Timeline

The most time consuming process in getting production up and running is the creation of the injection mould tooling which will take around 12 weeks to complete 5 moulds. We will be using that time to ensure that the other components (Paracord, fishing line, etc.) are ready for assembly when production starts in February, 2014. Below is our expected timeline and we will ensure that every backer is kept up to date by email as things progress :

  • Nov, 2013 - Commence Injection Mould Tooling
  • Feb, 2014 - Start Production and Assembly
  • Mar, 2014 - Begin Shipping LifeDiscs to Indiegogo Backers



Shipping 

After selecting your perk, you will need to add the value of one of the following shipping options to your contribution :

  • Add $10 to your contribution to cover domestic shipping within Australia.
  • Add $20 to your contribution to cover international shipping outside Australia.

If you forget to add shipping at the time that you grab your perk, all is not lost. You can use the "Forgotten Shipping" perks to look after it and we will marry up your shipping contribution with your LifeDisc perk.


Just To Say Thanks

Every Indiegogo backer will also receive at least one 580ml Folding Water Bottle as shown below. These bottles take up very little space when not in use and feature an active carbon water filter to produce safe drinking water from a multitude of sources. Whilst we would like to personally shake each of your hands for the part you're playing in bringing our new product to market, we hope that this gift expresses our appreciation in some small way.



What To Expect As A LifeDisc Backer

From the moment you select your LifeDisc perk, you're not just a customer, you're a member of the LifeDisc launch team - Welcome aboard!!

Whilst the campaign is underway we will be focusing all efforts on reaching our funding goal. You will receive email updates on how the campaign is progressing and how you can help spread the word to other potential backers.

When our 45 day campaign ends on 15th Nov, we go straight into production mode (if once  we've reached our goal). At that stage you become part of the decision making process for the finer details in bringing LifeDisc to market.

We will be asking for your views on matters ranging from the optional "ready-made kit" (listed above), to what default Paracord color is chosen. Your opinion will be vital in ensuring that we get things right for all future LifeDisc owners.

Every backer will receive an email in early December with a link to an online form to get your thoughts. If your perk includes a choice of colors ($37 or above), then this is where you pick your color(s). You will also have the option of confirming your delivery address details on this form.

We will have some milestones on the way to production, so please also expect to see some photos to keep you in the loop.


Thanks for your support!!


Other Ways You Can Help

You can still help make our campaign a success even if you can't contribute. You are the very best way we have of getting the word out that LifeDisc exists.

Please use the Facebook and Twitter links below to share the news around.

Sincere thanks.
story_txt:
About LifeDisc
LifeDisc started with the goal of having a compact fishing kit on hand whenever you need it, but has evolved into much more. Measuring just 37mm in height and 200mm in diameter, LifeDisc builds into a personal life sustaining toolkit that can be neatly stowed in your backpack, glove box or bug-out bag so it's always within easy reach. 

LifeDisc features a tough signalling mirror that's built to withstand the outdoors and usable without needing to open the disc. If you find yourself in need of rescue, being able to draw the attention of rescuers quickly is key to survival. A simple twist reveals a watertight storage unit with 240 cubic centimetre capacity. The contents of the storage unit have very deliberately been left to your own personal choice. Whilst we would expect that most survival kits would include an emergency water filter, fire starter, compass, etc., opinions vary widely when selecting personal survival items. So whether your preference is for GPS locators or insulin, the best thing that we feel we can offer with LifeDisc is freedom of choice. That said, we plan to offer you the option of purchasing the following ready-made kit of the basics we feel you would need in a survivalist situation. And yes, all of these items fit  within the LifeDisc storage unit : 
** The Following Optional Items Are Not Included In The Indiegogo Perks **

Aquamira Frontier Emergency Water Filter System 

Virogard Personal Protective Mask


SOL Fire Lite With Tinder Quik

Multi-Tool (Can Opener, etc.)

Fox 40 Micro Safety Whistle 

CRKT RSK Mk5 Knife 
20mm AA Grade Compass
Needle and Thread

Alcohol Swabs

Survival Snare

Wire SawThe retail value of this ready-made kit is $90, however we hope to have enough customer interest to qualify for volume discounts (see how you can help below).





The signalling mirror and storage unit can be detached, which then allows the outer covers to be removed. Inside you'll find a rope spool wound with 12 metres of 550 Paracord which can also be removed and used separately. The central reel, wound with 100 metres of Platypus 30lb fishing line, is enclosed behind the rope spool ensuring that it remains tangle free and ready for use. The two outer covers turn over and bayonet back onto the central reel forming a full size hand reel ready to catch your next meal.LifeDisc is manufactured in Australia from an ultra-tough plastic alloy that is chemical and UV resistant, making it virtually indestructible. LifeDisc also includes a drawstring net carry bag which doubles as a holding net for your catch. "Safety Orange" is the default LifeDisc color, but you also have the option of White, Black or Military Green if you would prefer.


So whether you're looking for a compact fishing kit for your next outdoor adventure, or a personal life sustaining tool for emergency preparedness, LifeDisc is up to the task.



Ready For Production
We have been quietly perfecting the LifeDisc design for over a year now and have created working prototypes to ensure the final design works flawlessly (see photos). Now that the design is safely covered by patent, it's time to release it to the world.



To take LifeDisc into full production, we need to raise $48,000 to cover the injection mould tooling. Our funding goal has been calculated to cover this initial up-front tooling cost, plus the cost of producing the LifeDiscs that you, our backer (read savior) will be receiving as part of your perk.We have chosen a fixed funding model for our Indiegogo campaign. This means that all of your contributions are refunded by Indiegogo if this campaign doesn't raise at least enough to fund the production of the LifeDiscs promised to you in your perks. There are two Early Bird perks for backers 
that are quick off the mark. We're offering 1000 LifeDiscs at $10 off, 
and another 1000 at $5 off the expected retail price as an extra 
"Thanks" for getting our campaign off and running early. Please note that these discs will be produced in our first production run ("Safety Orange" color only) and will therefore be shipped first .

Timeline

The most time consuming process in getting production up and running is the creation of the injection mould tooling which will take around 12 weeks to complete 5 moulds. We will be using that time to ensure that the other components (Paracord, fishing line, etc.) are ready for assembly when production starts in February, 2014. Below is our expected timeline and we will ensure that every backer is kept up to date by email as things progress :

Nov, 2013 - Commence Injection Mould Tooling
Feb, 2014 - Start Production and Assembly
Mar, 2014 - Begin Shipping LifeDiscs to Indiegogo Backers




Shipping 
After selecting your perk, you will need to add the value of one of the following shipping options to your contribution :

Add $10 to your contribution to cover domestic shipping within Australia.
Add $20 to your contribution to cover international shipping outside Australia.


If you forget to add shipping at the time that you grab your perk, all is not lost. You can use the "Forgotten Shipping" perks to look after it and we will marry up your shipping contribution with your LifeDisc perk.



Just To Say Thanks
Every Indiegogo backer will also receive at least one 580ml Folding Water Bottle as shown below. These bottles take up very little space when not in use and feature an active carbon water filter to produce safe drinking water from a multitude of sources. Whilst we would like to personally shake each of your hands for the part you're playing in bringing our new product to market, we hope that this gift expresses our appreciation in some small way.


What To Expect As A LifeDisc Backer

From the moment you select your LifeDisc perk, you're not just a customer, you're a member of the LifeDisc launch team - Welcome aboard!!Whilst the campaign is underway we will be focusing all efforts on reaching our funding goal. You will receive email updates on how the campaign is progressing and how you can help spread the word to other potential backers.When our 45 day campaign ends on 15th Nov, we go straight into production mode (if once  we've reached our goal). At that stage you become part of the decision making process for the finer details in bringing LifeDisc to market.We will be asking for your views on matters ranging from the optional "ready-made kit" (listed above), to what default Paracord color is chosen. Your opinion will be vital in ensuring that we get things right for all future LifeDisc owners.Every backer will receive an email in early December with a link to an online form to get your thoughts. If your perk includes a choice of colors ($37 or above), then this is where you pick your color(s). You will also have the option of confirming your delivery address details on this form.We will have some milestones on the way to production, so please also expect to see some photos to keep you in the loop.
Thanks for your support!!




Other Ways You Can HelpYou can still help make our campaign a success even if you can't contribute. You are the very best way we have of getting the word out that LifeDisc exists.
Please use the Facebook and Twitter links below to share the news around.
Sincere thanks.

story:
Roller Rink and Drink

Let's not let a moment go by, a day become a week, where a big box stays empty for long. The space is big.  Let's make a dream come true. Let's build a RINK - A REAL RINK.  Old school roller skates, new school craft beer, craft root beer, local spirits, and fantastic wine, pizza, popcorn and heck - even a big disco ball.  

We can do this together. 

  • Community Fun.
  • Fitness
  • Kids parties
  • Family get together

The Impact

Working to make the strip mall a destination in our time. 

  • This would likely just become the coolest place to hang in Chicago and the surrounding burbs. 
  • Retro rolls are in and cool and a great way to build a community of fitness fun.
  • The Derby Track will attract regular attendance, the organ music might just become hip and trendy again, and Forest Park and our neighbors will benefit from the added commerce.  

Risks & Challenges

It's still a dream - we still have to do a little more research - but this is happening.  If we don't raise it all in 60 days - YOU WILL get your money back. That's the option we picked.  You'll get it all back.  If we raise it - we'll research it. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

    • Get on your skates and roll the news out to the public.
    • SHARING IS CARING - tweet, Facebook, tell all your friends to DONATE to the roller rink. 

    And that's all there is to it.

story:
About the tour

It has been a dream of many people to see the 50 states in the United States of America. However very few are able to make this idea a reality. There is not a single tour out there that shows all 50 states. The USA is not just New York, California and the Las Vegas. This tour was created to show you all the 50 states. You will also see major cities in each states, national parks, major monuments, breweries,  museums, aquariums, zoos, historical places,  do fun activities. We guarantee you that this will be trip that you will love, cherish and remember for the rest of your life

Above is a map of how you will be travelling through the country. The pink lines are the road routes we will be traveling by bus (You can see a blue bus on the map above). We will be flying over the blue routes (You can see a plane going over the blue route). Please see detailed itinerary by at the bottom


The Route

We have carved out the best route that not only goes through all the 50 states but also goes through most of the major cities, national parks and important landmarks in the US so not only do you see all 50 states you also see most major cities, national parks and important landmarks  in the US

Luxury Hotels and Travel 

We will make sure that your trip is as comfortable as possible, be it the luxurious buses with WIFI, comfortable hotels and flights where the drive is long.   

Free Breakfasts


Breakfast is supposed to be the most important meal of the day and its on us. You will have to pay for your lunch and dinner 

Guided Tours


Every city we visit will have a tour guide showing us the city. This includes museums, monuments, attractions. The tour guide will explain the culture, history and fun facts of the places we are visiting so don't  just see the 50 states you know what you saw

We offer 2 packages 

1) 50 states for $29,999. This includes 4 days in Alaska and 3 days in Hawaii. See the detailed itinerary below. These 2 are farther away and take 8 extra days. You will have a lot of fun visiting these two states

2) 48 states for $24,999. This does not include Alaska and Hawaii. 

*See itinerary below for compete details.  

 

Only 1 Tour in 2020. Tour in 2020 will include free dinners along with breakfasts. Only 50 seats available  

Only 16 Tours in 2021. Includes free breakfasts. Book soon before your favorite dates are sold out
