story:
Introducing MyCanoe: 
A Canoe that Travels in a Suitcase

    

 

"A lot of thought was put into the design of the canoe and its carrying case. The case itself becomes the canoe’s floor, adding structural support and ensuring they won’t get lost throughout the day."  - Digital Trends -

MyCanoe is made to go with you on all your adventures. MyCanoe is a lightweight, patented origami folding canoe. It is a high quality folding canoe that turns into a beautiful Canadian canoe in 10 minutes. Its full sized 14.5 ft with two seats are perfect for sharing with family and friends for a quick trip to water. When it is folded to a case, it fits in most small sedans.

  

  • MyCanoe unfolds into a quality 14 ft canoe in only 10 minutes, and takes only 5 minutes to fold back up.
  • At only 52 lbs, MyCanoe is easy to take with you wherever you go!
  • The optional paddles are two-piece for easy carrying. If you ever drop one in the water, they float!
  • The two-piece carrying covers are used as the floor of the canoe so you don't leave anything behind.

  • The body of MyCanoe is made from a marine-grade custom polypropylene with a 15 year UV treatment that will withstand 20,000 folds!
  • On the off-chance that your MyCanoe capsizes, there is no need to worry as your canoe will still floats.
  • The main body comes with 15-year warranty and 1 year for the other parts. Even after 1 year, if a part deemed a defect rather than wear and tear, we will send out a replacement part at free of charge. 

Premium quality material everywhere.

  • MyCanoe can hold up to 440 lbs. With the stabilizers, it can hold up to 750 lbs.
  • The award winning MyCanoe is TUV certified, comparing stringently both better and/or similarly to other canoes.
  • On the off-chance that you have the misfortune of capsizing, there is no need to worry as MyCanoe still floats when capsized!
  • With 8 different seat positions, the possible ways to enjoy your MyCanoe are limitless.

MyCanoe was specifically built to be a top performing canoe.  Although it folds up small for easy transport, make no mistake, it is at home in the water and has now problem surging forward with the help of a paddle.  

 

See MyCanoe owners' reviews

"The benefits of having a light folding canoe are tremendous, the more time you paddle the MyCanoe, the more you appreciate them." See full review here.

Click the photo to read another review, "Sea Trial".

 

MyCanoe also offers additional options, including stabilizers and rowing system for added enjoyment, such as fishing or other activities. 

The stabilizer attachments take your canoe to the next level. Use them during regular nature wandering for extra steadiness or attach to your canoe for some relaxing stand-up fishing time. 

 

The rowing system works brilliantly to keep paddles attached to the canoe so you can row effortlessly and easily without fear of the paddles floating away.

Why paddle when you can row?  Our innovative oar lock kit allows you to row your canoe in style.  Slide gracefully through the water with speed! 

 

Assembly and folding back is very quick and easy.  To demonstrate just how easy, we made this little video for you that shows every step.  From a carrying pack to a canoe in 10 minutes or less!

 

The inspiration for MyCanoe struck when founders, KS Jin and Jay Lee, were on vacation with friends. They brought a canoe with them and after having to stop multiple times to retighten the straps that were holding the canoe to the car, they knew there must be a better way. 

This is when they started experimenting with different folding canoes using origami. After settling on a design that they knew was a winner, Team MyCanoe then transformed that paper into the highly technical design your see now. However, despite being highly technical, it's easy enough for anyone to pull out and quickly assemble for a day on the water.   

 

MyCanoe isn't just an idea, or a concept, or even a prototype for that matter.  It's a full fledged product ready to hit mainstream production.  Our team of engineers and designers has worked very hard for three long years to get to this point.  We wanted to make sure we had worked out every possible product bugs.  We tested and retested different assembly protocols, materials, and manufacturing sequences.  All to ensure that once you back, you will be the proud owner of your very own MyCanoe.  

On Time and as Promised!

 

    

Launch of first prototype in 2015

Shown above are our productive past 3 years. To the right you will see the earliest version, say 0.5! It was a good start, but left us a list of things to improve. This led us to the version 1.0 which you see in the middle. More ribbing, sturdier design, but still lacking. Version 2.0 is seen on the left. Much better... rigid, sturdy, lightweight and fast to set up.  

It's been a brutal process to improve (if not perfect) this boat over the last 3 years but it has been worth every single step! Our current version 2.5 with this Kickstarter support will have only 4 ribs which will make for a lighter and faster assembly.

Each and every boat is handcrafted with the utmost care.  No cutting corners here!

Unlike other campaigns, our funds will be used to drive down the cost of parts, supplies, and manufacturing process.  You see.  We've already done the R&D on our dime.  We're not going to use your money for that.  Our manufacturing facility has been selected and our suppliers have been interviewed and vetted.

This ensures that you get a top quality product and that you get it on time!

 

SHIPPING DETAILS

The United States shipping cost is for shipping to the contiguous United States. There will be additional charge for Hawaii or Alaska. If you are in Hawaii or Alaska, please contact us with your shipping address for your options.

 If you're looking for hi-res images, you've come to the right place!  Click here for hi-res images of MyCanoe.  For media inquiries, please contact info@oricanoe.com

We are a team of engineers, architect, and entrepreneurs located in Knoxville, TN. We love outdoor activities and worked hard for the past 3 years to make this dream product available to everyone. We spent days and nights to come up with the best designs and source the quality material to build performance origami folding canoe. MYCANOE is backed by an established business - Coovy Sports. Coovy is well known for premium quality products at affordable pricing with exceptional customer service. Thank you for your continued support and we promise to continue improving MYCANOE.

Here's to your next adventure!

-Team MYCANOE

Q. Are the International shipping costs accurate? It seems high.

A. They are fairly close. The costs are based on actual quotes from several carriers. We will include your shipping invoice with your package. If we can secure better deals for certain countries, we will issue a refund for the difference. 

Q. How and where is the MyCanoe made? 

A. The current MyCanoe prototypes are made in South Korea. Co-founder, KS Jin, currently stays in Korea to ensure the continued development and quality manufacturing. As MyCanoe grows, our plan is to manufacture in the United States. We've already identified a few partners that could take on the job here in Knoxville, TN. 

Q. What is made of and how long will the MYCANOE last ?

A. MYCANOE is made of a 5 mm double-layer custom polypropylene that is lightweight and extraordinarily strong. It is manufacturer rated for 20,000 fold cycles. We've tested in a various water/weather conditions and haven't yet found any issues. With proper care, a MYCANOE can last for years of paddling. Every component piece can be replaced in the event of breakage.

Q. How do I care for MYCANOE?

A. We recommend treating your MYCANOE as you would a fiberglass, wood, or skin-on-frame canoe: don’t drag it or bump into sharp things, store out of direct sunlight, and rinse the canoe thoroughly with fresh water after each use.

Q. How stable is a MYCANOE?

A. The MYCANOE is quite stable and difficult to capsize. However, we recommend that inexperienced paddlers go with a companion, and don't attempt to use the MYCANOE in conditions beyond their skill level.

Q. Does the MYCANOE float?

A. Yes, the MYCANOE is buoyant and will float even if it capsizes. However, we recommend taking every safety precaution, including personal flotation devices and equipping bow and stern with floating bags.

Q. Will repeated folding weaken the hull?

A. The body of MYCANOE is manufacturer rated for 20,000 fold cycles - that's a lot of folds!

Q. Can I take MYCANOE on a plane?

A. Yes, MYCANOE can be checked as luggage, and the best way to protect MYCANOE during transport is to cover with a protective material (e.g. blanket).

Q. Can It Be Used For Fishing?

A. Yes. With minor modifications the MyCanoe can be outfitted with a rod holder. Another great choice for outfitting your MyCanoe is with one of RAM's mounts— RAM Mounts makes a Tough Claw, that works perfectly on the MyCanoe. Clamps down tight without drilling any holes, and you can then attach a rod holder, or cup holder,camera mount, fish finder, etc. The RAM Mount can then be paired with a YakAttack or RAM rod holder. We recommend a stabilizer kit for added stability when fishing.

Q. Can I attach a trolling motor to the MyCanoe?

A. Yes. We recommend a small lightweight motor to properly protect the hull and gunwales from damage. For MyCanoe, you will need either a DIY mount (e.g., see YouTube) or buy one from online - search for "Canoe trolling motor mount".

Q. Can I take the MyCanoe in salt water?

A. Salt water will not damage the MyCanoe. Just make sure to rinse the inside and outside of the hull, all joints, parts and accessories after each use. Dry before folding.

Q. What if I hit a rock?

A. Avoid rocks. However, if you do hit one, you and your MyCanoe should be fine. We’ve tested it on rocky beaches and even attempted to crack the hull with a hammer.

Q. What if I made a hole?

A. While the hull is extremely durable and unlikely to get a hole, if that happened, simply contact us for a free repair kit.

Q. Can I store MyCanoe as assembled for an extended period?

A. Yes. MyCanoe can be stored either assembled or folded for months. Just avoid direct sun exposure and store in dry, cool storage space.

Q. Can I setup sailing rig with MyCanoe?

A. Yes. As long as you can find correct hardware (clamps, support, hooks, etc.), MyCanoe should be fun with a light sailing set up.

Q. What are the buckles & straps on the inside of canoe for?

A. You need to buckle them to give a proper tension and shape of canoe.

Q. Are there different colors to choose from?

A. No. MyCanoe will be available with only one color - white w/ aqua blue print.

Q. Does the paddle float?

A. Yes, the oars in MyCanoe Plus are buoyant and will float.

Q. How do I attach stabilizers?

A. Inflate about 70% and attach it using the built-in buckles. Finish inflation and tighten the buckles.

 

Manufacturing Updates

We've already started ordering materials and parts and assembling canoes.

Much better... rigid, sturdy, lightweight and fast to set up.  It's been a brutal process to improve (if not perfect) this boat over the last 3 years but it has been worth every single step! Our current version 2.5 with this Kickstarter support will have only 4 ribs which will make for a lighter and faster assembly.Each and every boat is handcrafted with the utmost care.  No cutting corners here!Unlike other campaigns, our funds will be used to drive down the cost of parts, supplies, and manufacturing process.  You see.  We've already done the R&D on our dime.  We're not going to use your money for that.  Our manufacturing facility has been selected and our suppliers have been interviewed and vetted.This ensures that you get a top quality product and that you get it on time! SHIPPING DETAILSThe United States shipping cost is for shipping to the contiguous United States. There will be additional charge for Hawaii or Alaska. If you are in Hawaii or Alaska, please contact us with your shipping address for your options. If you're looking for hi-res images, you've come to the right place!  Click here for hi-res images of MyCanoe.  For media inquiries, please contact info@oricanoe.comWe are a team of engineers, architect, and entrepreneurs located in Knoxville, TN. We love outdoor activities and worked hard for the past 3 years to make this dream product available to everyone. We spent days and nights to come up with the best designs and source the quality material to build performance origami folding canoe. MYCANOE is backed by an established business - Coovy Sports. Coovy is well known for premium quality products at affordable pricing with exceptional customer service. Thank you for your continued support and we promise to continue improving MYCANOE.Here's to your next adventure!-Team MYCANOEQ. Are the International shipping costs accurate? It seems high.A. They are fairly close. The costs are based on actual quotes from several carriers. We will include your shipping invoice with your package. If we can secure better deals for certain countries, we will issue a refund for the difference. Q. How and where is the MyCanoe made? A. The current MyCanoe prototypes are made in South Korea. Co-founder, KS Jin, currently stays in Korea to ensure the continued development and quality manufacturing. As MyCanoe grows, our plan is to manufacture in the United States. We've already identified a few partners that could take on the job here in Knoxville, TN. Q. What is made of and how long will the MYCANOE last ?A. MYCANOE is made of a 5 mm double-layer custom polypropylene that is lightweight and extraordinarily strong. It is manufacturer rated for 20,000 fold cycles. We've tested in a various water/weather conditions and haven't yet found any issues. With proper care, a MYCANOE can last for years of paddling. Every component piece can be replaced in the event of breakage.Q. How do I care for MYCANOE?A. We recommend treating your MYCANOE as you would a fiberglass, wood, or skin-on-frame canoe: don’t drag it or bump into sharp things, store out of direct sunlight, and rinse the canoe thoroughly with fresh water after each use.Q. How stable is a MYCANOE?A. The MYCANOE is quite stable and difficult to capsize. However, we recommend that inexperienced paddlers go with a companion, and don't attempt to use the MYCANOE in conditions beyond their skill level.Q. Does the MYCANOE float?A. Yes, the MYCANOE is buoyant and will float even if it capsizes. However, we recommend taking every safety precaution, including personal flotation devices and equipping bow and stern with floating bags.Q. Will repeated folding weaken the hull?A. The body of MYCANOE is manufacturer rated for 20,000 fold cycles - that's a lot of folds!Q. Can I take MYCANOE on a plane?A. Yes, MYCANOE can be checked as luggage, and the best way to protect MYCANOE during transport is to cover with a protective material (e.g. blanket).Q. Can It Be Used For Fishing?A. Yes. With minor modifications the MyCanoe can be outfitted with a rod holder. Another great choice for outfitting your MyCanoe is with one of RAM's mounts— RAM Mounts makes a Tough Claw, that works perfectly on the MyCanoe. Clamps down tight without drilling any holes, and you can then attach a rod holder, or cup holder,camera mount, fish finder, etc. The RAM Mount can then be paired with a YakAttack or RAM rod holder. We recommend a stabilizer kit for added stability when fishing.Q. Can I attach a trolling motor to the MyCanoe?A. Yes. We recommend a small lightweight motor to properly protect the hull and gunwales from damage. For MyCanoe, you will need either a DIY mount (e.g., see YouTube) or buy one from online - search for "Canoe trolling motor mount".Q. Can I take the MyCanoe in salt water?A. Salt water will not damage the MyCanoe. Just make sure to rinse the inside and outside of the hull, all joints, parts and accessories after each use. Dry before folding.Q. What if I hit a rock?A. Avoid rocks. However, if you do hit one, you and your MyCanoe should be fine. We’ve tested it on rocky beaches and even attempted to crack the hull with a hammer.Q. What if I made a hole?A. While the hull is extremely durable and unlikely to get a hole, if that happened, simply contact us for a free repair kit.Q. Can I store MyCanoe as assembled for an extended period?A. Yes. MyCanoe can be stored either assembled or folded for months. Just avoid direct sun exposure and store in dry, cool storage space.Q. Can I setup sailing rig with MyCanoe?A. Yes. As long as you can find correct hardware (clamps, support, hooks, etc.), MyCanoe should be fun with a light sailing set up.Q. What are the buckles & straps on the inside of canoe for?A. You need to buckle them to give a proper tension and shape of canoe.Q. Are there different colors to choose from?A. No. MyCanoe will be available with only one color - white w/ aqua blue print.Q. Does the paddle float?A. Yes, the oars in MyCanoe Plus are buoyant and will float.Q. How do I attach stabilizers?A. Inflate about 70% and attach it using the built-in buckles. Finish inflation and tighten the buckles. Manufacturing UpdatesWe've already started ordering materials and parts and assembling canoes.

story:
This is a campaign to capture the "classic" cars that have not been restored and are sitting in their final resting place, an auto graveyard, cornfield, barn etc. 

I will capture the clean, rusted detail of these vehicles, not just their whole beauty, but their small details, emblems etc. These will be beautiful art pieces ready for various types of printing and framing or just the book by itself would be beautiful on a coffee table or business. The vehicle in the picture above of course is fully restored and the pictures of the vehicles I will be taking are just the opposite.

I am a freelance photographer and have been dreaming about this project for some time. Usually I am photographing concerts for various outlets, photographing events for our local paper, and some newer car commercial stuff, I am very excited to be hopefully doing this with the older cars.

I live in the midwest, and will be driving to the southern states to find and capture these beauties as they rest, once great machines and if restored some worth hundreds of thousands of dollars now lay rusting away.

Typically I capture new vehicles, but do not want people to forget about the older classics and how they meant something to someone at one time....

This campaign if fully funded will allow me to rent a car, drive the 600 or so miles to the southern states and spend a little time searching for these classic machines and capturing their great detail

The perks would be perfect for a gift for that old car lover. This book will be a beautiful coffee table book filled with these old creatures. The perks will range from prints to a 10x8 Hardcover Coffee Table Book.

Please if you cannot help financially share this campaign and that will be help enough :)

Note, if this campaign is not fully funded no money is transferred, so there is no risk for your kind donation.

Feel free to check out my Facebook page and my web-site

Thanks for your time, George

www.strohlphotography.com

www.facebook.com/strohlphotography

story:
It all started with a scorched table.  

My family lives all around the world, so when my dad visited my brother Malek in Ivory Coast, they decided to have a barbecue to celebrate. Because there was no grill at hand, my father improvised on the spot and created his own Do-It-Yourself grill. The dinner was delicious, but as a result of grilling on the table, the table-top was scorched and ruined. Fortunately, the story didn't end there... After the incident, my father decided to work on a solution. After many trials and errors, his prototypes became my inspiration to create UNA Grill, the table-top charcoal grill to carry anywhere.

 

Family gathering in Frankfurt, Germany, during the exhibition at Ambiente 2017.

story:
What is Wanderluster?

Wanderluster offers premium luggage and travel gadgets hire service for people who want to go on a trip for the purpose both of leisure and business. You can rent us a premium luggage as well as the other essential travel gadgets such as SLR cameras, Polaroid, GoPro, selfie sticks, WiFi Devices, etc. Though those equipment cost a lot when you buy one, we are planning to provide them with affordable price so that you can travel without any hassle.


Why Wanderluster?

Wanderluster is here to give you a perfect vacation. It will get you prepared for travel in the quickest way ever. Discover the benefits of renting travel luggage and gadgets.

·  Airline approved bags

Wanderluster offers luggage, which fits most airline requirements (British airways, Easyjet, Lufthansa, Ryanair) to save you the trouble at airports.

·  Track Your Luggage

The fear of losing your bags in transit or at the airports will not haunt you anymore. We rent the location tracker with the luggage to make your travel hassle-free.

·  More Storage space

Your storage spaces at home can now be put to better use! The big pieces of luggage will now be our responsibility to maintain and store.


·  Be prepared to travel anytime

With Wanderluster you can now be prepared to travel whenever you want. One platform that offers all you need before venturing out for a perfect vacation or business trip.


·  Better Protection

The luggage provided by Wanderluster is all hard case, which protects your belongings in a better way. The damage is minimized due to the high quality of our products.

How it works

                                                   


Our Goal on Indiegogo

We aim to raise £9500 to make this service come to life. The fund will go to:

                        

Perks:

                                      

                                     

                                     

                                      

                                     

                                     

                                       

                                       


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, you can still support by:

  • Tell about the campaign to your friends and family.
  • Share it through Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Instagram
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word.

We need you. We need your support.

FAQ

Q1. How about the hygiene of items?

  As for luggage, in order to keep its quality, we will ask customers to use packing cube to maintain the hygiene of inside and a luggage cover to protect the surface of them. We guarantee that we constantly check and clean luggage as well as the other items to be the best quality for all the time.

Q2. What if luggage is damaged?

  For the minor damages such as scratch on its surface, we will not ask customers to compensate for it. If it is a serious damage such as large scratch or the breakdown of wheels, we would ask compensation if it is caused by customers. However, if it is due to airline companies or any of the other services which customers use, we will talk to them so that customers do not need to pay for it.

Q3. How long does it take from ordering to receiving items?

  It usually takes 3 to 5 working days to deliver them. In addition to standard delivery service, we are planning to offer fast track delivery, which requires customers to pay extra fees. Though we aim to dispatch items as soon as possible, we would recommend customers to order well in advance.

Q4. How and by when should I return items?

  The delivery charge is included in our price, so customers can simply pack, put the label which is provided by us on it, and send them back to us. We would ask customers to dispatch items within 3 days after their trip. After receiving, we will check the condition of items and send the notification of receiving for them via email.

Q5. How much deposit do I need to pay?

  It depends on your chosen items and total amount, so we will provide the information when you order.


Meet Our Team


We are 6 passionate MSc students at Cass Business School from across the globe. As a team, we want to change the conventional ways of preparing for travel, making it easier, more secure, and less of a hassle. 

 We are explorers ourselves, but it's a nightmare for each of us to prepare for travel. Therefore, the problems faced by us, prompted us to start this company and find solutions to the various problems before travel. The hassle before travel will be a thing of the past now.

story:
Für deutschen Text und Video hier klicken

Oder einfach nach unten scrollen



Maybe you know that: you are in a hurry and you park your car just for a moment anywhere you find a space – and you miss the clearway sign. Even though you only went away for some minutes, the tow truck has already arrived. That can cost you a pretty penny. Don't you think it would be great if there was a simple and affordable solution to that expensive problem? What if your car could just call you when it is in the way? With your help this will be possible soon.


About me - Daniel Kalliontzis

Did you know that in Hamburg, Germany, there are more than 40,000 cars each year that are towed away due to parking violations? That is annoying and expensive for car owners – and it's a problem for every driver in large cities. I grew up in Stuttgart, a large city in southern Germany. 


Now I live and work in the banking metropolis Frankfurt / Main in central Germany. Therefore I know that problem very well from my own experience. 

When my car was towed away once, I asked myself: Is that really necessary? To me, a freelancing IT consultant and passionate nerd, the answer to that question was a real challenge. There had to be a technical solution to that problem. I have always been annoyed by the sometimes too quick towing jobs in some major cities in Germany. Therefore a way out of that dilemma was of particular importance to me. 

That is why I tinkered and puzzled until my idea of the TowStop became ready for everyday use. Now it shall find its way into everyday life and maybe it will protect your vehicle from being towed away.


And that is how it works

You can attach your TowStop to the windshield pretty easily with its suction cups. Then, activate it and it is ready to use. Now you can hurry to care for your urgent issues. You don't need to worry about a tow service getting your car because you missed a clearway sign.



I can attach the TowStop simply by sticking it to my windshield with its suctions cups? Is it really that simple? Yes, it is! You can stick it to the windshield like a mobile navigation system and remove it without a trace afterwards whenever you want.


Once sticking to the windshield, the TowStop can be activated by the police by a simple touch. TowStop will then deliver a message to the police via its display about how quick you will be able to remove the car. 


TowStop works similar to a mobile phone. Thus, you only need to send the message you want it to show by SMS. If, for example, you send a message like „I will be back in 2 minutes“ to your TowStop, it will inform the police accordingly via its display. You need to send that SMS for programming the message only once. Afterwards, the programmed message is shown every time.  By sending a new SMS to you TowStop you can change the message whenever you want.


When activated by the police, the TowStop is not only delivering your message to the police, it also calls you to inform you that you must remove your car as quickly as possible. Therefore you just have to program your number into the device.


Via a mini USB connection you can recharge the device easily. You can use that connection for software updates, too. That makes updates quick and comfortable.


But will the police use my TowStop anyway?

What if you have a TowStop in your car but the police does not use it? In fact, law in Germany says that an officer has to choose the most efficient and inexpensive way for the car owner to remove the vehicle. And to call the driver to let him or her remove the car is not only cheaper. Usually, it is also a lot quicker than a tow service. So, seen from the judicial point of view, the TowStop is the best alternative.

The TowStop has a red edging. That is why the police will have no trouble to find it quickly. Also, the lettering says in round terms what you have to do when you want the car to be removed. It is as easy as it can get.
However, not only the police can use TowStop. It is also helpful if you park your car in front of a gateway or you block another car from driving away.

The advantages of TowStop

Everybody whose car has ever been towed away knows the high costs and the hassle. Due to its low purchase price TowStop repays already on the first occasion in which it is used. So, if you need a parking space in a crowded city quite often TowStop will repay soon. The operating costs are extremely low as well: You only need a prepaid SIM card. You need to charge this card only once as you will not have a chat with TowStop when it is calling you.


Another advantage of this little helper in everyday life is that police has to use it according to existing law in Germany. That is why you can rely on your TowStop.


Moreover, you are free to choose any phone number you like to program it to your TowStop. You only need to program that number and from that moment on you will get a call when you must remove your vehicle. The number can be changed easily.

Sometimes technical solutions are difficult to apply. But that is not true for the TowStop. You stick it to the windshield and that's it. You don't need any tools and you don't need to make any alterations to your car either. You can use TowStop in every car - even in rentals.


Let's keep in touch


Timetable


Early Bird Perks


Perks


Stretch Goal

GPS Extension

You are already thrilled by TowStop? Maybe soon it will be capable of even more services! Help us to reach an amount of 300,000€. Then the tow protection for your vehicle will get a GPS module with no extra costs. 


A GPS module would put an end to endless searches for your car on huge parking lots or streets of unfamiliar cities. Have we parked the car in the second or third crossroad, left hand or right hand? Did we park in section F or G? With a GPS module for your TowStop you will never ask those questions again. Even if your car has been stolen, the GPS function is quite useful. Simply send a SMS to TowStop in your vehicle and it will send back its current position.


You have missed TowStop your whole life? Then please support us and our useful device on the way into your everyday life!


Deutsche Version

AbschleppStopp – Teures Problem, günstige Lösung



Nie wieder abgeschleppt werden: 
Hier kommt DIE Lösung - günstig, einfach und genial



Wahrscheinlich kennen Sie diese Situation: Sie haben es eilig, stellen Ihr Fahrzeug nur kurz ab – und übersehen das Halteverbot. Schnell ist dann der Abschleppdienst da, auch wenn Sie nur wenige Minuten weg waren. Und das kann teuer werden. Wäre es nicht schön, wenn es eine einfache Lösung für dieses teure Problem gäbe? Was, wenn Ihr Fahrzeug Sie ganz einfach anrufen könnte, damit Sie es sofort entfernen? Das ist vielleicht bald möglich!


Über mich - Daniel Kalliontzis

Wussten Sie, dass allein in Hamburg jedes Jahr mehr als 40.000 Autos abgeschleppt werden? Das ist ärgerlich und teuer - und in vielen Großstädten ein Problem für Autofahrer. 

Ich stamme selbst aus Stuttgart, lebe und arbeite heute in Frankfurt am Main. Deshalb kenne ich das Problem aus eigener Erfahrung, denn auch mein Wagen wurde schon abgeschleppt. 


Da ärgert man sich und fragt sich: Muss das wirklich sein? Als freiberuflicher IT-Berater und leidenschaftlicher Bastler war die Antwort auf diese Frage eine Herausforderung, auf die es eine technische Lösung geben musste. 

Ein Weg aus dem Dilemma lag mir schon deshalb am Herzen, weil mich die mitunter sehr flotte Abschlepperei in deutschen Innenstädten schon immer ärgerte. Deshalb habe ich 3 Jahre gebastelt und getüftelt bis aus der Idee des AbschleppStopps ein alltagstaugliches Gerät wurde. Nun soll es Einzug halten in den Straßenverkehr und vielleicht auch Ihren Wagen vor dem Abschleppen schützen.


Und so einfach funktioniert es

Der AbschleppStopp lässt sich ganz einfach an der Windschutzscheibe mit Saugnäpfen befestigen. Aktivieren. Fertig. Schon können Sie losflitzen und Ihre eilige Erledigung machen. Dabei müssen Sie keine Angst vor dem Abschlepper haben, weil Sie vielleicht ein Parkverbot übersehen haben.


Den AbschleppStopp einfach an die Scheibe kleben? So einfach ist das? 
Ja, das ist es tatsächlich. Sie können das kleine Gerät wie ein Navigationsgerät einfach mit den Saugnäpfen befestigen und spurlos wieder ablösen.


Einmal befestigt, informiert das Display des AbschleppStopp Polizei oder Ordnungsbeamte mit einem beliebigen Text, wie schnell Sie wieder an Ihrem Fahrzeug sind. Dafür genügt es, einmal den Text als SMS an das Gerät zu schicken. 


Der AbschleppStopp funktioniert ähnlich wie ein Handy. Schicken Sie zum Beispiel die Nachricht „Bin in in 2 Minuten wieder da“, informiert es die Ordnungshüter entsprechend über den Display. 


Diese SMS müssen Sie nur einmal programmieren. Ändern können Sie die Nachricht an die Ordnungshüter jederzeit mit einer neuen SMS.

Sobald der AbschleppStopp von der Polizei ausgelöst wurde, zeigt er nicht nur Ihre Nachricht auf dem Display an, sondern informiert Sie gleichzeitig über Ihr Handy, dass Sie Ihr Fahrzeug umgehend entfernen sollen. Dazu ruft er ganz einfach jede beliebige Nummer an, die Sie dafür programmieren.

Über einen Mini USB-Anschluss lässt sich das Gerät außerdem immer wieder aufladen. Auch die Software kann über diesen Anschluss schnell und einfach aktualisiert werden.


Wird AbschleppStopp von der Polizei überhaupt benutzt?

Was, wenn Sie den AbschleppStopp im Auto haben und der Beamte nutzt es nicht? Tatsächlich besagt die deutsche Rechtslage, dass der Beamte oder die Beamtin den günstigsten Weg für den Fahrzeughalter wählen muss, um das Fahrzeug zu entfernen. Den Fahrer zu rufen und das Auto entfernen zu lassen, ist nicht nur deutlich günstiger. In der Regel ist es auch deutlich schneller als ein Abschleppdienst. Im Sinne der Verhältnismäßigkeit ist der AbschleppStopp also die rechtlich favorisierte Alternative.


Der AbschleppStopp ist durch seine rote Umrandung gut zu erkennen. Die Beschriftung sagt unmissverständlich aus, was zu tun ist, wenn das Auto entfernt werden soll. Einfacher geht es nicht.
Doch nicht nur die Polizei oder das Ordnungsamt kann den AbschleppStopp benutzen. Das Gerät ist auch hilfreich, wenn Sie vor einer Einfahrt stehen oder ein anderes Fahrzeug blockieren.

Die Pluspunkte des AbschleppStopp

Wer schon einmal abgeschleppt wurde, weiß, was das kostet und wie aufwändig es ist. Durch seinen niedrigen Anschaffungspreis macht sich der AbschleppStopp deshalb schon nach einem einzigen Einsatz bezahlt. Wenn Sie also oft in Innenstädten unterwegs sind, kann sich der AbschleppStopp sehr bald lohnen.

Auch die Betriebskosten sind extrem günstig: Sie brauchen nur eine Prepaid SIM-Karte. Diese laden Sie einmal auf und schon kann es losgehen. Da Sie Anrufe Ihres AbschleppStopps nicht annehmen, muss die Karte auch nur ein einziges Mal aufgeladen werden.
Ein weiterer Vorteil dieses kleinen Helfers: Die Polizei muss ihn nach geltender Rechtslage benutzen. Sie können sich also auf Ihren Abschlepp-Schutzengel verlassen.


Unter welcher Nummer Ihr AbschleppStopp Sie alarmieren soll, können Sie völlig frei wählen. Geben Sie einfach die Nummer Ihres Handys oder auch des Festnetzes ein und Sie erhalten auf diese Nummer den Anruf, wenn Ihr Fahrzeug entfernt werden soll.

Manche technische Lösungen sind in der Installation recht kompliziert. Nicht so der AbschleppStopp. Einfach mit den Saugnäpfen an der Scheibe befestigen. Fertig. Sie benötigen weder Werkzeug, noch müssen Sie Modifikationen an Ihrem Fahrzeug vornehmen. So können Sie den AbschleppStopp auch für mehrere Fahrzeuge verwenden.


Let's keep in touch


Zeitplan


Early Bird Deals


Die Deals


Stretch Goal

GPS Erweiterung
Sie sind jetzt schon vom AbschleppStopp begeistert? Vielleicht kann er aber bald noch mehr! Helfen Sie uns dabei, den Betrag von 300.000€ zu erreichen. Dann wird der kleine Schutzengel für Ihr Fahrzeug ein GPS-Modul erhalten. Damit hat das Suchen auf riesigen Parkplätzen und verwinkelten Straßen fremder Städte endlich ein Ende. War es jetzt die zweite oder dritte Querstraße, recht oder links? Standen wir jetzt in Abschnitt F oder G? Mit dem GPS-Modul des AbschleppStopp ließen sich diese Fragen ruckzuck beantworten. 

Auch wenn Ihr Fahrzeug gestohlen wurde, ist die GPS-Funktion hilfreich. Senden Sie Ihrem Fahrzeug einfach eine SMS auf sein AbschleppStopp und dieser schickt Ihnen seinen aktuellen Standort zurück.


Sie haben AbschleppStopp schon immer vermisst? Dann unterstützen Sie jetzt dieses nützliche Gerät auf dem Weg in Ihren Alltag!
story_txt:
Für deutschen Text und Video hier klicken 
Oder einfach nach unten scrollen

Maybe you know that: you are in a hurry and you park your car just for a moment anywhere you find a space – and you miss the clearway sign. Even though you only went away for some minutes, the tow truck has already arrived. That can cost you a pretty penny. Don't you think it would be great if there was a simple and affordable solution to that expensive problem? What if your car could just call you when it is in the way? With your help this will be possible soon.About me - Daniel Kalliontzis

Did you know that in
Hamburg, Germany, there are more than 40,000 cars each year
that are towed away due to parking violations? That is annoying and
expensive for car owners – and it's a problem for every driver
in large cities. I grew up in Stuttgart, a large city in
southern Germany. Now I live and work in the banking metropolis Frankfurt / Main in central Germany. Therefore I know that problem
very well from my own experience. When my car was towed away
once, I asked myself: Is that really necessary? To
me, a freelancing IT consultant and passionate nerd, the answer to
that question was a real challenge. There had to be a technical
solution to that problem. I have always been annoyed by the sometimes
too quick towing jobs in some major cities in Germany. Therefore a way
out of that dilemma was of particular importance to me. That is why I
tinkered and puzzled  until my idea of the TowStop became ready for everyday use. Now it shall find its way into everyday life and
maybe it will protect your vehicle from being towed away.And that is how it worksYou can attach your TowStop to the windshield pretty easily with its suction cups. Then, activate it and it is ready to use. Now you can hurry to care for your urgent issues. You don't need to worry about a tow service getting your car because you missed a clearway sign.

I can attach the TowStop simply by sticking it to my windshield with its suctions cups? Is it really that simple? Yes, it is! You can stick it to the windshield like a mobile navigation system and remove it without a trace afterwards whenever you want.


Once sticking to the windshield, the TowStop can be activated by the police by a simple touch. TowStop will then deliver a message to the police via its display about how quick you will be able to remove the car. 




TowStop works similar to a mobile phone. Thus, you only need to send the message you want it to show by SMS. If, for example, you send a message like „I will be back in 2 minutes“ to your TowStop, it will inform the police accordingly via its display. You need to send that SMS for programming the message only once. Afterwards, the programmed message is shown every time.  By sending a new SMS to you TowStop you can change the message whenever you want.


When activated by the police, the TowStop is not only delivering your message to the police, it also calls you to inform you that you must remove your car as quickly as possible. Therefore you just have to program your number into the device.


Via a mini USB connection you can recharge the device easily. You can use that connection for software updates, too. That makes updates quick and comfortable.


But will the police use my TowStop anyway?
What if you have a TowStop in your car but the police does not use it? In fact, law in Germany says that an officer has to choose the most efficient and inexpensive way for the car owner to remove the vehicle. And to call the driver to let him or her remove the car is not only cheaper. Usually, it is also a lot quicker than a tow service. So, seen from the judicial point of view, the TowStop is the best alternative.



The TowStop has a red edging. That is why the police will have no trouble to find it quickly. Also, the lettering says in round terms what you have to do when you want the car to be removed. It is as easy as it can get.

However, not only the police can use TowStop. It is also helpful if you park your car in front of a gateway or you block another car from driving away.

The advantages of TowStop

Everybody whose car has ever been towed away knows the high costs and the hassle. Due to its low purchase price TowStop repays already on the first occasion in which it is used. So, if you need a parking space in a crowded city quite often TowStop will repay soon. The operating costs are extremely low as well: You only need a prepaid SIM card. You need to charge this card only once as you will not have a chat with TowStop when it is calling you.




Another advantage of this little helper in everyday life is that police has to use it according to existing law in Germany. That is why you can rely on your TowStop.


Moreover, you are free to choose any phone number you like to program it to your TowStop. You only need to program that number and from that moment on you will get a call when you must remove your vehicle. The number can be changed easily.
Sometimes technical solutions are difficult to apply. But that is not true for the TowStop. You stick it to the windshield and that's it. You don't need any tools and you don't need to make any alterations to your car either. You can use TowStop in every car - even in rentals.

Let's keep in touch







Timetable


Early Bird Perks






Perks




Stretch Goal
GPS Extension
You are already thrilled by TowStop? Maybe soon it will be capable of even more services! Help us to reach an amount of 300,000€. Then the tow protection for your vehicle will get a GPS module with no extra costs. 



A GPS module would put an end to endless searches for your car on huge parking lots or streets of unfamiliar cities. Have we parked the car in the second or third crossroad, left hand or right hand? Did we park in section F or G? With a GPS module for your TowStop you will never ask those questions again. Even if your car has been stolen, the GPS function is quite useful. Simply send a SMS to TowStop in your vehicle and it will send back its current position.

You have missed TowStop your whole life? Then please support us and our useful device on the way into your everyday life!



Deutsche Version
AbschleppStopp – Teures Problem, günstige Lösung



Nie wieder abgeschleppt werden: Hier kommt DIE Lösung - günstig, einfach und genial
Wahrscheinlich kennen Sie diese Situation: Sie haben es eilig, stellen Ihr Fahrzeug nur kurz ab – und übersehen das Halteverbot. Schnell ist dann der Abschleppdienst da, auch wenn Sie nur wenige Minuten weg waren. Und das kann teuer werden. Wäre es nicht schön, wenn es eine einfache Lösung für dieses teure Problem gäbe? Was, wenn Ihr Fahrzeug Sie ganz einfach anrufen könnte, damit Sie es sofort entfernen? Das ist vielleicht bald möglich!Über mich - Daniel Kalliontzis

Wussten Sie, dass allein in Hamburg
jedes Jahr mehr als 40.000 Autos abgeschleppt werden? Das ist
ärgerlich und teuer - und in vielen Großstädten ein Problem für
Autofahrer. Ich stamme selbst aus Stuttgart, lebe und arbeite heute
in Frankfurt am Main. Deshalb kenne ich das Problem aus eigener
Erfahrung, denn auch mein Wagen wurde schon abgeschleppt. Da ärgert
man sich und fragt sich: Muss das wirklich sein? Als freiberuflicher
IT-Berater und leidenschaftlicher Bastler war die Antwort auf diese
Frage eine Herausforderung, auf die es eine technische Lösung geben
musste. Ein Weg aus dem Dilemma lag mir schon deshalb am Herzen, weil
mich die mitunter sehr flotte Abschlepperei in deutschen Innenstädten
schon immer ärgerte. Deshalb habe ich 3 Jahre gebastelt und
getüftelt bis aus der Idee des AbschleppStopps ein alltagstaugliches
Gerät wurde. Nun soll es Einzug halten in den Straßenverkehr und
vielleicht auch Ihren Wagen vor dem Abschleppen schützen.Und so einfach funktioniert esDer AbschleppStopp lässt sich ganz einfach an der Windschutzscheibe mit Saugnäpfen befestigen. Aktivieren. Fertig. Schon können Sie losflitzen und Ihre eilige Erledigung machen. Dabei müssen Sie keine Angst vor dem Abschlepper haben, weil Sie vielleicht ein Parkverbot übersehen haben.




Den AbschleppStopp einfach an die Scheibe kleben? So einfach ist das? Ja, das ist es tatsächlich. Sie können das kleine Gerät wie ein Navigationsgerät einfach mit den Saugnäpfen befestigen und spurlos wieder ablösen.




Einmal befestigt, informiert das Display des AbschleppStopp Polizei oder Ordnungsbeamte mit einem beliebigen Text, wie schnell Sie wieder an Ihrem Fahrzeug sind. Dafür genügt es, einmal den Text als SMS an das Gerät zu schicken. 



Der AbschleppStopp funktioniert ähnlich wie ein Handy. Schicken Sie zum Beispiel die Nachricht „Bin in in 2 Minuten wieder da“, informiert es die Ordnungshüter entsprechend über den Display. 



Diese SMS müssen Sie nur einmal programmieren. Ändern können Sie die Nachricht an die Ordnungshüter jederzeit mit einer neuen SMS.
Sobald der AbschleppStopp von der Polizei ausgelöst wurde, zeigt er nicht nur Ihre Nachricht auf dem Display an, sondern informiert Sie gleichzeitig über Ihr Handy, dass Sie Ihr Fahrzeug umgehend entfernen sollen. Dazu ruft er ganz einfach jede beliebige Nummer an, die Sie dafür programmieren.



Über einen Mini USB-Anschluss lässt sich das Gerät außerdem immer wieder aufladen. Auch die Software kann über diesen Anschluss schnell und einfach aktualisiert werden.


Wird AbschleppStopp von der Polizei überhaupt benutzt?
Was, wenn Sie den AbschleppStopp im Auto haben und der Beamte nutzt es nicht? Tatsächlich besagt die deutsche Rechtslage, dass der Beamte oder die Beamtin den günstigsten Weg für den Fahrzeughalter wählen muss, um das Fahrzeug zu entfernen. Den Fahrer zu rufen und das Auto entfernen zu lassen, ist nicht nur deutlich günstiger. In der Regel ist es auch deutlich schneller als ein Abschleppdienst. Im Sinne der Verhältnismäßigkeit ist der AbschleppStopp also die rechtlich favorisierte Alternative.



Der AbschleppStopp ist durch seine rote Umrandung gut zu erkennen. Die Beschriftung sagt unmissverständlich aus, was zu tun ist, wenn das Auto entfernt werden soll. Einfacher geht es nicht.

Doch nicht nur die Polizei oder das Ordnungsamt kann den AbschleppStopp benutzen. Das Gerät ist auch hilfreich, wenn Sie vor einer Einfahrt stehen oder ein anderes Fahrzeug blockieren.



Die Pluspunkte des AbschleppStoppWer schon einmal abgeschleppt wurde, weiß, was das kostet und wie aufwändig es ist. Durch seinen niedrigen Anschaffungspreis macht sich der AbschleppStopp deshalb schon nach einem einzigen Einsatz bezahlt. Wenn Sie also oft in Innenstädten unterwegs sind, kann sich der AbschleppStopp sehr bald lohnen.



Auch die Betriebskosten sind extrem günstig: Sie brauchen nur eine Prepaid SIM-Karte. Diese laden Sie einmal auf und schon kann es losgehen. Da Sie Anrufe Ihres AbschleppStopps nicht annehmen, muss die Karte auch nur ein einziges Mal aufgeladen werden.
Ein weiterer Vorteil dieses kleinen Helfers: Die Polizei muss ihn nach geltender Rechtslage benutzen. Sie können sich also auf Ihren Abschlepp-Schutzengel verlassen.



Unter welcher Nummer Ihr AbschleppStopp Sie alarmieren soll, können Sie völlig frei wählen. Geben Sie einfach die Nummer Ihres Handys oder auch des Festnetzes ein und Sie erhalten auf diese Nummer den Anruf, wenn Ihr Fahrzeug entfernt werden soll.

Manche technische Lösungen sind in der Installation recht kompliziert. Nicht so der AbschleppStopp. Einfach mit den Saugnäpfen an der Scheibe befestigen. Fertig. Sie benötigen weder Werkzeug, noch müssen Sie Modifikationen an Ihrem Fahrzeug vornehmen. So können Sie den AbschleppStopp auch für mehrere Fahrzeuge verwenden.


Let's keep in touch







Zeitplan




Early Bird Deals





Die Deals







Stretch Goal
GPS Erweiterung
Sie sind jetzt schon vom AbschleppStopp begeistert? Vielleicht kann er aber bald noch mehr! Helfen Sie uns dabei, den Betrag von 300.000€ zu erreichen. Dann wird der kleine Schutzengel für Ihr Fahrzeug ein GPS-Modul erhalten. Damit hat das Suchen auf riesigen Parkplätzen und verwinkelten Straßen fremder Städte endlich ein Ende. War es jetzt die zweite oder dritte Querstraße, recht oder links? Standen wir jetzt in Abschnitt F oder G? Mit dem GPS-Modul des AbschleppStopp ließen sich diese Fragen ruckzuck beantworten. 




Auch wenn Ihr Fahrzeug gestohlen wurde, ist die GPS-Funktion hilfreich. Senden Sie Ihrem Fahrzeug einfach eine SMS auf sein AbschleppStopp und dieser schickt Ihnen seinen aktuellen Standort zurück.Sie haben AbschleppStopp schon immer vermisst? Dann unterstützen Sie jetzt dieses nützliche Gerät auf dem Weg in Ihren Alltag!

story:
About the Bluff Creek Project:

The Bluff Creek Project is an open-source volunteer project initially formed to locate the original Patterson-Gimlin Bigfoot film site. It consists of several project contributors who volunteered their time and gas money to complete the mountains of field work needed to confirm the site's location. We have been researching the area formally on foot since 2009. Recently, during the summer of 2011, we successfully located the original film site and completed a detailed survey of the surviving monuments and trees. This survey has been an enormous contribution to the Bigfoot research community and can now be used to exact dimensional data from the film and make accurate measurement of the creature's pathway and size.

Trail camera survey:

The trail camera project was launched in July of 2012, and successfully raised enough money to purchase four high-end trail cameras. We committed all of our personal trail cameras to the project as well, for a total of nine cameras installed at the site. The cameras were installed in late October 2012 on the 45th anniversary of the film. The cameras spent seven months in total down at the film site, capturing the movements of Bluff Creek's inhabitants. We had a few camera failures, but all of the newly purchased cameras performed flawlessly.

We have learned many lessons and fought several battles to pull off the project. We captured hundreds of videos of bears, deer, and a cougar. I hope to publish a small research paper containing the findings and data after the completion of a total of one year of deployment of the cameras. We think that the summer and fall months are the most active for the area and wish to include them in the paper. After all, "Patty" was filmed in the PGF in late October, with reported activity preceding that in August, yet we didn't install the cameras until late October.

What we need:

We would like to continue the trail camera project over the winter of 2013/2014, and have a few needs for our continued success. We would like to raise enough money to purchase a couple new cameras, some bear-safe camera housings, and fresh batteries for the other cameras we currently have. We had amazing success with the 2012 Bushnell Trophy Cam, and wish to purchase new 2013 models.


A list of their features can be viewed here:

http://bushnell.com

The current price on Amazon.com for all items needed is:

$223.35  - Trophy can HD Max
$31.99  - Bear box for cameras
$20.37  - 32gb SD memory card
$22.99  - 12pk of Energizer lithium batteries

We intend this trail camera survey to be an open-source project, where all media and data is published immediately after collection for all the world to see. The main problem with similar camera projects is that all media and data is subject to strict non-disclosure agreements and stipulations. This is to protect any cash value associated with a potential Bigfoot image or video. We believe as a team that the commercialization of such a project is fundamentally unscientific. As a premise for the camera project we will practice full transparency during the entirety of the project. All videos and photos of any note will be published immediately after they are collected. They will be offered freely on the internet for non-commercial use for anyone who wants to use them for their own research. Any commercial use of the videos that results in a cash profit will be invested back into the Bluff Creek Project for use in the next season’s efforts.

While the subject of Bigfoot is quite controversial, it is still an enigma that captures the interest of people worldwide. The possible existence of such a creature is highly debated and subjected to constant skepticism from all sides. It is our opinion that if Bigfoot exists it is a physical, biological animal, and not paranormal in nature. Any animal that is real can be photographed and caught on video. Modern trail cameras are very high resolution and can take clear HD video of any animal that triggers the sensor. Such cameras have proven to be a valuable asset to any biological study of rare animals.

Contributors making sizable donations covering whole units will have the option of receiving back the used camera unit after this coming winter of 2013-2014. It is, however, encouraged that you contribute the camera to next year’s project. We will ship the camera to you after June 2013 when we retrieve the cameras. Any leftover cameras and materials will be put to use for the next overwinter season. There is of course the possibility that the camera will be damaged or stolen during the course of its use. This is unlikely due to the remoteness of the area and the roads being closed for the duration of the winter.

All contributors will have their name cited in the accompanying summary paper of the project. If you wish to remain anonymous please indicate so in a private message.

We also will be accepting physical donations of equipment and gear. Please contact one of the members of the project if you have some equipment to offer. We could use some old trail cameras, audio recorders, night-vision, binoculars, video cameras, etc. All donations are non-refundable. We do not expect an image of a Bigfoot creature as a result of this project (though that would be great!). We do however expect lots of HD video of local wildlife including bears, deer, elk, and cougar.

story:
LIGHT WATER is designed to be the best automatic water filter for outdoor enthusiasts, easily solving the problem of using clean and safe water outdoors. With advanced safety filtration technology and light weight design, LIGHT WATER is perfect for camping, hiking, biking, climbing, backpacking, hunting, skiing, or any other outdoor activity you like.

 

LIGHT WATER weighs 220 grams ( M-brand weighs 439 grams), is portable and handy in pockets, bags, purses or backpacks, unburdening heavy bottled water. Due to its lightweight and versatility, LIGHT WATER is the perfect device to purify water from the nearest streams, puddles, or ponds for outdoor activities.

LIGHT WATER is the world's first portable automatic outdoor water purification device. Just press the switch twice and LIGHT WATER will automatically filter the water for you. No pump/press or any wait for the chemicals to work and you will save time for more outdoor enjoyment. 

The super power provided by LIGHT WATER and high accuracy of FLEX-FLITER make the entire water purification process faster and more efficient. It can easily purify 9L of water in 10 minutes. It is no longer difficult to bathe and cook outdoors with clean water. It can easily solve water problems for more than 3 people on camping. 

Comprehensive protection is achievable by removing all waterborne pathogens (viruses, bacteria, protozoan cysts), heavy metals, and even microplastics with advanced safety filtration technology. The FLEX-FILTER can also be used separately to meet your lighter requirements. 

Backwash with clean water to ensure safer and longer service. No need to disassemble, no other tools, just press the switch, LIGHT WATER will automatically clean the filter for you. 

If you're more concerned about the weight and volume of your water purifier, we recommend the LIGHT WATER mini. If you care more about water quality and need higher filtration accuracy, we recommend FLEX-FILTER PRO.  We’ve found that the biggest problem with the filter element currently on the market is that it is easy to block, and once it is blocked, the entire filter element needs to be replaced, and the cost is high. 

But FLEX-FILTER PRO is different. The split design not only solves such problems, but also greatly improves the utilization rate of the filter element and reduces the cost of parts replacement. And every FLEX-FILTER PRO will be paired with a replaceable adapter. 

In addition to the original FLEXTAILGEAR filter element, LIGHT WATER can also be used with other brands of filter elements (eg lifestraw, sawyer, etc.）

FLEXTAILGEAR was established by four graduates from the same university, who share the same interest and aim. We are a team of experienced outdoor & adventure enthusiasts who are so passionate about outdoor activities. We want to share our ideas with everyone in the world who loves life and nature! Therefore, we decided to devote ourselves to invent some outdoor gears. We aim at designing more practical outdoor products that enable people to experience a comfortable& safe outdoor living and enjoy their leisure time.

Nothing is easy for product development. There’re always ups and downs. We don’t fear failure but rather fear not trying. Never give up, keep going and savoring the journey is always our goal! And after 2 years, we are so excited and extremely pleased to present to you our latest product – LIGHT WATER - you’re gonna love it!Make sure you enjoy your next outdoor adventure with LIGHT WATER!

It can easily solve water problems for more than 3 people on camping. Comprehensive protection is achievable by removing all waterborne pathogens (viruses, bacteria, protozoan cysts), heavy metals, and even microplastics with advanced safety filtration technology. The FLEX-FILTER can also be used separately to meet your lighter requirements. Backwash with clean water to ensure safer and longer service. No need to disassemble, no other tools, just press the switch, LIGHT WATER will automatically clean the filter for you.   If you're more concerned about the weight and volume of your water purifier, we recommend the LIGHT WATER mini. If you care more about water quality and need higher filtration accuracy, we recommend FLEX-FILTER PRO.       We’ve found that the biggest problem with the filter element currently on the market is that it is easy to block, and once it is blocked, the entire filter element needs to be replaced, and the cost is high. But FLEX-FILTER PRO is different. The split design not only solves such problems, but also greatly improves the utilization rate of the filter element and reduces the cost of parts replacement. And every FLEX-FILTER PRO will be paired with a replaceable adapter.  In addition to the original FLEXTAILGEAR filter element, LIGHT WATER can also be used with other brands of filter elements (eg lifestraw, sawyer, etc.）     FLEXTAILGEAR was established by four graduates from the same university, who share the same interest and aim. We are a team of experienced outdoor & adventure enthusiasts who are so passionate about outdoor activities. We want to share our ideas with everyone in the world who loves life and nature! Therefore, we decided to devote ourselves to invent some outdoor gears. We aim at designing more practical outdoor products that enable people to experience a comfortable& safe outdoor living and enjoy their leisure time.Nothing is easy for product development. There’re always ups and downs. We don’t fear failure but rather fear not trying. Never give up, keep going and savoring the journey is always our goal! And after 2 years, we are so excited and extremely pleased to present to you our latest product – LIGHT WATER - you’re gonna love it!Make sure you enjoy your next outdoor adventure with LIGHT WATER!

story:
What

This project is for developing a program to generate and use a Lossy Hash Table (LHT). A LHT is a time-memory trade-off for breaking unsalted or poorly salted password hashes. It is just a Hash Table (an indexed list of the full hashes and their corresponding passwords) but with missing information. The missing information is then brute forced. Normal settings are 3 bytes/password and under 100 ms. Any algorithm where you can use a Rainbow Table, you can use a Lossy Hash Table. The differences are Rainbow Tables take minutes and are probabilistic (99.9%) vs Lossy Hash Tables are "instant" and are deterministic (100%).

The generator will be able to generate the table in-place. This means you only need enough disk space to hold the final table.

All the code will be open source and licensed under aGPLv2/GPLv2.

How

The idea is to expand the Lossy Hash Table (LHT) I designed over a year ago to trillions of keys or passwords. You can see it in action with over 50 billion MD5ed passwords, takes about 10 to 100 milliseconds, and is only 119 GB (18.85 bits/password). That example can't scale very much since it took 800 GB of temporary disk to generate. LHTs are not magic, each bit/password stored cuts the search space in half. In the 50 billion MD5 database, there is an index that costs 1.85 bits/password which gets you down to only needing to brute force a few password ranges (four at most).

The only thing left is to finish the generalized version of the program that I wrote over a year ago. I've already written several hashing algorithms using SSE2, AVX, and XOP that can be used in LHTs (source for those are already available).

Video explaining the workflow of my Lossy Hash Table generator.

Here's a LHT calculator for figuring out settings, disk space, generation time, and hash processing time.

Who

There is one person involved in this project Steve Thomas. Steve is a programmer that likes math and cryptography.

Shot Glass Design

On a "lord shot glass" and should look like this:

story:
About Us

I am Becky Deadman and my wife, of almost 18 years, is Brenda St. Clair. After working most of our adult lives for corporate America, we are looking forward to a new chapter in our lives. We are looking forward to doing something that will make a difference in our lives and in the community.

What We Want 

We want to create a safe and comfortable vacation spot for LGBT families and their allies. Right now in Michigan there are very few LGBT campgrounds and they are only for those 18 years of age and older.  We want to change that.  We want to provide a campground for adults AND families with children.  A place that is fun, exciting and the first choice for everyone's vacation destination.

We want kids with LGBT parents to meet other kids in similar types of families, to be able to feel comfortable and free to play and have great experiences without discrimination. We want parents with LGBT kids to meet other parents with LGBT kids, to be able to create friendships and find support where needed and feel safe to express themselves.

We want the resort to be a judgment/discrimination free zone; a place where LGBT people can be themselves without fear of any kind.

And last but not least we want to partner with the community to educate and inform. 

How We Are Going to do it

With your help and generosity we will be able to buy a campground that has already been developed but not in operation for some time.  There are a lot of upgrades and repairs that need to be completed before it can re-open.  In the end we will create the best campground resort for LGBT families in Michigan. The amenities will include:

  • Tent campsites-rustic and water/electric
  • RV full hook-up
  • furnished cabins
  • shower facilities
  • game room
  • community event building
  • pavilions
  • playground
  • outdoor exercise park
  • pool
  • water park
  • basketball court
  • volley ball court
  • horseshoe pits
  • camp store
  • laundry facilities

What We Need & What You Get

We need to have a space for our community to gather, feel safe, comfortable and have a great time. 

Our community events center will be equipped to handle small intimate affairs as well as very large parties.  We will make our resort the one that everyone thinks of first to plan events, fundraisers, day camps etc.

We will partner with schools, non-profits, and community organizations in order to meet their needs as well as our own. 

The Impact

The Busy Bs' Campground Resort will be a great one of a kind place for LGBT families and friends to be free.  A place to make lasting memories, it will be a place where the community can come together to celebrate diversity educate one another and inform the world that we are here and deserve to be treated like everyone else.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute finacially you can still help us by spreading the word.  Share our campign with family, friends, co-workers, and anyone else that wants to make a difference. 

You can also be of help once the campground is purchased.  We will need a lot of people power to help get the camground up and running.  There will be lots of trees to move, lots of yardwork to complete, electrical and plumbing work to do and lot of other miscellaneous jobs.

story:
Meet SHARV - the Peer to Peer RV/caravan ride sharing platform (https://shar-v.com).

We plan to become the AirBnB of RV 

Our platform is:

  • Easy to use
  • Provider of convenient escape
  • Enabler of affordable holiday
  • Constantly developing

How it works

RV hosts, that share their vehicle with the travelers will earn money. Travelers, on the other hand get to enjoy an affordable cross country journey.

Enjoy the New Friendships

Through our platform, you'll not only experience a holiday of a lifetime, but you'll also meet new people and possibly form lifelong friendships.

RV Market

With the increasing RV and sharing economy market, we have a solid opportunity of crafting our success by placing our platform on the market as true pioneers of Peer to Peer RV ride sharing.

 

Roadmap

Support us!

With your help, we can truly become the AirBnB of RV sharing. Become part of our journey and be part of history by helping to develop a new form of peer to peer economy that we plan to become.

Thank you!

story:
What's Alpha Drone?

Alpha is brand-new drone with pocket circle-sized design. The whole dimension is only 3.4 inch (8.5 cm). it is easy to carry on when you are travel or on street. Works with the tech of G-sensor, intelligence voice control and 3D VR model, you can fly it as high as 120 m. all the technologies of Alpha drone makes the operation smarter & easier and catch every inspiring moments in real-time. 

Key features

Designs

Alpha is the first to apply this circle design, which makes the drone lighter and smaller, but equal to, or very much likely be more functional and safety.

There is three levels of speed you can change with your handle or phone App, and we suggest you start to manipulate it from the low level before you totally handle it. it's more safety.

4K HD video and 720 P images will help you record every moment you like. More important, Alpha has applied the advanced tech to increase the stability performance to 60% plus. Compared to others, our team care much more about its CAMERA.

There are four LED lights inside. each two of them are same which means the forth and back direction, this is most important function when you are using it in the nights, At the same time, those LED lights make Alpha colorful and funny.

 

Technology

Barometric hover

Alpha drone will stop according to the barometric pressure, this will be important for you when you are switch the handle model to phone control, Alpha will work smoothly and provide constantly high quality of videos and pictures. It's good for new beginners.

G-sensor

Work with phone App, you can use this function to control Alpha by moving your phone, which lower the operating thresholds that make everyone could easily to enjoy it

Intelligence voice

Tired of manipulating it with your hands？ try to fly it by talking to it. Turn the speaker function on your App, speak to her, and she will do as told. It's interesting and a great gift for Kids

3D VR Model

If you have a equipment of VR, just put it on and enjoy the feeling of flying in the sky. You will get the most real feelings and view as the Alpha does. 

In the App model, you can fly the right direction on your phone screen, move your finger up/down or left/right, our Alpha will do exactly the same orders.

 

Alpha App

Download our App on Apple store or Google play, you can control the Alpha with your phone

 

Take off and land with one button

 

 

Button functions

 

Those functions of Alpha will be awesome:

Push the Button of "Turn over", Alpha will do lots of amazing action in the sky, makes it interesting to use.  

Push the "Central" button, Alpha will return back wherever it is

 

Specs

Accessories

 

Package

 

Challenges & Risks

All our Alpha functions have been tested and improved by our team, Please allow me to give them great thanks. All functions could be achieved and we have been trying to provide excellent user experience for all our supporters.
Based on the current product drift and parts, we will begin to manufacture with the on-going project, and try to deliver it to your door as soon as possible. We realize that there will be some uncertain factors in manufacturing and shipment even you are trying to avoid those. But please give us a chance to prove you our ability to handle this. 

For the shipping issue. we are already preparing it now, once this campaign is live and we will manufacture it, and we will fulfill the shipping information and arrange for shipment in one week. We know how it feels to wait for products, we will do our best. 

For the fixed funding.  We will try our best to raise the target funding and make this campaign alive for everyone when it ends. But if we failed and you still want it, we will get in touch with you after this campaign ends and you can make the payment by PayPal or Credit Card with the same price here to get it. Or you can reach to: alphadroneigg@outlook.com, to know about our policy about this, we are glad to be helpful! Also, we need your faith in us, We will do our best to make this happen, meanwhile, we are asking for your help, to spread the words for our campaign. It does matters! 

 

FAQs

1. How long it will flies when full of charging?

You can fly it for half an hour once full of charging, because of its light and small body design, its flying height will reach to as high as to 120m. 

2.  What if the drone drop out from the sky?

We have designed the body with durable material, if the drone drop out from the height(10 m), it will not cause any damage to this drone, but you should take care when you are operating it.

3. What's the weight?

The weight of our Alpha is 1.5 Kg. 

4. Is this available for Children? 

Yes, our Alpha drone is easy to control with its Barometric hover technology, you can smoothly switch from phone to handle without worry about the stable of this drone.it will be a good gift for your kids as the new year is coming.

5. What are those in your package?

Our package includes USB cable for charging, phone holder, blades, and the storage bag, which is convenience when you are going to take it outside. 

6. What's your warranty?

Considering that there will be some manufacturing or logistic problems, we will provide 2 years warranty for all our supporters.

 

 Helps us spread the words
